humble+beginnings+a+story+of+shared+growth+and+transformation+has+unfolded.+In+the+present+day%2C+this+partnership+between+brilliant+agricultural+business+minds%2C+and+high-performance+software+engineering+teams+have+delivered+meaningful+land+impactful+value+to+Omnia+and+its+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHannes+van+Heerden%2C+GM+of+Innovation+within+Omnia%2C+talks+about+his+Agritech+journey+supported+by+Entelect%3B+delivering+the+Science+of+growing+right+into+customers%26rsquo%3B+hands.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Ciframe+allow%3D%22accelerometer%3B+autoplay%3B+encrypted-media%3B+gyroscope%3B+picture-in-picture%22+allowfullscreen%3D%22%22+frameborder%3D%220%22+height%3D%22375%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FWcqpwOfsgII%22+width%3D%22650%22%3E%3C%2Fiframe%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FOmniaLabAnalysisImage2.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+650px%3B+height%3A+531px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

te+in+the+green+energy+economy.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+POWERX+realized+the+need+for+a+bespoke+management+system+to+support+its+business+of+trading+renewable+electricity%2C+a+unique+and+complex+business+model.+The+solution+would+need+to+reach+across+several+business+functions+internally+-+including+sales%2C+operations+and+billing+-+as+well+as+external+users.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FNewsPic2.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+partnered+with+the+team+at+POWERX+to+conceive%2C+formulate+and+build+the+end-to-end+platform+which+supports+their+core+business+functions+related+to+sales+tracking%2C+supply+and+demand%2C+allocation+and+reporting.+The+new+platform+is+now+managing+all+aspects+of+the+business+cycle+without+over-complicating+functions+and+roles%2C+an+important+consideration+and+requirement+for+their+smaller+operations+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FpowerX.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+473px%3B+height%3A+125px%3B+float%3A+left%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPOWERX+is+growing+rapidly+throughout+South+Africa%2C+actively+looking+for+clean+energy+partners+and+re-sellers.+If+you%26%2339%3Bre+a+municipality%2C+a+power+generator+or+a+business+who+wants+to+know+more+about+how+POWERX+can+help+you+-+find+them+at+http%3A%2F%2Fwww.powerx.energy%2Fpowerx-get-in-touch%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Entrepreneurs+need+open+cloud%2C+not+protectionism %3C%21--%5Bif+%21mso%5D%3E+%3Cstyle%3E+v%5C%3A%2A+%7Bbehavior%3Aurl%28%23default%23VML%29%3B%7D+o%5C%3A%2A+%7Bbehavior%3Aurl%28%23default%23VML%29%3B%7D+w%5C%3A%2A+%7Bbehavior%3Aurl%28%23default%23VML%29%3B%7D+.shape+%7Bbehavior%3Aurl%28%23default%23VML%29%3B%7D+%3C%2Fstyle%3E+%3C%21%5Bendif%5D--%3E%3C%21--%5Bif+gte+mso+9%5D%3E%3Cxml%3E+%3Co%3AOfficeDocumentSettings%3E+%3Co%3AAllowPNG%2F%3E+%3C%2Fo%3AOfficeDocumentSettings%3E+%3C%2Fxml%3E%3C%21%5Bendif%5D--%3E%3C%21--%5Bif+gte+mso+9%5D%3E%3Cxml%3E+%3Cw%3AWordDocument%3E+%3Cw%3AView%3ENormal%3C%2Fw%3AView%3E+%3Cw%3AZoom%3E0%3C%2Fw%3AZoom%3E+%3Cw%3ATrackMoves%3Efalse%3C%2Fw%3ATrackMoves%3E+%3Cw%3ATrackFormatting%2F%3E+%3Cw%3APunctuationKerning%2F%3E+%3Cw%3AValidateAgainstSchemas%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ASaveIfXMLInvalid%3Efalse%3C%2Fw%3ASaveIfXMLInvalid%3E+%3Cw%3AIgnoreMixedContent%3Efalse%3C%2Fw%3AIgnoreMixedContent%3E+%3Cw%3AAlwaysShowPlaceholderText%3Efalse%3C%2Fw%3AAlwaysShowPlaceholderText%3E+%3Cw%3ADoNotPromoteQF%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ALidThemeOther%3EEN-ZA%3C%2Fw%3ALidThemeOther%3E+%3Cw%3ALidThemeAsian%3EX-NONE%3C%2Fw%3ALidThemeAsian%3E+%3Cw%3ALidThemeComplexScript%3EX-NONE%3C%2Fw%3ALidThemeComplexScript%3E+%3Cw%3ACompatibility%3E+%3Cw%3ABreakWrappedTables%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ASnapToGridInCell%2F%3E+%3Cw%3AWrapTextWithPunct%2F%3E+%3Cw%3AUseAsianBreakRules%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ADontGrowAutofit%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ASplitPgBreakAndParaMark%2F%3E+%3Cw%3AEnableOpenTypeKerning%2F%3E+%3Cw%3ADontFlipMirrorIndents%2F%3E+%3Cw%3AOverrideTableStyleHps%2F%3E+%3C%2Fw%3ACompatibility%3E+%3Cm%3AmathPr%3E+%3Cm%3AmathFont+m%3Aval%3D%22Cambria+Math%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AbrkBin+m%3Aval%3D%22before%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AbrkBinSub+m%3Aval%3D%22%26%2345%3B-%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AsmallFrac+m%3Aval%3D%22off%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AdispDef%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AlMargin+m%3Aval%3D%220%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3ArMargin+m%3Aval%3D%220%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AdefJc+m%3Aval%3D%22centerGroup%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AwrapIndent+m%3Aval%3D%221440%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AintLim+m%3Aval%3D%22subSup%22%2F%3E+%3Cm%3AnaryLim+m%3Aval%3D%22undOvr%22%2F%3E+%3C%2Fm%3A +ubiquitous%2C+low-cost+bandwidth%2C+and+cheaper+access+devices+like+smartphones%2C+tablets%2C+and+netbooks%2C+there+are+fewer+obstacles+than+ever+to+turn+an+idea+into+a+business.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+Cloud-based+Software-as-a-Service+%28SaaS%29+represents+a+great+opportunity+for+South+African+entrepreneurs.+The+much+lower+barriers+to+entry+and+simplicity+of+launching+cloud-based+services+open+up+international+markets+to+local+businesses.+This+allows+local+businesses+to+generate+revenue+flows+into+the+country.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+Analyst+firm+IDC+expects+the+worldwide+SaaS+market+to+reach+more+than+US%2440+billion+by+2014%2C+while+ABI+Research+expects+the+global+market+for+hosted+services+to+reach+US%2434+billion+in+2012.+This+trend+is+reflected+in+the+South+African+market+where+interest+in+SaaS+is+growing+rapidly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+Cloud+services+offer+reliability%2C+almost+effortless+scalability+and+substantial+cost+savings.+However%2C+South+African+hosting+is+not+a+competitive+option.+The+largest+local+players+are%2C+quite+simply%2C+charging+too+much+for+services+that+can+easily+be+sourced+overseas+at+a+much+lower+cost.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+How+much+lower%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+While+the+base+fees+charged+for+cloud+hosting+may+be+comparable%2C+the+real+test+of+a+service+provider%26rsquo%3Bs+offering+is+the+data+transfer+costs+on+offer.+Currently%2C+data+traffic+for+South+African+hosting+options+costs+between+R15+and+R85+per+GB+%28some+charge+more%29%2C+depending+on+the+level+of+service+required.+Foreign+cloud+service+providers+charge+as+little+as+R1+per+GB+%28depending+on+the+exchange+rate%29+for+data+transfer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+South+African+service+providers+simply+can%26rsquo%3Bt+compete+with+the+cloud+offerings+of+Rackspace%2C+Microsoft+Azure+or+Amazon+EC2.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+question+of+scale.+Foreign+cloud+service+providers+can+afford+to+build+a+much+larger+server+farm+because+they+have+a+potential+pool+of+hundreds+of+thousands+of+customers.+Because+they+have+a+much+larger+customer+base%2C+they+can+also+charge+each+customer+less.+Local+cloud+service+providers+are+forced+to+charge+more+because+they+have+a+smaller+pool+of+potential+customers%2C+and+are+dependent+on+bandwidth+providers+that+charge+exorbitant+prices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+In+our+experience%2C+the+argument+that+local+hosting+is+far+quicker+than+foreign+hosting+does+not+hold+water.+As+long+as+the+foreign+hosting+site+is+chosen+to+capitalise+on+the+new+undersea+cables%2C+the+average+user+will+not+notice+any+slow-down+in+service+for+software+hosted+on+foreign+servers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+The+Protection+of+Personal+Information+Bill+%28PPI%29+is+another+potential+spanner+in+the+works.+The+PPI+Bill+is+intended+to+offer+South+Africans+protection+of+their+personal+information%2C+and+places+the+onus+on+companies+collecting+such+information+to+ensure+that+that+information+is+collected+with+consent%2C+and+is+stored+and+used+in+a+secure+and+responsible+manner.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+The+PPI+bill+places+stringent+requirements+on+personal+information+that+is+sent+outside+of+South+Africa.+If+an+entrepreneur+chooses+to+use+foreign+hosting+he+has+to+ensure+that%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A38.25pt%3Bmso-add-space%3A+auto%3Btext-indent%3A-18.0pt%3Bline-height%3Anormal%3Bmso-list%3Al0+level1+lfo1%22%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-bidi-font-family%3ACalibri%3Bmso-bidi-theme-font%3Aminor-latin%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-list%3AIgnore%22%3E1.%3Cspan+style%3D%22font%3A7.0pt+%26quot%3BTimes+New+Roman%26quot%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3EThe+country+the+data+will+be+stored+in+is+subject+to+similar+legislature+as+the+PPI+Bill+in+South+Africa%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A38.25pt%3Bmso-add-space%3A+auto%3Btext-indent%3A-18.0pt%3Bline-height%3Anormal%3Bmso-list%3Al0+level1+lfo1%22%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-bidi-font-family%3ACalibri%3Bmso-bidi-theme-font%3Aminor-latin%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-list%3AIgnore%22%3E2.%3Cspan+style%3D%22font%3A7.0pt+%26quot%3BTimes+New+Roman%26quot%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3EHe+has+explicit+consent+from+each+of+his+customers+to+store+their+information+outside+of+South+Africa%2C+and%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoListParagraphCxSpLast%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A38.25pt%3Bmso-add-space%3A+auto%3Btext-indent%3A-18.0pt%3Bline-height%3Anormal%3Bmso-list%3Al0+level1+lfo1%22%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-bidi-font-family%3ACalibri%3Bmso-bidi-theme-font%3Aminor-latin%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-list%3AIgnore%22%3E3.%3Cspan+style%3D%22font%3A7.0pt+%26quot%3BTimes+New+Roman%26quot%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3EThe+transfer+of+personal+information+is+only+done+when+it+is+necessary+for+him+to+deliver+on+the+contract+he+has+with+his+customer+and+is+for+the+benefit+of+the+customer.%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-spacerun%3Ayes%22%3E%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+South+African+entrepreneurs+should+be+able+to+focus+on+creating+Value+Added+Services.+Legislation+such+as+the+PPI+Bill+could+force+entrepreneurs+to+choose+a+far+more+expensive+cloud+service+provider+in+order+to+simplify+the+contract+and+reduce+risk.+This+is+an+unnecessary+throttle+on+our+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+%26ldquo%3BThe+global+information+economy%2C+including+cloud+computing%2C+works+best+when+information+flows+freely+across+borders+in+a+responsible+way+with+appropriate+privacy+and+security+protections.%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-spacerun%3Ayes%22%3E%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3EEfforts+to+lock+data+within+a+particular+country+or+region+will+not+only+undermine+the+benefits+of+the+global+information+economy%2C+but+also+disadvantage+local+enterprises+that+want+to+take+advantage+of+the+tremendous+cost%2C+productivity%2C+and+innovation+advantages+that+cloud+computing+enables%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Benioff.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+A+South+African+entrepreneur+who+offers+SaaS+using+cheaper%2C+more+reliable+offshore+hosting+will+be+able+to+offer+products+at+a+lower+cost.+New+businesses+will+be+able+to+sell+more+products+to+more+people+and%2C+in+turn%2C+will+be+able+to+grow+his+business+more+effectively.+While+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+advocate+for+irresponsible+use+of+personal+data%2C+I+do+feel+that+we+need+a+legislative+environment+that+is+sensitive+to+the+globalisation+of+IT+that+is+taking+place%2C+and+takes+steps+to+make+it+easier+for+South+Africans+to+benefit.%3Cspan+style%3D%22mso-spacerun%3Ayes%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22+style%3D%22line-height%3Anormal%22%3E+Local+cloud+service+providers+face+an+uphill+battle+in+their+attempts+to+compete+with+foreign+providers.+To+make+matters+worse%2C+the+PPI+Bill+is+a+step+closer+to+protectionism+that+will+shackle+us+to+uneconomic%2C+unreliable%2C+expensive+options+when+there+is%2C+literally%2C+a+world+of+possibilities+out+there+for+us+to+choose+from.%3C%2Fp%3E
South+Africa+desperately+needs+to+encourage+entrepreneurship+as+a+means+to+addressing+the+country%E2%80%99s+job+creation+targets.+A+report+issued+by+FNB+and+the+Gordon+Institute+of+Business+Science+%28GIBS%29+states+that+%E2%80%9Cthe+most+competitive+nations+are+those+that+have+the+highest+level+of+entrepreneurial+activity.%E2%80%9D+The+Total+Entrepreneurial+Activity+%28TEA%29+is+a+measurement+of+the+percentage+of+the+active+population+in+a+country+%28people+aged+between+25+and+64%29+who+are+entrepreneurs.+According+to+International+Entrepreneurship%2C+South+Africa%E2%80%99s+TEA+in+2010+is+8.9%25.+This+is+higher+than+in+previous+years+and+significantly+higher+than+our+average+TEA+over+the+past+decade%3A+6.7%25.+If+South+Africa+wants+to+be+a+meaningful+player+in+the+global+economy%2C+we+have+to+shape+education%2C+society+and+legislation+to+encourage%2C+rather+than+stifle%2C+entrepreneurship.

Make+your+business+a+success+by+living+your+values The+full+article+can+be+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entrepreneurmag.co.za%2Fadvice%2Fgrowing-a-business%2Fperformance-and-growth%2Fno-holy-cows-for-high-growth%2F%22%3Efound+here%3C%2Fa%3E.
Dr+Charles+Pritchard%2C+Entelect+CEO%2C+was+recently+interviewed+by+Entrepreneurmag.+Here%27s+a+taster+of+an+upcoming+feature.+He+outlines+the+importance+of+knowing+your+limitations%2C+listening+to+others+and+avoiding+being+everything+to+everyone.+He+emphasizes+the+importance+of+following+ones+heart+and+pushing+this+through%2C+but+always+taking+guidance+from+top+management+who+often+see+things+differently+and+may+have+a+more+sober+insight+in+particular+areas.+Most+importantly+he+sticks+to+the+motto+of+hiring+the+best%2C+and+living+ones+values+-+something+he+believes+is+the+key+ingredient+to+Entelect%27s+continued+growth+and+success.

Software+skills+trending+in+2014 From+an+employer%26rsquo%3Bs+perspective%2C+to+make+yourself+an+attractive+hire+it+is+important+to+have+an+up-to-date+knowledge+of+trending+technologies.+The+ability+to+show+that+you+are+proactive+in+your+research+and+awareness%2C+that+even+though+you+may+not+have+two+years%26rsquo%3B+experience+in+a+language+or+toolset+but+can+identify+what+it+is%2C+where+it+came+from%2C+why+it+exists+and+how+to+apply+it%2C+shows+you+have+an+interest+in+the+subject+and+a+positive+attitude.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cem%3ETechRepublic%3C%2Fem%3E+Senior+Editor%2C+Teena+Hammond%2C+together+with+a+panel+of+industry+experts%2C+identifies+the+most+recent+general+trends+in+2014%2C+specifically+in+the+fields+of+security%2C+big+data+and+cloud-based+services.+Find+the+article+at%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.techrepublic.com%2Farticle%2Ftop-it-job-skills-in-2014-big-data-mobile-cloud%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.techrepublic.com%2Farticle%2Ftop-it-job-skills-in-2014-big-data-mobile-cloud%2F%3C%2Fa%3E+Entelect+has+seen+a+similar+trend+with+software+development+projects+specific+to+South+Africa.+The+predominant+focus+in+software+projects+and+related+services+is+now+moving+past+the+2013+rapid+adoption+of+cloud-based+development+towards+the+necessary+maturity+in+the+implementation+these+services.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+fast-approaching+adolescence+stage+in+the+usage+of+cloud-based+services+finds+companies+further+developing+aspects+of+security+and+considerations+on+specific+IT-governance+and+the+impact+of+specific+legislation%2C+such+as+the+PoPI+%28the+Protection+of+Personal+Information+Act+4+of+2013%29.+The+industry+is+currently+also+addressing+teething+problems+surrounding+big+data+management%2C+refactoring+for+better+data+flow+and+further+facilitating+intelligent+reporting+of+big+data.+Many+of+the+initial+implementations+overlooked+these+concepts+and+are+now+reacting+by+redeveloping+or+refactoring+implementations+caused+by+the+rush+to+get+onto+the+cloud.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+continues+to+notice+the+same+interest+in+outward-facing+concepts+such+as+UX+%28User+eXperience%29+and+responsive+design%2C+and+the+notable+back-end+trending+of+technologies%2C+such+as+NoSQL+data+stores%2C+and+the+implementations+of+Hadoop%2C+Mongo+and+Raven.+Additional+key+considerations+that+Entelect+advises+individuals+and+companies+to+consider+include+HTML5%2C+CSS3+and+other+frameworks+related+to+mobile+platform+development.+Mobile+technologies+and+apps+remain+a+strong+trend+in+2014%2C+these+can+now+be+seen+as+an+expectation+%28or+subset%29+of+any+project+delivery.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+important+for+software+engineers+to+keep+the+above+trends+in+mind%2C+so+in+an+interview+situation%2C+when+you+are+asked+what+technology+interests+you%2C+you+have+an+opinion+on+them.+If+you+are+not+active+in+the+job+market%2C+knowledge+of+these+technologies+can+only+add+value+to+your+current+position.
%3Cstrong%3EMark+Beets+%28GM%3A+Business+Development%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+The+software+industry+is+renowned+for+moving+at+breakneck+speed+%E2%80%93+a+three-week+holiday+can+see+you+returning+to+work+and+being+neck-deep+in+new+terminology%2C+technology+and+techniques.+It+has+become+critical+as+a+software+engineer+to+stay+abreast+of+technological+advances%2C+specifically+the+tools%2C+processes+and+platforms+to+which+you+may+be+exposed.+This+will+enable+you+to+identify+the+best+tool+or+framework+for+a+job+and+it+will+also+help+you+justify+your+decisions.

You+can%E2%80%99t+%E2%80%98outsource%E2%80%99+love %26lsquo%3BOf+course+money+helps+but+physically+engaging+with+love+is+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about.+If+people+know+they+are+loved+and+someone+else+out+there+cares+for+them%2C+they+will+react+more+positively+%26ndash%3B+and+it+involves+only+a+little+bit+of+time+and+sacrifice%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Pritchard.+%26lsquo%3BWe+have+witnessed+this+effect+in+our+Foundation+programme%2C+where+some+of+our+children+and+young+adults+have+had+significant+turnarounds+in+academic+performance+%26ndash%3B+even+without+teaching+them+subject+matter.+We+focus+on+supporting+them+with+life+questions%2C+helping+them+to+nurture+their+unique+strengths+and+of+course%2C+getting+them+excited+about+what%26rsquo%3Bs+out+there+for+them+when+they+leave+school.+We+are+very+grateful+to+our+staff+who+give+up+their+personal+time+to+support+people+in+need.%26rsquo%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Pritchard+goes+on+to+say+that+the+act+of+offering+expertise+and+physical+support+has+more+human+impact+than+offering+just+money%2C+so+even+organisations+that+do+not+have+the+budget+to+assist+others%2C+can+in+fact+reach+out+with+great+effect.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Click+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Ftechgirl.co.za%2F2014%2F07%2F24%2Fyou-cannot-outsource-your-love%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehere%3C%2Fa%3E+to+read+the+Tech+Girl+article+and+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FSocialResponsibility%2FGivingBackWithGallerySidebar.aspx%22%3Ehere%3C%2Fa%3E+to+find+out+more+about+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+varied+foundation+programmes.
Sam+Wright+at+Tech+Girl+recently+interviewed+Entelect+CEO%2C+Dr+Charles+Pritchard.+Pritchard+asserts+that+companies+need+to+take+ownership+of+their+own+community-support+initiatives.+Although+there+is+a+place+for+allocating+budgets+to+NGOs+that+support+the+poor%2C+he+suggests+that+it+is+far+more+effective+if+company+employees+also+become+involved+in+supporting+their+beneficiaries.

Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%29 Have+we+not+learned+to+detect%2C+protect+and+mitigate+against+these+types+of+intrusions%3F+If+so%2C+as+a+customer+without+technical+know-how%2C+how+do+you+trust+a+software+vendor+to+provide+secure+and+trustworthy+systems%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+Software+takes+a+look+at+a+few+angles+on+this+topic%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EVolume%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+a+rough+estimate+of+the+total+number+of+active+websites+online+as+of+March+2015+sitting+at+1.2+billion+%26ndash%3B+and+the+explosive+growth+seen+over+the+past+5+years+-+the+reason+we+see+so+much+bad+press+is+surely+partly+due+to+the+sheer+volume+of+public+facing+web+presences+being+deployed+into+the+wild.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately%2C+the+more+websites+we+have%2C+the+more+exposure+there+is%2C+and+there+more+news+there+will+be+of+one+or+another+organisation+becoming+a+victim+to+web+security+related+incidents.+Given+this+vast+web+of+information+available+via+the+internet%2C+this+volume+also+makes+it+an+attractive+target.+Particularly+with+almost+all+developed-world+banks+having+online+services%2C+and+the+spread+of+social+and+personal+information+online%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+not+to+stumble+upon+something+valuable+to+somebody.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMotive%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+second+side+to+this+debate%2C+and+often+the+one+which+frustrates+consumers+and+organisations+when+they+are+the+victim%3A+why+was+I+targeted%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAccess+or+theft%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+general%2C+we+think+of+security+when+we+have+something+to+protect+-+our+cars%2C+homes%2C+possessions+and%2C+in+the+case+of+web+applications%2C+data.+If+your+web+system+stores+or+processes+data+of+value%2C+such+as+payments%2C+personal+information%2C+passwords+or+anything+remotely+confidential%2C+then+it+needs+to+be+protected.+This+information+has+value+to+somebody%2C+so+there+is+a+clear+motive+here.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+forgivable+to+think+that+your+systems+are+safe+because+there+is+nothing+stored+within+that+is+of+value+to+anybody+else%2C+or+where+the+data+is+all+publicly+available+anyway.+Unfortunately%2C+there+are+still+two+remaining+motive%26rsquo%3Bs+that+will+take+advantage+of+this+thinking+%26ndash%3B+vandalism%2C+and+infrastructure.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EVandalism%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Vandalism+of+web+sites+is+an+unfortunate+reality+%26ndash%3B+where+the+motive+is+purely+one+of+challenge%2C+fun+or+an+attempt+to+embarrass+or+expose+the+victim.+Vandalism+motives+can+range+from+inconvenience+and+petty+meddling+to+full+scale+sabotage+and+ransom+%28seen+in+political+and+corporate+breaches+recently%29.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EInfrastructure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Infrastructure+is+a+more+interesting+motive.+In+today%26rsquo%3Bs+highly+connected+networks%2C+there+are+often+many+more+uses+for+server+hardware+than+the+systems+or+data+hosted+within.+The+most+prominent+one+%28when+the+data+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+the+actual+target%29+is+to+stage+and+execute+more+malicious+attacks+on+other+targeted+victims.+Using+%26lsquo%3Bbotnets%26rsquo%3B%2C+large+numbers+of+compromised+and+synchronised+servers+or+computers+online%2C+large+scale+attacks+such+as+are+possible%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMitigation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+paints+quite+a+grisly+picture%2C+but+there+are+answers+to+be+found.+The+truth+is%2C+like+many+things+in+the+Information+Technology+industry%2C+there+is+a+cost%2Fbenefit+ratio+to+be+considered+for+the+approach+to+protection.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately+there%26rsquo%3Bs+nothing+to+be+done+about+the+volume+of+websites+and+the+growth+of+the+industry+so+there+is+little+to+be+done+to+curb+statistics+that+way.+Looking+at+each+motive%2C+we+can+however+start+to+position+various+possible+protections.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+good+news+is+that+on+one+side+of+the+spectrum+is+a+mix+of+motive+and+risk+that+we+can+be+proactive+about.+A+staggering+amount+of+web-based+security+breaches+are+perpetrated+via+automated+tools+or+bots+that+are+constantly+scanning+the+web+for+vulnerabilities+to+exploit.+These+are%2C+at+any+point+in+time%2C+often+only+a+handful+of+risks.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Knowledge+of+these+vulnerabilities+equips+a+development+team+with+the+critical+eye+required+to+identify+risks+early%2C+and+close+those+gaps+long+before+the+system+sees+production.+Since+these+vulnerabilities+change+fairly+frequently+%26ndash%3B+along+with+new+technologies+and+tools+%26ndash%3B+running+once-off+training+courses+or+seminars+rarely+has+lasting+effects.+It+makes+more+sense+to+us+to+bake+this+awareness+into+the+day+to+day+development+processes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+a+software+development+company%2C+Entelect+takes+an+integrated+and+active+approach+to+security%2C+we+believe+that+awareness+and+visibility+of+these+vulnerabilities+throughout+development%2C+but+especially+at+the+start%2C+are+the+most+effective+way+to+build+secure+systems.+Building+security+into+a+web+application+after+it+is+done%2C+in+our+experience%2C+is+vastly+more+difficult%2C+and+costly%2C+and+less+effective%2C+than+including+it+in+from+the+ground+up.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+key+resource+we+recommend+to+this+end+is+the+oWASP+project.+Found+at+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.owasp.org%2C+this+organisation+is+a+non-profit+with+a+mission+%26ldquo%3Bto+make+software+security+visible%2C+so+that+individuals+and+organizations+worldwide+can+make+informed+decisions+about+true+software+security+risks.%26rdquo%3B+Their+yearly+%26lsquo%3Btop-ten%26rsquo%3B+projects%2C+in+particular%2C+help+to+identify+and+indicate+the+most+prevalent+security+flaws%2C+most+of+which+are+very+easy+to+close%2C+or+at+least+provide+the+knowledge+about+them+so+as+not+to+remain+ignorant+of+the+risks.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+the+more+scary+side+of+motive%2C+and+the+one+that+most+frequents+the+headlines+%26ndash%3B+deliberate+breach+for+theft+of+data.+With+the+high+end+of+the+scale+being+the+banks+and+financial+institutions+who+are+obvious+targets+for+fraud+and+criminal+activity.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+bad+news+is+that+highly+organised+and+targeted+attacks+are+often+extremely+difficult+%28read%3A+costly%29+to+detect+or+prevent.+In+this+situation%2C+if+the+organisational+objective+is+to+feel+completely+covered+from+any+and+all+vulnerabilities%2C+the+capital+and+ongoing+costs+can+quickly+escalate.+These+costs+are+for+specialised+hardware%2C+regular+penetration+testing+and+security+audits%2C+software+development%2C+and+ongoing+expert+consulting.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+conclusion%2C+it+is+clear+to+us+that+security+as+part+of+Software+Development+is+so+important.+Luckily%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+also+quite+straight+forward+to+achieve+thorough+coverage.+With+only+a+relative+minority+of+systems+being+deliberately+and+maliciously+attacked%2C+the+remainder+need+to+take+more+care.+More+care+with+learning%2C+evaluating+and+mitigating+web+vulnerabilities%2C+based+on+their+chosen+technologies.+Awareness+is+critical+%26ndash%3B+notably+awareness+of+the+current+generation+vulnerabilities+that+are+being+easily+exploited+through+automated+attacks.+Secondly%2C+remedial+action+applied+early+and+often+during+development%2C+to+evaluate+and+close+any+vulnerabilities+through+technology+or+features+will+go+a+long+way+to+taking+your+systems+off+a+malicious+user%26rsquo%3Bs+radar.

What+do+South+Africans+have+against+ICT%3F After+speaking+to+various+friends%2C+family+members+and+clients+about+the+subject%2C+it+seems+that+very+few+South+Africans+consider+careers+in+software+development+or+information+and+communication+technologies+%28ICT%29+when+leaving+school.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+a+number+of+reasons+for+this%2C+but+first+let%26rsquo%3Bs+look+at+why+a+career+in+software+should+be+given+some+consideration+by+this+country%26rsquo%3Bs+youth.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+2014%2C+Fortune%26rsquo%3Bs+100+Best+Companies+to+Work+For+revealed+that+four+of+the+top+ten+companies+were+software+or+technology-related+organisations.+In+fact%2C+the+top+two+were+both+software+companies.+Of+course%2C+this+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+an+indicator+of+the+attractiveness+of+all+software+companies%2C+but+the+%26lsquo%3BGoogle-philosophy%26rsquo%3B+and+Silicon+Valley+culture+is+certainly+more+prevalent+in+tech+companies.+On+the+local+front%2C+according+to+Career+Junction%26rsquo%3Bs+Index+%28July+2015%29%2C+the+ICT+industry+sees+the+highest+job+vacancy+levels+in+the+country.+The+demand+for+people+to+fill+ICT+roles+is+more+than+double+that+of+the+engineering+industry%2C+which+has+the+third-highest+demand+level+on+the+Index.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+addition%2C+according+to+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fbuzzsouthafrica.com%2Fcareer-choice-highest-paid-jobs-in-south-africa-2015%2F4%2F%22%3EBuzz+South+Africa%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+the+highest-paying+job+%28on+average%29+in+SA+in+2015+is+that+of+a+software+engineer.+This+particular+statistic+is+difficult+to+measure+and+differs+from+survey+to+survey%2C+however%2C+simply+because+of+the+demand+for+these+skills%2C+software+engineers+and+developers+will+usually+be+in+the+top+ten+of+any+salary+survey.+Finally%2C+in+the+biggest+worldwide+developer+survey+%26ndash%3B+StackOverflow%26rsquo%3Bs+2015+Developer+Survey+%26ndash%3B+around+70+percent+of+participants+said+that+they+were+self-taught+or+trained+on+the+job%2C+indicating+new+levels+of+sustained+value+to+employees+presented+by+this+field.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So%2C+if+ICT+companies+are+usually+good+companies+to+work+for%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+relatively+easy+to+find+a+job%2C+an+expensive+and+lengthy+qualification+is+often+not+required+and+the+pay+is+above+average%2C+why+don%26rsquo%3Bt+South+Africans+want+to+follow+this+path%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+At+present%2C+the+biggest+reason+is+our+backgrounds.+A+large+percentage+of+this+country%26rsquo%3Bs+population+grew+up+without+computers.+However%2C+this+is+changing+%26ndash%3B+smart+device+ownership+is+increasing+and+hopefully+we%26rsquo%3Bll+see+future+generations+take+a+greater+interest+in+the+software+element+of+these+devices.+To+add+to+this%2C+renewed+focus+and+commitment+by+public+and+private+sector+organisations+to+work+towards+improving+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+STEM+%28Science%2C+Technology%2C+Engineering+and+Mathematics%29+schooling+performance+is+expected+to+yield+positive+results%2C+which+will+also+play+a+large+part+in+making+the+ICT+field+more+accessible+for+young+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+also+a+perceived+lack+of+%26lsquo%3Bcool+factor%26rsquo%3B+around+the+industry.+However%2C+software+development+is+one+of+the+few+white-collar+industries+where+employees+can+have+the+instant+gratification+of+building+something+from+scratch.+With+software+being+a+part+of+everything+nowadays+-+from+apps+on+phones+and+devices%2C+social+media%2C+as+well+as+the+process+which+runs+a+DSTV+Explora+or+the+SatNav+in+a+car+-+software+developers%26rsquo%3B+work+is+often+showcased+in+the+public+eye.+What+could+be+cooler+than+that%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+comparison%2C+the+ICT+industry+is+the+largest+private+sector+employer+in+India.+India+has+a+population+of+more+than+one+billion+people%2C+and+has+embraced+an+industry+that+barely+existed+there+twenty+years+ago.+This+has+made+the+nation+one+of+the+most+powerful+ICT+forces+globally%2C+and+demand+for+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+ICT+services+has+driven+significant+economic+development.+African+countries+such+as+Kenya+and+Nigeria+are+also+following+suit.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+South+Africa%2C+the+ICT+market+continues+to+expand%2C+and+the+need+for+software+professionals+is+clearly+present.+However%2C+we+currently+just+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+people+with+the+right+skills+to+be+able+to+meet+this+demand+and+play+on+the+world+ICT+stage.+If+Indian+can+use+this+industry+to+boost+their+economy%2C+why+can%26rsquo%3Bt+we%2C+and+why+don%26rsquo%3Bt+we%3F
Shashi+Hansjee+%28CEO+-+Entelect%29%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3EAfter+speaking+to+various+friends%2C+family+members+and+clients+about+the+subject%2C+it+seems+that+very+few+South+Africans+consider+careers+in+software+development+or+information+and+communication+technologies+%28ICT%29+when+leaving+school.

Choosing+the+right+company+for+you+%E2%80%93+part+two %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EGrowth%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+looking+at+small-+and+medium-sized+companies%2C+it+is+important+to+look+at+their+growth+%28head+count+and+client+base%29+over+the+last+few+years%2C+wherever+possible.+Joining+a+company+that+is+experiencing+an+accelerated+growth+can+be+very+beneficial+to+your+career+in+the+long+term.+However%2C+on+the+flip+side%2C+a+company+that+is+losing+customers+and+shrinking+its+business+may+ultimately+not+have+room+for+you.+Look+for+companies+that+lead+in+their+industry+and+that+are+performing+well%2C+acquiring+new+clients+and+retaining+the+business+and+loyalties+of+old+ones.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EReputation+of+the+company+and+its+staff%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Do+some+research+to+try+to+understand+the+image+the+company+holds+in+the+industry.+Working+for+a+company+synonymous+for+quality+and+delivery+will+be+seen+as+a+positive+reflection+of+your+abilities+and+attitude.+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ECulture+and+values%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+company+culture+and+its+values+are+very+important+to+your+happiness+and+growth+within+the+company.+Ask+about+the+company+culture+and+the+team+structure+to+try+and+ensure+that+the+ethics%2C+values%2C+team+dynamics%2C+management+style+and+atmosphere+are+in-line+with+what+you+would+like.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EEmployee+turnover%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Because+developers%2C+analysts%2C+project+managers+are+in+high+demand%2C+they+often+move+between+companies+in+search+for+better+career+opportunities%2C+so+resignations+from+IT+companies+or+divisions+are+natural+and+organic.+However%2C+be+weary+of+companies+with+higher-than-normal+employee+turnover.+Generally%2C+companies+with+this+effect+have+underlying+issues+that+may+not+easily+be+seen.+Try+ascertaining+what+the+management%26rsquo%3Bs+attitude+is+toward+employee+development+and+retention.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EManagement+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Management+teams+and+styles+vary+from+company+to+company.+Often%2C+development+managers%2C+team+leads+or+project+managers+are+most+effective+if+they+have+worked+their+way+up+from+developer+or+analyst.+By+doing+so%2C+they+often+have+a+better+understanding+of+the+interests%2C+dynamics+and+intricacies+of+all+parties+and+components%2C+as+well+as+the+business+motives+behind+the+decisions+that+they+make.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EFiner+details%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you%26rsquo%3Bve+applied+for+a+role+and+have+an+interview%2C+try+to+get+a+better+understanding+of+exactly+what+your+day-to-day+job+will+entail.+Make+sure+you+know+what+type+of+development+work+you+are+committing+to.+Make+sure+you+are+acquiring+transferable+skills.+Will+you+be+working+on+challenging+new+development+or+are+you+going+to+be+confined+to+maintenance+work%3F%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+These+are+not+blanket+rules+and+there+are+exceptions+in+every+case+but+hopefully+the+points+raised+in+these+articles+have+given+you+a+better+base+to+make+a+decision+on+your+next+career+move.%3C%2Fp%3E

Choosing+the+right+company+for+you+%E2%80%93+part+one %3Cstrong%3ESize+of+company%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+size+of+the+company+makes+a+significant+difference+in+terms+of+roles%2C+responsibilities%2C+career+opportunities%2C+working+dynamics+and+so+on.+There+is+no+right+or+wrong+size+but+you+do+need+to+find+what+works+for+you+because+both+larger+and+smaller+companies+have+their+advantages+and+disadvantages%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Advantages+of+a+larger+company%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EStructured+career+paths%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EMature+HR+procedures+and+policies%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EFinancial+stability%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Disadvantages+of+a+larger+company%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ERigid%2C+bureaucratic+and+inflexible+systems%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EMore+impersonal%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ELess+room+for+visibility+at+the+top+and+more+layers+of+management+approval+required+for+every+decision%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EPositions+are+clearly+defined+and+developers+are+often+pigeonholed+into+specific+areas+of+the+technology+stack+and+software+development+life+cycle%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Advantages+of+a+smaller+company%3A%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EGreater+opportunity+for+visibility+by+top+management%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EHigher+chance+of+becoming+involved+in+all+areas+of+the+software+development+life+cycle+as+well+as+all+layers+of+the+software+architecture%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EMore+flexibility+and+it+is+typically+easier+to+get+buy-in+for+and+implement+change%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Disadvantages+of+a+smaller+company%3A%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ESlip-ups+and+weak+performances+are+more+visible+by+top+management%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EMay+not+be+financially+stable%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETrack+record%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+the+company+primarily+focuses+on+consulting%2C+have+a+look+at+its+website+to+see+if+it+has+a+track+record+listed.+Read+through+the+most+recent+releases+and+gauge+the+type+of+work+and+technologies+on+which+the+company+focusses.+See+if+the+type+of+projects+listed+are+in+line+with+what+you+envisage+yourself+doing.+Look%2C+too+at+the+technology+stack+used+in+these+projects.+Then+ask+yourself+the+following+questions+to+get+a+measure+of+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+health+and+suitabliity%3A%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+the+company+making+use+of+the+latest+technologies+and+tools%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+company+work+across+a+variety+of+industries+and+technologies+or+does+it+specialise+in+certain+fields%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+the+company+doing+recurring+work+for+the+same+clients%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+it+growing+its+client+base%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EStaff+development%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Mentorship+is+an+integral+part+of+a+developer%26rsquo%3Bs+growth.+For+a+developer+to+accelerate+his+or+her+technical+growth%2C+he+or+she+must+be+working+with+stronger+developers.+This+is+critical+to+laying+the+foundations+of+good+software+practices+that+will+live+with+a+developer+throughout+his+or+her+career.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Training+is+just+as+important+for+the+accelerated+growth+of+a+developer.+Do+some+research+and+ask+around+to+gain+insight+into+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+training+policies.+The+company+does+not+always+need+to+send+you+to+expensive+external+training+sessions+%26ndash%3B+sometimes%2C+self-managed+internal+training+sessions+are+more+beneficial.+These+sessions+are+presented+by+senior+representatives+of+staff+and+have+the+advantage+of+being+relevant+to+the+current+industry+trends.+The+sessions+are+usually+run+throughout+the+year%2C+which+can+be+far+more+useful+than+attending+a+three-day+course+once+a+year.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+part+two+of+%26ldquo%3BChoosing+the+right+company+for+you%26rdquo%3B+I%26rsquo%3Bll+take+a+closer+look+other+determining+factors%2C+including+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+growth%2C+reputation%2C+culture+and+values%2C+as+well+as+issues+surrounding+staff%2C+such+as+management+and+staff+turnover.

Dis-Intra-rupt%3A+The+new+age+of+business+and+looking+inwards %3Cp%3EAs+consumers%2C+we+can+all+agree+that+this+wave+of+market-disruption+is+a+good+thing.+We+all+stand+to+benefit+from+this+new+model+of+engaging+with+traditional+services.+Right+now%2C+you+can+order+a+dry-cleaning+pickup%2C+schedule+a+dog+grooming+for+your+pooch%2C+before+catching+an+online-ordered+taxi+to+the+airport.+Sitting+in+comfort+during+your+journey+you+can+live-trade+on+the+stock+market+in+your+favourite+shares+%28Go+EasyEquities%21%29.+All+these+can+be+accomplished+within+a+few+minutes%2C+with+just+a+few+clicks+on+your+tablet+or+smartphone.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+People+generally+have+a+feeling+of+enjoyment+when+realising+the+benefits+of+using+these+disruptive+apps%2C+primarily+because+of+the+rapid+response+and+instant-gratification+that+is+now+available.+Services+like+Uber+are+commonplace.+So+much+so%2C+%26lsquo%3BUber%26rsquo%3B+has+become+as+much+a+buzzword+as+%26lsquo%3Bdisruption%26rsquo%3B+at+conferences+%28drink%21%29.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Personally%2C+I+had+previously+never+used+a+traditional+metered+taxi%2C+besides+when+travelling+in+a+first-world+country+where+it+is+perceivably+safer+%28cleaner%29+and+I+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+carry+any+cash.+The+implication+is+clear%3A+that+not+only+are+Uber-esque+services+directing+business+away+from+the+traditional+old-school+businesses+-+disruption+now+looks+to+grab+the+attention+of+an+audience+that+has+never+previously+been+serviced.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Fundamentally+though%2C+there+is+still+an+underlying+problem+with+the+older%2C+mature+businesses+trying+to+disrupt+their+existing+market.+Their+primary+problem+is+a+lack+of+%3Cstrong%3Espeed%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%26nbsp%3BTraditional+businesses+are+bogged+down+by+slow+processes%2C+primarily+in+their+procurement+departments+and+within+their+supply+chain+management.+The+proverbial+red-tape+is+preventing+the+necessary+acceleration%2C+movement+and+momentum+that+is+required+to+disrupt+a+market.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Client-facing+disruption+is+now+commonplace%2C+expected+and+easy.+To+attain+the+necessary+speed+to+get+onto+the+wave%2C+I+think+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+for+the+older+businesses+to+first+direct+the+principles+of+this+disruption+movement+inwards.+Businesses+need+to+challenge+the+way+they+operate+internally.+Starting+with+revamping+their+processes+around+purchasing%2C+supplier+management%2C+payroll%2C+HR+%28including+recruitment+and+staff+loyalty+programmes%29+and+ending+with+their+actual+operations%3A+the+day-to-day%2C+business-as-usual%2C+grind.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Businesses+have+to+first+internally+disrupt+to+survive+this+rapid+changing+and+rapid-response+demand+from+a+service-hungry+consumer+market.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+are+often+called+in+to+reinvigorate+an+operational+software-development+environment.+Our+software+expertise+and+years+of+experience+afford+us+a+unique+opportunity+to+help+a+client+embrace+these+changes.+The+easiest+and+quickest+win+is+often+the+systemization+of+functions+that+could+%28and+should%29+be+automated+and+easier+to+use%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EAre+companies+still+using+paper+based+leave+and+expense+claim+forms%3F+Yes.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ESpreadsheets+for+sales+tracking%3F+Yes.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ELengthy+tender+processes+for+research+and+development+%28R%26amp%3BD%29+initiatives%3F+Yes%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+These+are+simple+examples+of+operationally+draining+and+costly+exercises.+These+should+be+completed+in+a+maximum+of+3+clicks%2C+in+under+2+minutes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+every+client+is+different%2C+I+have+on+numerous+occasions+experienced+a+complete+disconnect+between+the+older%2C+mature+business+processes%2C+such+as+traditional+procurement+which+don%26rsquo%3Bt+fit+the+disruptive+millennial+%26amp%3B+on-demand+services+model.+I+acknowledge+that+the+red-tape+is+important%2C+but+not+always+appropriate+for+modern+disruptive+services.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+up-and-coming+w Building+an+effective+software+environment %3Cp%3EMost+people+will+agree+that+any+working+environment+needs+to+be+conducive+to+staff+comfort%2C+happiness+and+output.+To+achieve+this%2C+there+should+be+the+right+combination+of+physical+space%2C+tools%2C+processes+and+people.%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EWithout+the+starting+point+of+a+comfortable+physical+space+and+the+right+tools%2C+the+environment+is+likely+to+fail%2C+irrespective+of+developers%26rsquo%3B+technical+ability.+To+ensure+an+effective+physical+space%2C+consider+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EA+secure+24-hour+office+with+flexi-time+managed+properly.+Employees+should+be+able+to+work+safely+when+they+feel+most+productive.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EFreedom+to+come+into+the+office+on+weekends%2C+whether+for+%26lsquo%3Breal%26rsquo%3B+work+or+for+side+projects+and+social+get-togethers.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EThe+physical+space+needs+to+compliment+the+tools+and+equipment+available.+Staff+need%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+right+equipment+for+the+job+%26ndash%3B+for+example%2C+easy+access+to+whiteboards+enables+the+ability+to+use+models+or+meta-models+%28models+of+models%29+to+communicate+within+a+team+or+with+clients.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EProximity+to+other+teams%2C+preferably+doing+technical+work.+It+is+great+to+feel+part+of+a+busy+and+innovative+company.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EOnce+the+tangible+aspects+of+the+work+environment+are+improved%2C+elements+such+as+the+processes+and+people+can+be+developed.+To+facilitate+effective+processes%2C+a+company+should%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EMinimise+micro-management+and+maximise+visibility+%28to+both+clients+and+management%29+and+accountability.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEncourage+collaboration+with+all+stakeholders%2C+including+the+more+distant+ones.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEmphasise+reward%2C+particularly+team+reward+through+exposure%2C+public+appreciation+and+celebrations%2C+and+personal+rewards+by+way+of+pride+in+achievements+and+difference+made.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EThe+most+important+element+for+an+effective+software+environment+is+the+people+within+it.+For+software+engineers%2C+working+alongside+a+brilliant+team+is+far+more+rewarding+than+having+a+lazy-boy+lounger+as+a+desk+chair.+To+ensure+job+satisfaction%2C+software+companies+should+empower+their+staff+by%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EEncouraging+on-the-job+learning.+Even+in+cases+where+a+team+and+project+is+small%2C+there+are+creative+ways+to+build+these+environments.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BMass%26rsquo%3B+of+team+is+critical+%26ndash%3B+a+larger+team+carries+more+momentum+in+critical+softer+aspects+such+as+culture%2C+pride+and+identity.+This+is+a+critical+learning+at+Entelect+after+ten+years+of+building+software+solutions+in+team+environments.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelopers+like+to+be+grouped+with+like-minded+professionals+so+create+an+environment+that+stimulates+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ECuriosity+%26ndash%3B+engineers+are+curious+and+happier+when+we+learn+something+daily.+We+need+to+be+in+an+environment+where+we+can+feel+a+sense+of+wonder.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ELearning+%26ndash%3B+we+learn+from+those+with+whom+we+work+and+from+informal+conversations%2C+conferences%2C+training+sessions%2C+code+reviews+and+so+on.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ESupport+%26ndash%3B+engineers+who+know+they+will+have+to+show+their+output+%28and+their+workings%29+to+another+engineer%2C+approach+work+very+differently+from+those+who+do+not+and+who+do+not+have+the+same+accountability+on+the+line.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+often+value+growth+above+all+else.+That+feeling+of+learning+something+new%2C+meeting+someone+new%2C+or+experiencing+something+different+on+a+regular+basis+is+key+to+our+happiness.+We+also+need+to+feel+challenged+%26ndash%3B+a+little+pressure+is+a+great+reason+to+get+up+in+the+morning+and+achieve.+Finally%2C+engineers+thrive+on+exposure.+We+all+share+a+curiosity+for+the+unknown%2C+and+a+desire+to+learn+and+solve.+Exposure+keeps+people+satisfied+and+productive%2C+thereby+creating+an+effective+working+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E
Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Managed+Solutions%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+To+get+the+best+out+of+their+engineers%2C+many+firms+create+the+%E2%80%98ideal%E2%80%99+place+for+staff+to+work.+They+install+creative+spaces%2C+televisions+that+are+tuned+to+news+or+live+events%2C+and+state-+of-the-art+meeting+rooms.+Some+also+offer+fantastic+perks+and+rewards.+How+important+are+these+to+creating+an+effective+software+environment%3F+Are+there+other%2C+more+important%2C+factors+to+consider%3F

Finding+the+right+offshoring+partner %3Cp%3EAs+an+organisation+looking+to+use+offshore+software+development+companies%2C+the+emphasis+needs+to+be+on+ensuring+that+there+is+some+cost+benefit+without+sacrificing+quality.+Some+of+the+major+factors+in+determining+quality%2C+centre+around+competency%2C+track+record+and+communication.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECompetency%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+developers+from+the+offshore+organisation+should+be+carefully+vetted.+It+is+worth+interviewing+a+selection+of+developers+and+managers+in+person+to%26nbsp%3Bobtain+an+understanding+of+the+levels+of+competency+of+the+developers%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+offshore+company+should+be+able+to+provide+standards+and+technology+guidelines%2C+and+must+be+willing+to+explain+the+methodology+it+uses+and+how+it+would+adapt+it+for+offshore+projects%2C+if+necessary.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EExpertise+in+multiple+software+technologies+is+also+important.+Often+if+the+company+is+very+specialised+in+one+technology+set%2C+it+becomes+difficult+to+diversify+and+use+new+or+different+technologies%2C+which+may+be+better+suited+to+the+task.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETrack+record%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+company%26rsquo%3Bs+track+record%2C+credentials+and+references+should+also+be+scrutinised+in+order+to+understand+the+level+of+competency+within+the+organisation.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ELook+for+a+company+that+is+big+enough+to+do+the+job+yet+small+enough+to+offer+agility+and+to+make+the+client+important+enough+to+receive+prompt+attention+when+it+is+needed.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EYour+company%26rsquo%3Bs+satisfaction+should+be+a+priority.+A+company+that+specialises+in+software+development+services+%28and+not+only+offers+software+development+as+a+small+part+of+multiple+other+services%29+is+also+advisable.+Many+of+these+organisations+do+fall+into+the+SME+space%2C+so+SMEs+are+definitely+a+great+option+with+this+in+mind.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECommunication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ESpeak+to+as+many+people+from+the+company+as+possible+to+gauge+how+the+communication+would+work.+This+will+help+to+determine+up+front+how+communication+between+the+two+parties+will+function.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+technologies+that+are+used+to+work+remotely+%28whether+they+are+an+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+own+employees+or+outsource+partners%29+are+more+mature+than+ever.+These+technologies+include+communication+mechanisms%2C+such+as+Google+Hangouts%2C+Slack+and+Skype+as+well+as+those+used+in+software+development+%26ndash%3B+distributed+source+control+and+project+management+tools+are+also+increasingly+cloud-based+or+online.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+terms+of+business+trends+that+lead+to+outsourcing%2C+there+are+movements+towards+more+specialised+business.+Many+businesses+are+focusing+on+their+core+and+outsourcing+non-core+or+specialist+areas.+Relying+on+external+expertise+and+focusing+on+real+value-adding+relationships+with+suppliers%2C+vendors+and+partners+is+becoming+more+commonplace.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOutsourcing+gives+organisations+a+way+to+accomplish+scale+and+flexibility+in+resourcing+and+costs.+And+of+course%2C+better+software+is+becoming+a+requirement+for+most+business+nowadays+so+using+highly+qualified+and+specialist+software+development+companies+to+assist+in+this+delivery+makes+good+sense.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Offshoring+to+South+Africa+%E2%80%93+a+beneficial+engagement %3Cp%3EThere+are+several+benefits+that+South+Africa+can+offer+over+other+offshore+destinations+or+to+organisations+looking+to+offshore+from+the+United+States%2C+Europe+and+Australia.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+of+the+main+benefits+is+the+financial+gain.+Typically%2C+offshore+locations+such+as+South+Africa%2C+India+and+the+Philippines+have+a+lower+cost+of+living+than+the+United+States%2C+European+and+Australian+markets+and+therefore%2C+development+resources+are+often+cheaper+in+those+countries.+Obviously%2C+cost-saving+at+the+expense+of+quality+is+not+recommended+and+this+is+the+critical+point.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhether+an+organisation+outsources+software+development+to+a+local+provider+or+an+offshore+provider%2C+it+still+has+to+ensure+those+with+whom+it+is+dealing+are+capable+of+the+task.+Offshoring+to+a+highly+competent%2C+professional+software+development+company+with+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery%2C+and+a+team+of+developers+who+are+highly+qualified+and+experienced+is+the+only+way+that+an+organisation+can+achieve+the+financial+benefit+associated+with+offshoring+without+sacrificing+quality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+most+cases%2C+to+be+successful%2C+the+software+development+process+needs+to+be+iterative+with+high+levels+of+communication%2C+trust+and+collaboration+between+a+client+and+the+provider.+Thus+the+two+major+areas+of+concern+when+offshoring+are+communication+and+trust.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+tools+such+as+Slack%2C+Skype+and+Google+Hangouts+have+made+global+communication+much+easier%2C+there+can+still+be+barriers+around+language+and+culture+that+hinder+the+success+of+a+project.+Working+across+different+time+zones+and+perhaps+even+to+different+working+hours+can+exacerbate+these+problems.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+terms+of+trust%2C+if+a+company+can+physically+see+its+outsourced+development+team+and+can+work+directly+with+them%2C+trust+is+built+up+quicker+and+collaboration+becomes+easier.+Obviously%2C+this+is+more+difficult+in+an+offshore+model+but+there+are+measures+an+organisation+can+take+to+mitigate+this+and+develop+trust.+These+include+talking+to+the+development+team+members+regularly+and+meeting+with+them+in+person+before+the+project+starts.+Starting+small+is+a+good+tactic+%26ndash%3B+if+the+software+company+uses+an+agile+approach%2C+the+engagement+can+be+ended+relatively+quickly+if+that+becomes+necessary.+Exploring+references+around+how+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+software+teams+operate+is+also+critical+to+building+trust.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+there+are+many+companies+across+the+world+to+choose+from%2C+there+are+many+advantages+to+utilising+the+world-class+software+developers+and+software+development+companies+in+South+Africa.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+any+project%2C+cost+is+important+and+although+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+development+resources+are+generally+at+a+lower+cost+than+others%2C+this+cost+saving+does+not+result+in+a+lower+level+of+service+and+output+quality.+While+South+African+software+development+may+be+more+expensive+than+that+from+India+and+other+parts+of+Asia%2C+there+are+a+number+of+factors+that+still+make+it+a+stronger+proposition+in+terms+of+the+ability+to+deliver+quality.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+business+language+in+South+Africa+is+English+and+thus+communication+problems+associated+with+offshoring+software+development+elsewhere+do+not+apply.+While+in+some+countries+companies+often+have+to+shield+their+developers+from+clients+because+of+the+language+barrier%2C+many+South+African+software+companies+can+have+integrated+technical+and+account+management+teams%2C+where+the+whole+team+has+strong+enough+business+communications+skills+to+deal+with+the+client+personally+and+obtain+project+information+directly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+South+African+business+culture+is+also+very+Westernised+in+that+it+is+similar+to+that+found+in+the+United+States%2C+the+United+Kingdom+or+Australia.+Proof+of+this+lies+in+companies+such+as+Entelect+%28www.entelect.co.za%29+whose+offshore+customers+have+all+commented+on+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+compatibility+with+their+own+work+environments+and+cultures%2C+as+well+as+on+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+professionalism+and+ability+to+deliver+complex+technical+solutions+at+a+relatively+low+cost.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africans+are+resourceful+and+entrepreneurial%2C+and+South+African+developers+generally+thrive+on+solving+business+problems+rather+than+producing+code+for+the+sake+of+it.+%26nbsp%3BThey+are+usually+willing+to+give+input+and+challenge+thinking+and+do+not+need+detailed+instructions+to+complete+simple+tasks.+Generally%2C+they+are+capable+of+communicating%2C+showing+initiative+and+taking+responsibility.+These+are+common+issues+associated+with+outsourcing+to+India+%28the+most+common+offshore+software+development+destination%29.+A+quick+Google+search+on+the+topic+indicates+that+there+are+some+fundamental+cultural+differences+that+impede+quality+of+service+in+Indian+offshoring%2C+primarily+around+developers+there+not+showing+initiative+as+a+result+of+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+more+hierarchical+and+instructional+culture.+A+by-product+of+this+is+lower+attrition+rates+and+better+retention+of+knowledge.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+relatively+central+time-zone+%28GMT%2B2%29+and+therefore+has+some%2C+if+not+most%2C+of+the+work+day+overlapping+with+foreign+markets.+It+also+directly+shares+a+working+day+with+Western+Europe.+This+means+that+communication+delays+are+less+impactful.+The+country+also+has+a+solid+legal+system+that+respects+privacy+and+intellectual+property+rights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+all+these+advantages%2C+one+would+assume+offshoring+to+South+African+software+development+companies+is+common+practice.+However%2C+South+Africa+is+not+currently+seen+as+the+preferred+software+development+destination.+This+may+largely+be+because+people+outside+of+the+country+do+not+know+that+there+is+a+great+deal+of+software+engineering+talent+in+South+Africa.+An+assumption+is+also+made+that+in+South+Africa%2C+and+Africa+in+general%2C+there+is+poor+ICT+infrastructure%2C+which+is+no+longer+true.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+certain+other+areas%2C+there+is+a+%26lsquo%3Btech+bubble%26rsquo%3B+that+has+resulted+in+a+vast+number+of+people+flooding+the+market+as+software+developers+and+they+are+not+qualified+or+trained+well+enough+to+develop+software.+Although+South+Africa+does+have+a+small+talent+pool%2C+this+is+not+necessarily+a+bad+thing.+In+this+case%2C+a+small+market+means+high+levels+of+specialisation+and+dedication+to+the+craft.+South+African+software+developers+usually+have+to+be+very+good+at+what+they+do%2C+to+stay+in+the+market.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+large+part+of+why+there+is+a+skills+shortage+in+South+Africa+is+down+to+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+history+and+demographics.+However%2C+the+number+of+people+enrolling+in+software-related+courses+at+South+African+universities+is+increasing+each+year.+There+are+also+several+local+private-sector+companies+that+are+investing+a+lot+of+time%2C+effort+and+money+into+further+widening+this+pipeline+through+bursaries%2C+scholarships+and+raising+awareness+around+the+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+South+African+success+stories+and+possibly+the+most+notable+example+is+that+of+software+developer+Mark+Shuttleworth.+Shuttleworth+founded+Thawte+%28one+of+the+largest+certificate+authorities+on+the+Internet%29+and+Ubuntu+%28an+open-source+operating+system%29.+%26nbsp%3BAnother+success+story+is+Amazon+Web+Services%26rsquo%3B+Elastic+Compute+Cloud+%28EC2%29%2C+which+a+team+in+South+Africa+under+the+leadership+of+Chris+Pinkham+and+Chris+Brown+built.+Sites+such+as+Reddit%2C+Foursquare%2C+Pinterest+and+Netflix+all+run+on+this+technology.+Amazon+Web+Services+Q3+2015+revenue+is+listed+as+US%242.1+billion%2C+and+Amazon+still+retains+a+sizeable+development+team+in+South+Africa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELesser-known+success+stories+include+WooThemes+%28a+Wordpress+toolkit%29+that+turns+over+millions+of+dollars+in+revenue+annually+and+Clicks2Customers%2C+which+is+a+digital+marketing+organisation+based+in+Cape+Town.+It+boasts+Vinny+Lingham%2C+who+is+now+CEO+of+Yola+Inc.%2C+as+its+founder.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+has+also+developed+a+number+of+technological+enhancements+over+the+years%2C+such+as+the+CT%2FCAT+scan%2C+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+first+digital+laser%2C+the+full-body+X-ray+scanner%2C+the+speed+gun+used+in+sports+%28including+cricket+and+tennis%29%2C+APS+therapy+systems+and+computerised+ticketing+%26ndash%3B+all+of+which+have+significant+software+development+components+to+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+there+may+be+a+reluctance+to+invest+in+South+Africa%2C+it+should+certainly+not+be+as+a+result+of+a+lack+of+technical+ability%2C+communication+barriers+or+cultural+differences.+The+success+stories+speak+volumes+in+highlighting+the+immense+talent+found+in+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+software+development+companies.%3C%2Fp%3E

Software+start-ups+-+succeeding+before+you+start %3Cp%3EStarting%26nbsp%3Ba+business+based+on+a+software+product+is+no+easy+task.+If+you%26%2339%3Bre+an%26nbsp%3Bentrepreneur+with+all+the+passion+for+the+business%26nbsp%3Baspects+of+your+new+endeavour+and+the+promise+of+the+millions+in+profit+driving%26nbsp%3Byou+on%2C+don%26rsquo%3Bt+be+deterred+by+the+mammoth+task+that+is+software+development+-+one%26nbsp%3Bof+the+most+important+elements+of+your+venture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlmost%26nbsp%3Bdaily%2C+our+team+is+asked+by+individuals+with+grand+ideas+%28ridiculous%2C+novel+or%26nbsp%3Bbrilliant%29+on+how+to+get+started+with+a+software-based+business.+Not+one+to%26nbsp%3Bpass+up+an+opportunity+to+uplift+the+development+community+%28and+tech-related+start-ups%29%26nbsp%3Bwe%26rsquo%3Bve+put+together+our+top+tips+for+anyone+starting+up+in+the+software+development%26nbsp%3Bspace.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BEducate+yourself%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware%26nbsp%3Bdevelopment+is+not+a+simple+process+of+committing+your+hard-earned+financial%26nbsp%3Binvestment+towards+an+appropriate+software+company.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+journey+of+highs+and%26nbsp%3Blows+that+you+need+to+prepare+for.+Kick+the+tyres+and+make+sure+your%26nbsp%3Bimplementation+vehicle+will+withstand+the+rigours+of+all+the+upcoming+road%26nbsp%3Bsurfaces.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26rsquo%3Bve+often%26nbsp%3Breceived+emails+from+prospective+start-ups+with+a+total+of+four+bullet+points+superficially%26nbsp%3Boutlining+their+dreams+for+starting+the+next+AirBnB-esque+platform%2C+and+have%26nbsp%3Bbeen+asked+how+much+it+will+cost%3F+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+at+this+point%2C+turn+back+and+Google%26nbsp%3Bhow+AirBnB+funded+their+start-up%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FTimeline_of_Airbnb.%22%3EAirBnB%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BBecome+familiar+with+the+software%26nbsp%3Bdevelopment+lifecycle.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp ibutes+to+consider+when+setting+out+the+requirements+for+a+software+build.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Stability+%26ndash%3B+How+well+do+all+parties+understand+the+requirements%3F+Are+we+all+on+the+same+page%3F+Ultimately%2C+this+is+an+indication+of+how+likely+it+is+that+requirements+will+change.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Criticality+%26ndash%3B+Requirements+with+high+criticality+are+the+ones+that+the+overall+success+of+the+system+hinge+on.+Without+these+requirements+achieved%2C+the+project+cannot+function.+It+takes+great+wisdom+to+realise+not+all+requirements+are+critical%2C+to+truly+pick+out+the+primary+elements+of+what+success+will+mean.+Achieving+this+balance+across+a+set+of+requirements+will+lead+to+strong+delivery+wherever+software+is+built.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Priority+%26ndash%3B+Note+that+there+is+a+difference+between+priority+and+criticality.+Priority+really+means+how+important+the+requirement+is+to+stakeholders.+A+requirement+may+not+be+critical+to+success%2C+but+could+still+be+a+stakeholder+priority.+Again%2C+a+balanced+grading+of+priority+across+requirements+will+make+for+a+fluid+development+process+as+high+priority+items+are+treated+with+respect%2C+and+low+priority+items+are+useful+to+be+traded+off+when+conflicts+occur.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Track+progress+smartly%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+markets+and+projects+often+move+too+quickly+for+documentation+to+be+kept+up+to+date+in+a+meaningful+way.+Be+sure+that+the+tracking+system+you+choose+is+able+to+keep+up+with+the+speed+of+progress+on+your+project.+Diagrams+and+models+are+often+better+than+reams+of+text%2C+but+both+are+still+open+to+multiple+interpretations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+documentation+is+obsolete.+When+used+in+the+appropriate+context+it+could+actually+prompt+us+to+be+smarter+about+what+we+pen+down.+For+example%2C+slower+changing+information+on+a+wiki+can+be+hugely+valuable%2C+and+remove+key-person+dependencies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Keep+your+team+small%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+common+misconception+is+that+adding+bodies+to+a+team+can+bring+calendar+dates+forward.+Doing+this%2C+ironically%2C+actually+slows+delivery+down.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFred+Brooks+famously+stated+that+%26ldquo%3Bnine+women+can%26rsquo%3Bt+make+a+baby+in+one+month.%26rdquo%3B+The+truth+is+that+while+large+teams+are+needed+for+broad+projects+where+a+level+of+parallelism+can+be+achieved+during+development%2C+communication+is+complex+%26ndash%3B+so+a+larger+team+actually+moves+more+slowly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+careful+cost%3Abenefit+ratio+to+be+weighed+up+here%2C+but+the+point+to+understand+is+that+great+software+takes+time.+We+often+recommend+that+a+client%2C+instead+of+approaching+a+project+with+mindset+of+x+resources+over+y+months%2C+use+y+resources+over+x+months.+Rarely+is+a+few+months%26rsquo%3B+delay+%28with+no+impact+to+total+cost+of+project%29+going+to+dramatically+change+market+reception.+In+fact%2C+extending+the+launch+actually+provides+more+time+to+understand%2C+process+and+polish+software%2C+usually+resulting+in+a+better+end+product.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Understand+the+Agile+methodology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAgile+is+a+time-boxed+and+iterative+approach+to+delivering+software+that+works+incrementally+from+the+start+instead+of+trying+to+deliver+everything+at+once+near+the+end+of+a+project.+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+using+it%2C+or+recommending+that+your+vendor+use+it%2C+you+should+be.+Scrum+has+already+comfortably+proven+to+be+more+effective+than+a+traditional+all-in%2C+top-down+approach.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E6.+Be+actively+involved%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EParticipate+in+the+process.+Outsourcing+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+simply+throwing+your+requirements+over+the+fence+and+waiting+for+delivery.+Outsourcing+means+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using+another+team%26rsquo%3Bs+expertise+and+knowledge%2C+blending+it+with+your+own+subject-matter+understanding+and%2C+through+this+partnership%2C+creating+something+truly+mutually+beneficial+that+perfectly+meets+the+needs+of+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+end+of+the+day%2C+outsourcing+should+save+you+money+and+result+in+better+products.+After+all%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+getting+a+team+purpose-fit+for+expert+software+development+to+do+it+for+you.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+bear+in+mind%2C+however%2C+that+outsourcing+software+development+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+a+fire-and-forget+exercise.+The+businesses+that+are+shaking+up+our+markets+with+innovative+solutions+and+products+are+the+ones+following+an+interactive%2C+disciplined+and+participatory+approach+to+building+software.%3C%2Fp%3E
