Building+High+Performing+Teams %3Cp%3EIn+today%26%2339%3Bs+software+development+environment%2C+there+are+many+teams+that+are+capable+of+delivering+and+producing+software.+But+there+are+also+those+who+fail+to+meet+the%26nbsp%3Bdelivery+requirements+usually+due+to+time+or+budget+restrictions+and+which+could+be+considered+a+failure.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+various+reasons+that+contribute+to+software+development+failures%2C+recorded+through%26nbsp%3Bempirical%26nbsp%3Bstudies+or%26nbsp%3Banecdotal+evidence.+Some+of+these+include+poor+requirements+specification%2C+scope+creep%2C+poor+management%2C+no+user+involvement%2C+poor+communication%2C+or+lack+of+testing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+that+these+are+some+of+the+factors+that+can+negatively+affect+the+success+of+the+project%2C+the+theory+suggests+that+if+a+project+does+not+encounter+any+of+the+negative+factors+mentioned+above%2C+a+project+should+be+a+success.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESomeday+in+the+future%2C+it+may+be+possible+that+all+projects+will+be+a+success+as+we%26%2339%3Bd%26nbsp%3Bprobably%26nbsp%3Bcreate+an%26nbsp%3BArtificial+Intelligence+to+create+software.+Happy+customers+and+flawless+software%2C+what+more+could+any+software+engineer+ask+for%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUntil+that+time+though%2C+software+will+be+created+by+us+-+humans+whom+we+group+and+cluster+into+optimized+teams+in+an+effort+to+reach+the+happy+customer+and+flawless+software%26nbsp%3Butopia.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOver+the+course+of+many+years+being%26nbsp%3Binvolved+in+the+various+facets+of+software+projects%26nbsp%3Bfrom+inception%2C+development+and+eventual+go-live+of+projects%2C+a+key+and+critical+success+factor+has+been+the+teams+on+these+projects.+This+has+begged+the+question+in+my+mind%3A+what+factors+of+a+team+contribute+to+a+project%26%2339%3Bs+success%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETrying+to+answer+this+question+led+me+to+an+overarching+description+of+such+teams+-+High+Performance+Teams+%28HPT%29.+In+my+experience%2C+a+HPT+is+one+with+key+attributes+that+contribute+to+a+successful+project.+In+real+terms+this+means+a+team+that+presents+the+following+five+characteristics%3A%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Delivers%26nbsp%3Bcontinuously%26nbsp%3Bat+a+steady+pace.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Displays+a%26nbsp%3Bpositive+sentiment%3A%26nbsp%3BThey+want+to+come+to+work%2C%26nbsp%3Bthey+are+eager+to+make+the+project+a+success%2C+they+are%26nbsp%3Beager+to+be+part+of+the+team%2C+they+have+a+sense+of+satisfaction+from+the+work+they+do+and+they%26nbsp%3Bhave+a+sense+of+purpose.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Eager+and%26nbsp%3Bwilling+to+contribute%26nbsp%3Bto+the+project+and+to+the+people+around+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Seeks+every%26nbsp%3Bopportunity%26nbsp%3Bto%26nbsp%3Bimprove+their+skills%3B%26nbsp%3Beither+on+a+project+and%2For+in+their+role+as+a+leader%2C+and+finding+ways+to+facilitate+these%26nbsp%3Bopportunities%26nbsp%3Bwhile+balancing+delivery+and+making+sure+timelines+are+met.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Realizes+the+importance+of%26nbsp%3Bmentorship%26nbsp%3Band+that+team+is+only+as+strong+as+its+weakest+member%3A+This+creates+a+strong+mentorship%26nbsp%3Benvironment+where+the+seniors+are+providing+constant+and+regular+feedback+to+juniors+to+improve+themselves%2C+and%26nbsp%3Bseniors+in+turn+gain+valuable%26nbsp%3Bexperience+with+mentoring%2C+which+serves+to+position+them+as+leaders+within+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+even+with+these+five+attributes+in+place%2C+there+are+other+operational+features+that+can+influence+a+project%26%2339%3Bs+success.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmpowerment+and+Decision-making%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+team+that+is+afforded+the+ability+to%26nbsp%3Bautonomously+and+pro-actively+make+decisions+on+project+is+key+for+several+reasons.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+a+HPT+can+action+items+immediately%2C+items+which+would+otherwise+require+several+layers+of+approval.+Typically%2C+this+is+because+they+have+a+much+closer+view+of+the+project+at+hand.+As+such%2C+they+are+well+suited+to+make+key+decisions+on+the+project%2C+since+they+are+closest+and+understand+the+potential+impacts+better.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+it+comes+to+problem+solving%2C+HPT+teams%26nbsp%3Bdefine+and+identify+the+solution+space+and+work+within+those+boundaries.+However%2C+they+are+also+not+afraid+to+clarify+or+challenge+the+status+quo%2C+and+due+to+their+closeness+to+the+project+are+able+to+think+creatively+about+how+to+solve+problems.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+HPT+that+is+empowered+often+absorb+high+levels+of+responsibility+and+accountability.+They+take%26nbsp%3Bresponsibility+for+their+decisions%2C+can+justify+their+actions+and+decisions%2C+and+are+not+afraid+to+accept%26nbsp%3Bresponsibility%26nbsp%3Bwhen+things+do+not+go+as+planned.+Plus%2C+they%26nbsp%3Bmake+sure+that+everyone+accepts%26nbsp%3Baccountability+for+the+roles.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+my+experience%2C+a%26nbsp%3Bsuccessful+component+of+this+process+is+to%26nbsp%3Brecognize+the+efforts+of+the+team+holistically+and%2For%26nbsp%3Bindividually+and+consistently+provide+direct+feedback.+Feedback+ensures+the+team+is+always+on+the+same+page+and+can+help+to+improve+self-confidence+within+the+team+as+a+collaborative+unit.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFurthermore%2C+external+factors+such+as+unforeseen+changes+in+the+client+team%2C+or+budget+redactions%2C+can+present+risks+and+limitations+to+the+team%26%2339%3Bs+delivery.+It+is+important+that+one+member+of+the+team+keeps+an+eye+on+external+factors+to+ensure+that+the+team+are+able+to+continue+to+apply+agile+planning+principles+with+relevant+and+necessary+information.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+should+be+only+one+Head+Chef+in+the+Kitchen%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHaving+clear%26nbsp%3Bleadership+within+a+team+is+important.+In+order+for+the+HPT+to+make+decisions+with+immediacy+and+based+on+accurate+information+of+project+and+external+factors%2C+the+team+member%26nbsp%3Bfulfilling%26nbsp%3Bthis+role+must+consistently+practice+a+number+of+leadership+traits+that+serve+to+support+the+growth+of+the+team%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Keep+the%26nbsp%3Bend+goal%26nbsp%3Bin+mind+and+ensure+the+team+is+aware+of+the+direction%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Ensure+that%26nbsp%3Broles+and+responsibilities%26nbsp%3Bwithin+the+team+are+well+understood%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Continuously+work+to%26nbsp%3Bimprove+the+skills%26nbsp%3Bof+the+team%26nbsp%3Bthroughout+the+project%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Presents+regular%26nbsp%3Bstatus+updates%26nbsp%3Bto+the+team%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Identify+and+highlight%26nbsp%3Bareas+for+improvement%2C+thereby%26nbsp%3Bencouraging+growth+and+skills+development%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E6.+Provide%26nbsp%3Bconstructive+feedback%26nbsp%3Bwith+clear+guidance+on+the+way+forward%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E7.+Provide%26nbsp%3Bteam+sheltering%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E8.+Leverages%26nbsp%3Bteam+diversity%26nbsp%3Band+employs+the+diverse+skills+and+attributes+to+the+benefit+your+team+and+its+delivery%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+some+instances%2C+multiple%26nbsp%3Bleaders+on+the+team+can+be+useful%2C+especially+if+they+are%26nbsp%3Bfulfilling%26nbsp%3Bdifferent%26nbsp%3Broles.+However%2C+if+those+leaders+are+pulling+the+team+in+different+directions%2C+the+team+suffers+and%26nbsp%3Bultimately%26nbsp%3Bcompromises+delivery.+Usually+one+head+chef+will+help+keep+the+HPT+aligned+and+focused+on+optimum+project+delivery.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+these+areas+are+considered%26nbsp%3Bholistically%2C+the+end+results+are+tangible+and+contribute+to+project+success.+%26nbsp%3BAlthough+we+will+never+stop+striving+to+achieve+the%26nbsp%3Bhappy+customer+and+flawless+software+%26%2339%3Butopia%26%2339%3B%2C+leadership+who+can+consciously+work+to+develop%26nbsp%3BHigh+Performance+Teams%2C+will+be+able+to+build+a+reputation+for+consistently+delivery+successful+software+projects%2C+and+differentiate+themselves+from+the+many+out+there+who+just%26nbsp%3Bdeliver+and+produce+average+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Ahmad+Mahomed+%28Entelect%2C+Team+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+In+the+software+engineering+space%2C+the+teams+are+a+critical+success+factor+of+projects.+But+what+features+define+a+High+Performance+Team%3F
    
["Innovation in business"]
  
Ahmad Mahomed.jpg
    
Corporate+IT%3A+Thoughts+on+staying+relevant+and+becoming+competitive+%C2%A0 %3Cp%3ESilicon+Valley+and+technology+hubs+around+the+world+have+become+incredibly+good+at+fast%2C+lean+product+development.+And+it+makes+sense+to+be+lean+and+quick%2C+given+the+high+volume+and+low+success+rates+that+are+features+of+the+tech-startup+industry.+In+contrast%2C+older+and+more+established+businesses+have+their+flags+firmly+planted+in+long-term+expensive+technology+investments+and+practices+that+were+relevant+in+the+1980s.+The+result+can+be+predictable+but+slow+and+expensive+progress.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+tech-startup+eco-system+has+driven+the+demand+for+fast-paced+agile+and+lean+software+practices+across+the+world+in+all+areas+of+software+engineering%2C+and+an+incredible+amount+of+innovation+in+software+tooling+and+technology.+The+landscape+is+shifting+constantly+and+so+too+are+approaches+to+designing+and+building+software+systems%2C+organizing+teams%2C+and+managing+deliveries.+Netflix+is+a+great+example+of+this.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+further+illustrate+the+point%3A+currently%2C+there+are+more+than+30+different+major+Javascript+frameworks+for+web+development%2C+multiple+cross-platform+mobile+frameworks+which+leverage+different+programming+languages+to+build+mobile+applications%2C+and+of+course+their+native+counterparts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOutside+of+digital%2C+we+have+an+increasing+number+of+languages+available+on+the+CLR+and+JVM+for+enterprise+system+development+and+growing+popularity+of+alternative+languages+like+Scala+and+Python.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+starting+to+make+less+and+less+sense+to+categorize+our+skills+according+to+the+classic+platforms+of+Java+and+C%23.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+members+of+the+corporate+IT+community%2C+what+does+this+mean+for+us+moving+forward%3F+How+do+we+make+sure+we%26rsquo%3Bre+delivering+against+industry%26rsquo%3Bs+best+practices+and+leveraging+the+benefits+of+modern+tools+to+stay+competitive+in+our+industry%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+A+culture+of+%26lsquo%3Bcontinuous+improvement%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+are+on+the+steepest+part+of+the+technological+innovation+curve+in+human+history.+Change+is+more+frequent%2C+rapid+and+pervasive+in+our+lives+than+ever+before.+According+to+a+recent+Deloitte+university+press+report%2C+the+unit+cost+of+computing-power+between+1992+and+2012+came+down+by+a+factor+of+3700.+What+cost+R3000+then%2C+costs+81c+now+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fdupress.deloitte.com%2Fdup-us-en%2Findustry%2Ftechnology%2Ffrom-exponential-technologies-to-exponential-innovation.html%22%3EDeloitte%2C+2012%3C%2Fa%3E%29.+More+importantly%2C+they+found+that+labour+productivity+growth+flat+lined+while+advances+in+core+digital+technologies+sky-rocketed%3A+exposing+a+clear+innovation+gap.+Conclusion%3F+We+are+not+capitalizing+on+this+innovation+in+software+organisations.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+understandable.+We%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to+avoid+becoming+victims+of+the+latest+flavour+of+the+month+practice+or+technology%2C+and+we+need+to+manage+our+risk+responsibly.+We+also+don%26rsquo%3Bt+want+a+tendency+toward+risk-aversion+to+limit+our+potential+as+an+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EChange+is+not+something+that+comes+easily+to+us+in+IT.+We+are+by+default+attracted+to+certainty+and+predictability+in+most+areas+of+our+lives.+Who+can+blame+us%2C+there+is+enormous+complexity+in+what+we+do+and+as+a+result%2C+a+huge+intellectual+and+emotional+investment+in+%26lsquo%3Bgetting+it+right%26rsquo%3B+once%2C+let+alone+again+and+again.+The+data+is+clear+though%3A+change+in+approach%2C+change+in+technology+and+change+in+people+are+all+connected+to+our+future+success+because+change+ensures+we+can+constantly+remain+relevant+and+can+meet+our+customers+needs.+While+the+tech+industry+has+been+somewhat+successful+at+adopting+agile+approaches+to+manage+our+software+delivery%2C+we+have+yet+to+capitalize+on+being+%26lsquo%3Bpro-change%26rsquo%3B+at+an+organisational+level.+Because+change+is+expensive+and+change+is+intimidating.+But+when+change+is+integrated+into+your+business+model%2C+it+can+become+a+fluid+part+of+your+process%2C+and+consequently%2C+much+more+cost-sensitive.+LinkedIn+is+a+great+example+of+a+company+that+believes+wholeheartedly+in+continual+learning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+headlines+to+think+about%2C+however+each+of+these+points+is%2C+in+isolation%2C+simultaneosly+a+brave+and+sizeable+undertaking+and+a+complete+necessity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Foster+a+culture+of+knowledge+sharing+and+collaboration+as+a+means+to+continuous+learning+growth+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fhbr.org%2F2016%2F03%2Fto-stay-relevant-your-company-and-employees-must-keep-learning%22%3EHarvard+Business+Review%3C%2Fa%3E%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Leverage+popular+agile+practices+to+guide+your+software+development+process+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mckinsey.com%2Fbusiness-functions%2Fdigital-mckinsey%2Four-insights%2Fan-operating-model-for-company-wide-agile-development%22%3EMcKinsey%3C%2Fa%3E%29%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Break+down+monolithic+architectures+and+functional+team+barriers+in+the+organisation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Adopt+a+DevOps+approach+to+reduce+operational+bottlenecks+and+speed+up+the+shipping+process%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Close+the+gap+between+business+and+IT+and+promote+a+culture+of+involvement+from+business+partners+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mckinsey.com%2Fbusiness-functions%2Fdigital-mckinsey%2Four-insights%2Fan-operating-model-for-company-wide-agile-development%22%3EMcKinsey%3C%2Fa%3E%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Engineer+your+solutions+for+change+by+leveraging+modern+architectural+practices+like+microservices+and+containerisation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Update+the+way+you+evaluate+and+seek+talent%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+an+organisation+that+values+deep+experience+in+specific+technologies%2C+then+you+suffer+from+the+disadvantage+of+having+people+who+are+good+at+the+past+and+%28potentially%29+bad+at+the+future.+Adopt+a+priority+of+looking+for+ability%2C+attitude+and+aptitude+for+change.+Seek+these+traits+out+at+the+cost+of+all+others%2C+and+you%26rsquo%3Bll+build+teams+who+are+constantly+delivering+work+that+is+fresh+and+current.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccept+that+on-the-job+training+for+any+technology%2C+tool+and+environment+is+part+and+parcel+of+your+operational+costs.+Plan+for+it%2C+embrace+it+and+get+really+good+at+making+it+happen+quickly.+If+we+can+build+organisations+that+are+resilient+to+high+churn+and+operate+efficiently+despite+it%2C+we+stand+a+greater+chance+at+succeeding+in+the+current+climate.+There+are+modern+approaches+designed+to+tackle+this%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Lean+and+fast+recruitment+processes+%26ndash%3B+invest+in+shorter%2C+less+cumbersome+and+frictional+interview+processes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Smooth+onboarding+and+orientation+can+help+ramp+up+productivity+and+employee+engagement+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fhbr.org%2F2015%2F03%2Ftechnology-can-save-onboarding-from-itself%22%3EHarvard+Business+Review%3C%2Fa%3E%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+%26nbsp%3BAlign+with+popular+tools+and+technologies+to+access+wider+skill-pool%2C+instead+of+niche+products+and+technologies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Reduce+setup+time+with+pre-configured+out-of-the-box+development+environments+and+tools%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Remuneration+strategies+that+target+shorter+tenures+%26ndash%3B+reward+performance+bravely+and+take+into+account+market+movements.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Leverage+software+development+partners+for+project-based%2C+team-based+or+staff-augmentation+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Start+at+the+beginning%3A+Adopt+a+low-hanging+fruit+approach%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDelivering+solutions+that+meet+your+customers+needs+perfectly+is+at+the+heart+of+being+competitive.+Try+out+a+feature-team+approach+on+your+next+deliverable.+Well-designed+systems+should+allow+you+to+ring-fence+components+and+experiment+with+new+technology+in+a+way+that+lowers+the+risk+of+impact+on+the+rest+of+your+eco-system+but+allows+you+to+make+subtle+changes+to+a+client+solution+that+keeps+you+ahead+of+your+competitors.+Start+with+the+least+critical+systems+and+get+comfortable%2C+working+your+way+deeper+as+you+go.+Start+the+conversations+in+your+team+and+challenge+your+team+to+think+outside+of+the+box%3A+what+should+we+be+doing+differently%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETrust+your+team%2C+but+contribute+to+the+decision+making+process.+Software+engineers+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+be+architects+or+have+15+years+of+experience+to+bring+good+ideas+to+the+table%2C+you+may+find+the+best+ideas+coming+from+the+graduate+who+joined+your+team+3+months+ago.+Encourage+a+culture+of+joint-accountability+and+continual+learning+and+innovation+-+you%26rsquo%3Bll+find+that+change+starts+happening+seamlessly+and+without+prompt.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Structure+that+enable+quick+and+collaborative+decision-making%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+bringing+your+entire+team+along+for+the+journey+is+a+non-negotiable.+Change+requires+teams+to+be+able+to+move+quickly.+Decentralize+technical+decision-making+and+invest+in+making+technology+and+practice+decisions+as+a+team.+If+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+build+understanding+and+consensus+in+your+teams+due+to+structures+that+exist+%26ndash%3B+break+them+down+and+start+again.+High+performing+teams+don%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+need+complete+autonomy%2C+but+they+do+need+trust+and+cohesion+which+are+two+things+the+old-guard+has+a+poor+track-record+at+fostering.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+you+build+confidence+in+your+new+approaches%2C+tools+and+technologies%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+build+an+organisation+who+are+not+only+resilient+to+change+but+thrive+in+it.+%26nbsp%3BA+philosophy+of+continuous+improvement+will+help+you+consistently+deliver+against+industry+best+practices.+As+a+result%2C+staying+compeititve+will+be+the+very+nature+of+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E

Building+High+Performance+Teams%3A+Part+2+%E2%80%93+The+3C%E2%80%99s %3Cp%3EMany+external+factors+contribute+to+the+success+of+software+development+teams.+In+a+previous+article%2C+I+discussed+some+characteristics+of+high-performance+teams+%28HPTs%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+included%3A%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli%3EDelivers%26nbsp%3Bcontinuously+at+a+steady+pace%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDisplays+a+positive+sentiment%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+eager+and+willing+to+contribute+to+the+success+of+the+project+and+to+the+development+of+the+people+around+them%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EValues+self-improvement+and+mentorship%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+also+spoke+about+operational+features%2C+such+as+team+empowerment+and+strong+leadership%2C+which+contribute+to+team+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+there+are+other+areas+that+have+a+pivotal+impact+on+a+team%26%2339%3Bs%26nbsp%3Bsuccess.+These+aspects+are+indicative+traits+and+behaviors+of+some+team+members+that+eventually+begin+to+rub+off+on+other+team+members.+Not+everyone+in+a+team+needs+to+be+a+%26%2339%3Bhigh+flyer%26%2339%3B+or+%26%2339%3Btop+developer%26%2339%3B.+Rather%2C+a+team+should+comprise+a+combination+of+people+who+want+to+learn+and+people+who+can+teach.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+symbiotic+nature+of+such+teams+leads+to+mutual+benefit+for+all+involved.+Less+experienced+individuals+who+are+eager+to+learn+end+up+learning+more%2C+and+improve+along+the+way.+The+more+experienced+team+members+gain+satisfaction+from+seeing+those+around+them+improve+because+of+their+teaching+efforts.+The+overall+team+just+gets+better%2C+works+better+as+a+cohesive+unit%2C+and+delivers+successful+projects%2C+regularly.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EApart+from+the+factors+noted+above%2C+there+are+a+few+other+qualities+that+I+believe+stand+out+within+high-performing+teams.+I+call+these+the+three+C%26rsquo%3Bs%3A+Craftmanship%2C+communication+and+customer+centricity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECraftsmanship%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+craftsmanship+is+an+aspect+in+software+development+where+coding+skill+is+viewed+as+an+alternative+metaphor+to+engineering+or+science.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+the+continuous+effort+to+create+a+working+prototype+or+a+system+and+to+iterate+and+make+slight+improvements+to+it+over+time.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+very+involved+process+that+sees+the+craftsmen+%28i.e.+the+developers%29+invest+heavily+into+what+is+being+created.+This+includes+copious+amounts+of+energy%2C+sheer+will%2C+determination+and%2C+above+all%2C+passion.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+only+about+the+actual+code+that+is+being+written+but+also+other+aspects+that+are+necessary+to+ensure+the+success+of+that+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+include%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli%3EUnderstanding+the+domain+better%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EImprovement+and+establishing+automated+deployment+processes%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EUsing+the+correct+tool%2Flanguage%2Flibrary+for+the+task+at+hand%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEngaging+in+tasks+that+improve+the+coding+process%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+craftsmen+are+not+afraid+of+feedback+and+actively+seek+out+ways+to+improve+themselves.+They+care+about+the+result+and%26nbsp%3B+is+delivered+to+the+customer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECommunication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+any+team-based+environment%2C+and+in+life%2C+communication+is+a+primary+tool+that+we+all+need+to+interact+with+others+and+exchange+information.+This+seems+like+common+sense+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+often+overlooked+and+not+held+in+high+regard+in+some+team-based+environments.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCommunication.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+701px%3B+height%3A+526px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+above+cartoon+is+typically+used+to+describe+common+misunderstandings+in+a+software+project.+It%26%2339%3Bs+quite+poignant+in+that+it+shows+how+bad+communication+can+lead+to+mismatched+expectations+at+various+levels+of+delivery.+It+also+shows+that+communication+gaps+can+occur+within+a+single+team%2C+between+teams+and+with+the+client+%28and+other+people%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+be+fair%2C+communication+is+difficult%2C+especially+when+dealing+with+different+people%2C+across+various+skillsets%2C+with+different+biases%2C+different+cultural+backgrounds%2C+varied+levels+of+experience%2C+and+each+with+their+own+motives+and+objectives%2C+languages%2C+etc.+This+excludes+the+differences+you+may+find+when+dealing+with+your+customer%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESuccessful+teams+consider+the+above+factors+and+build+mutual+respect.+They+work+together+towards+a+common+goal+but+also+all+understand+what+the+game+is+first.+It+involves+upskilling+people+where+required.+Understanding+and+developing+respect+for+your+peers%2C+is+a+group+effort+that+everyone+contributes+to.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EExternally+though%2C+when+dealing+with+a+customer%2C+there+is+a+tendency+to+over-communicate.+I+don%26%2339%3Bt+believe+that+over-communication+has+ever+led+to+project+failure.+Over-communication+should+not%26nbsp%3Bbe+haphazard.+There+is+planning+and+organisation+and+involves+everyone+in+the+team.+Communication+channels+are+established+upfront%2C+whether+it+is+email%2C+instant+messaging+or+a+spreadsheet.+The+point+is+that+all+parties+involved+agree+on+the+channels+of+communication.+Lastly%2C+key+contact+people+are+defined+as+well+the+roles+of+everybody+involved.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECustomer+Centricity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+most+developers+create+software+for+a+paying+customer%3A+someone+who+is+willing+to+commission+the+creation+of+a+system+or+solution+that+will+solve+some+business-related+problem+or+give+the+customer+a+competitive+edge.+As+developers%2C+we+need+to+keep+that+in+mind+as+this+plays+an+important+part+in+the+decisions+we+make+and+the+impact+of+those+decisions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+customers+should+always+get+what+they+paid+for.+However%2C+in+most+cases%2C+what+customers+think+they+want+and+what+they+need+can+be+two+different+things+entirely.+A+critical+part+of+a+developer%26rsquo%3Bs+role+is+to+always+try+and+create+what+the+customer+needs.+This+means+that+we+must+interact+and+communicate+with+them+regularly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECustomers+want+working+software+that+meets+their+needs.+They+have+little+consideration+for+how+it+was+created.+Developers+want+to+create+working+software+that+makes+a+difference+in+someone%26%2339%3Bs+life.+There+is+a+clear+relationship+between+the+motives+of+the+parties+involved+and+this+can+be+leveraged+to+enhance+the+product+delivered+to+a+customer.+Simply+put%2C+if+a+developer+can+truly+understand+the+customer%2C+their+needs+and+their+expectations%2C+a+developer+is+better+positioned+to+create+software+that+has+a+higher+probability+of+being+used+and+making+a+difference.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMileage+may+vary+for+different+teams%2C+but+there+is+a+strong+sense+that+craftsmanship%2C+communication+and+customer+centricity+are+basic+ingredients+for+high-performance+teams.+Add+some+freedom%2C+a+bit+of+authority+and+autonomy+and+you%26rsquo%3Bll+have+a+great+team+in+the+making.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Ahmad+Mahomed+%28Entelect%2C+Team+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Beyond+certain+operational+features+that+contribute+to+team+success%2C+there+are+three+behaviours%3B+craftsmanship%2C+communication+and+customer-centricity+that+should+be+considered+basic+ingredients+for+high-performance+teams.

Why+Agile+in+corporates+doesn%27t+work%2C+yet. %3Cp%3EConsider+the+prevalence+of+technology+in+our+lives+and+businesses+today.+Eventually%2C+every+business+will+be+a+technology+business.+The+proliferation+of+technology+has+moved+software+out+of+being+just+a+business+support+function%2C+to+one+that+can+define+a+business%26rsquo%3Bs+capability.+This+makes+high-quality+software+pivotal+to+a+business%26rsquo%3Bs+success+and+means+that+every+corporate+in+South+Africa+requires+a+significant+software+development+workforce+to+remain+relevant+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShift+to+Agile%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+CIOs+are+aware+that+quality+software+requires+an+organisation+to+follow+an+Agile+development+methodology.+As+a+result%2C+all+IT+divisions+in+the+progressive+corporates+are+fully+committed+to+adopting+Agile+and+are+at+various+levels+on+their+journeys.+However%2C+the+fundamental+issue+with+implementing+Agile+in+a+corporate+is+the+necessity+for+full+buy-in+from+the+entire+organisation.+It+is+an+organisational+shift.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECorporate+strategy+evangelists+promote+the+concept+of+%26lsquo%3Balignment%26rsquo%3B%3A+how+well+an+organisation+is+coordinated+to+achieve+its+goals.+A+central+feature+of+any+business+strategy+is+the+ability+to+effectively+execute+the+core+of+the+business+while+being+able+to+adapt+to+trends+and+changes+in+the+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFit+for+purpose%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisational+alignment+pulls+together+business+strategies%2C+organisational+capabilities%2C+resources+and+management+systems+%26ndash%3B+all+of+which+need+to+be+arranged+to+support+the+enterprise%26rsquo%3Bs+purpose.%26nbsp%3BIt+is+not+possible+for+the+organisation+to+move+quickly+if+it+is+not+aligned+and+does+not+demonstrate+%26lsquo%3Bfitness%26rsquo%3B+-+the+capacity+to+change+to+fit+new+circumstances+quickly%2C+and+thereby+remain+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESimilarly%2C+an+Agile+methodology+advocates+adaptive+planning%2C+evolutionary+development%2C+early+delivery%2C+continuous+improvement%2C+and+rapid+and+flexible+response+to+change.+This+is+achieved+through+a+culture+of+intellectual+curiosity%2C+collaboration%2C+effective+communication+and+always+being+ready+to+challenge+the+status+quo.+Importantly%2C+it+allows+and+requires+teams+to+break+from+old+habits+before+they+become+counterproductive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAgile+not+just+about+software%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+business+units+embrace+the+flexibility+that+an+Agile+approach+allows.+However%2C+the+typical+approach+is+to+expose+systems+teams+to+barrages+of+training+sessions+to+upskill+those+who+present+an+obvious+or+immediate+need.+But+what+is+often+overlooked+is+that+Agile+development+requires+a+culture+shift+across+the+entire+organisation+and+the+skills+need+to+be+applied+more+broadly+than+just+the+central+software+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+the+standard+modus+operandi+across+most+corporates+today+is+that+a+business+unit+innovates+a+product+in+isolation%2C+making+commitments+about+delivery+timelines+with+minimal+systems+input+and+then+finally+pushing+the+team+for+an+unrealistic+deadline.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+scenario+plays+out+to+different+extents+in+various+organisations.+However%2C+the+result+often+is+that+it+sustains+any+business+siloes+that+may+exist%2C+deadlines+are+missed%2C+or+there+is+a+mass+exodus+of+developers+at+the+end+of+the+project%2C+leaving+the+sentiment+that+Agile+is+bad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBuy-in+is+key+to+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAdmittedly%2C+much+progress+has+been+achieved+across+various+organisations+but+the+key+point+is+that+both+systems+and+business+teams+need+to+be+realistic+about+how+delivery+is+managed+and+come+up+with+a+process+that+works+in+a+corporate.+Only+when+everyone+-+from+the+individual+who+first+comes+up+with+a+product+idea+to+the+systems+team+-+buys+into+changing+the+way+they+approach+software+development%2C+will+an+organisation+benefit+from+Agile+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+%26lsquo%3Bpure%26rsquo%3B+Agile+is+not+feasible+in+a+corporate+because+expectations+across+senior+management+and+exec+level+are+always+tied+to+budgets+and+defined+deliverables%2C+something+that+Agile+struggles+to+represent.+But+communication+-+and+the+ability+to+communicate+your+project+in+a+language+that+various+business+teams+understand+%26ndash%3B+is+crucial+to+creating+buy-in.+Development+managers+typically+have+a+spreadsheet+that+converts+story+points+to+hours+so+that+they+can+report+in+a+way+the+CFO+appreciates%2C+which+helps.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+agile+about+Agile%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETherefore%2C+Agile+in+various+forms+can+work+in+a+corporate%2C+but+one+needs+to+be+agile+around+implementing+Agile.+In+the+specific+case+of+software%26rsquo%3Bs+Agile+methodology%2C+often+it+is+the+organisational+capability+and+resource+architecture+and+management+systems+that+prevent+the+organisation+from+being+able+to+fully+adopt+and+gain+the+full+benefit+of+an+Agile+approach+to+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+organisation+that+can+transform+to+a+truly+Agile+culture+will+recognise+it+needs+to+be+complemented+by+strong+and+sound+operational+processes+throughout+all+functional+areas+of+the+business.+CIOs+need+to+understand+the+importance+Agile+has+on+the+greater+operations+of+their+business+and+why+it+can+be+a+game-changer+if+the+organisation+can+get+it+right.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+your+business+tomorrow.+What+is+your+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+capability%3B+do+you+have+the+resources+to+adapt+to+a+shift+in+direction%2C+tomorrow%3F+If+not%2C+then+you+probably+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+a+fully+Agile+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E
Daniel+Manyemwe+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+All+CIOs+are+aware+that+quality+software+requires+an+organisation+to+follow+an+Agile+development+methodology.+But+Agile+development+requires+a+culture+shift+and+full+buy-in+from+the+entire+organisation.

Custom+software+development+vs+off-the-shelf+products%2C+which+will+help+elevate+your+business+ahead+of+its+competitors%3F %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+choice+between+custom+software+development+versus+an+off-the-shelf+product+is+an+ongoing+debate+for+start-up%26%2339%3Bs%2C+SMME%26%2339%3Bs%2C+and+big+corporates.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+conversation+heats+up+when+scaling+comes+into+the+frame+and+scope+requirements+become+broader.+Add+to+that+an+increasing+user+base%2C+the+ability+to+innovate%2C+the+need+to+adapt+business+offerings+as+the+company+grows%2C+then+the+decision+becomes+even+more+complex.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELook+at+successful+businesses.+Firstly%2C+what+distinguish+whether+the+business+is+successful%3F+Is+it+one+with+an+innovative+and+agile+approach%2C+or+one+with+revolutionary+products%3F+What+is+the+driving+force+behind+this%3F+Perhaps+the+software+they+use%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECustomers+have+no+knowledge+on+how+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+software+operates%2C+or+if+it+is+an+off-the-shelf+or+custom+development+solution.+The+important+thing+is+that+the+user+experience+is+great%2C+and+the+solution+meets+your+needs+and+requirements+as+a+business.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+how+then%2C+does+a+business+decide+whether+they+should+be+investing+in+a+customized+software+solution+or+an+off-the-shelf+product%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5+factors+to+consider+when+deciding+if+a+bespoke+solution+is+right+for+you%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Determine+an+accurate+comparison+for+the+cost.+You+need+to+look+beyond+the+purchase+price%2C+but+the+whole-life+costs+%28WLC%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Some+benefits%2C+such+as+competitive+advantage%2C+are+worth+spending+the+time+to+get+right.+Although+time+to+market+is+important%2C+the+pace+of+change+determined+by+the+market+may+mean+you+need+to+change+and+redirect+your+software+development+needs.+Bespoke+software+takes+longer+to+develop+and+structure+than+off-the-shelf+products%2C+but+it+aligns+to+your+business+needs.+Designing+the+software+correctly%2C+enables+agility+and+quicker+turn-around+time+as+the+software+grows+and+evolves.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Bespoke+seems+riskier.+While+a+solution+built+for+1000%26rsquo%3Bs+of+companies+apparently+presents+less+risk+in+terms+of+the+functionality%2C+the+risk+presents+itself+in+application.+Each+company+will+use+the+package+differently.+Therefore%2C+how+relevant+it+is+for+your+business+will+determine+the+risk+in+the+long-run%2C+especially+if+the+pre-determined+features+cannot+adapt+to+your+business+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+There+are+so+many+software+products+out+there%2C+why+go+custom%3F+Software+products+built+for+the+masses+are+done+so+with+the+intent+to+spend+the+minimum+development+cost+on+changes+needed.+If+the+product+covers+85%25+of+the+business+needs+out+there+it%26%2339%3Bs+good+enough+to+be+used+in+the+market.+85%25+is+the+basic+features+that+keep+your+business+running.+But%2C+this+means+you%26rsquo%3Bre+competing+with+the+same+tools.+The+innovation+required+that+elevates+you+ahead+of+your+competitors+will+be+a+custom+build.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+The+resources+that+a+bespoke+developer+can+spend+on+meeting+my+objectives+are+orders+of+magnitude+lower+than+off-the-shelf+products.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+have+analyzed+each+question%2C+and+are+still+not+sure+why+bespoke+software+is+better+for+your+business%2C+then+you+need+to+consider+some+aspects+that+may+affect+the+future+of+your+business+more+closely.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5+reasons+customized+solutions+will+help+you+to+future-proof+your+organization%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+With+customized+solutions%2C+you+only+pay+for+what+you+need.+Whereas%2C+off-the-shelf+software+solutions+cater+for+various+needs+of+many+businesses%2C+meaning+there+are+features+and+functions+that+you+will+never+use.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Using+a+tailored+solution+means+you+can+satisfy+your+own+business+model%2C+rather+than+that+of+a+product.+There+will+be+times+when+you+have+to+adjust+features+based+on+your+business+needs%2C+or+as+your+business+grows.+This+results+in+you+being+at+the+mercy+of+the+vendor+to+satisfy+your+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+To+meet+your+current+and+future+business+needs%2C+customized+solutions+enable+you+to+align+the+software+to+your+own+brand+and+specifically%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+market+positioning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Applying+a+solution+that+is+specific+to+your+processes+and+people+is+central+to+your+business+structure+and+growth+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Customized+solutions%2C+for+all+the+reasons+above%2C+enable+your+business+to+innovate+from+within+and+not+be+dependent+on+the+product+to+slowly+evolve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+last+5-10+years%2C+much+has+changed+in+terms+of+software+packages%2C+open+source+and+custom+services+that+specialize+in+a+single+service+only.+Most+of+these+are+free+or+come+at+a+low+price.+It+integrates+well+into+your+software+and+simplifies+the+work+for+you.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETake+Authentication+for+example%3A+AuthO+is+a+single+sign+on+%26amp%3B+Token+based+authentication+as+a+service.+That+means+your+authentication+for+your+system+or+application+is+handled%2C+managed+and+taken+care+of.+There+is+no+need+to+build+your+own.+This+allows+you+to+focus+on+your+business+needs+and+build+out+the+solution+which+fits+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhich+option+is+right+for+your+needs%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+should+think+carefully+about+your+individual+business+requirements+before+making+a+choice%2C+because+you+will+need+software+that+helps+you+achieve+maximum+results+in+line+with+your+business+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBespoke+applications+can+offer+huge+commercial+and+business+benefits%2C+giving+you+a+competitive+advantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+find+a+professional+with+best+practice+standards+who+can+develop+the+software%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Eand+meet+your+growing+business+needs+by+providing+regular+software+updates%2C+then+a+bespoke+solution+could+be+much+more+cost+efficient+in+the+long+run.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Trends+in+Enterprise+Software.+What+we+can+expect+to+see+in+2018. %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+is+likely+to+be+another+revolutionary+year+in+the+enterprise+software+space.+Underpinned+by+trends+ranging+from+cognitive+technologies+to+machine+learning%2C+we+can+expect+to+see+businesses+shift+to+building+consumer-centric+software+solutions+with+an+increased+focus+on+user+experience.%26nbsp%3BEnterprises+have+started+to+recognise+they+can+gain+operational+advantages+from+applying+consumer+offerings+internally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+enterprise+software+development+responds+to+software+needs+in+a+B2B+environment%2C+but+this+has+constrained+thinking+for+software+innovation.+While+companies+use+technology+trends+such+as+chat+bots+to+improve+their+external+and+consumer+facing+initiatives%2C+they+have+overlooked+the+advantages+these+kinds+of+approaches+can+have+on+their+internal+operations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+such%2C+much+of+what+we+saw+in+2017+will+continue+to+progress%3B+Agile+development%2C+Mobility+and+Custom+software+development.+But+two+core+driving+forces+behind+these+trends+for+2018+will+be+the+renewed+focus+on+user+experience+within+enterprises+mimicking+consumer+offerings.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+enterprises+will+start+to+mimic+consumer+offerings%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUntil+recently%2C+CRM+software+was+all+pushed+to+the+cloud%2C+simply+because+it+seemed+to+be+the+ideal+environment+for+so+much+data.+Companies+were+so+focussed+on+their+operations%2C+they+lost+sight+of+the+consumer+side.+But+with+more+millennials+coming+into+the+workforce%2C+this+is+changing.+Millennials+operate+in+a+world+where+their+entire+lives+are+optimised.+They+expect+this+of+their+employers+and+working+environments+too.+And+importantly%2C+companies+have+realised+that+applying+more+UX+thinking+to+their+enterprise+solutions+will+improve+operational+efficiencies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEnterprise+Software+used+to+dictate+how+the+software+works+and+the+usability.+It+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+built+for+the+end-user%2C+but+built+to+service+the+business+and+variances+of+a+business+process.+The+employee+had+to+perform+a+job%2C+and+the+software+enabled+them+to+do+so%2C+irrespective+of+the+user+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+past%2C+business+objectives+driving+consumer+offerings+have+typically+been%3B+to+improve+customer+experience%2C+to+optimize+the+user+journey%2C+or+to+optimise+offerings+to+the+customer.+But+companies+are+starting+to+ask+the+question+%26ndash%3B+what+if+we+apply+this+thinking+to+our+employees+and+their+operations%3F+Suddenly+the+objectives+become%3B+to+improve+employee+experience%2C+to+optimise+the+employee+journey%2C+or+to+optimise+the+offerings+to+the+employee.+This+can+all+lead+to+improved+internal+efficiencies+and+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsequently%2C+businesses+will+start+to+create+internal+systems+that+not+only+reflect+consumer+offerings%2C+but+also+have+a+high+user+experience+factor%2C+to+enable+quick+adoption+and+improved+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMobile+CRM+platforms+are+a+great+example+of+the+ways+modern+enterprise+software+is+starting+to+mimic+consumer+offerings+for+operational+advantages.+Real-time+collaboration+on+any+device+is+becoming+a+more+important+for+productivity.+Most+jobs+require+teamwork+and+communication+and+tools+that+enable+this+are+going+to+put+businesses+at+an+advantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+while+trends+like+Mobility+are+on+the+rise+in+terms+of+mimicking+consumer+offerings%2C+it+won%26rsquo%3Bt+yet+stretch+as+far+as+applied+use+of+social+media.+In+fact%2C+social+media+within+enterprise+software+hasn%26%2339%3Bt+taken+off+as+much+as+one+would+like.+Yes%2C+corporates+are+improving+their+social+interactions+and+employee+experience+within+the+company%2C+but+enterprise+software+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+yet+leverage+the+impact+and+insights+of+social+media+as+much+as+it+can.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+what+are+the+technology+trends+that+are+going+to+underpin+this+shift+for+enterprises+in+2018%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAgile%2C+Digital+Transformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E+within+the+corporate+environment.+This+transformation+is+rapidly+transforming+and+driving+enterprise+software+towards+consumerism.+CIO%26%2339%3Bs+and+CTO%26%2339%3Bs+are+becoming+more+closely+involved+with+the+design+of+products+and+systems%2C+ensuring+the+build+and+roll+out+is+done+within+an+Agile+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELess+offshore+development+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eand+more+in-house+capability+and+re-use+of+%26lsquo%3BSoftware+as+a+Service%26rsquo%3B+is+starting+to+infiltrate+and+customize+enterprise+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECustom+Software+development+%3C%2Fstrong%3Efor+enterprise+software.+Replacing+and+moving+away+from+off-the-shelf+products%2C+which+require+a+high+degree+of+integration+and+customization+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+focus+on+user+experience.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECognitive+technologies%3C%2Fstrong%3E+focused+on+Product%2C+Process%2C+and+Insight+will+have+a+massive+spike+in+the+user+experience+initiatives+which+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+been+adopted+yet.+Overall%2C+Cognitive+Technologies+encourage+a+greater+use+of+the+existing+services+and+streamline+continuous+feedback+and+information+gathering.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELower+infrastructure+costs%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3Bachieved+through+more+efficient+utilization+of+IT+resources%2C+and+an+increase+in+capacity+to+handle+peak+demands.+The+use+of+Containerisation+will+definitely+increase+in+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAI+and+Machine+Learning%3C%2Fstrong%3E+will+become+a+mandatory+business+aspect+with+the+rise+of+chatbots+and+business+bots+automating+various+features+and+customer+self-service+portals.+We%26rsquo%3Bve+already+seen+this+in+the+past+years+but+expect+to+see+the+trend+continue+in+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMobility+%3C%2Fstrong%3Ewill+play+a+big+factor+in+the+enterprise+software+space%2C+as+the+need+to+improve+UX+for+employee+productivity+will+be+a+necessity.+Some+businesses%2C+in+the+agricultural+and+healthcare+industries+have+started+making+this+move%2C+but+in+2018%2C+we+can+expect+to+see+businesses+in+other+industries+such+as+automotive+and+short-term+insurance%2C+which+will+recognise+the+advantages+of+having+a+mobility+solution+built-in+for+their+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENeedless+to+say%2C+2018+will+definitely+be+another+groundbreaking+year%2C+trying+to+play+catch+up+with+renewed+and+improved+technological+companies.+Companies+wishing+to+attract+the+best+talent+will+be+seeking+to+improve+their+employee+experience+by+mimicking+consumer+offerings.+The+extent+to+which+the+seven+tech+trends+will+impact+the+move+to+consumer+offerings+and+UX+is+yet+to+be+seen%2C+but+suffice+to+say%2C+we+can+expect+them+to+be+key+features+to+some+degree+or+another.%3C%2Fp%3E
By+Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+We+can+expect+to+see+several+technology+trends+making+waves+this+year%2C+but+the+force+driving+these+trends+will+be+the+renewed+focus+on+user+experience+within+enterprises+mimicking+consumer+offerings.

Working+from+home+-+is+there+a+verdict%3F %3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ETele-working+and+Telecommuting+are+both+popular+thanks+to+technology+tools+that+facilitate+communication+and+collaboration.+But+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+mean+both+deliver+the+same+results+in+terms+of+employee+engagement+and+productivity.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Telecommuting%2C+also+known+as+remote+work%2C+is+when+work+is+undertaken+at+a+different+location+than+the+head+office+to+reduce+the+commuting+time.+Tele-working+is+a+working+arrangement+where+employees+do+not+commute+or+travel+at+all.%26nbsp%3B+Although+the+terms+are+used+interchangeably%2C+they+are+in+fact+two+very+different+things.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Telecommuting+was+first+introduced+in+the+early+1970%26%2339%3Bs%2C+when+technology+allowed+linked+satellite+offices+to+connect+to+downtown+mainframes+through+dumb+terminals+using+telephone+lines+as+a+network+bridge.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Then%2C+in+the+1980%26%2339%3Bs%2C+the+continued+decrease+in+hardware+costs+and+increased+network+speed+has+allowed+employees+to+use+computers+to+connect+to+their+offices+from+the+convenience+of+their+own+home.+These+days+fibre+to+the+home+enables+high-speed+internet+to+the+home%2C+thereby+facilitating+conference+calls%2C+videos+calls%2C+and+high-speed+video+streaming%2C+furthering+the+potential+for+telecommuting.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technology+undoubtedly%2C+has+enabled+working+from+home+possible%26nbsp%3B+as+it+provides%26nbsp%3B+a+platform+to+deliver+fluent+communication+and+collaboration+of+employees%2C+for+example%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BSkype%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BWhatsApp+-+Groups%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BSlack%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BEmail%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BVideo+Conferencing+Applications%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E21st+century+digital+work%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFrom+an+employer%26%2339%3Bs+perspective%2C+there+are+several+benefits+for+a+company+to+embrace+telecommuting%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E1.%3Cstrong%3E+Real-estate.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EA+reduction+in+required+desk+space%2C+in+some+instances+as+much+as+40%25+of+a+workforce+has+been+known+to+work+remotely.+That+is+nearly+40%25+of+your+employee+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+%3Cstrong%3EAutonomy+and+freedom.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Giving+your+employees+the+freedom+to+work+from+their+most+productive+space+each+day%2C+and+to+enjoy+the+benefits+of+flexible+working+hours%2C+feeds+employee+satisfaction+and+trust.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+%3Cstrong%3ESaving+travel+time.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Employees+who+need+to+commute+for+long+hours+a+day+can+be+more+productive+if+they+can+save+unnecessary+travel+time.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+several+varieties+of+%26lsquo%3Bworking+from+home%26rsquo%3B+structures%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home+on+a+needs+basis+only%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+For+instance%2C+when+the+plumber+needs+to+fix+something%2C+you+are+waiting+for+a+package+to+be+delivered+to+your+house%2C+or+when+the+kids+are+sick.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home+for+2-3+days+of+the+week%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+hybrid+approach+like+this+saves+time+on+travel+and+commuting%2C+but+means+the+employee+is+available+in+the+office+for+the+other+days+of+the+week.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home%2C+full-time%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Also+known+as+Tele-working.+In+this+structure%2C+the+employee+is+only+required+to+be+in+the+office+for+meetings+when+video+calls+or+conference+calls+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+an+option.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETimes+have+changed.+Tools+for+collaboration+are+in+full+swing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+IBM+used+to+be+a+big+supporter+of+the+work+from+home+initiative.+In+2009+IBM+boasted+that+40%25+of+its+employee+base+didn%26%2339%3Bt+have+an+office.+IBM%2C+as+a+consultancy%2C+advised+their+clients+that+working+from+home+was+a+great+initiative%2C+and+that+leading+by+example+was+great+for+marketing.+But+by+2015+IBM+rolled+back+on+their+decision+to+work+from+home.+IBM%26%2339%3Bs+revenue+had+fallen+20+quarters+in+a+row%2C+and+although+IBM+wanted+to+imitate+a+Google+or+Apple%2C+neither+Google+nor+Apple+supported+working+from+home+to+the+extent+that+IBM+had+implemented.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Similarly%2C+Yahoo+reversed+it%26%2339%3Bs+working+from+home+policy+in+2013+after+the+company+had+to+cut+their+workforce+by+2+000+employees+due+to+financial+troubles+in+2012.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFacebook%26rsquo%3Bs+approach+was+different.+It+focussed+on+driving+collaboration+and+social+engagement+and+so%2C+created+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+open-plan+offices.+While+flexibility+remains+crucial+to+the+modern+working+style%2C+Facebook+recognised+that+human+interaction+and+engagement+was+also+important+in+getting+things+done+and+for+creative+thinking.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+still+about+connecting+with+people%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EWith+technology+available+to+make+remote+work+faster%2C+less+expensive+and+more+effective%2C+the+Facebook+example+shows+that+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+connect+with+people+just+by+being+at+your+desk%2C+we+connect+with+people+by+talking+to+them.+So+this+is+where+environments+like+the+coffee+machine+and+cafeteria+work+well.+While+technology+enables+virtual+collaboration+and+communication%2C+it+is+not+entirely+a+replacement+for+human+interaction.+There+are+some+things+that+we%2C+as+humans%2C+essentially+require+to+collaborate+effectively.+We+call+this+collaborative+efficiency%2C+and+its+critical+to+effective+teams.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EBack+in+1977%2C+MIT+professor+Thomas+J.+Allen+looked+at+communication+patterns+among+scientists+and+engineers+and+found+that+the+farther+apart+their+desks+were%2C+the+less+likely+they+were+to+communicate.+At+the+30-meter+mark%2C+the+likelihood+of+regular+communication+approached+zero.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+automatic+expectation+has+been+that+technology+should+improve+communication+and+remove+distance.+But+the+study+revealed+that+people+use+these+tools+to+connect+with+people+they+see+face-to-face+as+well.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Michelle+Peluso%2C+IBM%2C+Chief+Marketing+Officer+believes+that%2C+%26quot%3BThere+is+something+about+a+team+being+more+powerful%2C+more+impactful%2C+more+creative%2C+and+frankly+hopefully+having+more+fun+when+they+shoulder+to+shoulder.%26quot%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+working+environment+of+today%2C+employees+are+always+working+in+teams.+The+lone+worker+has+by+in+large+fallen+away.+Now-days%2C+employees+in+most+industries%2C+and+especially+in+the+software+space%2C+prefer+to+work+in+Agile+team+structures+that+are+multi-disciplinary.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ECreative+problem+solving%2C+quick+delivery%2C+and+the+application+of+judgement+on+complex+business+situations+requires+employee+interaction+and+sometimes%2C+this+can+only+be+truly+effective+in+an+environment+designed+to+support+creative+collaborative+efficiency.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+intersection+between+flexible+hours+and+team+collaboration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ECertainly+the+nature+of+work+has+changed.+We+will+never+return+to+a+system+where+people+all+work+a+9-5+day%2C+based+at+the+offce.+But+with+that%2C+companies+have+recognised+the+importance+of+collaboration.+We+can+expect+to+see+companies+investing+in+developing+intelligent+working+spaces+that+offer+productive%2C+collaborative%2C+environments+for+their+employees.+Enabling+them+to+jump+into+quick+meetings%2C+quick+coffee+catch-ups%2C+and+host+interactive+sessions+for+creative+planning%2C+when+they+are+at+the+office.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThere+is+the+old+saying...two+heads+are+better+than+one.+Collaborating+in+your+teams+is+vital.+There+are+smaller+offices%2C+and+spaces+where+one+can+experience+a+quiet+focused+environment%2C+but+also+collaborate+and+interact.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EEqually%2C+employees+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+see+offices+only+as+a+place+for+meetings+and+companies+should+look+at+how+they+can+create+creative+and+collaborative+working+environments+that+add+value.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E
Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect+Delivery+Manager%29%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Tele-working+and+Telecommuting+are+both+popular+thanks+to+technology+tools+that+facilitate+communication+and+collaboration.+But+it+doesn%E2%80%99t+necessarily+mean+both+deliver+the+same+results+in+terms+of+employee+engagement+and+productivity.

Choose+your+digital+transformation+starting+point %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FChoosingyourDigitalTransformationStartingPoint-Moosa.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+650px%3B+height%3A+358px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+by+Moosa+Gani+%26ndash%3B+Delivery+Manager%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhere+do+you+start+on+your+path+to+Digital+Transformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+successful+Digital+Transformation+stories+out+there.+According+to+Gartner%2C+about+66%25+of+leaders+want+to+transform%2C+but+only+about+11%25+are+actually+achieving+a+healthy+dose+of+digital+business.+In+your+quest+to+Digitally+Transform%2C+questions+such+as+%26ldquo%3BHave+we+unlocked+new+digital+ways+of+making+money%3F%26rdquo%3B+or+%26ldquo%3BCan+we+quantifiably+differentiate+the+way+to+deliver+value+to+our+customers%3F%26rdquo%3B.+If+you+answered+%26ldquo%3BNo%26rdquo%3B+to+either%2C+then+your+Digital+Transformation+journey+continues.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+with+anything+new%2C+it+is+always+difficult+to+get+things+off+the+ground%2C+to+take+that+first+step.+This+most+certainly+applies+to+Digital+Transformation+as+organisations+get+stuck+on+their+starting+points.+According+to+Gartner%2C+57%25+of+organisations+have+yet+to+find+a+starting+point+on+their+Digital+Transformation+journey.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Here+are+4+points+that+CIOs+can+leverage+on+their+journey+to+Digital+Transformation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%221%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EConnected+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+they+say%2C+knowledge+is+power+and+as+with+any+form+of+transformation%2C+lessons+learned+or+data+accumulated+is+always+key.+How+do+you+know+where+you%26rsquo%3Bre+going+if+you+don%26%2339%3Bt+know+where+you+have+come+from%3F%26nbsp%3BConnected+is+not+a+transformation+per+se+but+an+exercise+in+laying+the+foundations+for+optimisation+and+data+gathering+initiatives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+you+connect+all+the+assets+that+make+up+your+business%2C+therein+lies+the+value+to+transform.+From+creating+better+efficiencies+around+delivery+times+and+device+utilisation+or+implementing+technologies+like+IOT+%28Internet+of+things%29+to+reduce+costs.+Once+connected%2C+organisations+will+be+able+to+leverage+the+connections+and+data+to+open+up+new+revenue+streams+from+mining+data+or+just+exposing+the+data+across+the+value+chain+for+better+correlations+and+efficiency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%222%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EAutonomous+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+we+move+into+a+world+where+machines+become+%26lsquo%3Bsmarter%26rsquo%3B+with+the+likes+of+ML+and+AI%2C+there+exists+many+opportunities.+From+automating+mundane+human+processes+to+complex+AI+scenarios%2C+such+as+the+use+of+drones+for+the+security+industry+for+facial+recognition+or+perimeter+and+zone+defence+systems%2C+the+use+cases+are+plentiful.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Just+as+the+machines+make+human+efficiency+better+it+is+important+to+also+note+the+converse.+A+machine+is+only+as+good+as+what+it+has+been+taught+to+do.+With+the+rise+of+AI+and+machine+learning%2C+organisations+can+leverage+these+forms+of+autonomous+technologies+to+gain+competitive+advantages%2C+unlock+new+revenue+streams+or+just+cut+costs+with+better+efficiencies.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%223%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EEmpowered%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisations+who+empower+their+clients+create+exponential+growth+in+terms+of+value-add.+As+an+example%2C+in+the+medical+field%2C+Apple%26rsquo%3Bs+new+series+4+watch+has+the+ability+to+conduct+an+ECG+%28Electrocardiogram%29.+This+gives+the+user+the+pre-emptive+ability+to+be+aware+of+health-related+heart+conditions+before+it%26rsquo%3Bs+too+late.+This+not+only+saves+lives+but+also+medical+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Apple+has+empowered+their+consumers+through+the+use+of+technology%2C+giving+them+relevant+information%2C+thereby+empowering+them+to+be+proactive+instead+of+reactive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%224%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProgrammable+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+organisations+that+choose+to+go+the+programmable+route+as+a+starting+point%2C+it+is+important+to+note+that+business+and+operating+model+changes+become+a+focus.+The+objective+is+to+allow+other+parties+to+leverage+your+assets+in+order+to+deliver+value+to+your+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+generally+done+by+means+of+API%26rsquo%3Bs+%28application+programming+interfaces%29+that+give+3rd+parties+the+ability+to+unlock+value+from+what+you+have+exposed+to+them.+Examples+of+this+are+banks+which+expose+services+through+API%26rsquo%3Bs+like+charging+for+each+call+for+digital+identity+verifications+or+bank+account+verifications.+This+unlocks+new+revenue+streams+and+new+business+models+to+work+with.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+no+simple+formula+to+Digital+Transformation.+There+is+only+the+starting+point.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhich+one+will+be+yours%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
There+are+many+successful+Digital+Transformation+stories+out+there.+According+to+Gartner%2C+about+66%25+of+leaders+want+to+transform%2C+but+only+about+11%25+are+actually+achieving+a+healthy+dose+of+digital+business.+In+your+quest+to+Digitally+Transform%2C+questions+such+as+%E2%80%9CHave+we+unlocked+new+digital+ways+of+making+money%3F%E2%80%9D+or+%E2%80%9CCan+we+quantifiably+differentiate+the+way+to+deliver+value+to+our+customers%3F%E2%80%9D.+If+you+answered+%E2%80%9CNo%E2%80%9D+to+either%2C+then+your+Digital+Transformation+journey+continues.

Making+the+most+of+your+2019+technology+budget %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelect_2019TechnologyBudget.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+Mark+Beets%2C+General+Manager+at+Entelect%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+recent+years+it+has+become+critical+for+Medium+Enterprises+%28MEs%29+to+accurately+analyse+their+technology-related+spend+to+rather+detail+the+desired+value-generators.+This+value+perspective+aids+the+decision-making+process+and+also+ensures+the+spend+is+aligned+with+the+desired+organisational+goals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+beneficial+side-effect+of+this+analysis+will+also+re-awaken+an+appreciation+of+the+balance+between+projected+market-need+versus+actual+business-demand%2C+empowering+stakeholders+to+make+better+decisions+on+where+to+invest+that+hard-earned+cash.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+optimally-functioning+ME+should+also+look+to+exploit+the+inherent+organisational+adaptability+to+deliver+quantifiable+results+in+shorter+time+frames%2C+compared+to+a+larger+behemoth.+Fundamentally%2C+any+successful+ME+CIO%26rsquo%3Bs+mandate+should+be+to+consider+spend-optimisation+with+3+primary+goals+in+mind%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Advancement%2C+Process+Efficiency+and+Transformation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdvancement%2F+Enhancement%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Advancing+the+business+should+be+high+up+on+the+list+of+CIO+priorities%3A+the+consideration+of+Research+and+Development+%28R%26amp%3BD%29+opportunities+and+the+trend+to+prioritize+solutioning+over+systemization.+Sweating+the+infrastructure+assets+%28where+possible%29%2C+and+redirecting+the+always-shoestring+IT+budget+to+identifiable+iterative+development+projects+should+be+a+priority.+Decisions+towards+developing+solutions+that+look+to+evolve+the+organization%26%2339%3Bs+competitive+advantage+are+critical+for+growing+market-share.+This+short-term+strategy+should+look+to+produce+the+largest+gains+for+instant+recognition%2C+immediately+leverageable+by+the+marketing+and+sales+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Medium+to+long+term+would+be+to+%28thereafter%29+stabilise+these+gains+for+sustainable+growth+%28through+systemization%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EProcess+Efficiency%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identifying+and+streamlining+any+system%2C+or+people+related+processes%2C+with+an+effort+to+reduce+spend+and+alleviate+user+frustration+is+the+current+trend+for+a+service+demanding+and+app-fickle+generation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Push+for+those+cost-controls+and+cost-reduction+initiatives%2C+but+continue+to+show+improvements+in+system+efficiencies+to+continually+buy+favour+in+your+user+base.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+always+a+tough+ask+for+already+sunk+costs+and+ageing+equipment+-+but+an+easier+ask+if+the+sourcing+team+has+already+considered+feature+enhancements+while+in+the+original+purchasing+phase+of+any+organisations+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProcess+efficiency+is+now+a+top-down+approach+as+business+stakeholders+have+an+appetite+to+consider+a+short-term+offering+dynamism%2C+driven+by+a+realisation+that+the+ME+needs+to+differentiate+in+a+saturated+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+custom+solutioning%2C+aligning+a+sourcing+%28partnership%29+strategy+with+the+business+direction+will+look+to+create+harmony+between+technology+goals+the+correct+solution+partner.+Efficiently+reducing+wasteful+redesign+or+rework+with+an+established+and+experienced+provider+that+has+proven+itself+in+the+services+market+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETransformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESolutioning+that+looks+to+increase+market+share+%28or+capture+a+market%29%2C+increase+profit%2Freturns+or+increase+company+revenue%2C+are+all+top-of-mind+for+C-Suiters+and+are+a+top+priority+due+to+the+highest+value+returns.Unfortunately+only+a+few+CIOs+are+considering+new+technologies+and+advancements+to+accomplish+this%2C+instead+focussing+on+overall+stability+to+meet+these+goals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+ME+transformation+strategy+is+to+change+business+goals+towards+faster+services+%26amp%3B+solutioning.+The+large+effort+will+come+with+transforming+the+current+business+delivery+culture+into+smaller%2C+in-house+entities+for+small%2C+quick+solutioning+teams+for+faster+gains.+These+teams+can+always+be+absorbed+into+the+legacy+business+stable%2C+or+become+the+new+engine+at+a+later+stage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelectNewsletter1.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESource%3A+Gartner%2C+May+2018+%5Bhttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.gartner.com%2Fdoc%2F3877164%3Fref%3DclientFriendlyURL%5D%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+summary%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYour+competitor%26rsquo%3Bs+faster%2C+collaborative+teams+are+eating+away+at+your+market+share.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately+a+pragmatic+approach+to+assign+budget+spend+to+the+correct+value-initiative+is+always+unique+to+the+business+and+often+based+on+the+overall+maturity+of+the+organisation.+It+is%2C+however%2C+becoming+more+important+to+rather+bias+this+spend+towards+business+value+generators+and+not+necessarily+ROI%3A+and+to+consider+this+factor+%28value%29+as+well+as%3A+type%2C+size+and+complexity+of+each+solution%2C+to+deliver+the+most+organisational+impact.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinding+the+right+talent%2C+using+the+appropriate+systems+%28at+the+right+price+point%29+and+combining+these+to+develop+a+solution-based+culture+is+fundamental+to+the+success+of+medium-sized+enterprises+in+2019.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
In+recent+years+it+has+become+critical+for+Medium+Enterprises+%28MEs%29+to+accurately+analyse+their+technology-related+spend+to+rather+detail+the+desired+value-generators.+This+value+perspective+aids+the+decision-making+process+and+also+ensures+the+spend+is+aligned+with+the+desired+organisational+goals.
    
["Innovation in business"]

Reasons+to+upgrade+your+legacy+systems %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FReasonstoupgradeyourlegacysystems.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUpgrading+your+legacy+systems%3A+A+digital+advantage+or+giant+waste+of+money%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+most+enterprises%2C+the+thought+of+upgrading+a+longstanding+legacy+system+is+quite+daunting.+It+can+be+a+highly+cumbersome+process+with+lots+of+moving+parts+to+account+for%2C+generally+leading+to+an+%3Cem%3Eif+it+ain%26rsquo%3Bt+broke%2C+don%26rsquo%3Bt+fix+it%3C%2Fem%3E+mindset.+The+process+of+upgrading+is+also+infamous+for+often+being+a+costly+exercise+%26ndash%3B+causing+many+business+leaders+to+cling+to+their+deteriorating+systems.+When+a+legacy+system+still+meets+the+current+requirements%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+to+justify+spending+resources+to+stay+up+to+date.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGlobally%2C+IT+has+earned+a+poor+reputation+by+making+headlines+for+money+being+wasted+on+major+legacy+upgrades%2C+often+massively+impacting+customers+due+to+rushed+projects.+This+is+due+to+a+misperception+that+digitisation+has+to+include+scrapping+existing+technology+and+starting+over.+But+your+upgrade+could+find+a+happy+medium+by+adopting+a+hybrid+approach+between+legacy+and+modern+systems.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+your+ageing+digital+tools+may+get+the+job+done%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+recognise+when+your+business+has+the+need+for+a+modernised+alternative.+Deteriorating+legacy+systems+and+processes+you+currently+have+in+place+can+only+take+you+so+far+until+they+start+falling+behind.+This+will+impede+your+business+from+thriving+in+the+long+run.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFour+reasons+to+upgrade+your+legacy+system%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+many+justifications+for+system+upgrades%2C+but+your+main+driving+forces+to+consider+are%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUpgrades+reduce+security+risks%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Legacy+software+was+initially+focused+on+functionality+more+than+security+and+is+often+vulnerable+to+attack+from+cyber+criminals.+Underpinning+technology+stacks+could+also+be+nearing+end+of+life+and+will+not+see+future+upgrades.+For+businesses+operating+under+some+of+the+more+recent+regulatory+compliance+requirements+such+as+POPI+and+GDPR%2C+outdated+technologies+can+lead+to+repercussions+in+the+form+of+penalties+and+reputational+damage.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThere+is+a+shrinking+talent+pool+to+service+legacy+systems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+skills+needed+to+support+ageing+systems+are+becoming+scarce+and+expensive.+There+are+many+of+these+solutions+still+in+service%2C+but+the+number+IT+professionals+who+can+understand+and+update+the+code+dwindles+as+the+modern+workforce+moves+towards+relevant+and+transferrable+technology+skillsets.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BOperating+and+maintaining+legacy+systems+is+costly%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+cost+of+legacy+technology+maintenance%2C+in+the+form+of+licensing+and+expensive+specialised+hardware%2C+often+outweighs+the+upgrade+investment%2C+even+over+shorter+timeframes.+The+biggest+cost+risk+is+of+course+that+of+the+potential+failure+of+a+legacy+system+and+the+resulting+business+losses.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BInnovation+is+stifled%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Older+technologies+and+systems+will+limit+the+level+of+innovation+and+not+able+to+take+advantage+of+more+modern+solutions+that+customers+have+become+accustomed+to.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+navigate+an+upgrade+project%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Before+starting+your+upgrade%2C+consider+the+following+to+ensure+your+business+stays+up+and+running%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAvoid+one+massive+upgrade%2C+and+the+%26ldquo%3Bbig+bang%26rdquo%3B+approach.+Rather+focus+on+constantly+making+smaller+innovations+and+renewing+as+you+go.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDo+enough+research+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+fall+for+fancy+buzzwords+like+artificial+intelligence+or+robotic+process+automation%2C+because+the+chances+are+you+won%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+need+it.+Rather+understand+what+your+business+truly+needs+to+grow.+There+are+no+silver+bullets.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BEnsure+any+new+solutions+are+designed+around+compatibility+with+current+systems+to+create+a+more+seamless+transition.+Start+with+a+complete+audit+of+your+technology+landscape+to+gain+a+clear+picture+of+potential+impact.+This+ensures+that+no+surprise+failures+pop+up+when+going+live+with+a+new+system.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+obvious+and+not-so-obvious+reasons+for+upgrading+your+legacy+system%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+better+to+make+a+decision+to+upgrade+your+system+now+than+to+have+the+decision+forced+upon+you+later.+But+being+old+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+technology+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+add+value+either.+Sometimes+changes+in+business+processes+are+more+important+than+technological+changes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsidering+whether+to+upgrade+or+replace+legacy+systems+is+a+daunting+task+for+many%2C+but+if+you+do+embark+on+an+upgrade%2C+success+will+come+from+moving+methodically+and+pragmatically.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Upgrading+your+legacy+systems%3A+A+digital+advantage+or+giant+waste+of+money%3F+For+most+enterprises%2C+the+thought+of+upgrading+a+longstanding+legacy+system+is+quite+daunting.+It+can+be+a+highly+cumbersome+process+with+lots+of+moving+parts+to+account+for%2C+generally+leading+to+an+if+it+ain%E2%80%99t+broke%2C+don%E2%80%99t+fix+it+mindset.+The+process+of+upgrading+is+also+infamous+for+often+being+a+costly+exercise+%E2%80%93+causing+many+business+leaders+to+cling+to+their+deteriorating+systems.+When+a+legacy+system+still+meets+the+current+requirements%2C+it%E2%80%99s+hard+to+justify+spending+resources+to+stay+up+to+date.
    
["Innovation in business"]
