A+South+African+perspective+on+traditional+IT+versus+digital+transformation %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTraditionalITvsadigitaltransformation%28002%29.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+South+African+perspective+on+traditional+IT+versus+digital+transformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+has+quite+a+few+very+large+and+very+old+organisations.+They+tend+to+be+quite+federated%2C+and+a+cursory+glance+over+their+unique+histories+explains+why.+Some+departments+and+business+units+were+acquired+or+merged%2C+some+were+started+as+silos+and+others+just+evolved+along+a+different+vector.+Therein+lies+a+problem+of+companies+with+long+histories%3A+divergence.+Customer+channels+evolve+faster+than+mainframes%2C+payments+evolve+faster+than+compliance%2C+and+insurance+faster+than+banking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+if+we+assume+any+rate+of+improvement+of+one+area+over+another%2C+the+technological+gap+between+these+areas+widens+over+time.+The+older+the+organisation%2C+the+wider+the+gap%2C+and+the+more+complex+and+expensive+digital+transformation+becomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+a+few+considerations+when+designing+digital+technology+initiatives+that+deliver+change+and+close+the+gap%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStrategic+dimension%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelop+a+bold%2C+clear+strategic+mandate+the+organisation+can+get+excited+about+at+all+levels%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+going+to+change+an+organisation+without+derailing+it%2C+you+need+cooperation%2C+understanding+and+championship.+CIOs+must+become+the+champions+of+the+transformation+agenda+and+spend+time+creating+understanding+with+their+managers+%3Cul%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3ECampaign+for+the+strategy+internally%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cul+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em%3B%22%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelop+an+implementation+plan%2C+prioritisation+matrix+and+budget+in+collaboration+with+all+CIOs%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EDigital+initiatives+cut+through+the+entire+organisation%2C+from+customer+channels+to+mainframes.+It+is+instructive+to+include+all+participants+in+the+process+%3Cul%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EMake+CIOs+accountable+for+planning+their+contributions+and+deciding+their+obligations+to+the+digital+initiatives.+This+creates+a+shares+sense+of+purpose%2C+obligation+and+commitment%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ESet+shared+targets+and+incentives+across+departments+to+encourage+collaboration+and+vanquish+non-strategic+agendas%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETechnological+dimension%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3E+%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3EEquip+delivery+teams+to+deliver+end-to-end%3A%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EBreak+down+barriers+between+infrastructure%2C+data%2C+application%2C+integration+and+channel+teams+to+enable+end-to-end+feature+delivery+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cli%3EUse+DevOps%3Cstrong%3E%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EAs+you+start+to+deliver+at+a+faster+pace%2C+you+need+to+manage+the+pace+and+quality+of+releases%2C+deployments+and+issue+resolution.+DevOps+has+widespread+adoption+as+an+approach+to+automate+and+enable+this+for+a+reason+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3EBuild+a+design-thinking+culture%3A%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EUsing+the+five+principles+of+design-thinking+methodology%2C+ensure+that+your+organisation+is+building+digital+assets+that+are+proven+to+connect+with+and+help+your+customer.+Take+some+of+the+guesswork+out+of+implementation%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3EConsider+platforms+and+APIs%3A+%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EDigital+solutions+should+be+equipped+to+evolve+quickly.+The+ability+for+third-parties+and+other+business+units+to+extend+and+integrate+with+your+solutions+is+an+important+currency+in+the+digital+world%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3ECentralise%2C+aggregate+and+use+your+data%3A+%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EAs+you+enable+more+digitalisation+within+your+organisation%2C+you+open+up+the+taps+to+more+meaningful+data.+Ensuring+a+single-view+of+the+customer+across+a+large+federated+organisation+is+an+important+business+objective%2C+and+one+that+can+be+enabled+with+the+right+tools+and+approach+to+data+management%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+within+large%2C+traditional+South+African+corporates+is+a+far+cry+from+a+cake-walk%2C+and+one+needs+to+consider+both+the+political+and+the+technological+dimensions+of+a+programme+of+this+magnitude.+Organisations+can+improve+their+probability+of+success+by+driving+a+clear+and+collaborative+approach+from+the+highest+levels%2C+breaking+down+silo-thinking%2C+and+aligning+priorities+and+incentives.+From+a+technology+perspective+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about+the+understanding+and+implementation+of+modern+approaches+to+the+SDLC+including+feature+teams%2C+DevOps%2C+design-thinking%2C+APIs+and+big+data.%3C%2Fp%3E
South+Africa+has+quite+a+few+very+large+and+very+old+organisations.+They+tend+to+be+quite+federated%2C+and+a+cursory+glance+over+their+unique+histories+explains+why.+Some+departments+and+business+units+were+acquired+or+merged%2C+some+were+started+as+silos+and+others+just+evolved+along+a+different+vector.+Therein+lies+a+problem+of+companies+with+long+histories%3A+divergence.+Customer+channels+evolve+faster+than+mainframes%2C+payments+evolve+faster+than+compliance%2C+and+insurance+faster+than+banking.
    
["Innovation in business"]
  
Traditional IT vs a digital transformation.png
    
Build+and+buy%3A+Where+custom+software+belongs+in+your+universe %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBuildandBuy-Wherecustomsoftwarebelongsinyouruniverse-FINAL-15.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+businesses+evolve%2C+they+will+need+software+as+a+foundation+of+their+strategy.+Whether+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+product%2C+supporting+a+service%2C+or+driving+efficiency+in+business+processes%2C+there+is+no+avoiding+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHistorically%2C+custom+software+has+been+infamous+for+being+costly+and+redundant+in+the+presence+of+an+ever-growing+variety+and+quality+of+packaged+software+solutions.+There+are+several+areas+in+your+overall+architecture+where+packaged+solutions+still+make+the+most+sense.+These+include+systems+supporting+generic+business+functions+such+as+payroll%2C+call+centre%2C+and+systems-of-record.+In+these+areas%2C+the+business+needs+industry-standard+and+proven+systems+which+are+unlikely+to+require+much+customisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+recent+times%2C+custom+development+approaches+have+proven+to+be+back+in+favour+as+a+critical+component+of+any+holistic+IT+architecture.+The+key+consideration+is+where.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+a+modern+enterprise+architecture%2C+custom+software+is+essential+for+innovation%2C+differentiation+and+integration%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BInnovation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+are+building+customer+surface+areas+or+digital+channels+that+need+to+be+truly+innovative.+This+is+software+that+defines+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDifferentiation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+are+currently+in+a+competitive+environment+with+a+niche+product+or+service.+You+need+a+solution+that+differentiates+yourself+from+competitors+to+stand+out+from+the+crowd+and+win+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIntegration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+have+your+packaged+solutions+selected+and+working+well+independently%2C+but+need+to+present+a+more+rationalised+and+streamlined+experience+to+your+users.+You+will+need+well-designed+custom+software+to+achieve+this.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterestingly%2C+there+is+a+parallel+to+be+drawn+here+with+how+we+often+approach+investment+strategies%2C+and+consider+risk+versus+reward+over+the+long+term.+There+is+a+popular+portfolio-building+strategy+called+Core+%26amp%3B+Satellite.+The+premise+is+to+build+a+portfolio+designed+to+minimise+volatility+and+cost%2C+while+balancing+risk+between+active+and+passive+funds+to+provide+an+opportunity+to+outperform+the+market+as+a+whole.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+%26lsquo%3Bcore%26rsquo%3B+of+your+investment+strategy+should+be+assets+that+are+cost-effective%2C+proven%2C+robust%2C+best-practice%2C+and+relatively+risk-free.+Similarly%2C+you+need+dependable+and+functional+packaged+software+as+the+building+blocks+of+your+architecture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+%26lsquo%3Bsatellites%26rsquo%3B+around+these+building+blocks%2C+you+need+custom+solutions+in+order+to+innovate+and+to+truly+differentiate+yourself.+You+need+non-standard+and+memorable+experiences+which+offer+greater+impact+and+reward%2C+but+come+with+some+degree+of+risk.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBalanced+correctly%2C+both+your+IT+and+investment+architectures+are+geared+to+yield+generous+returns.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBuildandBuyINFOGRAPHIC.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+need+the+robust+and+cost-effective%2C+but+static+and+unexciting+packaged+products.+You+also+need+to+deploy+custom+systems+and+differentiated+user+experiences+to+succeed.+Ultimately%2C+your+ambition+should+be+to+build+and+buy%2C+to+create+a+holistic+strategy+which+correctly+exploits+both+approaches.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
As+businesses+evolve%2C+they+will+need+software+as+a+foundation+of+their+strategy.+Whether+it%E2%80%99s+a+product%2C+supporting+a+service%2C+or+driving+efficiency+in+business+processes%2C+there+is+no+avoiding+it.
    
["Innovation in business"]

%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUXasanimportantpartofyouragiledeliveryteam-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+noteworthy+impact+design+has+had+on+software+development+in+recent+times+has+been+indisputable.+The+market+now+is+absolutely+connected%2C+and+the+network+effect+means+that+products+with+excellent+user+experiences+will+go+viral%2C+while+bad+user+experiences+will+have+the+reverse+negative+effect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+many+of+our+projects%2C+the+amount+of+rework+is+reduced+and+the+adoption+of+the+product+is+increased+when+UX+principles+are+applied.+The+entire+software+industry+is+under+pressure+to+compete+with+the+user-centric+design+approach+of+the+major+players%2C+such+as+Facebook%2C+Airbnb+and+Uber.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFor+many+local+organisations+who+do+not+have+the+generous+budgets+to+match+these+big+brands%2C+adding+UX+Engineers+to+an+agile+delivery+team+does+have+a+major+impact.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUXImage2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+541px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bve+been+delivering+software+solutions+for+close+to+two+decades.+We+are+guided+by+our+many+years+as+an+implementation+partner+and+understand+that+great+UX+is+a+result+of+a+collective+effort+throughout+research%2C+design+and+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+always+cared+about+seeing+our+solutions+go+into+production+and+get+the+adoption+our+clients+had+hoped+for.+This+means+we+work+to+understand+context%2C+and+challenge+ideas+with+the+intention+to+deliver+something+meaningful+and+create+return+on+investment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+also+believe+in+looking+beyond+the+technology%2C+to+business+processes+and+other+opportunities+which+may+improve+experiences+or+solve+problems+in+smarter+ways.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGreat+UX+no+longer+just+a+nice-to-have+layer+added+at+the+end+of+the+development+cycle%2C+but+a+significant+aspect+embedded+right+from+design+phases+to+delivery.%26nbsp%3B+Over+the+last+few+years%2C+we+have+been+actively+working+to+bring+the+voice+of+the+user+into+software+design.+We+now+take+ownership+throughout+product+development%2C+and+can+take+a+deeper+level+of+accountability+than+most.+This+allows+us+to+deliver+great+solutions+and+give+our+customers+a+competitive+advantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+is+an+end-to-end+technology+services+provider+delivering+custom+software+across+all+industry+sectors.+We+help+our+clients+listen+to+the+needs+of+their+users%2C+and+create+seamless+and+memorable+digital+experiences+using+targeted%2C+data-driven+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFind+us+at+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E+%2F+%3Ca+href%3D%22mailto%3Asolutions%40entelect.co.za%22%3Esolutions%40entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

The+data+science+behind+UX %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTheDataScienceBehindUX.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+technological+advancement+in+the+21st+century%2C+everybody+wants+to+experience+the+best+technology+with+the+least+amount+of+effort.+By+now%2C+user+experience+%28UX%29+design+is+recognised+as+a+crucial+part+of+customer+satisfaction%2C+but+without+the+relevant+data+to+validate+the+designs%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+relying+too+much+on+intuition.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+and+data+are+a+hard-to-ignore+symbiosis.+UX+Engineers+have+a+variety+of+research+and+problem-solving+techniques+at+their+disposal%2C+but+data+is+probably+the+most+important.+While+design+instincts+are+still+valuable%2C+data+and+analytics+can+help+you+refine+your+product+understanding+and+ensure+your+decisions+satisfy+stakeholders.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFamiliarity+with+users+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+the+same+as+listening+to+them.+Here+is+how+using+targeted%2C+data-driven+research+can+help+you+listen+to+the+needs+of+users+to+create+seamless+and+memorable+digital+experiences%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFind+what+truly+resonates+with+users%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+designing+a+completely+new+product%2C+you+need+user+input%2C+However%2C+users+are+infamously+bad+at+explaining+their+needs%2C+often+asking+for+the+wrong+features.+Experience+and+good+intuition+are+assets+for+UX+Engineers%2C+but+without+robust+data%2C+decisions+would+be+based+on+educated+guesses+and+some+fairly+intangible+principles.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+where+data+science+comes+in.+Using+data-driven+insights%2C+UX+Engineers+will+better+understand+user+behaviour+and+context%2C+categorise+users+by+behavioural+patterns%2C+and+find+direction+in+the+design+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFocus+on+the+correct+problem%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Being+familiar+with+the+product+and+deeply+invested+in+its+success%2C+often+affects+the+objectivity+of+the+UX+Engineer.+Data-driven+UX%2C+provides+insights+to+minimise+guesswork%2C+preventing+UX+Engineers+from+wasting+time+by+circling+back+to+research+steps+in+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+not+necessarily+about+the+data+%26ndash%3B+but+rather+about+gathering+and+analysing+data+properly+in+order+to+find+the+correct+problems+which+will+need+creative+solutions.+The+lack+of+data-supported+evidence+risks+designing+the+wrong+services%2C+products+and+experiences.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BExplore+other+approaches%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Assumptions+are+always+a+problem+with+the+creative+process+of+UX+design%2C+especially+when+it+comes+to+relying+on+gut+feeling.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+to+shake+off+usual+approaches+and+best+practices+to+create+something+that+truly+resonates+with+your+audience.+Data+science+can+help+guide+UX+Engineers+in+a+more+creative+direction%2C+tailoring+the+UX+specifically+to+each+target+audience.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EData+may+show+user+misunderstandings%2C+how+they+take+shortcuts%2C+or+how+different+groups+of+users+fundamentally+use+our+systems+in+very+different+ways+%26ndash%3B+ultimately+revealing+unexpected+findings+that+improve+our+understanding.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSupport+bold+design+concepts%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Data+is+more+likely+to+encourage+creative+design+than+to+supress+it.+When+UX+design+principles+are+based+on+data-driven+research%2C+the+outcome+is+highly+personalised+and+optimised.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+is+often+seen+as+subjective+in+the+technology+industry%2C+but+research+findings+can+help+gain+buy-in+from+stakeholders+and+clients.+Stakeholders+ultimately+just+want+a+solution+that+works+and+works+well.+Making+decisions+based+on+evidence+gathered+from+actual+user+research+and+data%2C+will+help+them+gain+confidence+in+the+proposed+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUXDataInfographic-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUX+problems+are+complex+%28sometimes+in+their+simplicity%29%2C+and+so+solutions+must+be+sought+through+evidence-based+experimentation%2C+practice+and+collaboration.+Data+provides+the+ultimate+quantitative+evidence+to+prove+or+falsify+our+instincts.+Data+should+drive+a+responsive+and+improving+UX%2C+which+then+drives+new+data+for+measurement+and+observation.+This+is+a+valuable+process+which+can+create+momentum+of+its+own%2C+resulting+in+an+ever-evolving+data-driven+UX+cycle.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
With+the+technological+advancement+in+the+21st+century%2C+everybody+wants+to+experience+the+best+technology+with+the+least+amount+of+effort.+By+now%2C+user+experience+%28UX%29+design+is+recognised+as+a+crucial+part+of+customer+satisfaction%2C+but+without+the+relevant+data+to+validate+the+designs%2C+we%E2%80%99re+relying+too+much+on+intuition.

Why+Design+Sprints+fail %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhydesignsprintsfailFBV2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDeveloped+by+Google+Ventures%2C+a+Design+Sprint+is+a+five-day+process+for+answering+critical+business+questions+through+design%2C+prototyping%2C+and+testing+ideas+with+customers+or+stakeholders.+While+Design+Sprints+are+great+for+validating+ideas+and+solving+big+challenges%2C+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+always+work.+Getting+people+to+clear+their+schedules+for+a+week+is+already+challenging%2C+even+more+so+when+that+week+results+in+wasted+efforts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhyDesignSprintsfailV2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+376px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+Design+Sprints+begin+to+fail+there+are+usually+clear+indicators.+Without+proper+facilitation+and+structure%2C+arguments+erupt%2C+participation+declines%2C+users+become+disinterested+and+management+support+starts+decreasing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+problem+comes+from+thinking+that+this+methodology+is+a+one-size-fits-all+solution+to+any+problem.+When+having+this+mindset%2C+there+is+a+high+probability+the+sprint+will+not+provide+the+value+you+are+expecting.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBelow+are+four+reasons+why+Design+Sprints+fail+and+how+you+can+avoid+them%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou+don%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+need+a+Design+Sprint%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3ENot+every+problem+is+suitable+for+a+Design+Sprint%2C+so+ensure+the+problem+that+you%26rsquo%3Bre+bringing+to+the+sprint+is+worth+solving.+In+instances+where+the+scope+of+the+problem+is+either+too+broad+or+too+narrow%2C+or+if+there%26rsquo%3Bs+already+a+well-defined+product+that+is+ready+for+development%2C+a+Design+Sprint+would+not+be+the+right+tool.+Before+running+a+sprint+ask+whether+the+problem+is+big+enough+for+it+to+need+a+week+or+if+it%26rsquo%3Bs+just+a+project+that+needs+a+shorter+workshop.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli+value%3D%222%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EThere%26rsquo%3Bs+not+enough+variety+of+stakeholders+in+the+room%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EA+successful+Design+Sprint+needs+a+variety+of+people+within+the+organisation+in+the+room+in+order+to+produce+the+best+results.+The+key+is+to+get+all+voices%3A+operational%2C+finance%2C+strategic%2C+customer%2C+executive+and+objective+views+to+help+solve+problems+from+as+many+angles+as+possible%2C+and+unlock+creativity.+This+requires+the+business+to+take+several+of+their+employees+off+existing+projects+and+get+them+working+together+for+an+entire+week.+Even+though+this+seems+onerous%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+crucial+for+the+process+to+be+successful%2C+and+a+Design+Sprint+should+not+take+place+if+you+cannot+get+the+right+people+in+the+room.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli+value%3D%223%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou%26rsquo%3Bre+solving+the+wrong+problem%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EOr+you%26rsquo%3Bre+trying+to+solve+multiple+disparate+problems+at+the+same+time.+Ensure+everyone+in+the+room+knows+what+problem+to+focus+on+and+that+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+get+side-tracked+by+other+issues+during+the+process.+Design+Sprints+are+quick+and+demanding%2C+and+the+key+to+success+is+to+have+a+well-prepared+team+with+a+clearly+defined+problem+statement.+Even+though+five+days+seem+long%2C+it+goes+by+quickly+when+people+get+distracted.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col%3E+%3Cli+value%3D%224%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou%26rsquo%3Bre+losing+track+of+the+Design+Sprint+process%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+Sprints+follow+a+simple+framework.+This+is+easy+to+accomplish+in+the+week%2C+but+the+team+must+be+focused+and+have+experience+working+in+a+fast-paced+environment.+Keeping+a+Design+Sprint+on+time+and+on+target+is+crucial%2C+and+should+be+administered+by+an+experienced+facilitator+who+has+the+authority+and+assertiveness+to+ensure+the+sprint+stays+on+track.+The+key+is+to+trust+in+the+process+and+stick+to+the+exercises.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+Sprints+are+not+just+for+design.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+tool+for+solving+problems+and+validating+solutions%2C+and+can+be+used+in+a+wide+range+of+contexts.+But+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+a+silver+bullet+and+won%26rsquo%3Bt+solve+every+problem.+Most+of+these+risks+can+be+managed+by+an+experienced+facilitator+who+knows+how+to+ensure+the+right+problem+is+addressed%2C+a+balance+of+viewpoints+is+present%2C+and+the+Design+Sprint+process+is+followed+correctly.%3C%2Fp%3E
Developed+by+Google+Ventures%2C+a+Design+Sprint+is+a+five-day+process+for+answering+critical+business+questions+through+design%2C+prototyping%2C+and+testing+ideas+with+customers+or+stakeholders.+While+Design+Sprints+are+great+for+validating+ideas+and+solving+big+challenges%2C+they+don%E2%80%99t+always+work.+Getting+people+to+clear+their+schedules+for+a+week+is+already+challenging%2C+even+more+so+when+that+week+results+in+wasted+efforts.
    
["Innovation in business"]
  
Why design sprints failFBV2.png
    
Best+practices+for+building+developer-friendly+APIs %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBestpracticesfrobuildingdeveloper-friendlyAPIs.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EApplication+Programming+Interfaces+%28APIs%29+can+be+among+a+company%26%2339%3Bs+greatest+assets+but+can+also+be+among+their+greatest+liabilities.+Poorly+designed+APIs+lead+to+an+endless+queue+of+consequences+followed+by+a+bad+reputation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+API+is+an+interface+which+software+engineers+use+to+interact+with+the+data%2C+and+a+well-crafted+API+just+makes+their+lives+that+much+easier.+APIs+allow+fellow+software+engineers+to+create+software+to+access+and+interact+with+your+application.+If+your+API+is+not+robust%2C+maintainable+and+developer-friendly%2C+there+is+a+risk+of+your+API+being+used+incorrectly+or+not+used+at+all.+The+more+consumer-friendly+your+API+is%2C+the+more+people+can+and+will+integrate+with+it.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+complete+control+over+what+users+do+with+your+API%2C+here+are+best+practices+for+building+developer-friendly+APIs%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BBuild+your+API+using+ubiquitous+language%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+confuse+your+user+by+using+inconsistent+language+across+the+different+API+calls+and+response+formats.+The+API+should+reflect+a+single%2C+uniform+language+used+in+the+domain+by+the+business+%26ndash%3B+and+hopefully+the+industry+as+well.+For+example%2C+avoid+a+response+%26lsquo%3Btransaction%26rsquo%3B+in+one+instance+and+%26%2339%3Border%26rsquo%3B+in+another+when+referring+to+the+same+entity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+building+your+API%2C+take+the+principle+of+least+astonishment%2C+also+called+the+principle+of+least+surprise%2C+into+account.+The+principle+states+that+a+component+of+a+system+should+behave+in+a+way+that+most+users+will+expect+it+to+behave%3B+hence+the+behaviour+should+not+astonish%2C+confuse+or+surprise+the+API+consumers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUnderstand+your+audience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Knowing+who+your+target+audience+is+can+refine+both+API+functionality+and+segment+future+integration+possibilities.+Your+API+needs+to+have+real-world+use+cases+and+should+not+be+built+based+on+assumptions+of+what+your+audience+would+want.+Build+for+an+existing+need%2C+and+if+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+one%2C+do+the+market+research+by+speaking+to+relevant+stakeholders.+Leverage+user+feedback%2C+and+test+and+consume+your+API+yourself.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BChatty+vs.+chunky+APIs%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+of+the+challenges+of+building+any+API+is+designing+your+it+in+such+a+way+that+is+both+useable+for+a+wide+variety+of+consumers%2C+but+also+with+minimal+overhead%2C+understanding+and+effort+required+to+perform+an+operation.+An+API%26rsquo%3Bs+design+can+either+be+described+as+%26ldquo%3Bchatty%26rdquo%3B+or+%26ldquo%3Bchunky%26rdquo%3B%2C+which+refers+to+amount+of+calls+the+API+requires+for+a+single+logical+operation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BChatty+APIs+require+you+to+have+to+do+multiple+calls+to+perform+a+single+operation.+Chatty+APIs+are+often+not+favoured+because+requiring+multiple+network+calls+will+slow+down+an+application%26rsquo%3Bs+responsiveness.+You+also+need+to+have+the+knowledge+of+what+to+call%2C+when.+An+example+of+a+chatty+API+would+be+if+you+need+to+collect+resources+for+a+section+in+web+application%2C+it+might+force+you+to+get+needed+info+for+each+object+separately.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BChunky+APIs+include+more+information+in+the+payloads+and+do+more+with+single+calls.+A+chunky+API+will+create+are+fewer+calls%2C+but+can+do+more%2C+or+return+more+information.+Of+course%2C+there+are+limits+to+how+chunky+it+should+be.+With+chunky+APIs%2C+there+is+less+flexibility+for+the+consumers%2C+resulting+in+less+possible+variety+in+use+of+the+API.+Overly+prescriptive+results+in+less+creativity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Both+have+their+advantages+and+limitations%2C+and+a+balance+should+be+found+between+the+two+%26ndash%3B+depending+on+the+requirements+of+your+API.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FChattyvsChunky.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDesign+with+performance+in+mind%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+define+the+time+and+payload+size+limits+of+each+API+call+so+that+consumers+know+what+performance+to+expect+from+each+call.+However%2C+be+careful+not+to+over-optimise.+Design+with+performance+in+mind%2C+but+the+design+should+not+focus+on+performance+only.+You+would+still+need+to+be+mindful+of+the+API+usability+and+maintainability.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+would+need+to+adequately+test+the+API+and+incorporate+automated+testing+to+ensure+that+non-functional+requirements+are+met.+The+tests+should+be+representative+of+the+production+usage+and+load%2C+e.g.+databases+should+be+representative+of+production+data%2C+the+number+of+calls+and+distribution+thereof+should+mimic+expected+usage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BEnable+clear+error+reporting+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Error+or+status+codes+are+almost+the+last+thing+that+you+want+to+see+in+an+API+response.+However%2C+using+correct+error+codes+is+extremely+valuable+to+the+consumer+of+your+API%2C+and+beneficial+to+your+development+team.+Error+responses+should+have+the+right+level+of+detail+of+what+went+wrong+and+should+send+the+necessary+information+back+to+API+consumer.+With+a+simple+error+code+and+resolution+explanation%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bve+not+only+communicated+the+cause+of+the+error%2C+but+the+intended+functionality+and+method+to+fix+said+error.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Utilise+features+of+the+technology+protocols+rather+than+using+custom+error+reporting%2C+e.g.+apply+HTTP+response+codes+when+using+HTTP+protocol+according+to+level+2+of+the+Richardson+Maturity+Model+for+RESTful+interfaces.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+6.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAPI+documentation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Your+API+should+be+accompanied+by+good+documentation+and+should+give+your+consumer+guidelines+on+various+aspects%2C+such+as+expected+response+times.+It+needs+to+explain+the+domain+and+its+ubiquitous+language+where+the+API+cannot%2C+including+providing+high-level+context+to+piece+things+together.+Using+diagrams+for+this+often+helps.+Following+these+guidelines+should+eliminate+any+ambiguity+of+certain+terms+used+in+the+ubiquitous+language%2C+such+as+the+%26%2339%3Btransaction%26rsquo%3B+versus+%26lsquo%3Border%26rsquo%3B+instance.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+general%2C+an+effective+API+design+would+be+easy+to+read+and+work+with%2C+hard+to+misuse%2C+and+would+be+complete+and+concise.+As+the+saying+goes%2C+%26ldquo%3BA+user+interface+is+like+a+joke.+If+you+have+to+explain+it%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+that+good.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Application+Programming+Interfaces+%28APIs%29+can+be+among+a+company%27s+greatest+assets+but+can+also+be+among+their+greatest+liabilities.+Poorly+designed+APIs+lead+to+an+endless+queue+of+consequences+followed+by+a+bad+reputation.
    
["Innovation in business"]
  
Best practices fro building developer-friendly API...
    
But+is+it+art+%3F %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FButisitart-41.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Traditionally+one+of+the+most+common+understandings+of+what+the+software+engineers+do+on+a+development+team+is+that+they+are+individuals+that+turn+caffeine+and+pizza+into+code.+While+this+usually+gets+a+giggle+or+two%2C+it+is+obviously+not+the+whole+picture.+The+fact+of+the+matter+is+that+when+it+comes+to+understanding+what+developers+do%2C+very+few+people+can+empathise+with+the+%26ldquo%3Bcoders%26rdquo%3B+on+a+team+and+the+role+they+play+in+the+development+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FButisitart-01.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Over+many+years+in+various+parts+of+the+software+industry%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bve+started+seeing+and+appreciating+the+similarities+between+the+creation+of+a+piece+of+software+and+the+creation+of+a+piece+of+art+%26ndash%3B+and+to+that+end%2C+I+would+like+to+propose+an+analogy+between+the+two.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+a+believer+that+everyone+on+a+software+development+team+is+a+developer.+Whether+you+test%2C+design+or+write+code%2C+you+are+part+of+the+development+process%2C+and+therefore+you+are+a+developer.+However%2C+for+the+sake+of+the+analogy%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+referring+to+the+coders+or+software+engineers+on+the+team+as+developers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+software+development+life+cycle+%28SDLC%29+has+many+facets+to+it%2C+but+the+basic+gist+of+it+is+that+software+exists+to+solve+a+need+a+user+may+have.+Most+people+in+the+industry+would+agree+that+there+is+a+basic+flow+across+all+methodologies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+First%2C+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+need+should+be+identified.+Their+need+may+be+based+on+existing+software%2C+it+may+be+a+new+feature%2C+or+it+may+be+a+need+that+they+or+the+world+don%26rsquo%3Bt+even+know+they+have+yet.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Secondly%2C+a+solution+needs+to+be+designed+to+meet+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+need.+At+this+point%2C+there+are+many+people+involved%2C+such+as+the+user%2C+some+sort+of+design+element+and+the+engineering+team.+Whether+they+brainstorm%2C+story+map%2C+use+design+thinking+or+just+chat+around+a+whiteboard%3B+the+point+is+there+is+a+collaborative+effort+to+design+a+solution+to+solve+the+need.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+the+solution+has+been+designed%2C+something+needs+to+be+built.+This+leads+into+some+form+of+engineering+phase.+This+is+where+the+developers+code+the+actual+implementation+of+the+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+the+engineering+is+done%2C+there+is+a+testing+phase+with+a+little+to+and+fro+with+the+engineering+phase+to+ensure+the+solution+is+viable+and+works+as+expected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+everyone+is+happy+with+the+testing+outcomes+the+software+is+handed+over+to+the+user.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+people+will+agree%2C+that+this+process+is+more+or+less+the+same+irrespective+of+the+methodology+you+use+to+support+your+SDLC.+The+actual+methodology+is+irrelevant.+The+intention+of+this+article+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+to+explain+the+SDLC%2C+instead%2C+to+build+an+analogy+between+the+engineering+phase+and+the+creation+of+a+piece+of+art.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+makes+up+art%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+use+a+painting.+Broadly+speaking%2C+there+is+some+sort+of+canvas+for+the+artist+to+work+with.+The+artist+has+access+to+various+types+of+brushes%2C+and+is+skilled+in+making+use+of+different+strokes+and+techniques+to+visualise+their+envisioned+image+onto+the+canvas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+create+the+painting%2C+artists+mix+colours+to+create+new+ones%2C+they+test+different+strokes+and+brushes+create+different+effects+to+put+everything+together+to+create+a+piece+of+art.+They+experiment+and+explore+to+get+to+their+final+work+of+art.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whether+it%26rsquo%3Bs+spray+paint+and+a+wall%2C+watercolours+on+paper%2C+or+oil+paint+on+a+cloth%3B+an+image+is+formed+for+someone+else+to+enjoy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+makes+up+software%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Software+is+very+much+like+an+ogre+%26ndash%3B+and+no+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+ugly+like+an+ogre.+Or+at+least+I+hope+not%21+Everyone+should+be+creating+beautiful+software+for+your+users.+But%2C+by+now%2C+everyone+should+know+that+ogres+are+like+onions.+Onions+have+layers%2C+and+just+as+onions+and+ogres+have+layers%2C+software+has+layers+too.+There+are+many+aspects+to+a+piece+of+software+over+and+above+what+the+user+sees+and+experiences.+The+developers+and+the+architects+reading+this+may+argue+that+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+as+simple%2C+and+they+are+100%25+correct%2C+but+this+is+the+crux+of+what+I+need+for+my+analogy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FButisitart-02.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+top+there+is+a+user+interface+%28UI%29+layer.+This+is+the+layer+where+the+user+can+see+information+or+enter+data%2C+and+where+they+touch%2C+slide%2C+click+and+scroll.+Overall+it+is+what+the+user+experiences.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Below+the+UI+layer%2C+there+is+a+layer+of+logic+and+processing.+This+is+where+the+data+coming+from+the+user+is+processed.+This+layer+does+the+number+crunching+and+deciphers+what+to+feed+back+to+the+user.+The+user+interacts+with+this+layer+through+a+user+interface.+The+last+layer+is+where+data+is+persisted+for+later+use.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+these+layers%2C+there+are+many+tools.+These+tools+range+from+the+languages+we+use+such+as+C%23+or+Java%2C+constructs+in+these+languages%2C+and+the+ifs+and+loops+to+help+with+flow+control+%26ndash%3B+algorithms+we+have+learnt.+There+are+all+sorts+of+frameworks%2C+platforms+and+integrations+at+our+disposal+to+solve+problems+and+meet+the+needs+of+our+users.+These+are+very+much+like+our+colours%2C+brushes%2C+techniques+and+canvases+all+used+to+form+something+useful+for+a+user+to+enjoy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EThe+engineering%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+process+until+now+has+been+focused+on+creating+something+that+meets+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+needs%2C+but+the+engineering+phase+is+where+the+developers+must+solve+the+problems+that+were+created+by+the+solution.+For+most+people%2C+this+part+of+the+lifecycle+is+a+black+hole%2C+and+this+is+where+I+want+to+pause+to+connect+the+analogy+to+a+piece+of+art.+Much+like+the+artists%2C+the+engineers+need+to+sit+down+and+use+their+tools%2C+mix+and+match%2C+experiment+and+explore+to+implement+the+desired+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+no+one+way+to+approach+these+problems+%26ndash%3B+the+possibilities+are+endless.+This+is+where+c+creativity+needs+to+flow.+To+build+on+to+the+analogy%2C+each+developer+%28and+team+for+that+matter%29+will+also+have+a+unique+way+of+using+the+tools+to+come+up+with+a+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+are+a+developer%2C+you+walk+out+of+the+story+mapping%2C+design+thinking+session+or+whichever+collaborative+exercise+your+team+uses%2C+with+a+whole+cacophony+of+ideas.+While+we+are+one+step+closer+to+creating+something+that+meets+the+users%26rsquo%3B+needs%2C+we+have+now+just+created+a+whole+lot+of+problems+for+the+engineers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Our+tools+may+be+technical%2C+and+our+problems+may+be+technical%2C+but+we+need+to+get+creative+when+putting+it+all+together+in+a+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+Vasco+Duarte+said+about+knowledge+work%2C+%26ldquo%3BIt+is+in+doing+the+work+that+we+discover+the+work+that+needs+to+be+done%26rdquo%3B.+Let+that+sink+in+for+a+moment.+Even+though+we+already+have+a+solution%2C+there+is+a+whole+lot+of+discovery+that+needs+to+take+place+to+turn+it+into+a+final+software+product.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+My+intent+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+to+provide+a+checklist+to+solve+this+matter%2C+but+rather+to+create+awareness+for+possible+communication+barriers+within+the+SDLC+that+need+to+be+overcome.+A+great+place+to+start+is+to+visualise.+After+all%2C+a+picture+is+worth+a+thousand+words.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FButisitart-03.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+intention+is%2C+however%2C+to+create+a+bit+of+empathy+for+the+engineers+and+what+they+do+after+a+solution+has+been+designed.+At+the+end+of+the+day%2C+someone+needs+to+solve+the+problems+created+by+the+solution.+Thus%2C+my+question+to+you+is%3A+%26ldquo%3BBut+is+it+art%3F%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Traditionally+one+of+the+most+common+understandings+of+what+the+software+engineers+do+on+a+development+team+is+that+they+are+individuals+that+turn+caffeine+and+pizza+into+code.+While+this+usually+gets+a+giggle+or+two%2C+it+is+obviously+not+the+whole+picture.+The+fact+of+the+matter+is+that+when+it+comes+to+understanding+what+developers+do%2C+very+few+people+can+empathise+with+the+%E2%80%9Ccoders%E2%80%9D+on+a+team+and+the+role+they+play+in+the+development+process.

7+business+and+technology+trends+to+look+out+for+in+2020 %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F7business.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOver+the+past+decade%2C+buzzwords+like+%26ldquo%3Bdisruption%26rdquo%3B+and+%26ldquo%3Bblockchain%26rdquo%3B+were+all+the+hype%2C+along+with+some+curiosity+and+confusion+around+the+rise+of+artificial+intelligence+and+machine+learning.+The+big+question+for+businesses+moving+into+2020+is+how+to+start+leveraging+these+disruptive+technology+and+business+trends.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+clear+indicators+that+trends+like+automation%2C+cloud+strategies+and+leveraging+data+will+continue+to+be+utilised+by+organisations+throughout+the+coming+decade.+These+and+a+few+others+make+up+the+7+business+and+technology+trends+to+look+out+for+in+2020%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Data-driven+decision+making%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Data-driven+decision+making+%28DDDM%29+is+the+process+of+making+organisational+decisions+based+on+actual+data+rather+than+intuition+or+observation+alone.+Organisations+will+better+leverage+historic+data%2C+operational+data%2C+and+usage+data+to+guide+strategic+decisions.+However%2C+having+vast+amounts+of+data+at+your+disposal+is+not+the+advantage%2C+but+rather+how+it%26rsquo%3Bs+being+leveraged.+Data+is+only+as+valuable+as+the+insights+you+can+draw+from+it%2C+and+with+all+the+information+that%26rsquo%3Bs+floating+about%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+find+yourself+being+led+astray.+Businesses+that+will+truly+benefit+from+DDDM+are+the+ones+who+have+effective+data+strategies+in+place%2C+target+data+according+to+business+objectives%2C+and+turn+insights+into+action.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Automation+for+elevated+job+functions%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Automation+has+been+widely+discussed+over+the+last+decade.+Moving+forward%2C+automation+will+be+introduced+into+large+organisations+to+eliminate+menial+work.+This+won%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+lead+to+job+losses%2C+but+the+aim+would+rather+be+to+free+up+employees+to+perform+more+meaningful+tasks%2C+such+as+improving+customer+experience+and+offering+tactical+decision+making+in+operational+work.+Organisations+leveraging+automation+will+significantly+reduce+time+spent+on+manual%2C+repetitive+work+and+cut+down+on+human+error.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+An+increase+in+instant+apps+and+progressive+web+apps+%28PWAs%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+More+people+than+ever+before+are+online+and+the+ways+they%26rsquo%3Bre+accessing+the+web+are+ever-changing.+Mobile+usage+is+surpassing+desktop+and+the+trend+will+only+continue%2C+as+more+people+around+the+globe+primarily+use+mobile+devices+to+access+the+internet+through+mobile+websites+and+apps.+That+being+said%2C+the+need+for+bulky+mobile+applications+will+diminish%2C+and+organisations+will+opt+for+leaner%2C+cheaper+and+more+versatile+instant+applications+and+web+applications+that+look+and+feel+like+native+apps+in+the+coming+years.+In+future%2C+fully+fledged+mobile+app+offerings+will+mainly+be+for+flagship+products+where+there+can+be+no+compromise+on+user+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Cloud+adoption+and+utilisation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+there+has+been+mass+adoption+of+cloud+technologies+over+the+last+few+years%2C+it+has+mainly+been+centred+around+replicating+on-premises+bare+metal+architectures+on+the+cloud.+Organisations+will+now+better+harness+the+services+and+solutions+available+on+cloud+for+improved+delivery%2C+reliability%2C+scale%2C+and+cost.+Altogether%2C+cloud+services+offer+unparalleled+potential+for+improving+business+performance+and+increasing+profits.+Cloud+technologies+alleviate+complex+processes+for+getting+software+in+the+hands+of+customers%2C+allow+for+rapid+development+and+testing+of+hypothesis%2C+and+provide+more+reliability+in+serving+products+and+services.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Digital+twins+and+simulating+the+business%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Organisations+will+realise+the+opportunity+in+modelling+their+business+digitally+and+utilising+data+to+adjust+operations+on+an+almost+real-time+basis.+This+will+allow+businesses+to+improve+ongoing+processes%2C+train+employees%2C+and+test+new+products+or+services+before+launching+them+to+the+real+world%2C+where+it+becomes+more+expensive+and+complicated+to+fix+issues.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E6.+Microservices+and+micro+apps%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Similar+to+microservices%2C+micro+apps+provide+highly+focused%2C+task-based+functionality+that+let+users+get+in%2C+interact%2C+and+get+out+with+maximum+efficiency.+Both+microservices+and+micro+apps+are+meant+to+be+lightweight%2C+and+the+concepts+hold+great+importance+for+enterprise+mobility+strategies.+As+we%26rsquo%3Bre+moving+more+and+more+towards+the+world+of+%26ldquo%3Bmicro%26rdquo%3B%2C+organisations+will+embrace+building+focused%2C+lean%2C+and+well-defined+applications+over+large+scale+applications+that+do+too+much.+This+allows+for+validating+assumptions+and+business+models+with+quicker+feedback+loops.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E7.+Growing+stronger+teams+through+collaboration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+final+business+trend+worth+addressing+is+that+of+breaking+down+silos+through+collaboration.+Organisations+will+begin+to+place+more+emphasis+on+growing+stronger+teams+versus+stronger+individuals.+Instead+of+business+units+working+independently%2C+teams+with+different+goals+but+the+same+vision+will+start+working+more+tightly+together.+These+stronger%2C+more+agile+teams+will+break+out+of+the+traditional+ways+of+work+to+a+more+collaborative%2C+lean+and+aligned+way+of+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2020+is+filled+with+great+business+opportunity+and+challenges+for+organisations+to+become+more+efficient%2C+elevate+their+customer+experience%2C+and+offer+effective+products+and+services.+This+will+be+accomplished+by+leveraging+technology%2C+critical+evaluation+of+strategic+goals%2C+and+evolving+working+culture+for+a+new+age.+These+seven+trends+are+guiding+principles+that+can+help+make+this+a+reality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Over+the+past+decade%2C+buzzwords+like+%E2%80%9Cdisruption%E2%80%9D+and+%E2%80%9Cblockchain%E2%80%9D+were+all+the+hype%2C+along+with+some+curiosity+and+confusion+around+the+rise+of+artificial+intelligence+and+machine+learning.+The+big+question+for+businesses+moving+into+2020+is+how+to+start+leveraging+these+disruptive+technology+and+business+trends.
    
["Innovation in business"]
   7 business.png    
When+a+stranger+calls+-+The+hidden+generation+of+digital+customers %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhenastrangercallsv1.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere%26rsquo%3Bs+a+new+generation+of+customers.+Customers+who+are+more+informed%2C+more+experienced+and+more+digital.+And+they%26rsquo%3Bre+not+answering+your+calls+anymore.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+your+organisation+is+still+one+of+the+few+who+only+communicate+with+customers+via+a+call+centre%2C+you+are+alienating+a+large+portion+of+potential+clients.+The+State+of+Global+Customer+Service+Report+by+Microsoft+showcased+the+rising+expectations+of+digitally+empowered+customers.+According+to+the+report%2C+74%25+of+customers+aged+between+18-34+have+a+more+favourable+view+of+brands+that+respond+to+customer+service+questions+or+complaints+on+social+media%2C+and+79%25+of+customers+in+that+age+group+prefer+brands+that+offer+a+mobile-responsive+customer+service+support+portal.+A+surprising+and+sobering+statistic+for+many+large%2C+traditional+businesses.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+only+technologically+savvy+Millennials+who+prefer+engaging+over+digital+mediums.+66%25+of+global+respondents+of+all+ages+stated+that+they+prefer+omni-channel+services+and+actively+use+at+least+3+channels+to+engage+with+businesses+%26ndash%3B+a+blind+spot+that+is+often+overlooked+by+brands.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDespite+these+statistics%2C+organisations+have+always+been+led+to+believe+that+customers+prefer+a+more+personal+approach+%26ndash%3B+hence+the+investment+in+call+centres+and+phone+calls.+But+not+all+transactions+need+to+be+personal.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+take+the+customer+journey+of+buying+a+car+as+an+example.+Digital+customers+do+all+their+research+online+and+are+often+more+informed+than+the+sales+representatives+or+call+centre+agents+who+contact+them.+When+buying+a+car%2C+they+have+done+all+the+research+and+have+essentially+already+made+up+their+minds+by+the+time+they+send+through+an+enquiry.+The+only+thing+that+the+agent+can+really+do+at+that+point+is+talk+the+potential+customer+out+of+a+sale.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EChances+are%2C+when+a+customer+sends+through+a+product+enquiry%2C+they+have+sent+that+same+request+to+your+competitors%2C+and+receiving+call-backs+on+every+enquiry+instead+of+an+online+response+on+the+digital+medium+they+used+is+disruptive.+Then+there%26rsquo%3Bs+also+the+added+frustrations+of+trying+to+spell+out+their+name+and+address+to+the+agent+over+the+phone%2C+dealing+with+agents+who+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+informed+enough+to+deal+with+their+questions%2C+and+having+to+repeat+information+over+and+over+again+while+being+transferred+from+agent+to+agent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhycustomersavoidcalls-in-lineimage.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhere+to+from+here%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+that+customers+are+becoming+more+digital+by+the+year+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+often+difficult+to+keep+up+with+constantly-evolving+trends.+The+world%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+messenger+apps+%26ndash%3B+WhatsApp%2C+WeChat+and+Facebook+Messenger+%26ndash%3B+had+a+combined+user+base+of+over+4+billion+at+the+end+of+2019.+The+value+in+engaging%2C+serving+and+selling+to+customers+on+these+platforms+is+monumental.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisations+who+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+effective+omni-channel+strategies+in+place%3B+inclusive+of+email+comms%2C+live+chat+functionality%2C+instant+messaging+and+call+centres%2C+are+the+ones+stuck+with+a+blind+spot+of+customers+they%26rsquo%3Bll+never+reach.+These+customers+won%26rsquo%3Bt+complain+about+the+lack+of+communication+channels%2C+but+would+rather+move+on+to+the+next+best+service+provider.+Avoid+these+blind+spots+by+asking+your+customers+how+they+prefer+to+be+contacted+and+taking+active+steps+to+offer+more+digital+ways+to+engage+with+your+products.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+truth+is%2C+a+big+portion+of+customers+do+still+prefer+the+personal+connection+that+phone+calls+offer+and+they+should+not+be+ignored.+But+in+a+digital+world%2C+alienating+an+entire+generation+of+digital-only+customers+is+dangerous+when+your+competitors+are+always+at+their+fingertips.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
There%E2%80%99s+a+new+generation+of+customers.+Customers+who+are+more+informed%2C+more+experienced+and+more+digital.+And+they%E2%80%99re+not+answering+your+calls+anymore.
    
["Innovation in business"]

Overcoming+human+irrationality+with+UX %3Cmeta+charset%3D%22utf-8%22%3E+%3Ctitle%3E%3C%2Ftitle%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOvercoming+human+irrationality+with+UX%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BForget+about+your+competitors%2C+just+focus+on+your+customers.%26rdquo%3B+This+seems+like+a+simple-yet-bold+statement+by+Alibaba+co-founder%2C+Jack+Ma.+But+do+we+as+organisations+really+know+our+customers%3F+Or+do+we+just+think+that+we+do%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+often+believe+that+our+customers+are+rational+thinkers+that+make+decisions+based+on+what+is+best+for+them.+However%2C+it+has+often+been+proven+that+humans+are+irrational+beings%2C+often+making+decisions+that+are+not+based+on+facts+or+data%2C+but+rather+on+what+makes+them+feel+good.+This+is+because+humans+are+inherently+emotional+beings.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3E%26ldquo%3BOur+thinking+is+riddled+with+systematic+mistakes+known+to+psychologists+as+cognitive+biases.+And+they+affect+everything+we+do.+They+make+us+spend+impulsively%2C+be+overly+influenced+by+what+other+people+think.+They+affect+our+beliefs%2C+our+opinions+and+our+decisions%2C+and+we+have+no+idea+it+is+happening.%26rdquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+Toby+Macdonald%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETaking+users%26rsquo%3B+emotions+and+attitudes+into+account%2C+user+experience+%28UX%29+engineering+is+the+process+used+to+create+products+that+provide+meaningful+and+relevant+experiences+to+users.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+we+look+at+this+from+a+psychological+aspect%2C+it+means+addressing+the+clear+drivers+and+blockers+that+contribute+to+why+a+user+behaves+towards+a+particular+stimulus.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBelow+are+2+short+case+studies+on+how+companies+relied+on+UX+principles+to+understand+human+irrationality%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+The+optimal+level+of+challenge+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+During+the+1950s%2C+General+Mills+food+company+released+a+branded%2C+do-it-yourself+cake+mix.+Each+box+contained+all+the+ingredients+required+to+bake+the+cake%3B+packaged+as+a+packet+of+dry+ingredients%2C+which+included+milk+and+eggs.+All+that+was+needed+to+bake+the+cake+was+to+line+a+cake+tin%2C+add+water+to+the+mix+and+place+the+batter+into+the+oven.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUX-graph.png%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+12px%3B+margin-right%3A+12px%3B+float%3A+left%3B+width%3A+250px%3B%22+%2F%3EWhen+the+product+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+sell+General+Mills+decided+to+bring+in+a+team+of+psychologists+to+determine+why+this+was+the+case.+They+discovered+that+the+targeted+users+believed+that+it+was+just+%3Cem%3Etoo+easy%3C%2Fem%3E.+They+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+impress+anyone+with+their+cooking+skills%2C+as+it+felt+like+they+were+cheating.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+company+then+decided+to+complicate+the+product+slightly+by+adding+in+a+single+step+to+the+process%3B+to+%26ldquo%3Badd+an+egg%26%2339%3B%26rdquo%3B.+They+relaunched+the+product+and+sales+went+through+the+roof%2C+turning+the+negative+user+emotion+of+%26rsquo%3Bcheating%26rsquo%3B+into+the+positive+emotion+of+%26rsquo%3Bparticipation%26rsquo%3B+in+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPart+of+this+can+be+attributed+to+the+optimal+level+of+challenge.+The+framework+states+that+if+something+is+too+easy%2C+it+causes+negative+emotions+due+to+boredom.+It+also+states+that+if+something+is+too+challenging%2C+it+also+causes+negative+emotions+due+to+stress.+At+both+ends%2C+the+user+often+chooses+to+abandon+the+task.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+The+paradox+of+choice%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+theory+that+believes+when+providing+more+options+to+people%2C+there+will+be+something+for+everyone%2C+resulting+in+more+conversions.+However%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffaculty.washington.edu%2Fjdb%2F345%2F345%2520Articles%2FIyengar%2520%2526%2520Lepper%2520%282000%29.pdf%22%3Ea+study+about+jams%3C%2Fa%3E+conducted+in+2000+by+psychologists+Sheena+Iyengar+and+Mark+Lepper+proved+that+more+choice+equals+less+conversions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+study+took+place+at+a+local+food+market+shopping+centre+with+a+table+display+with+24+different+types+jams+on+it.+On+a+different+day%2C+the+same+table+only+had+6+different+jams+on+it.+While+the+table+with+the+24+jams+was+visited+more+often%2C+the+table+with+6+variations+saw+a+conversion+rate+that+was+10+times+higher.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+leading+theory+is+that+the+more+data+we%26rsquo%3Bre+required+to+process+before+making+a+decision%2C+the+more+strained+the+brain+becomes.+Less+was+more+in+this+instance%2C+but+it+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+the+case%2C+and+a+balance+needs+to+be+found+with+your+consumers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+order+for+organisations+to+focus+on+their+customers+effectively%2C+they+need+to+know+their+customers%26rsquo%3B+mindsets+and+cognitive+biases+%26ndash%3B+something+that+is+often+easier+said+than+done.+Although+each+of+these+case+studies+had+different+problems+that+needed+to+be+solved%2C+the+approach+remained+the+same.+They+went+about+trying+to+truly+understand+their+customers%26rsquo%3B+mindsights+and+behaviours+to+solve+a+business+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnderstanding+user+behaviour+is+key+to+finding+out+how+users+interact+with+your+product+and+brand.+There+are+a+variety+of+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D64885%22%3EUX+techniques+and+strategies%3C%2Fa%3E+that+an+organisation+can+look+at%2C+depending+on+the+problems+that+need+to+be+solved.+An+example+of+this+would+be+user+interviews.+This+is+a+well-established+technique+used+to+get+qualitative+information+from+a+target+audience.+If+we+take+the+case+of+General+Mills%2C+if+they+had+conducted+user+interviews+they+would+have+been+able+to+draw+critical+insights+form+their+target+user+groups.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHumans+are+irrational+beings%2C+but+if+you+invest+the+time+and+effort+into+genuinely+understanding+your+customers%26rsquo%3B+needs%2C+it+can+be+leveraged+to+provide+value+not+just+for+your+customers+but+for+your+organisation+too.+The+fact+is%2C+if+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+meet+those+needs%2C+your+competitors+will%2C+and+your+customers+will+go+elsewhere.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3C%2Fdiv%3E
Forget+about+your+competitors%2C+just+focus+on+your+customers.%E2%80%9D+This+seems+like+a+simple-yet-bold+statement+by+Alibaba+co-founder%2C+Jack+Ma.+But+do+we+as+organisations+really+know+our+customers%3F+Or+do+we+just+think+that+we+do%3F
    
["Innovation in business"]
  
Overcoming human irrationality with UX.png
    
Transforming+your+data+deluge+from+a+liability+into+an+asset %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDatadeluge.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+has+been+a+considerable+focus+on+amassing+and+storing+data+over+the+past+decade%3A+the+more+data+collected%2C+the+better.+But+when+the+volume+of+new+data+being+generated+is+overwhelming+the+capacity+of+institutions+to+manage+it+and+researchers+to+make+use+of+it%2C+it+turns+into+a+data+deluge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F1.Diagram.png%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+12px%3B+margin-right%3A+12px%3B+float%3A+right%3B+width%3A+350px%3B+height%3A+312px%3B%22+%2F%3EThe+world%26rsquo%3Bs+total+digital+data+volume+has+been+doubling+every+two+years.+In+their+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.seagate.com%2Ffiles%2Fwww-content%2Four-story%2Ftrends%2Ffiles%2Fidc-seagate-dataage-whitepaper.pdf%22%3EData+Age+report%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+the+International+Data+Corporation+%28IDC%29+predicts+that+175+zettabytes+of+data+will+be+generated+annually+by+2025.+Yes%2C+%3Cem%3Ezettabytes%3C%2Fem%3E%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EApart+from+traditional+data+sources%2C+there+are+numerous+digital+data+sources+that+have+made+it+difficult+to+aggregate%2C+visualise+and+analyse+information+efficiently.+Having+all+these+various+sources+at+hand+has+caused+many+organisations+to+collect+and+store+as+much+data+as+possible+%26ndash%3B+often+way+more+than+is+actually+needed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EData+is+easily+accessible+and+virtually+inexpensive+to+store%2C+and+thus+masses+of+data+is+kept+with+the+belief+that+it+could+be+useful+%3Cem%3Eone+day%3C%2Fem%3E.+But+floods+of+almost+completely+futile+data+cause+data+scientists+to+focus+less+on+data+analysis+and+more+on+data+scrubbing.+This+means+that+most+of+their+time+is+spent+struggling+with+inefficient+cleaning+processes+to+make+data+usable.+Data+preparation+accounts+for+about+80%25+of+the+work+of+data+scientists+%26ndash%3B+a+tedious+task+that+can+be+reduced+by+focusing+on+quality+over+quantity+when+data+is+collected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F2.Diagram.png%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+12px%3B+margin-right%3A+12px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+height%3A+296px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+contributing+factor+to+the+upsurge+of+data+in+recent+years+is+more+convenient+access+to+the+cloud.+Because+of+the+relatively+low+costs+of+storage%2C+cloud+technologies+are+promoting+carelessness+with+the+volume+of+data+that+is+being+stored.+Instead+of+organisations+sorting+through+it+and+keeping+only+what%26rsquo%3Bs+needed%2C+data+is+piling+up+in+a+bigger+drawer+of+junk+data+%26ndash%3B+a+%3Cem%3Edata+deluge%3C%2Fem%3E.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+there%26rsquo%3Bs+light+the+end+of+the+tunnel.+If+you+suspect+that+you+might+be+guilty+of+data+hoarding%2C+below+are+3+ways+to+turn+your+masses+of+data+from+a+liability+into+an+asset%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Build+a+data+strategy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whether+you%26rsquo%3Bre+a+big+data+giant+or+a+family-run+business%2C+all+successful+businesses+begin+with+a+strategy.+And+these+days%2C+all+companies+of+all+sizes+and+in+all+industries+need+a+data+strategy.+Ask+yourself+what+business+problem+needs+to+be+solved+and+what+data+is+needed.+From+there%2C+start+thinking+about+how+the+data+will+be+collected+and+analysed.+Keep+in+mind+that%2C+like+any+business+improvement+process%2C+things+may+shift+or+evolve+along+the+way.+You+may+find+that+you+need+to+revisit+your+existing+data+strategy+along+the+way+and+make+some+modifications+to+adapt+to+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Identify+the+causes+of+your+data+challenges%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+order+to+truly+master+your+data%2C+you+need+to+identify+some+key+challenges.+Does+your+data+live+in+multiple%2C+siloed%2C+legacy+data+systems%3F+Do+you+have+numerous+sources+of+data%3F+Does+data+cleansing+and+standardisation+only+occur+in+isolated+data+sources%3F+To+reap+the+benefits+of+useful+data%2C+relevant+stakeholders+in+your+organisation+need+to+understand+and+appreciate+the+role+of+data+governance%2C+and+take+time+to+regularly+review+data+rules+and+processes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+%26nbsp%3BSimplify+your+data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Establish+a+process+to+simplify+and+standardise+data+collection%2C+analysis+and+presentation.+This+will+allow+you+to+quickly+sort+through+data+lakes+and+find+exactly+what+you+need%2C+while+discarding+chunks+of+futile+data.+Your+data+strategy+should+include+automated+policies+to+ensure+data+remains+consistent+and+data+quality+is+standardised+across+your+organisation.+As+soon+as+internal+data+management+guidelines+are+in+place%2C+simplifying+data+will+become+easier+and+a+%3Cem%3E%26ldquo%3Bless+is+more%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fem%3E+culture+can+start+developing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+today+has+made+data+collection+more+seamless+than+ever.+This+ability+is+both+a+blessing+and+a+curse.+When+you+%3Cem%3E%3Cu%3Ecan%3C%2Fu%3E%3C%2Fem%3E+collect+anything+you+want%2C+the+challenge+is+deciding+what+you+%3Cem%3E%3Cu%3Eshould%3C%2Fu%3E%3C%2Fem%3E+collect.+The+focus+needs+to+slowly+start+shifting+towards+rich+data+instead+of+big+data%2C+because+bigger+data+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+better+data.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
There+has+been+a+considerable+focus+on+amassing+and+storing+data+over+the+past+decade%3A+the+more+data+collected%2C+the+better.+But+when+the+volume+of+new+data+being+generated+is+overwhelming+the+capacity+of+institutions+to+manage+it+and+researchers+to+make+use+of+it%2C+it+turns+into+a+data+deluge.

Should+you+be+worried+about+serverless+lock-in%3F %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FServerlessImage.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EServerless+architecture+is+the+inevitable+future+for+most+organisations%2C+as+major+players+in+the+technology+sector+are+moving+towards+cloud+platforms.+This+is+due+to+cloud+vendors%26rsquo%3B+abilities+to+provision+and+manage+major+computer+resources%2C+and+drastically+reduce+the+time-to-market.+With+the+growing+interest+in+serverless+architecture%2C+the+market+is+expected+to+reach+%247.7+billion+by+2021.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FGRAPH-Serverless.png%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+12px%3B+margin-right%3A+12px%3B+float%3A+left%3B+width%3A+250px%3B%22+%2F%3ESound+too+good+to+be+true%3F+Well%2C+sort+of.+Most+serverless+architectures+come+with+a+risk+called+%26lsquo%3Bvendor+lock-in%26rsquo%3B.+Vendor+lock-in+is+where+customers+are+dependent+%28i.e.+locked-in%29+on+a+single+cloud+provider%26rsquo%3Bs+technology+implementation%2C+and+cannot+easily+move+to+a+different+vendor+in+future+without+substantial+costs%2C+legal+constraints+or+technical+incompatibilities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+the+real+concern+is+how+much+you+should+allow+these+considerations+to+influence+decisions+about+whether+or+not+to+commit+to+a+particular+serverless+platform+vendor.+The+reality+is+that+there+is+always+a+degree+of+lock-in+with+any+technology+choice%2C+and+serverless+is+no+different.+Vendor+lock-in+is+a+reality%2C+whether+you+are+choosing+a+database%2C+a+programming+language%2C+or+an+operating+system%2C+and+serverless+is+no+different.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EVendor+lock-in+is+just+another+risk+that+comes+with+technology+choices.+But%2C+like+other+risks%2C+being+tightly+coupled+to+one+cloud+provider%26rsquo%3Bs+services+has+its+rewards.+You+get+scalability%2C+resilience+and+security+in+return%2C+and+can+launch+products+to+market+earlier+and+iterate+on+them+quicker.+Because+going+serverless+minimises+the+amount+of+undifferentiated+heavy+lifting+that+has+to+be+done%2C+you+can+better+focus+on+creating+business+value.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+with+any+technology+move%2C+however%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+a+good+idea+to+assess+the+potential+risk+and+impact+when+choosing+a+vendor.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+first+step+is+to+check+which+programming+languages+and+software+development+kits+%28SDKs%29+are+supported+by+the+vendors+you%26rsquo%3Bre+considering.+This+will+save+you+from+incurring+massive+costs+if+and+when+you+do+decide+to+migrate+to+a+different+platform+that+shares+the+same+language.+If+you+realise+during+a+migration+that+your+new+vendor+does+not+support+your+chosen+language%2C+it+will+open+a+whole+new+set+of+problems+to+address+before+the+migration+can+begin.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+next+big+challenge+after+committing+to+the+chosen+language+is+to+consider+transferrable+solution+architectures.+A+good+architectural+pattern+will+make+any+future+migrations+of+serverless+functions+much+easier.+If+the+base+code+remains+the+same+during+migration%2C+the+costs+come+down+automatically.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+choosing+a+cloud+provider%2C+the+question+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+whether+you+should+be+worried+about+being+locked+in%2C+but+rather+what+considerations+need+to+be+in+place+before+committing+to+a+single+vendor.+Migrating+from+one+vendor+to+another+is+not+impossible%2C+but+costly+and+risky+when+done+impulsively.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EServerless+platforms+and+services+should+be+exploited+for+the+right+use+cases.+It+can+be+cost-effective+for+burst+and+batch+type+workload+scenarios%2C+proof+of+concepts+and+low+consistent-load+systems.+But+for+more+traditional+websites+with+predictable+loads%2C+there+are+more+economical+solutions+to+utilise.+Being+%26ldquo%3Bcloud-ready%26rdquo%3B+is+the+right+proactive+move%2C+but+be+sure+that+going+serverless+is+the+best+solution+for+your+organisation+when+considering+costs%2C+integrations+and+scalability.%3C%2Fp%3E
Serverless+architecture+is+the+inevitable+future+for+most+organisations%2C+as+major+players+in+the+technology+sector+are+moving+towards+cloud+platforms.+This+is+due+to+cloud+vendors%E2%80%99+abilities+to+provision+and+manage+major+computer+resources%2C+and+drastically+reduce+the+time-to-market.+With+the+growing+interest+in+serverless+architecture%2C+the+market+is+expected+to+reach+%247.7+billion+by+2021.

Optimise-and-shift%3A+Finding+value+in+pragmatic+cloud+migration +however%2C+replatforming+involves+a+bit+of+modification+for+the+purpose+of+taking+advantage+of+the+new+cloud+infrastructure.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRefactor%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+more+advanced+process+of+rearchitecting+and+often+recoding+some+portion+of+an+existing+application+to+take+advantage+of+cloud-native+frameworks+and+functionality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EMost+existing+workloads+are+overprovisioned%2C+meaning+that+organisations+are+allocating+more+computer+data+storage+space+than+is+strictly+necessary.+Although+choosing+an+approach+is+unavoidable%2C+none+of+them+would+be+effective+when+inundated+with+inessential+data.+Instead+of+leveraging+cloud+technologies+and+services+to+become+more+efficient%2C+without+optimisation+and+a+proper+cloud+strategy%2C+organisations+will+just+migrate+existing+inefficiencies+to+a+new+location.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EIn+cloud+computing%2C+you+pay+Infrastructure-as-a-Service+providers+on+a+monthly+basis.+But+depending+on+how+much+computing+power+you+use%2C+your+costs+can+vary+wildly%2C+which+is+often+why+organisations+feel+that+remaining+on-premise+is+the+more+cost-effective+option.+This+can+be+avoided+by+establishing+a+baseline+of+resources+needed+in+the+cloud%2C+turning+off+idle+instances%2C+and+ensuring+that+servers+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+running+any+unnecessary+or+bloated+services.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EThere%26rsquo%3Bs+no+one-size-fits-all+transition+for+moving+an+application+from+your+on-premises+data+centre+to+the+cloud.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+recognise+which+components+are+worth+migrating+and+which+would+be+better+left+unchanged.+In+order+to+ensure+a+pragmatic+cloud+migration%2C+organisations+ideally+need+to+identify+which+components+are+low-effort%2C+high-value+optimisations.+Every+business%26rsquo%3B+process+and+cloud+strategy+is+different%2C+and+the+below+diagram+should+only+be+used+as+an+indication+on+how+to+categorise+and+prioritise+these+components.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FScreenshot2020.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EThere+are+often+components+or+modules+that+are+relatively+easily+adapted+to+a+cloud+hosting+configuration+and+will+yield+most+benefits+from+a+cloud+migration.+These+should+be+a+first+priority+during+optimisation.+At+the+other+end%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+recognise+the+high-effort%2C+low-value+components.+Focusing+on+migrating+these+components+will+result+in+a+waste+of+time%2C+effort+and+money%2C+without+yielding+any+benefits+the+cloud+provides.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EOptimisation+should+be+seen+as+an+ongoing+exercise%2C+as+organisations+continuously+migrate+applications+and+systems.+Costs+can+be+easily+be+hidden+and+become+lost+as+lists+of+components+grow+over+time.+Continued+rightsizing%2C+and+a+clear+picture+of+where+and+why+every+service+is+being+used+is+the+only+way+to+avoid+overprovisioning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EOrganisations+are+much+more+likely+to+see+real+value+when+they+view+migration+as+an+opportunity+to+rationalise+their+computing+and+storage+practices.+A+cloud+migration+presents+an+opportunity+for+spring+cleaning%2C+and+taking+the+time+to+put+together+a+migration+strategy+will+be+valuable+in+terms+of+cost%2C+time+and+effort+in+the+long+run.+When+companies+optimise+their+workloads%2C+they+can+reap+all+these+benefits+of+the+public+cloud+and+actually+save+time+and+money+in+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
The+%28r%29evolution+of+cloud+computing+has+been+a+significant+focus+in+industry+for+the+past+decade%2C+where+organisations+are+often+attracted+to+the+possibility+that+cloud+migration+can+lead+to+the+benefits+of+cost+savings+and+flexibility.+While+cloud+benefits+are+clear%2C+the+best+model+and+approach+for+migration+can+be+less+obvious%2C+and+organisations+frequently+waste+time+on+debating+this.+While+the+chosen+model+and+approach+for+a+cloud+migration+is+significant%2C+the+focus+should+rather+be+on+optimisation.
