3+reasons+why+UX+is+important+for+your+internal+systems %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUXforinternalsystems.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHistorically+%26ndash%3B+and+understandably+%26ndash%3B+the+focus+for+user+interface+and+user+experience+%28UI%2FUX%29+has+been+prioritised+for+customer-facing+software.+Naturally%2C+you+want+your+customers+to+have+the+best+experience+possible+to+drive+product+differentiation%2C+uptake+and+retention.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+technology+for+employees+is+seen+as+a+means+to+an+end%2C+rather+than+an+integral+part+of+business+strategy.+New+platforms+and+tools+are+introduced+internally+without+considering+how+they+fit+into+the+digital+workplace%2C+how+employees+will+respond+to+them%2C+how+they+can+be+optimised%2C+or+how+they+can+work+together.+The+result+is+often+a+fragmented+digital+experience+for+employees%2C+impacting+on+how+well+they+can+perform+their+roles.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBelow+are+three+reasons+why+investing+in+UX+for+internal+systems+is+critical%2C+and+growing%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+People%26rsquo%3Bs+roles+are+more+complex+than+ever%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Thanks+to+technological+advancements+in+areas+such+as+robotic+process+automation+%28RPA%29+and+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29%2C+menial+tasks+are+easy+to+automate+and+internal+admin-heavy+roles+diminishing.+This+has+resulted+in+the+creation+of+more+complex+roles+where+employees+need+to+use+more+judgement%2C+make+more+decisions%2C+and+understand+products+and+customers+to+solve+complex+problems+%26ndash%3B+the+type+of+problems+that+RPA+and+AI+can%26%2339%3Bt+address.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+consider+an+employee+who+works+in+a+call+centre%2C+they+would+need+access+to+multiple+systems+when+receiving+a+call+from+a+customer.+Customers+expect+your+employees+to+have+an+oversight+on+their+profile%2C+products+they%26rsquo%3Bre+linked+to%2C+transaction+or+product+history%2C+and+many+other+factors+core+to+your+business.+It+is+unrealistic+to+integrate+all+these+systems+seamlessly%2C+and+there+should+be+an+effort+made+to+aid+these+complex+roles+as+much+as+possible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUXgraphic.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+We+need+to+stop+serving+ourselves+last%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+all+recognise+the+importance+of+UX+for+customers+%26ndash%3B+and+that+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+change.+But+completely+neglecting+the+internal+systems+your+employees+need+to+work+on+daily+will+have+a+negative+impact+on+the+business+and+will+actually+not+be+cheaper+in+the+long+run.+Employees+become+less+productive+when+systems+are+not+intuitive%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+more+difficult+to+recruit+and+train+new+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESystems+should+be+inviting+and+clear+for+employees+to+get+their+jobs+done%2C+instead+of+just+assuming+that+they+will+figure+it+out+even+if+the+UX+is+bad.+Internal+systems+should+present+an+obvious+interface+that+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+a+manual.+Streamlined+UX+for+employee+software+is+directly+translated+into+a+streamlined+workflow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Poor+internal+UX+will+eventually+cross+the+boundary+and+affect+customers%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Businesses+often+overlook+internal+systems+because+customers+won%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+interact+with+it.+However%2C+eventually+the+experience+will+jump+the+gap+from+internal+to+external%2C+and+customers+will+be+affected+by+bad+UX.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+consequences+can+range+from+frustrated+customers+noticing+when+call+centre+employees+are+struggling+to+find+their+information%2C+to+more+serious+cyber+security+or+privacy+issues.+Poor+UX+can+also+lead+to+more+human+errors%2C+which+can+be+very+costly+%28even+as+costly+as+this+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fastcompany.com%2F90157153%2Fdon-norman-what-went-wrong-in-hawaii-human-error-nope-bad-design%22%3Efake+missile+threat+alert%3C%2Fa%3E+in+Hawaii+in+2018%29.+Taking+the+time+to+evaluate+the+internal+user+experience+and+investing+in+the+necessary+changes+will+result+in+better+business+value.+Compare+the+technology+you+use+internally+to+your+consumer+platforms+and+establish+what+can+be+improved.+Seek+feedback+from+employees+on+their+main+frustrations%2C+what+could+work+better+and+how+they+can+be+engaged+more+effectively.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+principles+that+apply+to+how+you+design+systems+around+your+customers+%28their+needs%2C+roles%2C+feedback+and+behaviour%29+are+exactly+the+same+for+your+employees.+Employees+should+be+elevated+to+first+class+users%2C+empowering+them+further+to+drive+productivity+and+sentiment.+The+easier+it+is+for+your+employees+to+fill+their+role%2C+the+better+experience+they+can+craft+for+your+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

3Bs+not+possible+to+short-circuit+product+or+project+ideas.+Technical+insight+allows+us+to+identify+obvious+low-effort+solutions+that+could+avoid+costly+engineering+involvement+altogether+or+upfront.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EExplaining+the+problem+properly+gets+a+better+solution.+If+you+understand+the+technology%2C+you+can+explain+the+problem+and+expectations+better.+This+closes+the+understanding+gap%2C+sets+a+coherent+project+path+and+saves+a+lot+of+time.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+decisions+cannot+come+from+lower-+or+mid-level+management%2C+such+as+technology+or+team+leads%2C+because+they+still+lack+holistic+context+into+business%2C+history%2C+strategy+or+product.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+There+is+a+natural+trust+boundary+between+the+business+and+a+vendor%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+any+project+with+a+technology+partner%2C+there+is+an+implicit+and+unavoidable+trust+boundary+present+due+to+the+existence+of+a+commercial+engagement.+This+boundary+can+create+friction+when+the+business+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+understand+what+the+vendor+is+doing%2C+and+rely+entirely+on+decisions+and+advice+exclusively+from+the+%26ldquo%3Bother+side%26rdquo%3B+of+that+boundary.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+entirely+solved+with+an+inherently-trusted+internal+party+to+sense-check%2C+validate+or+oppose+vendor+views+using+business+context+and+constraints.+Critical+or+impactful+technical+decisions+must+be+made+on+an+informed%2C+collective+basis.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+a+fairly+detailed+level+of+knowledge+and+background+into+technology+teams%26rsquo%3B+work%2C+the+business+can%26rsquo%3Bt+keep+them+honest+or+have+constructive+conversations+if+something+breaks+down.+When+executive+teams+and+vendors+can+interrogate+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+decisions%2C+it+creates+confidence+and+builds+more+robust+trust+in+the+relationship.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Vendors+work+better+with+executive+teams+with+the+relevant+insights%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+any+technological+partnership%2C+vendors+will+need+to+work+alongside+a+tech+representative+at+executive+level.+Someone+who+has+the+relevant+history%2C+context+and+technology+of+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+negligent+to+leave+teams+to+run+projects+on+their+own+without+internal+expertise+and+guidance%2C+and+they+would+never+be+able+to+gain+this+context+on+their+own.+Even+with+the+best+of+intentions%2C+in+the+absence+of+that+context%2C+the+team+cannot+help+but+make+short-sighted+decisions.+In+these+instances%2C+engineering+teams+can+easily+go+off+on+the+wrong+path%2C+building+solutions+that+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+in+line+with+the+business+strategy.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechsavvyDIAGRAMv1.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+executive+teams+need+to+have+widespread+knowledge+that+covers+all+areas+of+the+business%2C+which+now+includes+technology.+To+draw+a+comparison%2C+none+of+us+would+opt+to+outsource+all+finance+and+accounting+responsibilities+to+an+external+service+provider+without+deep+internal+understanding+of+what+they+are+doing.+Specifically%2C+the+ability+to+critique+their+work+at+both+input+and+output+levels.+We+would+absolutely+have+a+finance+executive+with+the+relevant+financial+knowledge+to+oversee+and+interrogate+their+work.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+same+applies+to+technology+and+we+need+to+stop+seeing+this+differently.+Execs+don%26rsquo%3Bt+all+need+to+be+technology+experts%2C+but+every+executive+team+must+have+a+representative+who+holds+enough+experience%2C+skill+and+context+to+steer+engineering+teams+in+the+right+direction.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

The+evolving+role+of+IT+budgets+within+large+organisations %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FITBudget-77R.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+evolving+role+of+IT+budgets+within+large+organisations%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EWhile+technology+has+been+a+focal+point+for+businesses+for+some+time+now%2C+technology+budgeting+and+investment+practices+have+been+lagging.+With+the+growing+need+for+digital+transformation+within+large+organisations%2C+IT+budgets+need+to+shift+from+a+project-to-project+execution+model+to+one+that+is+capacity-based+and+more+flexible.+IT+and+software+are+becoming+the+products+themselves+and+will+be+permanently+evolving.+They+cannot+be+seen+as+start%2Fstop+expenses.+In+many+cases%2C+they+are+the+fuel+for+the+organisations+continued+growth%2C+or+even+relevance%2C+and+so+need+to+be+invested+in+proportionally.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3ETraditionally%2C+budgets+have+been+defined+and+predetermined+according+to+specific+projects+planned+for+the+upcoming+year%2C+and+the+business+sees+IT+as+a+cost+centre+based+on+these+individual+projects.+However%2C+as+projects+and+technology+requirements+evolve+from+year+to+year%2C+organisations+should+focus+on+building+a+capacitated+IT+competency+instead%2C+and+use+them+as+an+engine+room.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3ETechnology+projects+are+never+truly+done%2C+and+there+are+constantly+new+demands+from+customers%2C+3rd+party+partnerships+and+internal+users.+As+the+market+and+business+grow%2C+new+products+and+features+are+required+on+a+constant+basis.+This+happens+weekly+or+even+daily+%26ndash%3B+not+yearly.+Expanding+and+improving+software+is+now+part+and+parcel+of+expanding+and+improving+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EThe+diagram+below+highlights+the+differences+between+agile+and+traditional+budgeting.+In+evolutionary+budgeting+approaches%2C+the+business+and+IT+collectively+decide+on+a+budget+that+is+proportional+to+role+technology+plays+within+the+organisation+%26ndash%3B+currently+and+into+the+future.+A+sensible+IT+budget+should+indicate+the+emphasis+the+organisation+places+on+it+as+an+investment+%28and+sometimes+an+expense%29+relative+to+other+capex+areas.+This+step+is+specifically+distinct+from+the+concept+of+what+that+budget+will+be+spent+on.+This+is+a+%26lsquo%3Bworking+forwards%26rsquo%3B+approach.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EAgile+budgeting+allows+for+flexibility+within+teams+to+prioritise+components+instead+of+projects+in+its+entirety.+Because+there+is+a+readily+available+IT+competency+within+the+business%2C+projects+can+be+broken+down+further+into+a+smaller+granularity.+These+smaller+components+can+then+be+executed+on+a+purely+priority-first+basis%2C+extracting+maximum+value+from+the+budget.+This+also+allows+build+and+run+investments+to+be+mixed%2C+making+much+more+effective+use+of+skills%2C+capacity+and+talent.+When+there+are+budget+or+capacity+cuts%2C+IT+can+simply+cut+certain+lower-priority+components+and+focus+on+the+next+task+at+hand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EWith+traditional+budgeting%2C+IT+estimates+costs+for+a+list+of+predetermined+projects+for+the+year%2C+and+then+asks+the+business+for+budget+to+deliver+these+set+projects.+This+is+a+%26lsquo%3Bworking+backwards%26rsquo%3B+approach%2C+which+might+should+more+diligent+but+also+risks+being+too+brittle.+Should+budgets+be+changed+during+the+year%2C+entire+projects+must+be+cut+because+there+is+little+or+no+granularity+in+each+project.+They+are+each+%26ldquo%3Ball+or+nothing%26rdquo%3B+in+nature.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FITbudgets-DIAGRAMR.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3ETraditional+budgeting+is+still+useful+in+instances+where+there+are+detailed%2C+unchanging+needs+and+a+strict+environment%2C+whereas+evolutionary+budgeting+relies+on+trust+and+talent+from+the+agile+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EModern+and+flexible+delivery+styles+are+not+compatible+with+fixed+budgets.+Technology+is+an+investment+regardless+of+how+it+was+budgeted+for+%26ndash%3B+the+question+is+the+efficiency+and+reach+of+that+investment.+There+are+gaps+in+our+budgets%2C+and+there+is+time+and+money+wasted+on+planning+which+is+doomed+to+become+redundant+long+before+the+cycle+ends.+This+is+important+because+it+means+there+are+opportunities+to+ultimately+fit+more+work+into+the+same+total+budget+by+working+smartly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3EThere+is+real+value+in+the+ability+of+the+organisation+to+reprioritise%2C+in+this+year+and+this+budget.+Better+practical+outcomes%2C+less+time+spent%26nbsp%3Bre-planning+and+more+time+doing+what+matters+on+a+shorter+cycle.+This+can+happen+when+IT+and+Business+jointly+determine+a+sensible+budget+which+speaks+directly+to+strategy%2C+and+then+establish+how+to+go+about+maximising+that+investment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3A+justify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
While+technology+has+been+a+focal+point+for+businesses+for+some+time+now%2C+technology+budgeting+and+investment+practices+have+been+lagging.+With+the+growing+need+for+digital+transformation+within+large+organisations%2C+IT+budgets+need+to+shift+from+a+project-to-project+execution+model+to+one+that+is+capacity-based+and+more+flexible.+IT+and+software+are+becoming+the+products+themselves+and+will+be+permanently+evolving.+They+cannot+be+seen+as+start%2Fstop+expenses.+In+many+cases%2C+they+are+the+fuel+for+the+organisations+continued+growth%2C+or+even+relevance%2C+and+so+need+to+be+invested+in+proportionally.
    
["Innovation in business"]

Where+to+start%3A+Managing+the+pressure+to+modernise+legacy+systems %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWheretostart-Banner.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+large+enterprise+executives+have+been+feeling+the+pressure+to+upgrade+legacy+systems+due+to+risks%2C+costs%2C+missing+functionality%2C+technical+debt%2C+and+the+growing+necessity+for+digital+offerings+in+every+industry.+In+a+complex+landscape+with+bulky+IT+architectures+that+have+been+assembled+over+decades%2C+how+do+you+know+what+to+modernise+and+which+route+to+take%3F+Legacy+systems+are+often+complex%2C+affect+multiple+business+units%2C+rely+on+niche+skills%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+know+where+to+start.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+previously+asked+the+question%3A+Is+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D61128%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Eupgrading+your+legacy+systems%3C%2Fa%3E+a+digital+advantage+or+a+giant+waste+of+money%3F+To+answer+this%2C+technology+executives+will+need+to+look+at+their+entire+IT+landscape+and+establish+a+holistic+and+coherent+strategy+which+starts+with+a+mapping+out+of+their+as-is+landscape.+This+can+become+the+basis+for+a+forward+plan+to+address+each+platform%2C+system+or+product+on+a+priority+basis+in+the+direction+of+modernisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+practical+modernisation+strategy+should+include+a+wide+range+of+initiatives+tailored+to+each+component+in+your+map.+Looking+across+the+full+picture%2C+certain+systems+may+not+need+to+be+modernised+at+all.+These+are+stable+enough+to+continue+without+any+adjustments%2C+or+are+planned+for+decommissioning.+On+the+other+hand%2C+there+will+be+a+set+of+systems+that+are+clear+candidates+to+be+replaced+entirely%2C+under+the+banner+of+innovation%2C+risk+or+cost.+The+balance+of+platforms+will+then+land+in+the+%26ldquo%3Buncertain%26rdquo%3B+category.+It+may+not+be+immediately+clear+whether+there+is+enough+of+a+risk+%28or+benefit%29+to+modernise+these+systems.+In+these+instances%2C+further+work+is+required+to+assess+the+best+way+forward.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYour+modernisation+strategy+can+then+be+meaningfully+composed+of+a+practical+and+cost-effective+mix+of+5+approaches+applied+to+each+platform+or+system+in+your+map%2C+depending+on+where+each+one+falls.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Assess%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Assessments+are+used+when+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+entirely+sure+whether+to+modernise+that+specific+system.+This+step+is+intended+to+undertake+a+full+review+of+the+purpose%2C+functionality+and+audience+for+this+technology%2C+and+create+a+business+case+for+modernisation+%28or+against+it%21%29+If+there+are+good+reasons+to+proceed%2C+the+case+should+also+recommend+which+strategy+to+deploy%3A+re-host%2C+rewrite%2C+renew%2C+retire%2C+replace%2C+or+convert+these+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Analyse%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+During+the+analysis+approach%2C+business+requirements+are+extracted+from+packaged+or+legacy+software+applications+to+gain+a+deeper+understanding+of+underlying+business+methods.+Systems+are+reverse+engineered+in+readiness+to+make+it+redundant%2C+either+with+a+new+system%2C+or+by+dissolving+its+responsibility+across+many+other+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Enhance%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Legacy+systems+are+often+complex+and+interconnected%2C+with+lots+of+built+up+technical+debt.+Application+remediation+allows+you+to+enhance+and+improve+current+systems%26rsquo%3B+functionality+without+having+to+replace+them+entirely.+This+avoids+wasting+money+and+time+on+replacing+the+whole+system%2C+by+rather+just+removing+a+bottleneck+and+promoting+simpler+integration.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Re-platform%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+certain+instances%2C+a+legacy+application+component+will+only+need+to+be+migrated+to+a+newer%2C+more+efficient+technology+platform+that+has+been+nominated+by+the+organisation.+This+is+an+administrative+step+that+can+reduce+operational+costs+or+licensing+exposure%2C+but+also+ensures+consistency+in+the+landscape+by+keeping+things+together%2C+organised+and+secure.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Replace%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+During+this+approach%2C+an+application+component+is+decommissioned+entirely+and+replaced+with+a+new+system+that+takes+current+business+needs+into+account.+Usually+this+is+necessary+for+critical+line-of-business+systems%2C+competitive+differentiators%2C+or+to+enable+new+product+lines+which+are+dependent+on+these+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWheretostartDIAGRAM-13.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+need+for+technology-based+or+supported+services+in+every+organisation+means+that+the+pressure+to+modernise+our+ecosystems+will+not+relent.+It%26%2339%3Bs+not+only+about+competitive+ability+though.+There+are+cost-saving+opportunities+where+newer+platforms+can+displace+older+license-intensive+tools%2C+and+many+modern+technologies+that+drive+the+customer+experience+or+scalability+we+need+to+differentiate.+These+newer+technologies+rely+on+platforms%2C+data+and+functionality+that+a+legacy+technology+layer+can%26rsquo%3Bt+accommodate.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+where+do+you+start%3F+Start+with+a+balanced+strategy.+A+strategy+that+maps+out+the+differing+modernisation+needs+for+each+system+in+your+landscape.+This+becomes+a+list+of+modernisation+projects+which+can+be+prioritised+in+a+tactical+and+strategic+way.+Usually+this+list+looks+at+critical+risk%2C+customer+needs%2C+business+outcome+and+profit+and+outlines+a+holistic+strategy+of+technology-enablement+for+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUntanglingambiguity1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+few+things+as+powerful+as+getting+the+right+people+in+the+same+room+to+unpack+a+problem.+A+seemingly+simple+recipe+for+problem-solving+%26ndash%3B+a+design+sprint+%26ndash%3B+does+exactly+that.+This+five-day+problem-solving+technique+is+becoming+a+go-to+for+companies+who+want+to+test+ideas%2C+develop+a+new+product%2C+or+overcome+a+pressing+business+concern.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+sprints+are+mainly+used+in+two+instances%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EInnovation%3A+When+you%26rsquo%3Bre+on+a+mission+to+reinvent+your+business%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EWicked+problems%3A+Concerns+that+are+difficult+to+solve+because+of+incomplete%2C+contradictory+or+changing+requirements%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+magic+of+this+approach+lies+in+getting+different+stakeholders+to+talk+to+each+other.+This+creates+a+problem-solving+forum+where+stakeholders+work+through+complex+topics+as+a+team+%26ndash%3B+through+mapping%2C+sketching+and+prototyping+%26ndash%3B+with+the+help+of+guided+facilitation.+A+facilitator+plays+a+crucial+role%2C+and+should+guide+the+group%2C+spur+questions%2C+extract+thoughts+and+ideas%2C+find+patterns%2C+and+depict+it+on+the+%26ldquo%3Bshared+brain%26rdquo%3B+%28the+map%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+method+is+by+no+means+a+silver+bullet.+There+are+many+instances+where+design+sprints+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D63601%22%3Ewon%26rsquo%3Bt+give+you+the+result+%3C%2Fa%3Eyou%26rsquo%3Bre+searching+for.+But%2C+used+correctly%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+dynamic+approach+that+can+be+used+to+diagnose+and+solve+critical+business+problems%2C+such+as+unsatisfactory+customer+experience+or+tedious+manual+processes%2C+in+a+short+period+of+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+surveyed+four+Entelect+teams+who+have+successfully+facilitated+design+sprints+at+various+blue-chip+enterprises+in+the+banking%2C+insurance%2C+car+rental+and+mining+industries%2C+to+understand+what+kind+of+problems+this+method+can+solve+and+how+they+went+about+solving+it.+The+below+canvas+highlights+the+range+of+business+problems+being+tackled%2C+where+the+value+of+the+sprint+ultimately+lays%2C+what+the+teams+required+for+the+approach+to+work+well%2C+and+what+tools+were+utilised.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDesignSprint.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+any+problem+that+your+organisation+or+team+is+currently+experiencing.+By+including+representatives+from+functions+right+across+the+organisation%2C+we+gain+perspectives+that+are+otherwise+hidden+or+overlooked.+These+people+genuinely+have+experiences+and+ideas+of+their+own%2C+that+cannot+be+guessed+or+assumed.+The+function+of+design+sprints+is+to+create+a+mechanism+through+which+you+can+bring+diverse+people+together+for+combined+problem-solving%2C+by+guiding+and+facilitating+conversations+that+would+usually+not+take+place.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesign+sprints+help+untangle+the+messiness+of+ambiguity%2C+and+give+some+structure+to+solving+any+problem+and+discovering+quick+wins.+This+learn-fast-fail-fast+approach+not+only+leverages+a+diversity+of+ideas+and+perspectives+in+just+one+week%2C+but+also+forms+stronger+relationships+and+builds+trust+during+the+process%2C+ultimately+enabling+participants+to+collaborate+and+solve+future+problems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
There+are+few+things+as+powerful+as+getting+the+right+people+in+the+same+room+to+unpack+a+problem.+A+seemingly+simple+recipe+for+problem-solving+%E2%80%93+a+design+sprint+%E2%80%93+does+exactly+that.+This+five-day+problem-solving+technique+is+becoming+a+go-to+for+companies+who+want+to+test+ideas%2C+develop+a+new+product%2C+or+overcome+a+pressing+business+concern.

DevOps%3A+buzzword+of+the+moment The+overall+impact+was+potentially+less+than+today%26rsquo%3Bs+demand+for+accuracy+and+expediency%2C+however%2C+the+interactions+and+flow+of+people%2C+processes+and+systems+were+just+as+important+as+they+are+today.+The+combination+and+intra-workings+of+the+development+process+and+the+dependency+on+operational+components+form+the+basis+for+the+logical+grouping+of+these+functions+into+one+%26mdash%3B+DevOps.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+basic+principles+of+software+delivery%26ndash%3B+analyse%2C+code%2C+test+and+deploy+%26ndash%3B+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+changed+dramatically+over+the+past+few+years.+However%2C+there+has+been+a+tremendous+maturity+seen+in+the+supporting+process+and+tools.+This+is+most+prevalent+in+the+more+modern+and+controlled+software+development+environments%2C+which+have+shortened+release+cycles+from+weeks+to+hours+without+compromising+on+the+same+quality+delivery+%26ndash%3B+all+as+a+result+of+a+high+level+of+DevOps+automation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevOps+tools+have+also+subsequently+gained+focus+by+being+further+developed+to+accompany+and+enhance+the+preferred+development+methodologies.+Including+tasks+such+as+automated+quality+assurance+%28QA%29+processes%2C+measuring+code+coverage+and+also+performing+code-compilation+tasks%2C+issue+tracking+and+the+final+deployment+and+configuration+of+compiled+systems+are+now+the+norm.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Efficiently+grouping+all+these+requirements+together%2C+while+also+coordinating+the+project%26rsquo%3Bs+tasks%2C+was+traditionally+the+responsibility+of+development+managers.+However%2C+we+have+seen+the+empowerment+of+development+teams+to+accomplish+the+same+or+similar+outcomes.+Reporting+metrics+%26ndash%3B+including+backlog%2C+delivery+rate%2C+and+the+related+costs+%26ndash%3B+to+chief+information+officers+has+also+been+made+easier.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+it+is+understood+that+every+software+team+has+some+form+of+DevOps%2C+many+with+varying+levels+of+maturity+or+slants+in+implementation%2C+the+next+step+is+to+understand+the+overriding+objective%3A+to+make+your+software+delivery+life+cycle+%28or+preferably+an+iterative+cycle%29+and+the+operational+requirements%2C+as+efficient+and+painless+as+possible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+clients+frequently+ask+how+quickly+they+can+get+what+they+want%2C+and+depend+on+your+rapid+response+to+change+while+you%26rsquo%3Bre+balancing+development+scope%2C+time+to+implement+and+the+cost%2C+as+efficiently+as+possible.+The+software+development+industry+has+been+forced+to+embrace+the+creation+of+internal+facilities+to+allow+for+this+change+to+inevitably+deal+with+scope+creep+or+scope+change.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+underpinning+of+your+DevOps%2C+and+the+capabilities+of+your+staff%2C+will+facilitate+change+without+the+need+for+embarking+on+another+complete+analysis+phase.+We+are+finding+that+there+is+a+trend+of+pushing+the+develop-to-specification+%28traditionally+a+binding+contract%2C+accurate+to+the+last+full-stop%29+to+the+sidelines.+Emerging+businesses+need+to+be+in+an+entrepreneurial+position+to+change+according+to+market-related+direction+and+pressures.+As+such%2C+so+do+the+companies+supporting+the+development+of+their+software+projects.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+change-management+complexity+exists+in+every+operations+hub+within+software+companies+worldwide.+The+industry%26%2339%3Bs+reaction+is+to+consider+and+implement+Agile%2C+Scrum+or+Kanban+methodologies+to+structure+the+flow+of+design+principles%2C+manage+issue+%28defect%29+and+change+tracking%2C+and+efficiently+allow+the+flow+into+release+management%2C+which+ultimately+results+in+a+solid+product+or+valuable+service+to+a+client.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Principles+of+continuous+integration+and+continuous+build+have+become+an+integral+part+of+modern+DevOps.+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+currently+doing+these%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+behind+the+curve+of+collaborative+development+and+are+likely+to+be+diminishing+your+production+quality+by+increasing+technical+debt%2C+substituting+automated+operations+for+man-power%2C+and+increasing+costs+unnecessarily.
%3Cstrong%3EMark+Beets+%28GM%3A+Business+Development%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+DevOps+has%2C+in+principle%2C+been+around+for+decades.+In+the+early+1980%E2%80%99s%2C+DevOps+was+a+rudimentary+end-to-end+process.+It+started+with+punching+holes+into+cards+%28representations+of+code+and+data%29%2C+quality+assuring+their+correctness%2C+an+then+physically+transporting+the+cards+to+be+fed+into+an+IBM+mainframe.+All+the+while+ensuring+that+nothing+fell+out+or+was+blown+away%2C+breaking+the+program+and+causing+delays+in+delivery.
    
["New technology"]
   Mark.jpg    
Business+Intelligence%3A+getting+back+to+thinking+inside+the+box The+typical+BI+solution+consolidates+multiple+data+sources%2C+cleans+the+data+to+ensure+accuracy+and+quality+and+then+disseminates+the+information+into+a+time-variant+data+store.+The+%26lsquo%3Btraditional%26rsquo%3B+approach+has+several+pros+and+cons.+When+implemented+correctly+and+time+variance+works+well%2C+it+can+compensate+for+integration+shortfalls+within+source+systems%2C+allowing+an+organisation+to+gather+huge+insights+into+its+customer+base+by+storing+history+and+gathering+trends.+A+good+example+of+this+was+when+the+retail+group+Target+sent+a+teenage+customer+a+pregnancy-coupon+kit%2C+before+she+had+even+let+her+own+father+know+she+was+pregnant.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+converse+side+is+that+all+too+often%2C+BI+solutions+become+a+%26lsquo%3Bwhite+elephant%26rsquo%3B+in+organisations.+This+is+largely+due+to+the+fact+that+there+is+a+longer+time+to+market+and+companies+cannot+keep+up+with+the+ever-changing+businesses.+When+not+implemented+correctly%2C+BI+solutions+can+become+a+hindrance+to+use+and+difficult+to+extract+information+from.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+becoming+more+and+more+challenging+to+keep+track+of+all+the+BI+tools+that+connect+and+report+directly+off+an+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+source+systems.+These+tools+are+attractive+and+usually+quick+to+implement.+Within+a+matter+of+weeks%2C+a+CFO+can+have+a+dashboard+that+tells+him+or+her+everything+there+is+to+know+about+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+finances%2C+an+operations+manager+can+quickly+see+the+performance+of+the+department%2C+a+call-centre+manager+can+understand+which+agents+are+performing+well+and+a+sales+department+will+have+a+good+representation+of+how+good+its+sales+actually+are.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whilst+these+tools+work%2C+and+they+usually+work+well%2C+there+are+several+fundamentals+that+need+to+be+in+place+for+these+tools+to+provide+an+effective+solution%3A+accurate+and+integrated+data+in+the+source+systems+needs+to+be+perfect.+If+this+cannot+be+guaranteed%2C+a+separate+level+of+abstraction+is+required%2C+and+this+is+achieved+through+a+traditional+BI+solution.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+important+to+understand+the+motivation+for+organisations+wanting+to+implement+a+BI+system.+One+of+the+challenges+faced+by+many+organisations+is+calculating+the+true+profitability+of+a+customer%2C+that+is+how+much+money+the+customer+actually+spends+with+the+organisation%2C+and+how+much+does+the+cost+of+sales+actually+cost+the+organisation.+Costs+associated+with+a+customer+include+the+cost+of+the+actual+product+or+service+being+sold%2C+the+commissions+paid+to+the+sales+people%2C+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+fixed+costs+that+need+to+be+distributed+across+all+customers+and+then+there+are+additional+variable+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Only+once+we+have+done+Activity+Based+Costing+and+incorporated+all+fixed+and+variable+costs%2C+can+we+truly+get+an+accurate+reflection+of+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+profitability.+In+addition+to+trying+to+find+out+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+true+profitability%2C+analysing+information+to+understand+inefficiencies+in+a+business+is+a+big+motivator.+Which+of+the+products+are+not+moving+fast+enough+and+therefore+costing+too+much+to+store%3F+When+will+the+company+run+out+of+stock+and+what+are+the+cross-sell+opportunities%3F+Which+debtor%26rsquo%3Bs+agents+are+performing+and+which+aren%26rsquo%3Bt%3F+These+are+all+questions+that+organisations+are+trying+to+answer.+These+are+all+questions+that+good+a+BI+solution+should+be+able+to+provide+answers+to.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+successfully+implement+a+BI+solution%2C+management+needs+to+understand+the+disparate+systems+in+their+organisation.+Instead+of+trying+to+go+for+the+quick+win%2C+they+need+to+keep+their+long-term+strategy+in+mind.+No+one+in+an+organisation+should+have+%26lsquo%3Bconsolidating+data+not+available+in+the+BI+solution%26rsquo%3B+as+part+of+his+or+her+job+description.+Before+teams+try+to+get+dashboards+out%2C+they+need+to+understand+the+underlying+systems+in+the+organisation+and+the+Data+Supply+Chain.+Data+needs+to+be+100+per+cent+accurate+and+integrated%2C+with+sufficient+history+maintained+to+enable+the+discovery+of+important+trends.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+effective+BI+solution+should+be+able+to+drive+innovation+in+your+organisation+and+simplify+people%26rsquo%3Bs+lives.+The+purpose+of+a+BI+solution+is+far+more+than+a+presentation+layer+on+top+of+your+data.+While+your+organisation+is+busy+trying+to+impress+each+other+with+pie+charts%2C+someone+else%2C+a+more+innovative+and+forward-thinking+organisation%2C+is+focusing+on+transforming+data+into+information+and+letting+that+information+drive+innovation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Implementing+an+effective+BI+solution+should+not+be+difficult+if+you+keep+the+fundamentals+in+mind+and+make+sure+it+is+not+an+afterthought.+An+efficient+BI+solution+will+also+enable+you+to+create+additional+service+offerings%2C+find+new+opportunities+in+the+market+and+validate+strategic+business+decisions.
%3Cstrong%3ERyan+Naude+%28Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+The+landscape+of+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29+is+shifting.+More+and+more+companies+are+looking+for+a+rapid+implementation+of+a+BI+solution.+While+the+request+to+see+a+return+on+investment+in+a+solution+as+quickly+as+possible+is+not+unfounded%2C+organisations+are+starting+to+forget+what+goes+into+the+foundation+of+a+robust+BI+solution.
    
["New technology"]

So+you%27re+still+running+SQL+Server+2008%3F Crucially%2C+it+means+no+more+hotfixes%2C+no+more+cumulative+updates+and+no+more+service+packs.+If+a+bug+is+identified%2C+it+will+not+be+fixed%2C+even+if+it+is+a+critical+bug+that+severely+hinders+normal+operation.+For+those+businesses+running+critical+operations%2C+this+may+be+unacceptable%2C+and+so+upgrading+to+a+newer+version+is+clearly+the+answer.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+preferred+version+to+upgrade+to+at+this+point+in+time+would+be+SQL+Server+2014.+There+are+two+main+editions%3A+Standard+and+Enterprise.+Standard+edition+is+intended+for+non-mission+critical+workloads+and+small+organisations.+It+lacks+many+of+the+scalability+and+availability+features+in+Enterprise+edition.+Enterprise+edition+is+aimed+at+the+important+workloads+where+minimising+downtime+and+maximising+performance+is+critical.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Switching+to+SQL+Server+2014+is+not+insanely+bleeding-edge.+With+releases+now+coming+every+two+years+now%2C+there+are+few+good+reasons+to+upgrade+to+an+older+version.+The+habit+of+waiting+for+SP1+is+old+fashioned.+Service+packs+are+released+less+frequently+and+are+replaced+with+more+regular+and+smaller+cumulative+updates.+Of+course%2C+staying+within+support+is+not+the+only+reason+one+would+upgrade%2C+the+features+that+appear+in+newer+versions+are+an+incentive+to+upgrade%2C+too.+There+have+been+some+great+enhancements+made+in+SQL+Server+2014+that+make+it+worth+considering%2C+these+include%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EMemory-optimised+tables%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EColumnstore+indexes%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EBuffer+pool+extension%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEncrypted+backups%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAlwaysOn+for+HA%2FDR%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Memory-optimised+tables+and+Columnstore+indexes+are+two+aspects+of+SQL+Server%26rsquo%3Bs+in-memory+offering+%26ndash%3B+see+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D33889%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D33889.+%3C%2Fa%3EMemory-optimised+tables+enable+transaction+processing+at+the+very+highest+level+and+Columnstore+indexes+allow+for+incredibly+fast+analytics.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Buffer-pool+extension+allows+both+Standard+and+Enterprise+editions+to+use+solid-+state+devices+as+if+they+were+memory%2C+offering+improved+scalability+and+throughput+for+both+OLTP+and+reporting+workloads.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+SQL+Server+has+offered+compressed+backups+for+multiple+versions%2C+encrypted+backups+have+been+a+long-standing+request.+With+increasing+numbers+of+data+thefts+and+breeches%2C+it+is+more+important+than+ever+to+properly+protect+backups%2C+and+that+protection+starts+by+encrypting+the+backup+at+creation+time.+This+can+now+be+done+in+SQL+Server+2014%2C+in+both+Standard+and+Enterprise+editions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+AlwaysOn%2C+available+from+SQL+Server+2012%2C+allows+for+both+high+availability+and+scale-out+of+reporting+workloads+with+its+combination+of+synchronous+and+asynchronous+replicas.+It+also+allows+for+the+offloading+of+a+backup+workload+so+that+the+primary+server+can+continue+serving+the+business+and+customers+without+interruption.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+the+end+of+support+for+SQL+2008+is+drawing+nearer%2C+the+exciting+features+available+in+SQL+Server+2012+and+2014%2C+make+upgrading+a+sound+proposition.
%3Cstrong%3EGail+Shaw+%28Entelect+Technical+Lead%3A+SQL+Server%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Mainstream+support+for+both+SQL+Server+2008+and+SQL+Server+2008+R2+ends+in+July+2014%2C+so+it+is+important+to+understand+exactly+what+this+means.

Internet+of+Things+%E2%80%93+it%E2%80%99s+all+about+the+data %3Ch3%3E+Gathering+the+data%3C%2Fh3%3E+Crowdsourcing%2C+a+term+coined+in+2005%2C+describes+a+process+used+to+obtain+services%2C+ideas+and+content+by+soliciting+contributions+from+a+population+of+people%2C+knowingly+or+unknowingly%2C+on+the+part+of+the+participant.+The+emergence+of+the+Internet+has+made+crowdsourcing+a+common+approach+to+obtain+these+services%2C+ideas+and+content%2C+regardless+what+the+crowdsourcer+may+use+them+for.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+vast+amount+of+information+that+is+gathered+using+crowdsourcing+projects%2C+for+example%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+Wikipedia+is+the+most+popular+referenced+site+on+the+Internet+today%2C+with+close+to+5+million+content+pages+being+maintained+by+users+at+an+average+of+21.78+edits+per+day+and+an+excess+of+732+million+page+edits+since+its+inception.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+TripAdvisor%2C+the+Internet%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+travel+site%2C+allows+potential+travellers+to+plan+their+journeys+by+offering+trusted+advice+from+people+who+have+been+to+the+place+in+question.+TripAdvisor+hosts+more+than+170+million+reviews+and+opinions+on+more+than+4+million+businesses+in+more+than+140%2C000+destinations.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Most+Valuable+Professional+%28MVP%29+programme+enables+MVPs+to+answer+millions+of+questions+each+year.+The+MVPS+provide+vital+feedback+reflecting+the+needs+of+Microsoft+customers.+MVPs+are+not+paid%2C+instead%2C+they+answer+questions+to+share+their+knowledge+with+others+and+for+the+recognition+they+receive.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Waze%2C+which+was+recently+acquired+by+Google%2C+allows+its+50+million+users+to+share+information+about+daily+traffic+incidents+and+situations+on+roads.+This+information+assists+other+users+in+travelling+around+efficiently.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+clear+that+we+are+living+in+an+age+of+Big+Data.+Crowdsourcing+is+a+very+efficient+way+of+gathering+information+that+can+be+utilised+for+economic+benefit+or+to+benefit+communities+as+a+whole+and+to+make+our+lives+easier.+The+original+nature+of+crowdsourcing+is+to+use+willing+participants.+Those+who+are+can+spend+time+and+resources+assisting+in+gathering+and+submitting+information+%26ndash%3B+whatever+the+crowdsourcer+needs.+With+what+some+might+describe+as+a+revolution+of+the+IoT%2C+all+of+this+has+already+changed.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Possibilities%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Imagine+a+world+where+everybody+with+Internet+connectivity+has+the+ability+to%2C+with+a+whole+army+of+their+own+devices%2C+submit+information+with+minimal+effort+as+frequently+as+they+like+or+even+in+real-time+and+on+demand+%26ndash%3B+this+is+crowdsourcing+on+a+whole+new+scale%21+In+other+words%2C+we+could+start+modelling+the+world+and+build+an+online+state+model+of+the+world+in+which+we+live.+This+would+be+possible+by+making+use+of+and+connecting+consumer%26rsquo%3Bs+everyday+devices%2C+leading+to+a+massive+explosion+of+data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+data+can+include+almost+any+type+of+information%2C+such+as+weather+conditions%2C+ocean+currents+and+wildlife+locations.+Health+information+and+the+tracking+of+individuals%26rsquo%3B+medical+history+can+make+medical+practitioners+aware+of+their+patients%26rsquo%3B+condition+and+may+even+assist+in+warning+of+conditions+before+the+patient+becomes+aware+of+his+or+her+symptoms.+The+data+can+also+help+researchers+gain+insight+into+any+population+or+any+items%26rsquo%3B+attributes.+This+could+help+us+make+assumptions+and+draw+correlations+between+patterns+we+never+even+knew+existed.+Imagine+being+able+to+query+a+model+of+the+world+at+your+convenience.+This+means+you+can+access+information+someone+or+someTHING+logged%2C+for+example%2C+on+the+route+you+might+take+on+holiday+or+to+work.+You+could+access+the+data+for+whatever+reason+you+need+the+specific+information%26hellip%3B+if+you+can+measure+it%2C+you+can+include+it.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Remote+controlling+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+based+on+information%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+you+can+request+information+from+devices+in+real-time%2C+you+can+also+send+commands.+This+means+that+we+can+start+controlling+devices+remotely.+We+can+set+up+rules+in+the+cloud+to+perform+specific+tasks+based+on+our+observations+of+our+%26lsquo%3Bworld+model%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+is+representing+the+state+of+the+world.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Speaking+to+everything%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Interaction+between+devices+will+mean+that+they+will+be+able+to+%26lsquo%3Bspeak%26rsquo%3B+to+one+another%2C+and+that+devices+will+have+the+ability+to+act+and+to+be+controlled+based+on+the+state+of+everything+around+them+%26ndash%3B+for+example%2C+this+could+mean%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+control+traffic+lights+based+on+specific+traffic+conditions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+monitor+the+health+of+workers+and+stop+access+to+hazardous+work+environments+should+there+be+any+condition+present+that+endangers+a+workforce.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+monitor+the+environments+for+less-than-ideal+conditions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Autonomous+cars+can+use+information+they+obtain+from+other+cars+and+conditions+around+them+to+drive+safely+without+any+human+intervention+%26ndash%3B+something+major+players+such+as+Google+are+already+developing.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+of+these+things+are+already+happening+but+they+occur+in+isolation+where+integrating+all+of+the+data%2C+or+at+least+a+platform+to+allow+systems+to+do+their+own+integration+and+correlation%2C+can+mean+decision+making+and+automation+processes+are+much+smarter.+A+whole+plethora+of+possibilities+opens+up+%26ndash%3B+for+example%2C+think+about%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+Convenience+%28home+automation%2C+stock-monitoring+systems%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Safety+%28warning+systems+monitoring+various+factors%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Security+%28online+motion+sensors%2C+cameras+and+tracking+of+items%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Controlling+devices+based+on+%26lsquo%3Bawareness%26rsquo%3B+of+present+company%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Energy+and+resource+usage+optimisation+%28energy+monitoring+on+electronics%2C+effective+irrigation+control+based+on+conditions%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Health+monitoring%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Occupational+hygiene+monitoring%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Wildlife+preservation+%28tracking+of+animals+and+their+vital+statistics%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Futuristic+but+already+affordable%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+probably+many+more+%26lsquo%3Bfuturistic%26rsquo%3B+uses+but+the+fact+is%2C+the+technology+is+already+here+and+it+is+becoming+more+and+more+affordable+and+less+power+hungry.+It+is+becoming+cheaper+and+easier+to+implement.+One+way+is+to+use+the+technology+that+already+exists.+Waze+is+already+doing+this+without+most+of+us+even+realising.+Our+smartphones+and+their+sensory+inputs+are+being+used+as+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+on+the+Internet.+When+using+Waze%2C+without+submitting+traffic+information+manually%2C+you+are+doing+so+by+just+using+the+application.+It+will+log+information+with+regards+to+your+travel+using+the+sensory+inputs+on+your+phone.+Smartphones+are%2C+in+many+ways%2C+some+of+the+earliest+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Companies%2C+including+Google%2C+are+spending+money+on+mesh+networks+and+are+acquiring+companies%2C+such+as+Nest+Labs+amongst+others%2C+to+assist+with+their+research+and+development+in+this+area.+Many+ways+are+being+researched+by+big+companies+and+hobbyists+to+make+wireless+communications+cheaper+and+less+power+hungry.+Hobbyists+can+already%2C+with+reasonable+ease+in+their+own+homes%2C+use+Wi-Fi%2C+Bluetooth+LE+and+low+frequency+RF+communications+to+gather+sensory+data.+Using+development+platforms+such+as+Raspberry+Pi%2C+Arduino+and+Beaglebone%2C+these+different+communication+media+are+being+used+by+hobbyists+to+relay+information+and+receive+commands+via+the+Internet.+Fitness-tracking+devices+are+becoming+increasingly+popular+for+active+people.+The+traditional+fitness+computer%2Ffitness+watch+manufactures+have+their+hands+full+keeping+up+with+new+functionality+being+made+available+by+a+range+of+new+entrants+at+affordable+prices+into+their+market.+These+are+all+connected+to+the+Internet+in+some+way%2C+some+real-time%2C+others+delayed%2C+but+they+are+all+examples+of+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+already+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Barriers+to+entry%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+obvious+that+the+obstacles+to+implementing+these+futuristic+ideas+are+not+technological.+Each+hobbyist+can+already+create+a+model+of+his+or+her+world.+There+are+even+products+out+there+that+give+you+access+to+devices+in+your+home+via+the+Internet.+However%2C+this+is+not+where+the+power+of+the+IoT+lies.+Individuals+using+these+products+would+probably+be+able+to+control+everything+in+their+houses+remotely%2C+they+can+probably+sense+conditions+remotely+and+can+as+a+result%2C+with+some+server+side+processing%2C+set+up+some+rules+to+automate+and+manage+their+world.+This+is+very+impressive%2C+but+probably+also+regarded+as+very+%26lsquo%3Bgeeky%26rsquo%3B+by+most.+The+true+power+lies+in+taking+everybody%26rsquo%3Bs+small+worlds+and+integrating+them+into+one+integrated+world+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Protocols%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+integration+medium+is+already+there+in+the+form+of+the+Internet+but+currently%2C+the+problem+lies+in+the+protocols+used+to+get+the+information+onto+the+Internet.+Some+would+argue+to+use+the+same+protocols+as+the+rest+of+the+Internet+but+there+are+difficulties+with+this.+Our+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+need+to+be+low+powered+and+cheap%2C+therefore+we+would+need+lightweight+protocols+to+move+information+efficiently+to+a+single+point+on+our+local+network%2C+before+passing+it+onto+our+traditional+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+At+the+moment%2C+many+protocols+exist+but+we+are+in+the+process+of+seeing+which+one+will+emerge+as+the+most+used.+This+is+important+because+consumers+would+want+to%2C+without+thinking+about+it%2C+have+their+devices+or+things+able+to+use+the+same+point+of+access+to+the+Internet+and+able+to+talk+to+each+other%2C+or+at+the+least+to+use+each+other%2C+as+a+mesh+networking+node.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Socioeconomics%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Other+important+questions+include%3A+are+people+ready+for+this%3F+Will+they+embrace+this+change%3F+The+chances+are+that+many+will+feel+that+this+impacts+their+privacy%2C+and+would+not+want+to+share+information.+They+believe+that+%26lsquo%3Bif+it%26rsquo%3Bs+no+longer+on+my+premises%2C+I+do+not+have+control+over+who+sees+it%26rsquo%3B.+This+notion%2C+however%2C+seems+to+be+taking+a+backseat+with+organisations+moving+to+utilise+the+benefits+of+cloud+computing.+The+difference+here%2C+is+that+the+IoT%2C+does+not+only+involve+organisations+but+it+also+includes+end+consumers.+Therefore+a+similar+mind+shift+%26ndash%3B+cloud-based+computing+required+from+organisations+%26ndash%3B+is+required+from+consumers+of+these+products+and+devices.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Security%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Consumers+are+scared+because+they+do+not+comprehend+the+likelihood%2C+or+the+impact+of+risks+regarding+security.+As+a+result%2C+they+also+do+not+understand+how+to+minimise+the+likelihood+of+these+risks.+With+privacy+being+such+a+major+concern%2C+security+is+important+to+put+device+owners+in+compete+control+of+who+can+see+their+data.+With+no+single+protocol+at+the+moment+being+the+norm%2C+it+is+very+difficult+to+have+a+single+way+to+implement+security+in+such+a+way%2C+at+device+level+%28especially+wireless+devices%29+that+is+trusted+to+the+same+degree+as+the+security+on+the+Internet.+Also%2C+the+impact+of+security+breaches%2C+especially+on+the+remote-control+side+of+devices%2C+may+also+have+a+greater+impact+%26ndash%3B+imagine+cars+and+access+control+being+hacked.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+An+extension+of+our+Internet%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Adoption+of+the+IoT+will+probably+change+our+world+in+such+a+way+that+we+cannot+imagine+right+now.+In+essence%2C+it+is+an+extension+of+our+Internet%2C+as+we+have+always+known+it.+However%2C+the+IoT+can+control+and+read+values+of+real-+life+things+and+it+can+be+used+to+access+more+information+than+just+what+was+posted+by+humans.+Suddenly+a+whole+new+range+of+data+sources+can+be+made+available+on+the+Internet+over+HTTP+and+other+protocols%2C+and+this+data+will+be+accessible+similarly+to+how+we+make+information+in+databases+available.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+same+way+the+software+world+moved+at+an+incredible+pace%2C+the+hardware+and+embedded+world+started+moving+at+the+same+pace+with+open+source+prototyping+platforms%2C+3D+printers+and+laser+cutters.+People+are+making+their+projects+available+open+source.+Everybody+is+collaborating+and+working+on+new+devices%2C+their+communications+and+this+%26lsquo%3Bnew+extension%26rsquo%3B+of+our+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Users+should+be+prepared+for+a+range+of+new+solutions+needed+in+the+cloud+to+support+all+of+the+data+gathered+and+innovations+resulting+from+new+opportunities+made+possible+by+the+IoT.+Exciting+times+are+ahead+and+in+the+same+way+we+converged+on+a+set+of+standards+on+the+Web%2C+we+will+converge+on+a+set+of+standards+for+the+IoT+that+will+integrate+with+our+existing+Web+standards.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Cisco+estimates+that+by+2020+we+will+have+more+than+50+billion+devices+connected+to+the+Internet.+Some+might+argue+that+50+billion+is+optimistic+but+it+does+give+you+an+idea+of+the+level+of+belief+Cisco+has+in+the+IoT+growing.+Cisco+is+not+alone+and+companies+including+Google%2C+IBM%2C+Microsoft%2C+have+all+made+announcements+regarding+some+sort+of+IoT+innovation%2C+and%2For+shown+intention+on+capitalising+on+the+growth+of+the+IoT.+Effectively%2C+the+IoT+will+move+us+from+having+smartphones%2C+smartTVs%2C+connected+cars%2C+and+wearables+to+having+smartcars%2C+smarthomes%2C+smartcities%2C+smartoffices%2C+smartfactories%2C+and+other+smartenvironments.
%3Cstrong%3EHennie+Lessing+%28Entelect+Team+Lead%3A+Software+Development%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Before+we+can+understand+the+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29%2C+we+need+to+know+a+little+more+about+where+the+information+that+is+used+comes+from+%E2%80%93+after+all%2C+the+IoT+is+all+about+the+data%21
    
["New technology"]

Big+Data+and+the+Vs After+having+many+discussions+about+the+topic+of+Big+Data+with+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+CTO%2C+Martin+Naude%2C+I+decided+to+visit+my+go-to+website%2C+Wikipedia%2C+for+a+%26lsquo%3Btidy%26rsquo%3B%2C+encyclopedic+definition.+According+to+Wiki%2C+the+concept+of+Big+Data+has+been+around+since+2001.+Initially%2C+there+were+three+V%26%2339%3Bs+that+defined+Big+Data.+These+were+volume%2C+velocity+and+variety.+However%2C+this+is+where+the+main+dilemma+begins%26hellip%3B+no+one+can+define+any+of+these+V%26%2339%3Bs+for+me.+There+is+no+concise+definition+of+what+each+one+means+or+entails.+So+after+all+the+research+and+more+discussions%2C+I+have+decided+to+throw+the+dictionary+%28and+Wiki%29+out+of+the+window+on+this+one+and+come+up+with+simpler%2C+more+realistic+definitions+of+all+the+V%26%2339%3Bs+and+at+the+same+time%2C+hopefully+make+sense+of+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+researching+the+%26lsquo%3Bvolume%26rsquo%3B+side+of+Big+Data%2C+I+found+quite+a+few+definitions.+Some+say+the+data+must+be+terabytes%2C+petabytes+and+even+larger.+However%2C+%26lsquo%3Bvolume%26rsquo%3B+was+set+as+a+pillar+back+in+2001%2C+and+when+I+look+back+on+my+career%2C+in+the+early+2000s+if+someone+had+100+gigabytes+of+data+in+a+data+store%2C+he+or+she+was+on+the+bleeding+edge+and+would+probably+asked+to+be+a+keynote+speaker+at+a+conference+to+explain+how+he+or+she+actually+got+it+right.+Today%2C+we+are+in+a+more+privileged+environment.+For+just+US%243500+we+can+buy+a+small+footprint+hard+drive+that+can+store+all+the+music+that+the+world+has+ever+produced.+With+the+uptake+of+solid+state+drives%2C+we+are+able+to+equip+a+server+that+has+the+ability+to+store+and+access+tons+of+data+without+breaking+the+bank.+So+my+definition+of+volume+is+more+around+the+%3Cem%3Eability%3C%2Fem%3E+to+store+and+access+large+volumes+of+data%2C+and+not+purely+a+focus+on+the+amount+of+data+that+constitutes+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BVelocity%26rsquo%3B+refers+to+rapidly+changing+data+that+is+processed+at+a+very+quick+rate.+It+won%26rsquo%3Bt+come+as+a+shock+to+find+that+I+have+an+issue+with+this+one%2C+too%21+Where+is+the+line+in+the+sand+to+say+we+are+processing+quickly%3A+is+it+6+gigabytes+a+second+as+in+the+case+of+the+Large+Hadron+Collider%2C+is+it+1%2C000+transactions+a+second+or+is+it+once+a+month%3F+I+believe+that+velocity+is+less+of+an+important+consideration+and+rather+that+it+is+the+ability+to+process%2C+analyse+and+output+the+transactions+at+a+required+rate+over+a+specific+required+timeframe.+For+example%2C+transactional+fraud+detection+is+important+and+we+may+need+near-real-time+algorithms+to+run+against+the+transactions+processing%2C+otherwise%2C+our+risk+exposure+would+increase+dramatically.+For+geofencing+applications+we+need+near-real+time%2C+too.+However%2C+if+we+want+to+analyse+a+debtors%26rsquo%3B+book%2C+an+acceptable+time+of+a+day+or+two+to+run+certain+scenarios+and+put+plans+in+place+for+results+processing+is+fine.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+we+look+at+velocity%2C+we+also+need+to+take+into+account+several+external+factors.+These+include+infrastructure+and+Internet+speeds%2C+storage+ability+and+processing+speeds.+This+is+where+software+meets+hardware+and+fortunately%2C+we+are+in+the+middle+of+a+software+boom%3A+new+data+storage+engines+are+being+released+every+month+and+we+now+have+the+likes+of+Mongo%2C+NewSQL%2C+NoSQL%2C+Hadoop+and+many+more+that+challenge+our+preconceptions+of+storing+data+in+non-traditional+formats.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BVariety%26rsquo%3B+is+the+one+%26lsquo%3BV%26rsquo%3B+that+has+really+matured+over+the+last+ten+years.+We+now+have+the+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29+and+in+sensor-driven+manufacturing%2C+we+have+the+ability+to+pull+in+social+media+information+to+take+our+understanding+of+our+customer+to+the+next+level%2C+and+we+also+have+many+more+lines+of+business+systems+that+we+did+ten+years+ago.+This+is+where+the+real+challenge+starts+from+a+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29%2C+analytics+and+Big+Data+point+of+view.+We+can+no+longer+pick+a+technology+and+run+with+it.+Historically%2C+organisations+were+a+Microsoft+or+an+Oracle+outfit+but+they+are+now+faced+with+the+challenge+of+running+side-by-side+appliances+that+are+appropriate+for+the+relevant+variety+of+data+they+are+attempting+to+consolidate+and+relate.+Today%2C+organisations+need+to+start+diversifying+from+a+single-vendor+solution+%28although+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+think+believe+traditional+relational+database+will+ever+die%29%2C+to+face+a+new+challenge+of+taking+that+traditional+relational+data+and+relating+it+to+unstructured+data+%28for+example%2C+on+a+Hadoop+appliance%29+and+yet+still+provide+the+results+through+a+mechanism+that+business+users+can+understand+while+remaining+intuitive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+am+not+sure+what+happened+in+2012+but+another+V+was+added+to+the+list+%26ndash%3B+%26lsquo%3BVeracity%26rsquo%3B.+This+means+that+the+data+needs+to+conform+to+the+truth+and+the+data+has+to+be+trusted.+This%2C+to+me%2C+brings+everything+back+together+and+forms+the+foundation+for+a+Big+Data+implementation.+In+everything+we+are+doing%2C+we+need+to+ensure+that+what+we+are+providing+to+business+conforms+to+the+truth+and+can+be+trusted.+If+we+look+up+some+successful+Big+Data+applications+and+implementations%2C+we+just+need+to+ask+the+question+%26lsquo%3Bwhat+if+the+data+was+wrong%3F%26rsquo%3B+and+we+will+quickly+understand+the+importance+of+this.+When+President+Obama+ran+his+micro-targeting+campaigns%2C+there+was+very+little+room+for+error+and+the+data+had+to+be+correct.+This+is+also+the+case+with+Amazon.com%2C+which+is+trialling+delivering+goods+before+customers+order+them.+To+do+this+effectively%2C+the+company+has+written+such+great+algorithms+to+predict+what+customers+are+going+to+order+%28and+when+they+will+order%29%2C+that+if+the+data+is+only+90+per+cent+accurate%2C+the+company%2C+stands+to+lose+a+lot+of+money.+Then+we+have+Uber%2C+a+company+that+is+setting+a+benchmark+for+others%2C+innovating+in+several+industries+as+not+just+another+taxi+service.+Uber+published+the+algorithm+for+predicting+a+client%26rsquo%3Bs+destination%2C+and+can+now+begin+to+offer+car-pool+services.+The+value+of+accurate+and+correct+data+is+easily+understood.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+all+these+V%26rsquo%3Bs+in+place%2C+there+seem+to+be+many+more+marketable+V%26%2339%3Bs+that+can+easily+be+strapped+onto+the+existing+foundation.+%26lsquo%3BVisualisation%26rsquo%3B+is+important%3A+can+we+provide+business+with+the+information+in+a+format+that+makes+sense%3F+Businesses+are+spoilt+with+the+number+of+technologies+available+to+use+for+a+presentation+layer.+However%2C+this+also+brings+another+conundrum+%26ndash%3B+which+visualisation+tool+do+they+use%3F+And+this+is+where+we+start+balancing+cutting+edge+with+bleeding+edge.+At+least+once+a+month%2C+I+speak+to+a+potential+client+who+mentions+a+new+visualisation+tool+and+asks+if+we+at+Entelect+have+expertise+in+it.+Each+tool+has+its+own+pros+and+cons%2C+and+here+is+where+we+need+to+take+a+step+back+and+define+what+functionality+we+are+actually+looking+for+in+a+visualization+tool.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+have+done+countless+implementations+where+self-service+BI+was+a+hard+requirement%2C+so+the+tools+were+selected+and+the+universe+of+data+provided.+Then%2C+however%2C+when+I+checked+in+a+few+months+later%2C+the+company+had+employed+report+writers+because+they+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+want+to+write+their+own+reports+or+their+IT+department+was+experiencing+headaches+because+everyone+was+applying+different+filters+to+the+data+and+expecting+the+same+result.+Do+we+actually+need+interactive+charts+and+graphs%2C+with+drill+down+and+drill+through%2C+bottom-up+and+top-down+reporting%3F+For+many%2C+these+requirements+are+a+must%2C+until+you+mention+the+price+of+the+potential+tool%2C+then+they+quickly+move+to+a+show+value+first+and+add+the+sexy+visualisations+later.+I+have+never+seen+a+successful+revenue+assurance+implementation+run+on+anything+other+than+raw+data.+What+I+am+trying+to+emphasise+is+that+companies+need+to+keep+their+short-term+goals+in+mind%2C+and+before+they+fork+out+a+lot+of+money+on+a+visualisation+tool%2C+make+sure+that+the+path+they+are+going+down+is+going+to+add+value+to+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BValue%26rsquo%3B+has+also+been+added+to+the+list+of+V%26%2339%3Bs.+Now+that+we+have+all+the+data+and+it+is+available+to+look+at%2C+how+do+we+actually+extract+value+from+this%3F+New+roles+are+being+created+within+organisations%2C+for+example%2C+we+now+have+chief+data+officers+and+the+role+of+the+data+scientist+is+also+gaining+business+traction.+Once+again%2C+before+businesses+go+out+and+spend+money+on+someone+with+a+quants+or+risk+qualification%2C+they+need+to+look+internally+for+the+person+I+like+call+the+%26lsquo%3BMiss+Congeniality%26rsquo%3B+of+your+company.+This+is+someone+who+has+been+at+the+company+for+many+years+and+worked+across+the+majority+of+the+departments.+This+is+the+person+who+best+understands+the+lower+levels+of+the+business.+He+or+she+is+one+who+understands+how+the+insurance+department+influences+the+credit+department+and+the+implications+thereof.+This+person+will+create+the+foundation+before+the+data+scientists+arrive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+field+of+data+analytics%2C+many+companies+have+invested+in+out-of-the-box+analytics+that+will+provide+a+perceived+%26lsquo%3Beasy+way%26rsquo%3B+to+analyse+data.+It+is+quick+to+push+out+a+time+series+forecast+or+a+decision+tree+and+to+cluster+the+base.+This+is+great%2C+but+keep+in+mind+that+there+is+no+competitive+advantage.+Out-of-the-box+tools+are+available+to+anyone+who+is+willing+to+pay+for+them.+Know+up+front+that+if+you+want+something+different%2C+it+is+going+to+have+to+be+bespoke.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+now+we+have+all+the+theory+and+the+best-case+scenario+examples.+The+number+of+success+stories+I+have+read+are+countless.+However%2C+the+number+I+have+seen+properly+implemented+are+far+fewer.+We+all+know+the+benefits+of+using+this+data+to+drive+sales%2C+increase+revenue+during+down+times+and+to+engage+customers+more+effectively.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+South+Africa+we+have+access+to+exactly+the+same+technology+as+the+rest+of+the+world%2C+we+have+people+in+this+country+who+are+able+to+create+the+custom+algorithms+and+to+stand+up+as+the+true+data+scientists.+The+question+remains%2C+%26lsquo%3Bwhy+are+we+still+behind+the+curve+on+this%2C+why+are+we+not+the+benchmark%3F%26rsquo%3B+My+pledge+to+the+data+community+of+South+Africa+is+to+invest+in+Big+Data+competency+over+the+next+12+months+and+keep+you+updated+each+step+of+the+way%2C+I+hope+to+further+learn+what+actually+works+and+what+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+in+practical+and+real-world+environments.+With+a+bit+of+luck+and+a+lot+of+hard+work%2C+we+will+be+able+to+position+South+Africa+as+the+world+leaders+in+Big+Data.
%3Cstrong%3ERyan+Naud%C3%A9+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%29+%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+%E2%80%98Big+Data%E2%80%99+may+no+longer+be+a+buzzword+%E2%80%93+the+concept+of+Big+Data%2C+creating+Big+Data+stores+and+analysing+against+these+effectively+is+common+practice.+However%2C+%E2%80%98Big+Data%E2%80%99%2C+is+still+a+bit+of+a+%E2%80%98fuzzword%E2%80%99%2C+as+I+like+to+call+it%2C+because+there+are+no+industry-accepted+or+concrete+definitions+to+tick+off+and+go+through+and+finally+say%2C+%E2%80%98I+have+Big+DataBig+Data.%E2%80%99+Lately%2C+I%E2%80%99ve+been+on+a+quest+to+try+and+understand+what+this+monster+is+and+what+would+be+the+key+factors+that+would+enable+a+successful+Big+Data+implementation.
