   Ryan.jpg    
Why+Big+Data+should+be+a+priority+at+the+moment The+reason+for+the+belief+in+the+data+age+is+that+as+each+millionth+of+a+second+passes%2C+almost+everything+we+see%2C+hear+and+touch+is+generating+data.+Using+PCs%2C+mobile+handsets%2C+tablets%2C+GPS+devices%2C+servers+and+sensors+attached+to+vehicles%2C+buildings+and+satellites%2C+leads+to+huge+amounts+of+data+being+stored+across+multiple+databases+and+data+stores+worldwide.+The+speed+at+which+this+data+is+being+generated+is+increasing+rapidly+and+so+is+the+volume+and+array+of+different+structured+and+unstructured+data+types%2C+which+are+commonly+referred+to+as+Big+Data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+theory%2C+Big+Data+means+having+tons+and+tons+of+data+at+your+disposal.+However%2C+in+practice%2C+this+data+is+next+to+useless+if+businesses+cannot+apply+analytics+to+benefit+and+gain+insight+from+it.+Businesses+must+find+a+%26lsquo%3Bmechanism%26rsquo%3B+that+can+perform+collaborative+filtering+to+%26lsquo%3Bnet%26rsquo%3B+vital+information+and+trends+and+to+answer+key+questions.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+But%2C+how+easy+is+it+to+find+this+mechanism%3F+Currently%2C+there+are+frameworks+that+have+been+developed+to+store+and+retrieve+the+data+using+MapReduce+algorithms.+Apache+Hadoop+is+one+of+the+frameworks+of+choice%2C+and+some+of+the+large+tech+and+social+media+companies+have+shown+a+keen+interest+in+it.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hadoop+is+so+popular+because+of+the+speed+at+which+it+can+load+the+volume+and+variety+of+data+compared+with+other+ETL+%28extract-transform-load%29+tools+and+frameworks.+Hadoop+can+load+data+much+quicker+than+relational+databases+because+it+has+no+gatekeeping+rules.+It+stores+the+data+on+its+HDFS+%28Hadoop+Distributed+File+System%29+without+needing+to+match+the+destination+structure+with+the+source+structure+%26ndash%3B+a+relational+database+would+require+%26lsquo%3BTable+B%26rsquo%3B+to+be+the+same+as+%26lsquo%3BTable+A%26rsquo%3B+in+order+to+transfer+data+across.+Instead%2C+Hadoop+stores+the+data+across+numerous+data+nodes+using+key-value+pairs.+Initially%2C+querying+data+on+HDFS+was+slow+and+involved+a+great+deal+of+effort.+To+complete+the+task%2C+a+more+SQL-like+language+was+needed.+However%2C+over+the+years%2C+many+contributions+have+been+made+to+this+open-source+software+framework.+Currently+there+are+many+%26lsquo%3BSQL+on+Hadoop%26rsquo%3B+languages%2C+such+as+Apache+Hive%2C+Stinger%2C+Apaches+Drill+and+Spark+SQL%2C+which+have+improved+data-retrieval+performance+considerably.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hadoop%26rsquo%3Bs+architecture+is+very+scalable+so+this+allows+for+millions+of+servers+to+work+together+instead+of+running+one+high-specced+server.+Hadoop+is+also+fault+tolerant%2C+storing+multiple+copies+of+each+piece+of+data+in+different+nodes.+If+one+node+goes+down%2C+the+framework+will+automatically+switch+over+to+another+in+the+most+efficient+manner.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+recent+times%2C+Hadoop+has+received+a+lot+of+buy-in+from+the+big-player+analytics+and+visualisations+vendors.+Cloudera+is+partnering+with+NoSQL+creator+MongoDB%2C+and+Hortonworks+has+collaborated+with+Tableau.+Other+vendors%2C+such+as+Qlikview%2C+Spotfire+and+Microstrategy%2C+have+some+ODBC+configuration+to+connect+to+Hadoop.+Cloudera+has+released+a+universal+ODBC+driver+that+enables+the+connection+of+many+applications%2C+such+as+Teradata+Parallel+Transporter+%28TPT%29%2C+SSIS%2C+IBM+DataStage%2C+Ab+Initio%2C+Informatica+PowerCenter%2C+SAP+Data+Services%2C+Business+Objects%2C+OBIEE%2C+Cognos%2C+SAS%2C+SPSS%2C+Unica%2C+Linked+Server%2C+Oracle+Database+Gateway+and+many+more.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+all+sounds+very+exciting+and+convincing+that+Hadoop+is+the+way+to+go.+However%2C+although+Big+Data+has+been+around+for+years%2C+it+has+still+not+taken+off+in+the+South+African+market+as+initially+predicted.+If+you+or+your+company+is+equipped+with+skill+set+similar+to+these+large+tech+and+social+media+companies%2C+then+implementing+a+Big+Data+solution+is+not+an+issue.+However%2C+the+question+is+how+many+companies+are+actually+equipped+with+a+skill+set%3F+The+answer+is+not+many+and+the+market+is+showing+a+massive+demand+for+Big+Data+resources.+Global+management+consulting+firm+McKinsey+%26amp%3B+Company+has+predicted+that+by+the+year+2018%2C+the+shortfall+of+Big+Data+experts+will+be+at+anywhere+from+140%2C000+to+190%2C000.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+good+news+is+that+tertiary+institutions+are+now+including+Big+Data+in+their+curricula+and+post-graduate+degrees%2C+so+we+can+expect+the+Big+Data+resource+pool+to+grow+over+time+as+these+students+complete+their+studies.+Until+this+happens%2C+companies+are+investing+in+their+current+staff+compliment+to+fill+the+gap.+However%2C+learning+Big+Data+via+frameworks%2C+such+as+Apache+Hadoop%2C+is+quite+a+steep+learning+curve+compared+with+traditional%2C+structured+BI+involving+SQL%2C+ETL+and+OLAP+tools%2C+and+to+a+certain+degree%2C+it+requires+a+mindset+shift.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Companies+do+have+other+options.+They+can+opt+for+a+cloud+solution+like+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+HDInsight+sitting+on+their+Azure+platform.+This+option+has+its+pros+and+cons.+On+the+plus+side%2C+it+collects+and+stores+your+data+at+a+reasonable+price+on+your+HDInsight+cluster.+There+is+no+need+to+understand+the+background+processing+and+architecture+of+Hadoop.+Microsoft+has+also+developed+a+way+to+combine+and+query+both+non-relational+data+%28HDInsight%29+with+structured+SQL+Server+Parallel+Data+Warehouse+in+the+form+of+Polybase.+This+integrates+perfectly+with+the+latest+version+of+Microsoft+Excel+and+an+assortment+of+PowerBI+tools%2C+such+as+PowerPivot+and+PowerQuery.+One+of+the+biggest+negatives+for+this+option+is+the+cost+involved+in+processing+and+retrieving+the+answers+you+looking+for.+There+is+also+the+security+element+of+storing+sensitive+data+on+an+off-site+server%2C+perhaps+half-way+across+the+globe.+Implementing+data+governance+can+also+be+tricky+with+regard+to+unstructured+data+and+defining+which+users+are+authorised+to+see+which+data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+option+companies+may+choose+is+to+engage+with+consulting+companies+that+have+already+invested+time%2C+research+and+development+in+Hadoop+and+its+architecture.+Consultancy+firms+allow+their+staff+autonomy+to+play+around+with+cutting-edge+technologies+and+often+give+them+carte+blanche+to+find+innovative+ways+of+solving+tomorrow%26rsquo%3Bs+business+needs.+This+allows+companies+to+use+this+expertise+and+knowledge+without+wasting+unnecessary+time+and+money.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whichever+option+you+choose+to+invest+in%2C+I+believe+Big+Data+is+the+must-have+component+that+should+be+found+in+every+company%26rsquo%3Bs+BI+architectural+framework.+Due+to+the+current+skill+shortage+and+reluctance+to+opt+for+a+cloud+solution%2C+Big+Data+may+not+be+a+priority+for+companies+at+the+moment%2C+but+it+will+definitely+become+a+must+in+the+future.+The+quicker+businesses+get+their+Big+Data+solution+up+and+running%2C+the+faster+they+will+be+able+to+gain+a+substantial+leading+edge+over+their+competitors.+The+race+is+on+for+companies+to+find+the+answers+of+tomorrow+based+on+the+data+that+was+always+there+but+could+never+before+be+analysed.
%3Ch3%3E+Shane+Moodley+%28Entelect+Team+Lead+%E2%80%93+Data+Solutions%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+History+has+seen+a+stone+age%2C+which+was+considered+an+age+of+innovation%2C+and+this+stone+age+was+followed+by+the+bronze+and+iron+ages.+Many+people+believe+that+today%2C+we+are+living+in+the+%E2%80%98data+age%E2%80%99.
    
["New technology"]
  
shane.moodley.jpg
    
My%2C+what+Big+Data+you+have%21 Research+is+critically+important+and+companies+need+to+start+asking+the+right+questions+before+they+engage+a+software+supplier.+The+main+objective+is+to+choose+a+software+supplier+that+will+help+to+grow+your+business+and+ultimately%2C+create+a+mutually+beneficial+partnership.+Choosing+the+most+appealing+supplier+is+a+process%2C+and+careful+considerations+need+to+be+made.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAdding+value%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+need+to+ask+yourself+which+supplier+will+add+the+most+value+to+your+business+and+why+they+will+add+value.+One+way+to+narrow+down+your+selection+is+to+determine+each+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+main+or+unique+characteristics.+Are+these+characteristics+well-matched+to+your+organisation+and+will+they+make+the+supplier+the+best+candidate+to+handle+your+Big+Data%3F+Does+the+supplier+have+a+documented+procedure+for+the+service+it+provides+and%2C+if+so%2C+are+its+current+customers+fully+satisfied%3F+Another+important+factor+is+to+make+sure+your+supplier+shares+your+vision+for+your+Big+Data+outcomes.+This+is+very+important+as+it+will+ensure+all+parties+are+invested+from+the+get+go.+Often%2C+choosing+a+local+partner+has+a+range+of+significant+benefits%2C+from+better+and+more+insightful+communication+to+shorter+delivery+timeframes.+However%2C+for+many%2C+distance+is+not+a+deterrent+and+other+factors+are+more+important.+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMore+than+technology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+choosing+your+supplier+you+need+to+be+aware+that+Big+Data+is+not+just+a+technological+problem+but+a+data+engineering+problem%2C+too+%26ndash%3B+it+is+not+just+Hadoop+but+instead%2C+has+many+layers+and+aspects+to+it.+Whoever+you+choose+as+your+supplier+of+talent%2C+make+sure+that+the+company+has+a+full-circle+service+offering.+This+must+include+analysis%2C+development+and+data+competency.+Judging+by+the+current+market%2C+it+will+serve+your+organisation+well+to+make+sure+that+the+supplier+is+competent+in+all+Cloud+platforms+because+these+will+be+an+integral+part+of+your+Big+Data%2FInternet+of+Things+solution.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EQuality+and+quantity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+key+indicator+is%2C+of+course%2C+the+quality+of+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+service+as+well+as+the+size+and+skill+set+of+its+staff.+You+need+to+ask+the+supplier+about+its+track+record+on+delivery.+The+real+differentiator+is+the+qualification+of+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+staff%2C+its+intellectual+property+and+its+professional+approach+to+solving+complex+software+problems.+If+a+company+really+is+as+BIG+as+it+claims+to+be%2C+then+the+proof+will+be+in+the+data+management.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+also+needs+to+bear+in+mind+the+support+structures+of+the+organisation.+Are+there+relevant+experts+who+can+be+called+upon+%26ndash%3B+these+experts+should+range+from+extremely+technically+minded+employees+to+those+with+excellent+financial+and+mathematical+skills.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Do+a+bit+of+research+on+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+staff+members%2C+too.+Do+they+have+blogs+and+are+they+actively+sharing+their+knowledge+with+the+development+community%3F+This+is+critical+as+it+will+help+assess+the+long-term+engagement+strategy+with+the+supplier.+Again%2C+make+sure+there+are+shared+values+between+your+organisation+and+the+supplier.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDo+you+know+where+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Client+referrals+are+always+a+must+when+it+comes+to+reviewing+the+authenticity+of+a+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+claims.+Delve+deeper+into+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+closet+and+see+if+there+are+any+skeletons+roaming+around.+If+a+client+was+not+fully+serviced%2C+it+would+most+definitely+be+neighbourhood+gossip.+The+converse+is+true%2C+too%3A+when+a+client+is+fully+satisfied%2C+the+results+will+be+evident+in+the+suppliers%26%2339%3B+client+retention+as+well+as+client+referrals.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+there+is+plenty+of+talent+in+South+Africa+when+it+comes+to+software+engineering%2C+Big+Data+is+such+a+new+concept+in+South+Africa+that+the+tech+skills+may+not+be+there+completely.+To+this+end%2C+organisations+should+look+for+a+supplier+than+can+plug+into+all+the+different+aspects+of+it%2C+including%3A+high-speed+data+processing%2C+strong+data+governance+and+s+pedantic+and+pragmatic+approach.+Ultimately%2C+who+you+choose+will+come+down+the+supplier+that+ticks+all+the+Big+Data+boxes+that+your+organisation+values+most.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E
Ryan+Naud%C3%A9+%3Cbr%2F%3E+Entelect+Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%3Cbr%2F%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Since+the+dawning+of+the+digital+age%2C+companies+have+realised+the+importance+of+investing+in+effective+Big+Data+solutions.+The+real+question%2C+however%2C+is+WHO+do+you+choose+for+this+Big+task%3F
    
["New technology"]
   Ryan.jpg    
Decoding+tech+buzzwords Sometimes%2C+a+buzzword+emerges+out+of+necessity+%26ndash%3B+there+simply+is+no+other+way+to+describe+a+new+phenomenon+or+trend.+In+many+cases%2C+however%2C+it+is+a+shift+in+thinking+or+a+reincarnation+of+an+old+concept+that+provides+the+marketing+fraternity+with+a+fresh+opportunity+to+create+a+%26lsquo%3Bbuzz%26rsquo%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Instead+of+fostering+a+real+understanding%2C+the+use+of+buzzwords+and+jargon+can+create+misconceptions+that+ultimately+slow+down+the+decision-making+process.+At+best%2C+people+waste+time+trying+to+understand+what+is+essentially+something+very+simple.+At+worst%2C+they+miss+an+opportunity.+Either+way%2C+new+terms+can+be+confusing%2C+so+I+have+decoded+some+of+the+IT+industry%26rsquo%3Bs+up-and-coming+jargon+and+buzzwords.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.+Big+Data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D39759%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EBig+Data%3C%2Fa%3E+refers+to+the+large+amounts+of+data+that+are+typically+collected+from+events+triggered+by+particular+actions+or+devices+monitoring+some+phenomena%2C+often+stored+in+a+loosely+structured+format.+Traditional+techniques+for+processing+these+large+data+sets+are+ineffective+and+new+approaches+are+necessary+to+collect%2C+retrieve%2C+summarise+and+visualise+%26ndash%3B+turning+the+data+into+something+more+meaningful.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+generally+accepted+defining+properties+of+Big+Data+are+known+as+the+Three+Vs%2C+which+Gartner+analyst+Doug+Laney+originally+coined%3A%3F+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EVolume+%26ndash%3B+the+amount+of+data+stored%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EVelocity+%26ndash%3B+the+rate+at+which+data+is+generated+and+processed%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EVariety+%26ndash%3B+the+type+and+source+of+the+data.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+each+of+these+properties+is+increasing+significantly%2C+the+information+can+be+considered+to+be+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aside+from+the+fact+that+companies+are+collecting+vast+amounts+of+information+on+customers%26rsquo%3B+movements%2C+behaviour+and+buying+habits%2C+why+is+Big+Data+important+from+a+business+perspective%3F+The+old+adage+of+%26lsquo%3Bknowledge+is+power%26rsquo%3B+holds+true.+The+more+equipped+people+are+to+make+decisions%2C+the+better+the+outcome+for+their+business.+What+is+relevant+in+the+case+of+Big+Data+however%2C+is+making+sense+of+the+information+%28separating+the+noise+from+the+meaningful%29%2C+the+timing+of+the+information%2C+and+how+to+use+the+information+effectively+to+improve+a+product+or+service.+The+current+movement+in+Big+Data+aims+to+address+these+issues+and+is+reshaping+our+understanding+of+how+to+process+information+on+a+much+larger+scale.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+Prescriptive+Analytics%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EMaking+sense+of+the+information+leads+us+to+the+field+of+data+analytics+%26ndash%3B+the+tools+and+techniques+that+are+used+to+extract+meaning+from+huge+volumes+of+data.+Analytics+efforts+can+be+broadly+classified+into+one+of+three+main+categories+%26ndash%3B+descriptive%2C+predictive+and+prescriptive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Descriptive+analytics+tells+us+what+has+happened+and+possibly+why+it+has+happened.+It+usually+involves+reporting+on+historical+data+to+provide+insights+into+various+business+metrics.+Predictive+analytics+attempts+to+tell+us+what+may+happen+in+the+future%2C+taking+historical+data+into+account+and+applying+algorithms+and+various+statistical+models+to+predict+the+future.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Prescriptive+analytics%2C+the+third+and+most+recent+focus+area+of+data+analytics%2C+takes+it+to+the+next+level+by+recommending+a+course+of+action%2C+and+presenting+the+likely+outcomes+of+choosing+such+action%2C+incorporating+any+constraints+of+the+current+environment+%28financial+or+regulatory%2C+for+example%29.+An+actual+person+still+has+to+make+the+decisions+but+prescriptive+analytics+can+provide+valuable+input+into+scenario+planning+and+optimisation+exercises%2C+by+combining+business+rules%2C+statistical+models+and+machine+learning+to+quantify+the+impact+of+future+decisions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+variety+of+organisations+that+have+invested+significant+effort+in+descriptive+analytics+and+reporting+solutions+to+provide+insight+into+historical+data%2C+and+many+are+starting+to+explore+the+opportunities+that+predictive+analytics+has+to+offer.+Both+are+necessary+precursors+to+prescriptive+analytics%2C+which+requires%2C+at+a+minimum%2C+the+capability+to+capture+and+summarise+large+data+sets+efficiently.+The+data+can+then+be+used+as+input+to+prescriptive+analytic+engines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.+Software-defined+infrastructure+%28SDI%29%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software-defined+infrastructure+builds+on+the+capabilities+of+virtualisation+and+cloud-based+services+to+define+IT+infrastructure+requirements.+These+requirements+include+computing+power%2C+as+well+as+network+and+storage+capacity%2C+at+the+software+level.+SDI+allows+application+developers+to+describe+their+expectations+of+infrastructure+in+a+standard+and+systematic+way%2C+turning+computing+resources+into+logical+components+that+can+be+provisioned+on+the+fly+without+human+intervention.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Take+today%26rsquo%3Bs+scenario+of+having+to+configure+each+element+of+infrastructure+to+support+an+application+%26ndash%3B+machines+and+images%2C+storage+and+mount+points%2C+firewalls+and+load+balancers+to+name+a+few+%26ndash%3B+and+replace+it+with+the+simple+action+of+identifying+an+SDI-enabled+data+centre+and+clicking+%26lsquo%3Bdeploy%26rsquo%3B.+Each+resource+is+automatically+configured+as+required+and%2C+more+importantly%2C+can+reconfigure+itself+as+the+application+and+usage+changes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Defining+these+requirements+based+on+policies+and+expected+usage+patterns+at+the+software+level+and+incorporating+them+into+the+deployable+artefacts%2C+means+that+IT+organisations+can+respond+more+quickly+to+peaks+and+troughs+in+throughput+and+achieve+repeatable+and+reliable+application+deployments+by+automating+many+infrastructure+related+activities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Furthermore%2C+SDI-enabled+data+centres+can+optimise+resource+usage%2C+which+will+drive+down+the+cost+of+infrastructure.+Specialists+can+focus+on+optimising+specific+elements+of+the+infrastructure%2C+such+as+network+or+storage%2C+rather+than+reactively+wiring+and+rewiring+configurations+to+support+evolving+application+requirements.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+was+the+case+with+Java+and+the+standardised+APIs+%28Application+Programming+Interfaces%29+that+make+up+the+Java+Enterprise+Edition+framework%2C+SDI+will+require+a+concerted+effort+to+ensure+inter-operability+between+the+tools%2C+platforms+and+processes+that+make+up+the+virtual+data+centres+of+the+future.+As+with+cloud+services%2C+there+is+a+vendor+battle+brewing+to+capture+the+lion%26rsquo%3Bs+share+of+what+is+likely+to+be+a+significant+market+for+SDI-capable+services.+Those+vendors+who+actively+drive+and+support+open+interfaces+and+APIs+will+have+the+advantage+in+the+long+term.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+DevOps%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+term+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D32819%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EDevOps%3C%2Fa%3E+has+been+around+for+some+time+now+and+the+concept%2C+even+longer.+However%2C+only+in+recent+years+has+it+started+gaining+widespread+acceptance+as+standard+practice+in+the+development+communities.+DevOps+is+to+development+and+operations+teams+as+Agile+is+to+development+teams+and+business.+Where+the+Agile+movement+promotes+increased+collaboration+between+development+teams+and+business+users%2C+DevOps+looks+at+integrating+operations+activities+much+earlier+and+more+tightly+into+the+software-development+life+cycle.+Both+have+the+same+goal+of+enabling+software+projects+to+respond+more+effectively+to+change.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+reality%2C+DevOps+is+an+extension+of+Agile+as+we+know+it+today.+However%2C+it+also+includes+operations+and+support+functions.+The+authors+of+the+Agile+Manifesto+certainly+never+explicitly+excluded+operations+and+support+from+their+widely+accepted+list+of+values+and+principles+but+in+the+experience+of+many%2C+the+focus+on+Agile+projects+has+always+been+biased+towards+improving+the+collaboration+between+business+users+and+the+development+team%2C+rather+than+the+development+team+and+the+operations+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Yes%2C+it+is+true+that+the+operations+team+is+implicitly+included+in+the+concept+of+cross-functional+development+teams+%28see+below%29%2C+but+in+reality%2C+IT+operations+in+many+organisations+are+still+very+much+an+isolated+function%2C+which+is+exactly+the+barrier+that+DevOps+is+trying+to+eliminate.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+Cross-functional+teams%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+concept+of+a+cross-functional+team+is+simple.+The+development+team+has+all+the+skills+necessary+to+deliver+a+piece+of+working+software+into+production%2C+which+may+include+activities+such+as+user+experience+design%2C+database+design%2C+server+configuration+and%2C+of+course%2C+writing+code.+Where+product+development+teams+are+concerned%2C+businesses+adopting+Agile+practices+should+be+assembling+cross-functional+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+not+an+excuse+for+hiring+fewer+individuals+and+expecting+them+to+be+Jacks-of-all-trades%3A+specialisation+is+important+and+a+necessity+when+solving+complex+problems+that+require+focus+and+experience.+Having+a+single%2C+co-located+team+that+can+take+something+from+concept+to+reality%2C+eliminates+external+dependencies+that+plague+many+software+development+teams+of+today%2C+especially+in+large+organisations.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aside+from+efficiency+and+knowledge+sharing%2C+the+argument+for+isolated+teams+defined+by+skill+or+technology+is+the+degree+of+control+of+standards+and+governance+within+a+particular+domain.+This+argument+is+valid+but+only+for+operational+and+%26lsquo%3Bcommoditised%26rsquo%3B+services%2C+such+as+desktop+support+and+hardware+infrastructure.+As+soon+as+product+development+enters+the+mix%2C+the+effectiveness+of+the+team+becomes+more+important+than+the+efficiency+of+the+team.+Assuming+differentiation+is+one+of+the+main+objectives%2C+product+development+teams+should+be+optimised+for+effectiveness+rather+than+efficiency%2C+since+development+in+this+scenario+is+a+creative+process%2C+one+that+should+not+be+constrained+by+red+tape+and+corporate+IT+governance.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+companies+want+to+increase+their+chances+of+creating+a+product+that+delights+their+customers%2C+they+should+include+specialists+and+designers+in+the+team+as+full-time+members+until+their+services+are+no+longer+deemed+critical%2C+which+will+probably+be+only+after+several+production+releases.+If+you+want+to+minimise+your+IT+costs+at+the+expense+of+rapid+innovation%2C+create+a+dedicated+team+that+out-sources+its+services+to+several+internal+development+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+the+occurrence+of+new+%26lsquo%3Bbuzzwords%26rsquo%3B+in+the+ICT+space+is+on-going%2C+it+is+crucial+that+decision+makers+ensure+a+practical+and+simplified+understanding+before+making+any+kind+of+investment+on+behalf+of+their+organisation.+Often+designed+to+excite+and+compel%2C+these+buzzwords+often+do+not+describe+the+actual+function+or+benefits+of+a+particular+concept.+At+Entelect%2C+we+encourage+business+leaders+to+screen+potential+IT+suppliers+not+by+the+terminology+and+complicated+jargon+they+offer%2C+but+rather+by+how+simply+and+understandably+they+are+able+to+communicate+their+solutions.
%3Ch3%3E+Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager+of+Service+Delivery%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+Every+day%2C+we+are+bombarded+with+jargon+and+buzzwords.+Each+industry+has+its+fair+share+of+jargon%2C+but+none+so+much+as+the+IT+industry.
    
["New technology"]
   Doug.jpg    
How+data+lakes+can+form+a+culture+of+innovation %3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3EWhile+data+lakes+are+becoming+more+popular%2C+they+should+not+be+a+tick-box+exercise.+Effective+use+of+a+data+lake+can+provide+insights+that+make+significant+improvements+to+your+organizational+strategy.+But%2C+this+can+only+be+achieved+with+the+right+resources.%26nbsp%3B+Business+often+talks+about+having+%26lsquo%3Bthe+right+people%2C+in+the+right+seats+on+the+bus%26rsquo%3B%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+also+about+making+sure+the+ride+stays+interesting.+%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EAt+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+Chief+Data+Officer+Forum+Africa%2C+the+subject+of+data+lakes+was+a+hot+topic%2C+as+was+retaining+top+talent.+But%2C+while+businesses+become+aware+of+the+advantages+of+data+lakes%2C+many+do+not+understand+how+to+leverage+them+for+maximum+results.+So+although%2C+these+may+seem+like+separate+topics%2C+they+are+in+fact+interconnected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EIn+the+big+data+environment%2C+many+companies+are+starting+to+pull+away+from+the+traditional+approach+of+Extract+Transform+Load+%28ETL%29+towards+Extract%26nbsp%3BLoad%26nbsp%3BTransform+%28ELT%29.+But+the+emergence+of+the+Data+Lake+in+this+shift+towards+ELT+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+be+viewed+as+a+tick+box.+In+fact%2C+it+should+be+a+strategic+play+to+provide+your+organisation+with+comprehensive+and+unique+insights+to+be+more+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EOnce+a+company+appreciates+the+potential+of+a+data+lake%2C+it+is+in+a+position+to+pull+incredibly+exciting+insights.+However%2C+to+leverage+a+data+lake+to+its+fullest+requires+a+diversity+of+people+and+skill+sets.+In+this+sense%2C+a+culture+of+innovation+that+drives+continuous+learning+and+collaboration+should+be+considered+the+%26lsquo%3Bbest+friend%26rsquo%3B+of+exceptional+data+science.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThis+is+why+the+topic+of+data+lakes+become+inextricably+linked+with+attracting+and+retaining+top+talent%2C+since+extracting+insights+will+be+dependent+on+the+capability+of+the+data+science+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EFinding+a+data+scientist+is+tough.+In+fact%2C+the+role+is+most+effectively+delivered+through+two+roles%2C%26nbsp%3Ba+data+engineer+and+a+data+analyst.+Where+a+data+engineer+can+populate+the+data+lake+and+perform+the+ELT+operations%2C+the+data+analyst+can+communicate+the+results+to+the+business+in+such+a+way+that+strategic+financial+and+operational+decisions+can+be+made.+Consequently%2C+these+two+roles+require+different+stimulation+to+sustain+high+productivity%2C+continuous+innovation+and+ultimately%2C+ensure+retention.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3ERetention+therefore%2C+is+about+making+sure+the+%26lsquo%3Bride+stays+interesting%26rsquo%3B.+Data+engineers+and+analysts+are+working+in+a+highly+evolving+industry+so+the+culture+they+operate+in+needs+to+support+this.+It+requires+a+strong+focus+on+innovating+within+roles+and+structures%2C+which+is+why+the+best+fit+for+this+industry+are+environments+that+create+a+culture+of+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EWhile+big+business+is+under+constant+pressure+to+sweat+its+assets%2C+a+consultancy+firm+has+more+flexibility+to+invest+in+retention+strategies+such+as+continual+learning+and+a+flexible+working+environment.+Consultancies+know+that+best+practices+are+what+differentiate+them+from+their+competitors%2C+so+these+are+investments+they+are+willing+to+make.+Similarly%2C+big+businesses+can+be+assured+of+a+data+science+team+that+is+constantly+stimulated+and+in-touch+with+best+practice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3ESome+ways+that+outsourced+consultancies+create+a+culture+of+innovation%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Consulting+companies+pride+themselves+in+investing+heavily+in+in-house+training+programmes+that+ensure+clients+are+impressed+with+the+skills+provided.+This+serves+the+dual+purpose+of+improving+delivery+and+keeping+the+staff+continually+growing+and+learning.+Staff+should+be+incentivised+to+attend+conferences%2C+get+involved+in+the+development+community.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Regarding+the+work+environment+for+data+engineers+and+analysts%2C+flexibility+and+freedom+will+encourage+and+incentivise+the+team+to+come+up+with+new+ideas.+Providing+them+with+spare+time+to+implement+these%2C+whether+it+be+playing+around+with+facial+recognition+software+or+thinking+of+different+ways+to+analyse+tweet+streams+for+certain+topics%2C+is+key+to+creating+a+flexible+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Outsourcing+is+also+beneficial+to+leverage+the+strengths+of+the+skills+effectively.+In+build+phase%2C+a+consulting+firm+can+allocate+someone+who+is+strong+at+ELT%26rsquo%3Bs%2C+mainly+setting+up+and+optimising+the+data+into+the+data+lake.+Once+it%26rsquo%3Bs+in+the+data+lake%2C+you+can+bring+on+the+analysts.+This+%26lsquo%3Broll-on%2C%26nbsp%3Broll-off%26rsquo%3B+approach+ensures+the+client+always+has+the+best+person+for+the+job+and+means+consultancies+can+be+as+agile+as+the+client+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Lastly%2C+knowledge+transference+is+critical%2C+because+support+and+maintenance+tasks+are+not+for+everyone.+Transferring+the+IP+back+to+clients+by+including+them+in+training+sessions%2C+and+walking+the+journey+together+to+build+up+the+internal+capacity%2C+means+consultancies+and+clients+can+both+get+the+most+out+of+the+partnership.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThe+world+of+Big+Data+is+changing+quickly.+I+believe+that+if+you+are+looking+to+select+a+partner+to+accompany+you+on+the+journey+of+implementing+a+meaningful+big+data+solution%2C+you+need+to+find+a+company+with+a+culture+of+innovation+that+is+always+looking+for+new+ways+to+do+things%2C+learning+new+technologies%2C+and+staying+up-to-date+with+trends.+While+the+inclusion+of+a+data+lake+may+provide+great+opportunities+for+business%2C+a+data+science+team+that+can+adapt+to+industry+culture+and+remain+relevant+will+keep+the+ride+interesting+and+provide+you+with+the+best+results.%3C%2Fp%3E

SQL+2016+upgrade %3Cp%3EThe+main+draw+for+SQL+Server+2016%2C+at+least+from+my+point+of+view%2C+is+the+Query+Store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EQuery+Store+allows+us+to+answer+the+question+of+how+queries+were+performing+in+the+past%2C+to+easily+track+and+fix+query+performance+regressions%2C+to+see+total+resource+consumption+over+time+and+to+identify+expensive+queries.+Previously+we+would+have+needed+to+run+Extended+Event+sessions+over+periods+of+time%2C+import+the+results+and+aggregate+them+and+then+analyse+the+results%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+prone+to+missing+queries+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+run+all+the+time.+DMVs+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+that+problem%2C+but+the+data+they+contain+is+not+persisted%2C+and+is+lost+when+the+server+restarts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EQuery+Store%2C+once+it+is+enabled%2C+captures+queries%2C+plans+and+performance+characteristics+and+persists+them+into+the+database.+Since+it%26rsquo%3Bs+persisted+and+running+all+the+time%2C+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+worry+about+whether+there+was+an+extended+event+session+running+when+a+query+showed+a+problem%2C+or+whether+the+server+has+been+restarted+since+the+problem+started.+The+data+showing+historical+query+performance+is+a+query+away.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd+that%26rsquo%3Bs+far+from+the+only+feature+added+in+this+version.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+received+temporal+tables%2C+tables+that+automatically+keep+a+history+and+which+are+queryable+for+how+the+data+in+the+table+looked+at+any+point+in+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStretch+DB+was+introduced%2C+the+ability+to+stretch+a+table+into+Azure+so+that+cold+data+can+be+stored+in+the+cloud%2C+transparently+to+users.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlways+Encrypted+finally+provides+an+answer+to+preventing+the+DBA+from+seeing+data+by+transparently+encrypting+the+data+in+the+application+and+storing+only+encrypted+data+in+the+database.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERow+level+security+allows+users+to+be+assigned+rights+to+read+or+modify+subsets+of+the+data+in+tables.+No+more+need+to+add+views+for+security.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELive+query+statistics+makes+diagnosing+current+query+problems+easier%2C+as+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+need+to+wait+for+the+query+to+finish+to+get+the+run-time+statistics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+also+improvements+to+Columnstore+indexes%2C+In-memory+OLTP%2C+Always+On+Availability+Groups+and+a+pile+of+internal+optimisations+that+make+SQL+Server+2016+just+run+faster.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut%2C+upgrading+is+risky%2C+especially+with+the+cardinality+estimator+changes+in+SQL+Server+2014.+Testing+for+broken+functionality+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+hard+if+the+apps+have+good+test+coverage%2C+but+testing+for+performance+has+been+really+difficult.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUntil+now+with+Query+Store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+performance+for+the+SQL+Server+2016+upgrade+is+as+easy+as+restoring+a+copy+of+the+DB+to+a+testing+server%2C+enabling+Query+Store%2C+running+the+workload+under+old+and+new+compatibility+levels%2C+and+then+using+the+built-in+Query+Store+reports+to+identify+queries+that+experienced+performance+regressions.+What+could+take+days+of+work+to+identify+the+regressions+in+previous+versions%2C+can+now+be+done+by+looking+at+a+single+built+in+report.+In+some+cases%2C+fixing+the+performance+regression+may+also+be+easily+done+with+Query+Store%2C+using+the+plan+forcing+feature.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThat+was+the+story+at+RTM%2C+a+compelling+case+for+upgrading%2C+and+a+feature+that+makes+it+far+easier+to+test+for+that+upgrade+than+ever+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+SP1+was+released.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+big+news+of+SP1+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+the+new+features+it+had%2C+though+the+features+were+interesting.+The+big+news+of+SP1+was+about+the+Enterprise+edition-only+features%2C+like+Columnstore+indexes%2C+In-Memory+OLTP%2C+Partitioning%2C+Compression+and+several+more.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+of+SQL+Server+2016+SP1%2C+those+Enterprise-only+programmability+features+are+available+in+all+editions%2C+right+down+to+Express.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+makes+SQL+Server+2016+a+must-have+upgrade+for+anyone+using+Standard+edition+of+any+lower+version.+Upgrade+to+SQL+Server+2016+standard+edition%2C+apply+SP1+and+get+a+whole+pile+of+features+that+were+previously+only+available+in+Enterprise+Edition.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+there%26rsquo%3Bs+more.+SP1+also+included+some+nice+features+itself%2C+including+a+way+to+clone+a+database+without+data+in+a+single+statement%2C+a+more+flexible+hinting+model+for+queries%2C+more+DMVs+for+monitoring+what+SQL+Server+is+doing+and+the+addition+of+the+CREATE+OR+ALTER+syntax+for+stored+procedures%2C+functions%2C+views%2C+and+triggers%2C+which+makes+deployment+scripts+simpler.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+one+of+the+best+versions+of+SQL+Server+in+a+long+time%2C+and+upgrading+to+it+should+be+on+almost+every+IT+department%26rsquo%3Bs+roadmap+for+this+year.%3C%2Fp%3E

SQLBits+2017 %3Cp%3EThis+year%2C+the+SQLBits+conference+is%26nbsp%3Bheld+in+Telford%2C+a+small+town+near+Birmingham+and+runs+from+the+5th+through+to+the+8th+of+April.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESQLBits+is+an+excellent+conference%2C+small+enough+to+feel+cosy%2C+large+enough+that+there+are+plenty+of+people+to+talk+tech+with.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+uncommon+to+see+large+groups+sitting+around+discussing+various+aspects+around+data%2C+data+management+or+other+aspects+of+the+field%2C+even+during+sessions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+conference+is+a+4-day+event%2C+with+full-day+seminars+running+on+the+Wednesday+and+Thursday+and+regular+sessions+on+the+Friday+and+Saturday%2C+with+an+expected+1500+people+attending.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+must-see+sessions+this+year.+This+year+we+have+three+sessions+from+Bob+Ward%2C+Principal+Architect+for+the+Microsoft+Data+Group%2C+including+a+look+at+post-SP%21+Changes+for+SQL+Server+2016%2C+showing+the+ongoing+work+that+is+going+into+making+SQL+Server+2016+even+faster+and+scalable+than+ever.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+also+have+Conor+Cunningham%2C+Principal+Software+Architect+on+the+SQL+Server+Query+Processor+Team%2C+showing+off+the+adaptive+query+plan+feature+that%26rsquo%3Bs+planned+for+SQL+Server+vNext+and+Azure+SQLDB.+The+adaptive+query+plan+is+a+complete+departure+from+the+way+the+SQL+Server+Query+Optimiser+has+worked+for+many+versions%2C+allowing+for+a+single+query%26rsquo%3Bs+plan+to+generated+in+parts+as+the+query+executes%2C+and+not+upfront+as+is+the+current+behaviour.+Conor+is+also+presenting+a+session+on+how+the+engineering+team+delivers+monthly+updates+to+Azure.+This+is+more+a+practices+and+methodologies+session+than+a+purely+technical+session%2C+and+will+be+a+fascinating+look+into+how+the+Microsoft+teams+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26rsquo%3Bm+presenting+one+session+this+year%2C+a+2-hour+dive+into+indexes+on+the+Friday.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+it+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+covering+index+architecture+and+then+looking+at+how+that+architecture+affects+choices+for+the+clustered+index.+Most+of+the+sessions+will+be+spent+looking+at+how+nonclustered+indexes+are+used+and+how+they+should+be+selected+to+give+the+best+possible+improvement+to+the+application+performance.+I%26rsquo%3Bll+also+mention+the+newer+Columnstore%2C+hash+and+range+indexes+in+SQL+Server.%3C%2Fp%3E

First+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+comes+to+South+Africa %3Cp%3EWillie+Strydom+was+awarded+the+prize+for+the+most+innovative+build+at+the+first+ever+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+to+be+hosted+in+South+Africa.+Willie%26rsquo%3Bs+project+in+%26lsquo%3Bhome+automation%26rsquo%3B+is+designed+to+consolidate+various+home+automation+applications+into+a+single+user+interface+that+can+be+accessed+from+an+app+on+your+iPhone+or+Apple+watch+and+was+selected+as+the+winning+entry+based+on+its+relevance%2C+usefulness%2C+and+future+potential.+Willie+won+a+%26lsquo%3BLimited+Edition%26rsquo%3B+Raspberry+Pi%2C+only+1000+have+been+produced+globally+and+a+voucher+to+spend+at+RS+Components+for+his+next+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+%26lsquo%3BRaspberry+Pi%26rsquo%3B+is+a+credit-card-size+computer+board+that+can+run+the+same+basic+functions+as+a+PC+but+costs+a+fraction+of+the+price.+The+device+has+been+used+in+numerous+applications+from+setting+up+computer+labs+to+home+automation%2C+and+from+atmospheric+monitoring+to+robot+cars.%26nbsp%3B+A+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+is+an+organised+community+event+where+people+get+together+and+share+knowledge%2C+learn+new+things+and+meet+other+Raspberry+Pi+enthusiasts.+This+particular+event+was+structured+as+a+show+and+tell%2C+meaning+that+participants+were+given+the+opportunity+to+demonstrate+their+Pi+projects+and+discuss+them+with+other+like-minded+Pi+enthusiasts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJointly+hosted+by+RS+Components+and+Entelect+Software%2C+nine+Pi+projects+were+presented+and+the+event+kicked+off+with+a+keynote+address+by+Eben+Upton%2C+the+illustrious+inventor+of+the+Raspberry+Pi.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUpton%26rsquo%3Bs+address%2C+provided+the+guests+with+an+insight+into+the+initial+concept+of+the+Pi+and+the+start-up+phase+of+the+Raspberry+Pi+Foundation.+He+explained+that+the+idea+of+the+Raspberry+Pi+came+about+in+trying+to+solve+a+particular+problem+which+was+to+boost+an+interest+in+computer+programming+and+STEM+learning+in+young+learners.+The+concept+was+to+create+an+affordable+computer+at+%2435%2C+which+needed+to+be+both+functional+and+simple+enough+for+a+child+to+learn+coding.+The+team+initially+envisioned+selling+1000+Raspberry+Pi+boards%2C+but+demand+peaked+quite+rapidly+to+10%26nbsp%3B000+boards+and+5+years+later+they+have+sold+over+15+million+units+around+the+world.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+the+event%2C+RS+Components+and+Entelect+Software+representatives+shared+their+expert+knowledge+with+the+participants+to+provide+some+insight+on+where+to+next+with+each+of+the+projects+presented.+Projects+were+judged+by+a+panel+according+to+predetermined+criteria%2C+such+as%2C+novelty%2C+creativity%2C+technology+choices%2C+user+experience%2C+simplicity+and+future+potential.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecond+place+went+to+Gareth+Stephenson%2C+who+presented+his+%26lsquo%3BPi+Cluster%26rsquo%3B+project+which+tested+the+concept+of+cluster+computing+using+Raspberry+Pis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThird+place+went+to%3A+Schalk+van+Heerden+with+his+%26lsquo%3BCherry+Pi+Brewery%26rsquo%3B+project+which+is+a+prototype+concept+for+a+fully+automated+micro-brewery.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOther+notable+projects+were%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+self-driving+car%2C+developed+by+Philip+Booysen.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+offline+library+developed+for+underprivileged+students%2C+designed+by+Yoshiaki+Nagasawa%2C+a+Japanese+student%2C+currently+living+in+Cape+Town.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EExplaining+where+the+idea+came+from+to+host+the+first+Raspberry+Jam+in+South+Africa%2C+Brian+Andrew%2C+General+Manager%2C+RS+Components+South+Africa%2C+said%3A+%26ldquo%3BSince+the+day+the+Raspberry+Pi+was+launched+in+South+Africa+in+2012%2C+it+was+an+instant+hit+with+design+engineers%2C+makers+and+anyone+who+loves+tech+gadgets+because+of+its+cost+and+the+fact+that+it+functions+as+a+mini+computer.+Although+it+was+initially+designed+to+promote+STEM+learning+and+coding%2C+it+has+successfully+been+used+in+both+business+and+home+applications.+We+realised+that+as+a+global+distributor+of+the+Pi+computer+board%2C+we+needed+to+initiate+a+platform+in+South+Africa+for+Pi+fanatics+to+get+together+and+share+their+knowledge+and+ideas.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMark+Beets%2C+General+Manager+at+Entelect+Software%2C+agreed%3A+%26ldquo%3BWe%26rsquo%3Bre+passionate+about+the+future+of+technology+and%2C+for+us%2C+this+means+doing+whatever+we+can+to+help+the+tech+community+grow%2C+and+creating+environments+where+people+can+share+their+innovations+with+like-minded+people.+The+Raspberry+Pi+is+an+awesome+tool+that+enables+tech+enthusiasts+to+create+some+really+cool+innovations%2C+which+is+exactly+what+we+saw+today.%26rdquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+the+date+for+the+next+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+set+yet%2C+there+are+plans+in+the+pipeline.+Both+Andrew+and+Beets+agree+that+these+community+platforms+are+where+some+of+the+best+innovations+happen%2C+so+watch+this+space.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+would+like+to+be+informed+about+future+Raspberry+Pi+Jams%2C+please+register+on+the+following+link%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FRPiJamSA%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FRPiJamSA%3C%2Fa%3E.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

How+the+blockchain+can+put+an+end+to+identity+theft %3Cp%3EYou+and+I+could+be+among+the+30%26nbsp%3Bmillion+South+Africans+whose+personal+information+was+compromised+in+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.itweb.co.za%2Findex.php%3Foption%3Dcom_content%26amp%3Bview%3Darticle%26amp%3Bid%3D165695%22%3Ecountry%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+data+breach%3C%2Fa%3E+to+date.+Look+at+that+number+again%3A+30+million+%26ndash%3B+more+than+half+of+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+population.+Actually%2C+the+security+researcher+who+exposed+the+breach+%26ndash%3B+let%26rsquo%3Bs+call+them+the+Hunt+Files%2C+after+the+researcher+%26ndash%3B+expects+this+number+to+be+a+lot+higher.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+very+real+possibility+that+our+information+is+on+that+list%3A+our+ID+numbers%2C+names%2C+addresses%2C+genders%2C+birth+dates%2C+ethnicities%2C+occupations%2C+marital+status+and+more.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EGreatest+threat%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+hack+has+brought+cybersecurity+into+the+spotlight+once+again.+South+Africa+has+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fmybroadband.co.za%2Fnews%2Findustrynews%2F219598-cyber-theft-the-fastest-growing-crime-around-the-globe.html%22%3Ethird+highest+number+of+cybercrime+victims+worldwide%3C%2Fa%3E+and+loses+more+than+R2.2+billion+to+internet+fraud+and+phishing+attacks+annually%2C+according+to+the+South+African+Banking+Risk+Information+Centre.+Gartner+predicts+that+cybercrime+might+become+the+greatest+threat+to+every+person%2C+place+and+thing+in+the+world+within+the+next+five+years.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EClearly%2C+something+has+to+change.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EEnter+the+blockchain%2C+a+shared%2C+digital%2C+decentralised%2C+secure+online+ledger+that+facilitates+online+transactions+%26ndash%3B+and+not+just+monetary+ones.+Had+the+Hunt+Files+been+stored+on+the+blockchain%2C+the+hack+would+never+have+happened.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EHere%26rsquo%3Bs+why%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EDecentralised%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Hunt+Files+were+stored+on+a+central+database+with+questionable+security%2C+which+is+why+it+was+possible+to+access+all+the+information+easily+and+in+one+go.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+is+stored+on+a+decentralised+database+%26ndash%3B+the+blockchain%2C+comprising+thousands+%26ndash%3B+if+not+hundreds+of+thousands+%26ndash%3B+of+nodes%2C+scattered+all+over+the+world.+An+attacker+will+need+to+control+more+than+51%25+of+the+nodes+in+order+to+compromise+the+database%2C+and+the+chance+of+that+happening+is+virtually+impossible.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3ESecure%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+uses+public-key+cryptography%2C+which+is+one+of+the+strongest+form+of+encryptions+available+today.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+used+to+secure+websites%2C+certificates+and+just+about+everything+on+the+Internet.+Together+with+the+decentralised+nature+of+the+blockchain%2C+this+means+that+not+even+the+combined+power+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+supercomputers+could+crack+the+chain.+It+has+stood+the+test+of+time+for+the+past+nine+years%2C+securing+hundreds+of+billions+of+dollars%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+the+blockchain%2C+our+data+is+%26ldquo%3Bowned%26rdquo%3B+by+hundreds+of+different+service+providers+%26ndash%3B+banks%2C+telcos%2C+e-commerce+stores+and+more.+This+means+our+information+is+stored+on+potentially+thousands+of+different+databases+that%2C+hopefully%2C+have+robust+security+in+place.+Clearly%2C+some+don%26rsquo%3Bt.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EPower+shift%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+blockchain+%26ndash%3B+and+with+apps+like+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.civic.com%2F%22%3ECivic%3C%2Fa%3E+%26ndash%3B+consumers+regain+control+of+their+data.+They+decide+who+can+access+it%2C+for+what+purposes+and+for+how+long.+And%2C+when+we+no+longer+need+the+service+%28e.g.+we+switch+banks%29%2C+we+take+our+information+with+us%2C+rather+than+leaving+a+copy+of+it+on+the+bank%26rsquo%3Bs+database.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3ECivic+makes+it+as+easy+to+log+into+a+website+as+it+is+to+log+in+with+Facebook%2C+except+our+information+is+stored+on+our+phones+and+not+in+a+public+database.+When+we+log+in+with+Civic%2C+we+scan+a+barcode+on+the+website+that+allows+the+site+to+only+access+the+bare+minimum+information.+If+it+only+needs+our+email+address+to+log+in%2C+that%26rsquo%3Bs+all+it+gets.+If+we+were+to+log+in+with+Facebook%2C+we+share+a+lot+more+about+ourselves+than+the+site+needs+to+know+%26ndash%3B+like+personal+information%2C+interests+and+connections.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+next+year%2C+Civic+will+be+able+to+process+Know+Your+Customer+%28KYC%29+and+anti-money-laundering+%28AML%29+requests%2C+making+it+a+viable+option+for+quick%2C+cheap+and+secure+compliance+and+regulatory+verifications.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EChallenges%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+biggest+challenge+hampering+the+wide+scale+uptake+of+the+blockchain+is+throughput.+The+fastest+blockchain+platforms+currently+available+can+process+around+1%2C000+transactions+a+second.+When+we+first+started+using+blockchain+for+transaction+processing%2C+it+could+only+handle+around+seven+transactions+%26ndash%3B+making+it+ideal+for+the+processing+of+cryptocurrency+transactions+at+the+time.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+we%26rsquo%3Bve+come+a+long+way+in+a+short+space+of+time%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+still+far+from+the+40%2C000+transactions+processed+every+second+by+the+likes+of+Visa+and+Mastercard.+But+at+the+current+rate+of+development%2C+we+anticipate+serious+contenders+by+the+end+of+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EStart+now%2C+start+here%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+people+still+believe+that+the+blockchain+only+has+financial+applications.+But+because+of+the+reduced+cost+and+ease+of+developing+decentralised+apps+%28Dapps%29%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+already+seeing+a+lot+more+use+cases%2C+across+every+industry%2C+including+government%2C+healthcare%2C+manufacturing%2C+supply+chain+and+identify+verification.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3ELike+the+Internet+of+Things%2C+artificial+intelligence+and+machine+learning%2C+the+blockchain+is+going+to+radically+change+many+industries%2C+and+now+is+as+good+a+time+as+any+for+businesses+to+start+exploring+its+use+cases+and+opportunities+%26ndash%3B+especially+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+still+running+their+operations+on+legacy+infrastructure.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EBefore+embarking+on+a+blockchain+project%2C+ensure+your+team+has+the+skills+to+develop+Dapps+and+that+they+understand+cryptography.+Chances+are%2C+if+you+handle+any+kind+of+sensitive+information%2C+the+blockchain+will+provide+an+unmatched+level+of+security+and+user+control%2C+helping+you+to+meet+governance+requirements+and+to+gain+the+trust+of+your+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+is+going+to+fundamentally+challenge+traditional+power+structures+by+giving+control+of+information+back+to+the+consumer.+Innovating+in+this+space+is+a+business%26rsquo%3B+best+defence+mechanism.+If+businesses+don%26rsquo%3Bt+embrace+the+blockchain%2C+they+may+very+likely+have+their+own+Kodak+moment.%3C%2Fp%3E
Wahjid+Nasser+%28Entelect%2C+Technical+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Somebody+could+be+using+your+personal+information+right+now+to+commit+fraud.+The+scary+thing+is%2C+you+wouldn%E2%80%99t+know+until+it+was+too+late+%E2%80%93+maybe+you+get+a+credit+card+bill+running+into+the+thousands+or+an+exorbitant+cellphone+account+for+a+number+you+don%E2%80%99t+own.

What+will+the+skills+base+of+the+future+look+like%3F %3Cp%3EThe+workforce+of+the+future+is+going+to+be+dependent+on+its+adaptability.+While+it%26rsquo%3Bs+true+that+many+jobs+of+today+will+no+longer+exist%2C+in+the+short+term%2C+one+should+worry+less+about+the+relevance+of+a+current+job+and+rather+focus+on+priming+the+next+generation+to+follow+careers+that+meet+the+needs+of+the+technology+revolution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+today%26rsquo%3Bs+job+market%2C+many+jobs+include+manual+labour%2C+tedious+repetition+of+tasks%2C+or+basic+decision-making%2C+all+of+which+are+prime+for+replacement+via+automation+or+artificial+intelligence.+This+is+because+a+machine+will+almost+always+be+better+in+performance+at+jobs+of+this+nature.+Equally+however%2C+with+the+rise+of+automation+and+artificial+intelligence%2C+jobs+involving+architecting+systems%2C+and+systems+maintenance%2C+will+become+more+important.%26nbsp%3B+People+are+also+required+to+have+a+deep+understanding+of+domains%2C+the+ability+to+make+strategic+decisions%2C+and+translate+a+strategy+into+something+that+machines+can+understand+and+can+work+towards.+So%2C+these+roles+will+remain+crucial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+name+explicit+jobs+of+the+future%2C+some+essential+skills+will+be+required%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+IT+and+domain-based+skills.+The+ability+to+understand+intricacies+in+different+domains+is+important+to+ensure+that+the+technology+we+build+to+address+problems+is+suitable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+Communication+skills+are+vital+in+translating+ideas+and+a+strategic+vision+to+something+tangible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+The+ability+to+apply+logic%2C+as+well+as+strong+problem-solving+abilities%2C+are+needed+to+design%2C+engineer%2C+and+bring+these+technologies+to+life.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreativity+is+also+something+difficult+to+simulate+in+a+machine.+The+ideation+of+possibilities+whilst+simultaneously+considering+the+impacts+of+it+is+a+complex+thought-process+which+is+difficult+to+simulate+in+a+machine.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+a+study+conducted+by+Ad+agency%2C+McCann%2C+in+Japan%2C+pitched+its+creative+planner+to+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+first+AI+creative+director+to+develop+a+TV+commercial.+In+an+anonymous+vote+the+AI+creative+director%26rsquo%3Bs+TV+Ad+won%2C+using+only+algorithms+to+respond+to+the+brief+and+determine+the+elements+of+the+TV+Ad.+However%2C+in+creative+scenarios+such+as+this%2C+the+algorithms+will+be+created+by+humans%2C+so+arguably%2C+people+remain+at+the+heart+of+AI%26rsquo%3Bs+efficacy+and+humans+with+these+skills+remain+important+for+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+concept%2C+of+technology+replacing+the+human+mind%2C+is+a+definite+possibility+in+the+distant+future.+We+may+be+able+to+upload+our+minds+to+machines%2C+we+may+develop+algorithms+that+learn+how+to+think+generally+like+humans+do.+There+are+many+examples+of+early+stages+of+general+intelligence+technology+today+such+as+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+Alpha+Go.+Currently%2C+we+are+harnessing+automation+and+artificial+intelligence+to+tackle+narrow+domains+and+contexts.+As+we+get+better+at+building+these+systems%2C+a+more+general+intelligence+similar+to+the+human+mind+becomes+more+realistic.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+longer+term%2C+individuals+who+want+to+remain+relevant+and+an+asset+to+their+organisation+need+to+undergo+a+mind+shift.+Fundamentally%2C+it+all+comes+down+to+one+thing%3A+Innovation+and+future+thinking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+being+open+to+change+and+harnessing+it+for+the+benefit+of+the+organisation%2C+every+person+can+be+an+asset.+Being+stuck+in+a+traditional+way+of+thinking+and+doing+things+quickly+becomes+a+hindrance+to+innovation.+Often%2C+an+organisation+can+operate+fine%2C+unaware+of+its+sloth%2C+until+it%26rsquo%3Bs+disrupted+by+another+organisation+that+embraces+innovation.+By+that+time%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+too+late.+Companies+need+to+invest+in+skunk+works%2C+or+at+least+the+culture+that+encourages+people+to+innovate+from+within+because+organisations+also+have+a+role+to+play+in+developing+the+skills+of+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+open+to+rethinking+the+way+we+work%2C+the+value+we+add%2C+and+the+vision+we+work+towards+is+almost+expected+for+the+future+of+an+organisation.+Be+part+of+the+revolution%2C+or+be+consumed+by+it.%3C%2Fp%3E

Pair-programming+makes+light%28er%29+work+of+sprint+zero %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Kale-Ab+Tessera+%28Entelect%2C+Intermediate+Software+Engineer%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+Engineers+are+notorious+for+being+antisocial.+We+are+known+to+work+in+isolation%2C+with+our+headphones+on+and+enough+coffee+and+snacks+to+sustain+us.+However%2C+with+the+increased+adoption+of+Agile+and+Extreme+Programming%2C+pair+programming+has+increased+in+popularity%2C+challenging+the+lone-programmer+mindset.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMy+team+and+I+were+challenged+to+deliver+an+MVP+in+16+weeks+for+a+large+South+African+mobile+communications+company.+The+challenges+included+a+tight+timeline%2C+high-quality+delivery%2C+acute+and+effective+problem-solving+and+somewhere+amongst+all+this%2C+team+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESprint+zero+is+often+the+hardest+%26ndash%3B+in+order+to+develop+a+MVP%2C+teams+have+to+conduct+client+interviews%2C+story+mapping+with+UX+designs%2C+setup+of+the+delivery+pipeline+for+the+squad%2C+continuous+Integration+and+delivery%2C+deployments%2C+identifying+and+implementing+communication+channels+such+as+Slack%2C+with+integrations+into+the+delivery+pipeline.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEssentially%2C+pair+programming+is+where+two+people+simultaneously+working+together+on+the+same+piece+of+code.+One+person+%28the+driver%29+codes%2C+while+another+person+%28the+navigator%29+makes+suggestions%2C+corrections+and+improvements+to+the+code+written.+These+two+roles+can+also+switch+at+certain+intervals+allowing+both+individuals+to+get+a+chance+at+coding+and%2C+making+suggestions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+believed+pair-programming+would+help+overcome+key+challenges+synonymous+with+%26lsquo%3Bsprint+zero%26rsquo%3B%2C+such+as+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+code+quality%2C+and+team+communication%2C+but+we+uncovered+some+other+benefits+along+the+way+too.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdopting+new+technology+and+acquiring+new+skills%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+this+project%2C+many+of+the+team+were+new+to+React+and+Spring+Boot.+Pair+programming+allowed+us+to+learn+and+rapidly+distribute+our+knowledge+in+the+team.+Once+someone+had+learned+how+a+part+of+a+framework+works%2C+he%2Fshe+would+pair+with+an+individual+who+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+and+this+would+quickly+distribute+the+knowledge+in+the+team%2C+meaning+in+a+few+weeks%2C+we+all+knew+the+fundamentals+of+the+frameworks+we+were+using.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlong+with+quick+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+this+approach+also+reduces+key+man+dependency%2C+whereby+only+one+individual+knows+how+a+certain+part+of+a+system+works.+Pair+programming+transforms+the+effectiveness+of+the+entire+team+by+ensuring+at+least+two+people+have+seen+or+worked+through+each+part+of+the+system.+Distribution+of+knowledge+also+supports+the+development+of+high-quality+code+under+tight+deadlines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+advantage+we+had+as+a+result+of+pair+programming+was+increased+project+momentum.+We+have+all+been+in+situations+where+we+have+spent+too+much+time+stuck+on+a+technical+task.+Rather+than+asking+a+coworker+for+help%2C+we+tend+to+push+through+and+waste+valuable+time.+Pair+programming+ensures+that+if+one+person+is+stuck+or+struggling%2C+another+person+is+able+to+help+or+is+at+least+aware+of+the+situation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaintaining+code+quality%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESixteen+weeks+is+a+tight+deadline+for+any+team+to+develop+a+MVP+and+makes+achieving+good+code+quality+quite+difficult.+In+addition+to+Unit%2C+Integration+and+Acceptance+Tests%2C+pair+programming+allowed+us+to+ensure+quality+was+maintained+as+we+coded+in+pairs+and+checked+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+code+and+logic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+inevitable+that+having+multiple+people+working+on+the+same+piece+of+code%2C+increases+the+likelihood+to+pick+up+bugs+earlier%2C+while+decreases+the+chance+of+using+obscure+hacks+%28two+people+need+to+agree+to+these+hacks%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFurthermore%2C+both+parties+can+share+their+knowledge%2C+tips+and+tricks+with+one+another%2C+creating+a+code+base+using+the+shared+knowledge+of+both+parties.+Even+the+intern+could+teach+you+about+some+design+pattern+or+tool+he+or+she+read+about+the+night+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETeam+communication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEffective+team+communication+is+a+critical+part+of+any+successful+project.+Pair+programming+encourages+individuals+to+discuss+problems+together+and+solve+them+in+a+way+that+both+parties+are+happy.+This+also+ensures+a+better+spread+of+knowledge+of+what+is+going+on+in+the+system%2C+ensuring+that+more+people+are+in+the+loop+with+the+inner+working+of+the+system+and+what+the+business+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+was+especially+relevant+to+our+project%2C+as+it+had+complicated+business+rules%2C+which+the+team+needed+to+master+quickly.+When+pairing%2C+we+would+spread+and+build+on+our+understanding+of+these+complicated+rules+and+we+could+discuss+possible+ways+of+representing+these+rules.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWorking+in+tight-knit+pairs+and+communicating+closely+also+helps+keep+the+teams+focused.+We+found+that+it+is+much+easier+for+a+pair+to+stay+highly+focused+for+longer%2C+than+a+larger+team+where+people+work+as+individuals+and+some+people+on+the+periphery+fade+away.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+perfect+solution%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENaturally%2C%26nbsp%3B+there+are+risks+too.+The+most+significant+risk+with+pair-programming+that+we+have+identified+is+slower+development+time.+Research+has+shown+that+pair+programming+has+a+15%25+development+time+cost+%28https%3A%2F%2Fcollaboration.csc.ncsu.edu%2Flaurie%2FPapers%2FXPSardinia.PDF%29.+This+is+because+less+tasks+can+be+worked+on+concurrently.+Additionally%2C+whether+it+is+due+to+different+experience%2C+skill+levels+or+just+programming+speed%2C+pair+programming+can+also+slow+down+the+faster+of+the+pair.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAdditionally%2C+Pair+programming+inherently+involves+a+lot+of+discussion%2C+but+it+is+important+to+ensure+majority+of+this+talk+is+related+to+tackling+the+issues+at+hand.+A+major+risk+of+pair+programming%2C+is+having+one+person+doing+all+the+work+or+driving%2C+while+the+other+individual+is+disinterested+or+on+their+phones.+This+could+lead+to+a+wasted+resource+and+no+real+value+received+from+pair+programming.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd+we+know+that+some+engineers+prefer+working+alone%2C+so+Pair+Programming+will+be+a+big+shift+for+some+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUndeniably%2C+Pair+Programming+is+an+investment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+with+the+possible+risks+of+slightly+slower+development+times%2C+workload+imbalance+or+off+topic+discussions%2C+pair+programming+can+increase+quality+of+code+and+ultimately+saves+time+and+money.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPair+programming+should+definitely+be+viewed+as+an+investment.+The+longer-term+advantages+of+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+code+quality+and+bug+fixes%2C+along+with+team+communication+and+problem-solving+capabilities%2C+converts+a+15%25+development+time+cost%2C+into+an+investment+in+the+present+and+future+capabilities+of+any+team.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+still+need+to+have+the+discipline+and+the+people+skills+to+make+sure+pair+programming+is+beneficial.+In+situations+where+pair+programming+is+not+possible%2C+teams+could+ensure+thorough+code+reviews+are+done+so+that+all+code+has+been+checked+or+at+least+seen+by+more+than+one+person.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIs+pair+programming+suited+for+your+team%3F+Well%2C+maybe.+It+worked+well+for+our+team+and+allowed+us+to+build+a+good+quality+MVP%2C+with+majority+of+the+team+having+a+good+idea+of+the+system+as+a+whole.+Why+not+give+it+a+try%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCuttingthroughthehypeofAI-06.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArtificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+has+erupted+as+an+industry+trend+over+the+last+two+years%2C+with+a+clear+confusion+about+what+AI+really+means+to+us+as+consumers+and+businesses.+Are+robots+coming+for+all+of+our+jobs%3F+Do+we+have+to+prepare+for+the+rise+of+the+machines%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+think+a+key+challenge+we+face%2C+especially+as+technology+experts+in+industry+right+now%2C+is+to+demystify+AI+for+our+customers+and+partners.+AI+is+not+a+single+technology%2C+but+rather+a+number+of+different+technologies+applied+in+different+functions+through+various+applications.+We+need+to+separate+applications+of+it+into+layman%26rsquo%3Bs+terms%2C+being+careful+not+to+follow+the+rabbit+hole+with+wild+ideas%2C+costing+lots+and+changing+little.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Looking+at+the+recent+Gartner+hype+cycle%2C+their+research+indicates+that+many+of+the+applications+of+AI+will+be+rounding+the+top+of+their+hype+cycle+imminently+%28excluding+general+intelligence%2C+which+is+an+entirely+different+concept.%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FhypecycleR.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+means+there+is+a+small+window+of+opportunity+remaining+to+leverage+the+AI+buzz+with+executives%2C+customers+and+other+stakeholders+before+it+slips+into+the+%26lsquo%3BTrough+of+Disillusionment%26rsquo%3B%2C+making+justification+for+new+projects+very+difficult.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+if+AI+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+this+magic+potion+which+turns+every+product+into+a+runaway+success%2C+how+does+one+even+begin+to+clarify+which+ideas+within+AI+have+real+merit+and+long-term+potential+as+a+new+product+or+upliftment+to+your+business%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Employ+a+pragmatic+approach+to+compare+the+flawed+ideas+from+the+differentiators+with+value.+Consider+the+following+when+preparing+for+your+next+AI-inclusive+software+project%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3ELeverage+AI+within+strategic+initiatives%3A+What+are+the+big+ticket+items+in+the+organisational+strategy%3F+This+is+where+any+AI+solution+should+be+explored.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+lose+focus+on+the+mission+critical+priorities+just+to+introduce+AI+as+a+side-line+initiative.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EUnderstand+how+the+given+AI+solution+will+solve+a+specific+challenge%3A+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+get+lost+in+the+case+studies+and+magic+marketing%2C+especially+from+the+big+players.+But+ensure+there+is+a+set+objective+which+can+and+will+be+met.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EBe+critical+when+weighing+up+solutions+with+and+without+AI%3A+Consider+whether+there+is+any+material+benefit+to+justify+the+costs.+You+might+find+that+a+%26lsquo%3Bsimple%26rsquo%3B%2C+non-AI+solution+solves+the+problem+without+any+fuss.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EHave+evaluations+in+place%3A+Ensure+you+are+clear+about+success+criteria%2C+and+have+specific+and+measurable+outcomes+in+place+for+the+AI+components.+The+benefits+of+the+AI+solution+should+be+measurable+against+the+criteria+and+it+should+be+evident+that+the+product+owner+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+only+using+AI+for+the+sake+of+it.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3ESpend+time+on+understanding+the+AI+solution%3A+It+is+important+for+businesses+to+note+that+the+product+will+be+radically+different+from+their+usual+technological+enhancements.+Product+owners+should+take+the+time+to+research+and+understand+the+AI+solution%2C+which+will+enable+them+to+make+informed+decisions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whether+creating+new+digital+experiences+for+clients%2C+more+accurate+predictions%2C+or+innovative+ways+to+interact%2C+AI+is+already+changing+the+face+of+industries+and+should+be+utilised.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately%2C+as+a+participant+in+the+global+technology+industry%2C+at+Entelect+we+have+a+responsibility+to+help+our+clients+and+partners+cut+through+the+hype%2C+and+find+real+and+impactful+applications+of+AI+which+can+make+it+into+production.%3C%2Fp%3E

od%2C+blockchain+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+it.+West+Virginia+announced+that+they+would+be+the+first+US+state+to+experiment+with+blockchain+during+their+midterm+elections%2C+allowing+people+serving+in+the+military+to+vote+via+a+smartphone+app.+But+experts+in+both+cybersecurity+and+voting+see+blockchains+as+needlessly+complicated%2C+and+no+more+secure+than+other+online+ballots.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBlockchain+would+work+for+recording+votes%2C+but+would+need+additional+layers+of+technology+for+more+complex+challenges+such+as+voter+validation%2C+ballot+anonymity%2C+and+letting+voters+verify+whether+their+votes+were+recorded.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+final+results+would+be+stored+on+the+blockchain+so+you+can+have+a+permanent+record+of+the+final+result%2C+but+this+does+not+guarantee+that+the+votes+hadn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+altered+before+they+went+on+the+blockchain.+Simply+put%2C+blockchain+would+not+solve+the+double-voting+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+organisations+looking+to+use+blockchain+technology+to+build+products+which+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+blockchain%2C+gain+nothing+from+it%2C+and+in+some+cases+are+worse+off+because+of+it.+To+help+you%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+sharing+some+of+our+experiences.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+below+flowchart+has+a+list+of+questions+you+need+to+ask+before+using+blockchain+to+ensure+your+product+needs+and+benefits+from+the+technology%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBlockchainflowdiagram.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELooking+at+this%2C+the+salad+restaurant+chain+wouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+made+it+past+the+first+question%2C+and+secure+voting+has+major+problems+at+the+last+three%2C+as+well+as+a+technical+weakness+just+getting+votes+into+the+blockchain+to+start+with.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBlockchain+is+no+silver+bullet+and+more+often+than+not%2C+there+is+a+simpler+alternative.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+be+wooed+by+the+latest+trending+technologies+promising+industry+disruption%2C+but+you+need+to+think+critically+about+how+the+technology+would+help+you.+A+useful+rule+of+thumb+is+to+always+determine+which+distinct+advantages+the+new+technology+brings+with+it%2C+along+with+the+problems.+Overlooking+a+potential+technology+mismatch+in+a+rush+to+get+a+solution+out+is+a+sure+way+to+end+up+over+invested+in+a+product+which+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+fit+for+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

4+ways+to+future-proof+your+IoT+solution%2C+and+avoid+obsolescence. %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F4waystofuture-proofyourIoTSolution-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29+is+evolving+rapidly+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+say+what+things+may+look+like+in+a+year+or+two%2C+much+less+in+the+next+decade.+One+of+the+biggest+concerns+for+organisations+is+buying+what+soon+becomes+functionally+or+technologically+obsolete%2C+but+continually+deferring+to+invest+in+IoT+could+lead+to+analysis+paralysis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisations+understanding+the+use+cases+and+potential+of+IoT+are+the+organisations+that+will+likely+drive+innovation+over+the+next+decade.+IoT+is+enabling+businesses+in+numerous+industries+to+prevail+%26ndash%3B+especially+industries+you+would+not+typically+associate+with+this+technology.+Manufacturing+plants+are+using+machine+learning+and+smart+sensors+in+their+manufacturing+process%2C+farmers+are+using+IoT+to+meet+growing+agricultural+demands%2C+and+oil+and+gas+companies+use+IoT+devices+to+optimise+drilling+procedures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+below+graph+showcases+the+worldwide+IoT+spend+per+industry+in+2015%2C+as+well+as+the+predicted+spend+for+2020.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIoTGraphFinal.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+biggest+spenders+over+the+last+few+years+have+been+the+manufacturing+and+logistics+industries%2C+due+to+the+fact+that+the+industrial+world+comes+with+decades+of+legacy+equipment+and+existing+infrastructure+that+cannot+be+replaced+easily+or+cost+effectively.+After+dealing+with+the+replacement+and+integration+of+legacy+systems%2C+how+are+these+industries+ensuring+successful+IoT+adoption+while+still+avoiding+obsolescence%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnlike+more+established+technologies%2C+the+immature+and+fast-evolving+nature+of+IoT+solutions+increases+the+risk+of+early+obsolescence.+In+the+age+of+IoT+cloud-based+solutions%2C+future-proofing+is+a+continuous+process+to+maximise+solution+adaptability%2C+while+still+managing+risk.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBelow+are+four+considerations+to+keep+in+mind+to+ensure+a+future-proofed+IoT+landscape.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSecurity%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Masses+of+data+means+masses+of+potential+security+threats%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There%26rsquo%3Bs+a+quip+that+goes%3A+The+%26lsquo%3BS%26rsquo%3B+in+IoT+stands+for+%26lsquo%3Bsecurity%26rsquo%3B.+This+is+because+IoT+adoption+is+widely+criticised+for+the+lack+of+security.+Having+an+IoT+solution+that+does+not+start+with+security+as+first+priority+%26ndash%3B+addressing+authentication%2C+authorisation%2C+and+encryption+of+data+%26ndash%3B+will+not+only+lead+to+obsolescence%2C+but+will+also+risk+putting+the+entire+solution+at+risk.+Future-proofing+your+IoT+security+will+ensure+that+customers%26rsquo%3B+personal+details+don%26rsquo%3Bt+get+leaked.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BScalability%3Cbr+%2F%3E+IoT+solutions+should+be+based+on+horizontally+scaling+architectures%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+the+IoT+wave+growing+quicker+than+expected%2C+there+has+not+only+been+an+increase+in+devices%2C+but+also+an+increase+in+the+amount+of+data+that+is+being+transferred.+There+are+many+considerations+that+go+into+building+up+an+IoT+infrastructure+that+can+scale%2C+but+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+lot+more+to+consider+than+simply+scaling+servers.+Designing+an+infrastructure+that+can+scale+will+help+ensure+the+success+of+the+business+that+is+built+upon+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFlexibility%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Rapidly+adopt+new+devices%2C+protocols+and+integration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+more+IoT+applications+emerge%2C+architectures+need+to+be+flexible+enough+to+adapt+to+varying+requirements+and+feature+sets.+There+will+undoubtably+be+new+devices+entering+your+ecosystem+and+your+IoT+solution+must+be+prepared+to+handle+those+devices.+A+lack+of+flexibility+will+result+in+the+rapid+aging+and+obsolescence+of+your+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPortability%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+single+deployment+model+is+not+enough%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+universal+shift+to+the+cloud+is+challenging+for+many+large+enterprises.+For+those+looking+to+build+future-proof+IoT%2C+leveraging+cloud-based+technologies+and+the+application+of+real-time+data+analysis+can+enable+autonomous+decision-making%2C+and+create+the+potential+for+new+services+and+revenue+streams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFortunately%2C+the+frameworks+provided+by+major+technology+players+have+recently+matured.+The+Platform-as-a-Service+offerings+from+Microsoft%2C+Amazon%2C+Google+and+Apache+are+now+truly+production+ready.+They+have+a+large+amount+of+infrastructure%2C+data+and+network+heavy-lifting+available+out+the+box%2C+and+pre-configured+solutions+available+for+other+areas+in+some+instances.+There+are+essentially+fewer+breaking+changes+which+would+affect+your+product%2C+so+there+has+never+been+a+better+time+to+pursue+an+IoT+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFuture-proofing+your+IoT+infrastructure+is+achievable+as+long+as+your+organisation+is+thoroughly+prepared+for+the+changes+that+IoT+brings%2C+or+you+have+an+expert+technology+partner+who+can+guide+you+through+these+four+critical+aspects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+is+an+end-to-end+technology+services+provider+delivering+custom+software+across+all+industry+sectors.+Entelect+has+developed+several+large+IoT+enterprise+solutions%2C+leveraging+modern+cloud+infrastructure+to+ensure+future-proofing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFind+us+at%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.entelect.co.za+%3C%2Fa%3E%2F+%3Ca+href%3D%22mailto%3Asolutions%40entelect.co.za%22%3Esolutions%40entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
The+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29+is+evolving+rapidly+and+it%E2%80%99s+difficult+to+say+what+things+may+look+like+in+a+year+or+two%2C+much+less+in+the+next+decade.+One+of+the+biggest+concerns+for+organisations+is+buying+what+soon+becomes+functionally+or+technologically+obsolete%2C+but+continually+deferring+to+invest+in+IoT+could+lead+to+analysis+paralysis.
