4 ways to future-proof your IoT Solution - FINAL.p...
    
A+look+at+feature+stores+to+enable+machine+learning %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FAlookatfeaturestorestoenablemachinelearning-FINAL1.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWorking+with+data+is+messy+and+getting+it+ready+for+any+kind+of+model+building+is+a+painstaking+and+time-consuming+process.+Building+feature+stores+is+meant+to+optimize+this+process+for+all+machine+learning+teams+in+an+organization.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+concept+of+a+feature+store+is+growing+in+popularity+with+Uber+introducing+the+concept+in+2017+as+part+of+the+data+management+layer+in+their+machine+learning+platform%2C+Michelangelo.+Netflix+used+a+similar+concept+called+a+feature+encoder+in+their+time+machine%2C+Delorean.+Other+companies+embracing+feature+stores+include+Linkedin+and+Airbnb.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+is+a+feature+store%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+feature+store+is+a+curated+collection+of+pre-computed+features%2C+stored+in+a+centralized+location.+Features+are+calculated+by+joining+raw+data+sources+and+transforming+them+into+formats+that+can+be+interpreted+by+machine+learning+models.+They+are+then+stored+under+descriptive+names+in+a+central+location%2C+making+them+identifiable+and+accessible+to+the+teams+using+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+addition+to+storing+the+features%2C+the+feature+store+has+the+functionality+to+continuously+update+the+feature+calculations+as+new+data+is+added+and+track+that+data+lineage.+They+also+have+the+functionality+to+create+new+features+and+backfill+them+using+the+historical+data.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBut+what+is+it+for%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Data+scientists+at+Airbnb+spend+up+to+60%25+of+their+time+engineering+features+to+be+used+for+machine+learning+and+Uber+says+during+model+training+the+most+time+is+spent+transforming+and+selecting+features.+Creating+these+features+is+a+fundamental+part+of+the+machine+learning+workflow+but+also+a+an+inefficient+one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Feature+stores+solve+several+problems+in+the+machine+learning+workflow%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+If+features+are+calculated+ad-hoc+as+part+of+the+pipeline%2C+they+are+difficult+to+reuse+across+different+pipelines.+This+wastes+time+and+resources+during+the+experimentation+phase.+Feature+stores+standardize+how+features+are+accessed+and+make+them+reusable+across+pipelines+and+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+It+allows+teams+to+share+insights+by+including+new+features+that+they+have+found+useful+in+the+store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+Feature+stores+also+create+a+consistency+in+data.+Various+teams+may+unknowingly+be+creating+the+same+features%2C+a+waste+of+resources+but+also+various+implementations+may+produce+different+results+obscuring+the+definition+and+understanding+of+the+feature+to+the+teams+and+the+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+4.+Features+are+automatically+updated+when+new+data+comes+in%2C+but+the+data+lineage+is+tracked.+This+way+teams+do+not+have+to+redo+all+the+calculations+to+update+their+features%2C+but+they+can+still+replicate+experiments+from+before+data+updates+occur.+This+is+important+for+explaining+model+decisions+and+tracking+model+performance+over+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+5.+Features+calculated+during+the+experimentation+phase+in+the+data+scientists+preferred+language+may+not+be+perfectly+replicable+in+the+production+system.+This+causes+an+inconsistency+in+the+features+used+for+training+and+those+calculated+for+live+predictions.+Performance+of+a+model+is+then+difficult+to+measure+accurately+until+it+is+deployed%2C+which+can+be+a+costly+mistake.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+feature+store+makes+it+possible+for+teams+to+search+through+a+catalogue+of+features+for+what+they+need.+Teams+can+gain+insight+from+other+teams+by+browsing+the+existing+features+or+sharing+their+own+when+they+add+new+ones.+The+time+saved+on+feature+engineering+can+then+be+dedicated+to+model+building.+Since+this+is+a+very+experimental+process%2C+the+time+added+to+the+model+building+phase+allows+more+ideas+to+be+tested+and+a+better+solution+built.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOff-the-shelf+or+custom-built%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Netflix%2C+Uber%2C+and+Airbnb+have+all+created+their+own+custom+feature+store+implementations.+Since+these+companies+were+at+the+forefront%2C+they+did+not+have+an+off-the-shelf+solution+available+to+them.+However%2C+not+every+company+needs+a+completely+custom-built+option+and+now+there+are+off-the-shelf+options+available.+Open-source+feature+store+services+are+available+from+Hopsworks+and+Feast+with+Airbnb+planning+to+open+source+their+solution%2C+Zipline%2C+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Building+a+reliable%2C+speedy+feature+store+could+be+a+massive+undertaking+as+it+will+need+to+malleable+enough+to+create+new+features+and+backfill+them%2C+produce+the+results+in+a+reasonable+amount+of+time+and+be+queryable+from+multiple+platforms+and+finally+be+accessible+to+both+offline+sandboxes+and+online+deployed+models.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Off-the-shelf+options+are+faster+to+get+up+and+running+and+will+show+return+on+investment+sooner%2C+but+they+are+still+quite+new+and+there+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+feedback+yet+on+how+they+are+doing+within+organisations+that+have+adopted+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWant+to+read+more%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFeature+Store%3A+the+missing+data+layer+in+ML+pipelines%3F%3A%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.logicalclocks.com%2Ffeature-store%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.logicalclocks.com%2Ffeature-store%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Introducing+Feast%3A%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fintroducing-feast-5eb4d539c13f%22%3E+https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fintroducing-feast-5eb4d539c13f%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Meet+Michelangelo%3A+Uber%26rsquo%3Bs+Machine+Learning+Platform%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Distributed+Time+Travel+for+Feature+Generation%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com%2Fnetflix-techblog%2Fdistributed-time-travel-for-feature-generation-389cccdd3907%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Working+with+data+is+messy+and+getting+it+ready+for+any+kind+of+model+building+is+a+painstaking+and+time-consuming+process.+Building+feature+stores+is+meant+to+optimize+this+process+for+all+machine+learning+teams+in+an+organization.

How+to+create+the+right+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDevOpsCultureArtwork-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDevOps+is+a+cultural+shift.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+a+matter+of+simply+adopting+agile+planning+or+continuous+delivery%2C+although+those+practices+are+certainly+important.+Creating+a+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation+is+about+having+shared+understanding%2C+communication+and+collaboration+between+software+engineers+and+operations%2C+and+sharing+responsibility+for+the+software+they+build.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+such+an+environment+is+a+challenge.+It+requires+assessing+and+realigning+how+people+think+about+their+teams%2C+the+business%2C+and+the+customers.+People+don%26rsquo%3Bt+often+welcome+change%2C+but+it+is+doable+by+following+these+four+steps+to+developing+a+strong+and+effective+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGet+leadership+on+board%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ensuring+you+have+management+buy-in+is+the+first+step.+Without+it+everything+else+will+fail.+Bringing+DevOps+into+your+organisation+involves+cultural+changes+that+are+usually+more+difficult+for+management+to+adapt+to+than+staff.+Taking+a+DevOps+approach+requires+being+comfortable+working+more+transparently+and+requires+management+to+be+comfortable+with+seeing+certain+team+failures+as+growth+opportunities.+A+top-down+approach+to+initiating+a+DevOps+culture+is+the+ideal+way+to+ensure+that+teams+experience+smooth+integration.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BStart+simple%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+with+adopting+any+new+practices%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+not+to+overwhelm+teams+with+sudden%2C+unmanageable+changes.+Explore+the+DevOps+process+with+a+viable+pilot+project+and+constantly+field+feedback+from+team+members+along+the+way.+This+will+allow+you+to+encourage+collaboration+between+teams+and+introduce+reliable+measurements+to+frequently+improve+before+rolling+it+out+to+bigger+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUse+DevOps+to+create+a+culture+of+growth%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Implementing+a+DevOps+culture+is+an+opportunity+to+grow+team+members%2C+expand+skillsets+and+expand+responsibilities.+Ensuring+end-to-end+responsibility+for+products+is+essential+in+an+integrated+team+environment.+This+will+allow+software+engineers+to+not+just+do+repetitive+coding%2C+but+to+take+more+accountability+for+the+whole+solution+including+infrastructure%2C+support+and+tooling.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BBreak+down+silos%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Encourage+forming+horizontal+connections+in+your+company+to+break+down+silos%2C+and+increase+transparency%2C+communication+and+collaboration+across+teams.+Discussions+between+teams+lead+to+valuable+insights+and+inputs+into+the+development+process%2C+allowing+teams+to+avoid+certain+issues+and+inefficiencies+right+from+the+get-go.+Great+software+is+built+by+great+teams%2C+which+are+built+on+great+relationships.+It+drives+down+response+times+and+pushes+sprint+velocity+%28and+talent+retention%29+up.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDevOpsDiagram.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+who+get+DevOps+right+have+done+so+on+the+back+of+a+strong%2C+reliable+culture%2C+driving+them+to+take+accountability+and+ownership+of+the+end+product.+This+culture+has+to+be+supported+by+managers+who+are+willing+to+learn+alongside+their+teams.+Software+Engineers+should+feel+comfortable+to+reach+outside+of+the+%26ldquo%3Bdevelop%26rdquo%3B+step+of+the+SDLC+and+across+into+other+areas+like+design%2C+testing%2C+configuration%2C+infrastructure+and+deployment.+Mixing+these+roles+and+responsibilities+promotes+the+shared+accountability+that+a+successful+DevOps+culture+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
DevOps+is+a+cultural+shift.+It%E2%80%99s+not+a+matter+of+simply+adopting+agile+planning+or+continuous+delivery%2C+although+those+practices+are+certainly+important.+Creating+a+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation+is+about+having+shared+understanding%2C+communication+and+collaboration+between+software+engineers+and+operations%2C+and+sharing+responsibility+for+the+software+they+build.
    
["New technology"]

Understanding+bias+in+artificial+intelligence %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FAIbias.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArtificial+Intelligence+%28AI%29+aims+to+learn+how+to+do+things+that+people+are+good+at.+Humans+are+great+at+stringing+together+complex+concepts+and+harnessing+them+towards+a+goal.+With+that+in+mind%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+also+moulded+by+our+culture%2C+upbringing%2C+and+history.+This+introduces+bias+in+all+humans.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAI+systems+are+only+as+good+as+the+data+we+use+to+mould+them.+This+all+stems+from+people+deciding+what+data+is+captured%2C+how+it+is+captured%2C+and+to+an+extent%2C+how+it+is+interpreted.+With+the+upsurge+of+AI+in+human-centric+areas%2C+such+as+hiring%2C+finance%2C+and+criminal+justice%2C+society+has+started+to+wrestle+with+just+how+much+human+biases+can+make+their+way+into+these+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+AI+bias+happens%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Bad+data+can+contain+implicit+racial%2C+gender%2C+or+ideological+biases%2C+and+many+AI+systems+will+continue+to+be+trained+using+biased+or+flawed+data%2C+making+this+an+ongoing+problem.+AI+bias+is+often+explained+by+a+poor+understanding+of+the+domain%2C+data%2C+and+how+it%26rsquo%3Bs+being+used.+The+reality+is%2C+bias+can+creep+in+long+before+the+data+is+collected%2C+as+well+as+at+many+other+stages+of+the+machine+learning+process.+Some+of+these+stages+include%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+The+data+collection+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+two+main+ways+that+bias+shows+up+in+training+data%3A+either+the+data+collected+is+not+an+accurate+representation+of+reality%2C+or+it+reflects+existing+prejudices.+If+a+deep-learning+algorithm+receives+more+photos+of+light-skinned+faces+versus+darker-skinned+%2C+a+facial+recognition+system+would+inevitably+be+worse+at+recognising+darker-skinned+faces+since+it+has+few+examples+to+learn+from.+Addressing+the+second+case+would+be+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reuters.com%2Farticle%2Fus-amazon-com-jobs-automation-insight%2Famazon-scraps-secret-ai-recruiting-tool-that-showed-bias-against-women-idUSKCN1MK08G%22%3EAmazon%26rsquo%3Bs+internal+recruiting+tool%3C%2Fa%3E+that+dismissed+female+candidates.+Because+the+system+was+trained+on+historical+hiring+decisions%2C+which+favoured+men+over+women+%2C+it+learned+to+do+the+same.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+The+data+preparations+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+data+preparation+stage+involves+selecting+which+data+or+attributes+of+the+data+can+be+engineered+into+features+you+want+the+algorithm+to+consider+when+learning.+Examples+of+%26ldquo%3Battributes%26rdquo%3B+could+be+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+age%2C+location%2C+income%2C+gender%2C+education+level+or+years+of+experience.+Choosing+which+attributes+to+consider+or+ignore+can+significantly+influence+a+model%26rsquo%3Bs+prediction+accuracy+but+also+introduce+bias.+Individuals+from+previously+disadvantaged+backgrounds+may+be+discriminated+against+due+to+a+combination+of+attributes+without+intentionally+doing+so.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDatacollectionDIAGRAM.png%22+style%3D%22border-width%3A+0px%3B+border-style%3A+solid%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+AI+bias+is+not+an+easy+fix%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Because+AI+is+not+a+brand-new+discovery%2C+it+is+often+believed+that+most+problems+should+have+been+ironed+out+by+now.+But+due+to+the+complexity+of+AI+biases+and+ever-changing+technology+and+social+landscapes%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+an+easy+fix.+The+truth+is+%26ndash%3B+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know.+This+is+probably+the+biggest+complexity+organisations+have+to+deal+with+when+trying+to+identify+and+solve+biases+in+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+introduction+of+bias+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+obvious+during+a+model%26rsquo%3Bs+construction+because+you+may+not+realise+the+downstream+impacts+of+your+data+and+choices+until+much+later.+Once+biases+are+discovered%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+identify+where+it+came+from+and+how+to+get+rid+of+it.+Similarly%2C+the+way+in+which+engineers+and+scientists+are+taught+to+frame+problems+often+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+compatible+with+the+best+way+to+think+about+social+problems.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+also+not+clear+what+the+absence+of+bias+should+look+like.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+foundational+laws+and+regulations+were+established+in+a+different+time%2C+where+the+digital+world+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+exist.+There+have+been+instances+of+governing+bodies+adapting+laws+to+try+battle+AI+biases+and+information+privacy%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+easy+to+keep+up+with+rapidly+advancing+technologies.+Laws+and+regulations+struggle+to+keep+up+with+the+pace+of+new+technologies+and+their+uses+that+are+constantly+erupting+and+evolving.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhere+to+from+here%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Fortunately%2C+a+strong+group+of+AI+researchers+are+working+hard+to+address+the+problem.+They%26rsquo%3Bve+taken+a+variety+of+approaches%2C+such+as+algorithms+that+help+detect+and+mitigate+the+biases+learned+by+the+model+regardless+of+the+data+quality.+Since+bias+in+AI+has+come+to+the+fore+in+recent+years%2C+more+influential+figures%2C+organisations+and+political+bodies+are+taking+a+serious+look+at+how+to+deal+with+the+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAI+has+many+potential+benefits+for+businesses%2C+the+economy%2C+and+tackling+society%26rsquo%3Bs+most+pressing+social+challenges%2C+including+the+impact+of+human+biases+and+emotional+decisions+that+have+high+global+impact.+But+that+will+only+be+possible+if+people+trust+these+systems+to+produce+reliable%2C+unbiased+results.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Artificial+Intelligence+%28AI%29+aims+to+learn+how+to+do+things+that+people+are+good+at.+Humans+are+great+at+stringing+together+complex+concepts+and+harnessing+them+towards+a+goal.+With+that+in+mind%2C+we%E2%80%99re+also+moulded+by+our+culture%2C+upbringing%2C+and+history.+This+introduces+bias+in+all+humans.

Security+tactics+to+minimise+risks %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSecuritytactics_Banner123.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+today%26rsquo%3Bs+modern+world%2C+almost+every+business+has+a+digital+presence.+Some+businesses+use+digital+tools+to+support+their+core+offering+and+others+rely+on+digital+technology+as+their+offering+altogether.+These+technologies+include+customer-facing+mobile+and+web+applications%2C+and+back-office+systems+managing+supply%2C+demand+and+critical+calculations.+In+more+and+more+cases%2C+huge+data+processing+transmission%2C+storage%2C+and+processing+is+happening.+In+these+complex+technical+environments+where+data+is+being+transmitted+over+the+internet+and+other+networks%2C+information+security+becomes+a+factor+that+can+pose+risks+and+challenges.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+top+ten+security+concerns+you+should+know+about%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+digital+landscapes+can+be+intricate%2C+consisting+of+a+number+of+different+systems+working+together%2C+there+are+some+common+information+security+concerns+that+surface.+A+reliable+and+popular+source+of+these+concerns+is+the+Open+Web+Application+Security+Project+%28OWASP%29+Top+10+vulnerabilities+list.+OWASP+is+an+international+non-profit+organisation+dedicated+to+improving+the+security+of+software.+The+OWASP+Top+10+document+highlights+the+first+steps+towards+building+more+secure+solutions.+Here+are+the+concerns+explained+in+a+relevant+and+human+way+for+business+and+non-technical+users%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FOWASP_Top_10-03.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETactics+to+address+security+in+your+solutions%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Security+is+all+too+often+considered+only+when+a+solution+is+about+to+be+released+into+the+wild.+Teams+scramble+to+make+fixes+and+shoehorn+security+features+into+a+solution+to+meet+deadlines+and+expectations.+Information+security+should+be+considered+from+the+start+of+any+project.+By+leveraging+simple+tactics+around+education%2C+collaboration%2C+automation%2C+and+creating+visibility%3B+information+security+can+become+part+of+your+process%2C+rather+than+being+a+dreaded+checkbox+that+compromises+the+solution+and+business+at+large.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTacticstoaddresssecurity-04.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+knowledge+of+the+common+security+concerns%2C+and+the+tactics+for+incorporating+information+security+practices+into+your+ways+of+work+is+the+beginning.+These+principles+and+practices+must+be+continuously+reinforced+within+the+organisation+and+teams.+The+goal+should+be+to+breed+security+as+a+concern+into+the+culture+of+digital+product+development+and+engineering+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+ensure+better+security+implementation%2C+we+need+to+think+not+only+about+how+technology+can+catch+our+mistakes+or+breaches+after+the+fact%2C+but+help+us+work+smarter+and+more+securely+from+the+earliest+stages%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
In+today%E2%80%99s+modern+world%2C+almost+every+business+has+a+digital+presence.+Some+businesses+use+digital+tools+to+support+their+core+offering+and+others+rely+on+digital+technology+as+their+offering+altogether.

Unpacking+the+data+deluge%3A+5+reasons+why+big+data+projects+fail %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUnpackingthedatadeluge-BANNER.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+exponential+growth+of+digital+products+and+services+means+more+data+being+gathered+than+ever+before%3A+customers%2C+usage%2C+patterns%2C+and+problems.+With+this+growth%2C+we+have+needed+to+store+and+manage+it+all%2C+but+more+importantly%2C+to+figure+out+how+to+learn+and+benefit+from+it.+This+has+driven+the+increasing+popularity+and+desire+to+incorporate+machine+learning+%28ML%29%2C+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+and+data+science+into+most+new+generation+systems+and+products%2C+these+big+data+projects+are+often+ambitious%2C+and+often+failures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndustry+is+scrambling+to+capitalise+on+this+data%2C+causing+a+surge+in+demand+for+skilled+data+scientists%2C+engineers+and+developers+who+can+curate%2C+store%2C+process+and+analyse+data.+However%2C+according+to+a+Gartner+report%2C+at+least+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fdesigningforanalytics.com%2Fresources%2Ffailure-rates-for-analytics-bi-iot-and-big-data-projects-85-yikes%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E60%25+of+big+data+projects+fail%3C%2Fa%3E+to+even+move+past+preliminary+stages%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+predicted+that+these+numbers+could+be+closer+to+85%25.+The+overwhelming+hype+has+led+to+unreasonable+expectations+from+the+business%2C+and+change+is+outpacing+the+production+of+competent+professionals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBigdata-01.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+though+only+a+fraction+of+data+science+and+analytics+models+that+are+developed+actually+make+it+into+production+usage%2C+technology+is+not+the+only+point+of+failure.+In+fact%2C+technology+is+a+minor+cause+of+failure+relative+to+the+real+culprits.+We+unpack+5+key+reasons+why+big+data+projects+fail+below.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Data+science+weekend+warriors%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Due+to+the+growing+hype+around+data%2C+there+has+been+an+influx+of+interested+people+that+are+learning+and+practicing+data+science+without+experience.+They+can+churn+out+something+that+looks+great+but+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+accurate%2C+and+they+struggle+to+productionalise+it.+They+lack+the+theoretical+background+to+understand+which+algorithms+to+use%2C+and+why+certain+algorithms+work+or+don%26rsquo%3Bt+work+in+each+context.+Their+exposure+is+generally+a+narrow+portion+of+ML%2C+limited+to+pet+projects+or+data+that+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been+exposed+to.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Productionalisation+problems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+data+science+is+only+meant+for+hypothesis+testing+and+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+be+taken+into+production%2C+but+there+are+still+multiple+data+science+projects+that+do+need+to+be+productionalised.+These+projects+fail+when+they+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+productionalised+due+to+data+pipeline+issues.+Most+data+scientists+want+to+deal+with+the+%26lsquo%3Bfun+and+attractive%26rsquo%3B+model+building%2C+without+taking+time+to+understand+the+end-to-end+process.+This+leads+to+hacked+together+%26%2339%3Bproduction%26%2339%3B+solutions+that+often+fail+and+contribute+to+the+large+pool+of+unsuccessful+projects+in+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Lack+of+data+engineer+skillsets%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Everyone+wants+to+be+a+data+scientist+but+very+few+want+to+be+data+engineers.+Typically%2C+the+industry+needs+double+the+amount+of+data+engineers+to+data+scientists%2C+since+around+60%25+of+the+work+is+prepping+and+pipelining+data%2C+and+only+30%25+is+covered+in+areas+like+machine+learning.+The+skillset+for+data+engineers+is+also+quite+different+from+that+of+data+scientists%2C+and+much+closer+to+a+traditional+software+engineer%2C+mixed+with+DevOps+and+the+understanding+of+ML+algorithms.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Lack+of+customer+buy-in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Due+to+the+above+issues%2C+customers+have+been+burnt+by+unsuccessful+data+science+projects+and+are+wary+to+offer+their+support.+Badly+productionalised+solutions+end+up+costing+businesses+more+money+than+anticipated%2C+weekend+warriors+who+lack+proper+skill+and+experience+take+longer+to+reach+a+conclusion+with+their+projects%2C+and+the+lack+of+engineer+skills+makes+deriving+value+from+these+projects+more+difficult.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Expecting+ML+to+be+a+silver+bullet%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+common+misconception+that+machine+learning+can+do+anything+with+any+data.+This+lack+of+understanding+of+the+meaningful+use+cases+for+ML+can+cause+friction+and+unmet+expectations.+ML+has+its+place%2C+but+if+you+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+sure+what+you+want%2C+any+road+will+get+you+there.+The+proliferation+of+data+makes+this+even+more+difficult%2C+because+people+think+data+implies+ML%2C+without+understanding+the+quality+of+the+data+and+the+problem+they%26rsquo%3Bre+trying+to+address.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBigdata-02.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+more+organisations+turn+to+AI%2C+ML+and+data+science+to+drive+decision+making%2C+introduce+new+products+and+maximise+resources%2C+the+more+important+it+becomes+to+ensure+the+success+of+big+data+projects.+To+avoid+adding+to+the+growing+statistic+of+failed+initiatives%2C+businesses+need+to+have+a+realistic+data+strategy+in+place+to+prepare+for+and+avoid+these+pitfalls.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERecruit+or+partner+with+experienced+data+professionals+who+have+a+proven+track+record+of+successful+data+projects.+Do+enough+preparation+and+research+before+rushing+models+into+production%2C+and+promote+cross-skilling+within+your+organisation+to+help+fight+the+data+skills+gap.+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+still+having+trouble+with+gaining+customer+buy-in%2C+move+slower+and+stay+involved+to+ensure+you+remain+on+the+right+path.+Finally%2C+recognise+that+ML+%28or+any+data+approach+for+that+matter%29+is+not+a+silver+bullet%2C+and+time+needs+to+be+invested+to+understand+the+strengths+and+weaknesses+of+the+various+approaches+before+starting+data+projects+without+clear+direction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
The+exponential+growth+of+digital+products+and+services+means+more+data+being+gathered+than+ever+before%3A+customers%2C+usage%2C+patterns%2C+and+problems.+With+this+growth%2C+we+have+needed+to+store+and+manage+it+all%2C+but+more+importantly%2C+to+figure+out+how+to+learn+and+benefit+from+it.+This+has+driven+the+increasing+popularity+and+desire+to+incorporate+machine+learning+%28ML%29%2C+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+and+data+science+into+most+new+generation+systems+and+products%2C+these+big+data+projects+are+often+ambitious%2C+and+often+failures.

PaaS+has+reignited+industry+need+for+custom+software %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPaaS_Banner.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+early+days+of+software+tooling+for+businesses+were+quite+unlike+what+we%26rsquo%3Bre+used+to+now.+Decades+ago%2C+practically+everything+was+custom-built+because+it+needed+to+be.+Packaged+solutions+weren%26rsquo%3Bt+on+the+market%2C+and+this+custom+technology+is+set+at+the+core+of+most+systems+today+and+still+performing+well.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+of+this+custom+software+had+one+glaring+problem%2C+which+was+driving+up+costs+and+making+maintenance+a+nightmare+for+our+IT+teams%3A+integration.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPaaSpullquote-1%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+one+custom+application+needed+to+integrate+to+another%2C+share+data%2C+or+participate+in+a+workflow%2C+that+integration+needed+to+be+custom+too.+With+enough+time%2C+the+number+of+custom+integrations+quickly+created+a+mess+of+crossed+lines+and+complex+dependencies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+always+wanted+total+control+over+what+we+offer+our+customers%2C+users+and+systems+by+way+of+functionality.+We%26rsquo%3Bve+also+always+wanted+the+tidier%2C+bespoke+nature+of+systems+which+do+just+what+we+want+them+to+%26ndash%3B+and+nothing+more.+This+came+with+a+mess+of+expensive+integration+tucked+just+out+of+sight.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPaaSpullquote-2%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+created+a+pressure+gap+in+the+market%2C+as+software+had+become+more+advanced+and+readily+available%2C+out-the-box+solutions+gained+preference+due+to+the+convenience%2C+faster+time-to-market%2C+and+lower+costs+associated+with+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+this+is+starting+to+change+once+again.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEnter+platform-as-a-service+%28PaaS%29.+PaaS+is+a+category+of+cloud+computing+services+that+allows+users+to+develop%2C+run%2C+and+manage+applications+without+the+complexity+of+building+and+maintaining+the+infrastructure+associated+with+running+applications.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPaaS+gives+you+the+opportunity+to+create+a+unique+customer+experience+for+users%2C+without+most+of+the+disadvantages+of+wiring+everything+together.+This+suddenly+makes+custom+development+more+cost-effective.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPackaged+solutions+still+have+their+place+in+technology+landscapes.+You+would+very+rarely+rebuild+an+HR+or+payroll+system%2C+because+they%26rsquo%3Bre+standard+for+most+organisations+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+any+unique+functionalities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+for+more+functional+systems%2C+such+as+pricing+and+quoting%2C+customer-facing+products+and+services+%28like+your+digital+channels%29%2C+and+specialised+workflows%2C+custom-built+is+once+again+the+more+sensible+route.+In+financial+services%2C+big+names+who+have+been+winning+customers+over+in+the+last+few+years%2C+are+those+who+have+been+creating+innovative+digital+channels.+Leveraging+a+PaaS+approach+provides+the+necessary+flexibility+and+versatility+to+support+such+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPaaS+eliminates+the+need+to+build+the+fundamentals+for+applications+from+scratch.+With+back-end+infrastructure+standardised+and+consistent+for+an+entire+ecosystem%2C+it+offers+your+in-house+development+team+new+capabilities%2C+without+the+need+to+hire+specialised+staff+%28usually+on+legacy+frameworks+and+languages%29+or+outsource+activities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+all+contributes+to+reducing+the+costs+normally+associated+with+custom+development.+Cost+savings+are+a+nice+bonus+when+building+custom+solutions%2C+but+fundamentally%2C+enterprise+PaaS+is+about+exploiting+a+competitive+advantage+through+leveraging+the+consistent+infrastructure+and+integration+strategy+presented.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThanks+to+the+maturing+of+cloud-based+platforms.+Custom+is+now+not+only+cost-effective+for+a+broad+range+of+applications+once+again%2C+but+also+provides+enterprises+with+more+control+over+user+experience%2C+functionality+and+timing.+Custom+has+been+reignited+and+is+here+to+stay%2C+and+will+most+likely+expand+even+more+in+the+years+to+come+to+take+back+more+of+the+market+share+lost+over+the+past+two+decades.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
The+early+days+of+software+tooling+for+businesses+were+quite+unlike+what+we%E2%80%99re+used+to+now.+Decades+ago%2C+practically+everything+was+custom-built+because+it+needed+to+be.+Packaged+solutions+weren%E2%80%99t+on+the+market%2C+and+this+custom+technology+is+set+at+the+core+of+most+systems+today+and+still+performing+well.
    
["New technology"]

Avoiding+disaster+in+a+software+outsource+relationship %3Cstrong%3EDo+due+diligence+on+your+potential+partner%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Not+doing+a+proper+due+diligence+check+on+a+potential+business+partner+is+probably+the+biggest+mistake+one+can+make.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+under+pressure+and+the+person+you%26rsquo%3Bre+dealing+with+seems+impressive+and+knowledgeable%2C+so+you+go+for+it+%26ndash%3B+only+to+find+down+the+line+that+deadlines+have+been+missed+because+of+all+sorts+of+issues+and+excuses%2C+despite+your+partner+having+the+best+intent+at+the+project+outset.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Choosing+the+right+partner+should+not+be+done+hastily.+Meet+the+directors+of+the+company+and+do+your+homework+on+them%3B+check+for+judgements%2C+get+SARS+clearance+certificates%2C+phone+clients+for+references+and+physically+visit+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+premises+and+meet+key+staff.+Ascertain+if+the+company+has+the+appropriate+support+structures%2C+ensure+there+is+a+culture-fit+with+your+organisation+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+review+CV%26rsquo%3Bs+and+meet+the+people+who+will+be+working+on+your+project.+Understand+how+the+potential+partner+manages+projects+similar+to+yours+%26ndash%3B+ask+for+evidence+or+get+expert+consultants+to+conduct+appropriate+audits+if+need+be.+It+is+also+important+to+ensure+that+the+company+is+in+a+strong+enough+financial+position+to+carry+the+costs+of+default+if+contract+milestones+are+not+met.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Note+the+quality+of+the+proposal%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Make+sure+that+the+potential+partner+writes+a+high+quality+proposal%2C+understands+your+requirements+and+has+accurately+presented+them.+The+most+senior+staff+are+typically+responsible+for+writing+proposals%2C+and+the+quality+of+the+proposal+will+tell+you+a+lot+about+the+company+and+its+people.+Engage+with+the+supplier+in+this+process+and+ensure+that+they+are+on+the+same+page+as+you.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOwn+the+source+code%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+a+software+product+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+demonstrated%2C+or+is+not+demonstrably+rolled+out+to+a+number+of+clients%2C+you+can+safely+assume+that+the+vendor+is+designing+and+developing+a+custom+built+solution.+Most+corporate+systems+have+a+significant+amount+of+custom+requirements+because%2C+more+often+than+not%2C+systems+are+tailored+around+a+business%2C+not+the+other+way+around.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Unless+a+solution+is+truly+pre-packaged+and+supported%2C+insist+on+owning+the+source+code+and+ensure+that+this+is+stipulated+in+the+terms+of+your+agreement.+Also+ensure+that+appropriate+technical+documentation+is+delivered+on+handover%2C+and+that+it+is+written+in+a+way+that+it+can+be+maintained+by+an+alternative+development+team+if+need+be.+I+have+seen+a+number+of+companies+being+held+over+a+barrel+for+exorbitant+licence+fees+for+a+system+that+was+developed+exclusively+for+them%2C+has+been+paid+for+in+full%2C+and+then+they+still+pay+development+fees+for+software+upgrades+that+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+own.%26nbsp%3B+Solutions+that+demand+licence+fees+are+typically+highly+commoditised+with+large+footprints%2C+such+as+accounting%2C+relationship+management%2C+web+management+or+online+retail+packages.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Make+sure+you+are+charged+a+fair+hourly+rate%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+are+using+an+independent+contractor+that+has+been+supplied+by+a+labour+brokerage%2C+then+it+is+fair+to+add+a+15%25+to+30%25+margin+on+the+actual+fee+paid+to+the+contractor%2C+this+fee+is+often+negotiable.+The+recruitment+agency+typically+needs+to+recover+the+costs+of+advertising%2C+sourcing+the+candidate%2C+negotiating+contracts+and+paying+salaries.+Independent+contractors+demand+higher+hourly+fees+as+the+contract+risk+is+on+them.+Bear+in+mind+that+bringing+in+%26ldquo%3Bbodies%26rdquo%3B+from+agencies+and+having+teams+effectively+under+your+management+does+have+more+risk+associated+with+it+as+there+is+little+recourse+in+the+event+of+poor+quality+output.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Alternatively%2C+if+you+engage+with+a+software+vendor+as+a+supplier%2C+a+premium+can+be+charged+with+the+proviso+that+more+value+will+be+delivered+than+just+a+team+of+contractors.+The+best+form+of+engagement+in+our+experience+is+for+the+vendor+to+take+ownership+of+the+delivery+of+a+project.+In+this+instance%2C+ensure+that+the+vendor+has+all+the+right+credentials%2C+supporting+infrastructure%2C+design+processes%2C+technologies+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+academically+qualified+software+engineers+or+computer+scientists.+Would+you+hire+an+unqualified+engineer+to+build+and+sign+off+a+bridge%3F+The+same+level+of+engineering+professionalism+should+apply+in+the+design+and+delivery+of+a+piece+of+software+%26ndash%3B+in+particular+if+it+is+core+to+one%26rsquo%3Bs+business.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+mitigate+risks+on+a+project+I+would+recommend+that+the+software+vendor+commits+to+a+fixed+price+based+on+the+delivery+of+specific+milestones.+For+bigger+systems%2C+an+initial+%26ldquo%3Bpaid+for%26rdquo%3B+audit+is+usually+conducted%2C+with+the+outcome+being+milestone-based+pricing%2C+a+project+plan%2C+functional+specifications+and+an+application+level+architecture+design.+The+quality+of+this+document+can+also+serve+as+further+security+in+the+competence+of+the+vendor+before+launching+into+a+project.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIs+it+cheaper+or+lower+risk+to+hire+your+own+software+staff+or+to+outsource%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+perform+the+equation+%26ldquo%3B%28time+to+delivery%29+times+%28hourly+fees%29+over+%28quality+as+a+percentage%29%26rdquo%3B%2C+a+good+software+outsource+partner+should+come+out+at+a+lower+number+than+if+the+project+was+performed+by+your+in-house+development+staff.+By+quality+I+refer+to+a+product+that+is+easy+to+maintain%2C+user+friendly+and+bug+free.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+large+client+of+ours+conducted+an+independent+productivity+audit+on+some+of+our+teams+and+the+results+were+quite+staggeringly+in+our+favour+when+compared+to+output+levels+of+their+in-house+teams+%28after+all+why+pay+more+when+you+can+hire+your+own+cheaper%3F%29.+There+are+a+number+of+reasons+for+this+that+are+too+lengthy+to+cover+in+this+article%2C+suffice+to+say+that+the+output+levels+of+a+specialist+design+house+will+always+be+higher+than+one+whose+core+business+is+something+else.+After+all%2C+would+you+go+to+the+headache+of+sourcing%2C+hiring+and+managing+permanent+staff+to+electrify+and+cable+your+expensive+offices+or+would+you+use+the+services+of+a+specialist+electrical+and+cabling+company%3F+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Over+and+above+complete+project+outsourcing%2C+we+have+had+huge+successes+where+we+have+taken+over+technical+leadership+and+ownership+of+delivery+of+projects%2C+often+working+side+by+side+with+existing+in-house+support+teams+%26ndash%3B+where+often+all+that+is+required+to+speed+delivery+up+is+some+specialist+input+and+guidance.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+What+is+the+make-up+of+a+good+software+outsource+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+the+best+outsource+projects+work+where+the+software+vendor+is+given+full+ownership+of+design+and+delivery+%28assuming+the+right+partner+of+course%29.%26nbsp%3B+Notwithstanding%2C+a+successful+project+requires+a+project+champion+on+the+client+side+to+facilitate+access+to+key+business+and+technical+people.+In+our+experience%2C+a+typical+outsource+development+team+usually+compromises+a+team+lead+who+handles+the+client+engagement%2C+staff+management+and+full+life+cycle+of+the+project.+The+team+lead+must+have+strong+prior+development+experience+to+lead+effectively.+A+technical+lead+%28or+architect%29+needs+to+be+involved+during+the+initial+design+phases%2C+while+the+rest+of+the+team+is+usually+made+up+of+a+senior+software+engineer+who+is+a+development+environment+specialist%2C+followed+by+intermediate+and+junior+level+software+engineers+with+proven+problem+solving+ability+and+qualification.+We+have+found%2C+even+with+the+best+design+process+and+methodology%2C+the+single+most+important+factor+in+a+software+project+is+the+quality+of+the+people+on+the+job%2C+both+from+an+attitude+and+problem-solving+perspective.+A+good+outsource+partner+should+have+a+knack+for+consistently+identifying%2C+retaining+and+managing+such+people%3B+otherwise+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+case+of+hit-and-miss.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EFinally%2C+how+is+it+possible+to+gauge+if+the+software+partner+is+doing+a+good+job%3F+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+the+best+way+to+ensure+that+a+project+is+on+track+is+to+follow+an+%26ldquo%3Bagile%26rdquo%3B+approach%2C+i.e.%2C+set+lots+of+small+targets+and+make+sure+that+these+are+met+and+continually+aligned+with+the+project+plan.+Weekly+progress+report+meetings+are+important+because+software+projects+are+never+exactly+defined+up-front+and+involve+some+iteration.+Expecting+a+business+owner+to+define+a+detailed+specification+in+advance+is+not+reasonable+in+a+complex+system%2C+so+a+level+of+on-going+refinement+in+the+build+phase+is+part+of+the+process.+We+often+create+by+seeing%2C+so+this+level+of+flexibility+must+be+allowed+by+the+software+partner.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Getting+the+architectural+basics+right+at+the+outset+of+a+project+is+the+most+critical+part+of+the+project.+If+there+is+any+doubt+about+a+vendor%26rsquo%3Bs+ability%2C+it+is+at+this+time+%26ndash%3B+before+development+work+starts+%26ndash%3B+that+a+technical+audit+should+be+done+to+see+if+the+design+is+a+good+one.+Building+a+system+on+a+weak+foundation+that+has+not+been+designed+with+change+in+mind%2C+is+a+recipe+for+disaster.+A+good+software+partner+should+understand+where+the+system+%28and+business%29+can+potentially+go+and+should+cater+for+this+at+design+time.%26nbsp%3B+After+all%2C+all+large+scale+systems+evolve+just+like+a+good+business%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E
Comment+by+Charles+Pritchard%2C+CEO+of+Entelect%3A+We+often+hear+horror+stories+about+companies+appointing+a+software+partner+and%2C+many+millions+of+rands+later%2C+deadlines+are+missed+and+excuses+are+made+for+non-delivery.+I+have+personally+seen+it+happen+with+companies+that+have+invested+in+good+business+plans%2C+only+to+be+stumped+by+a+software+project+gone+wrong.+With+big+blue-chip+companies+who+have+comprehensive+support+structures%2C+the+same+can+happen%3A+project+deadlines+keep+getting+missed%2C+often+with+unrecoverable+costs+to+the+business.+So+how+does+one+go+about+choosing+the+right+partner+to+ensure+delivery+in+software+projects%3F
    
["Software best practices"]

Technical+debt+reversal+%E2%80%93+development+process+most+effective+solution According+to+Matthew+Butler%2C+GM+of+Projects+at+Entelect%2C+%26ldquo%3BTechnical+debt+reversal+is+definitely+something+we+are+starting+to+see+more+of+with+Chief+Information+Officers+%28CIO%29+and+Development+Managers.+In+our+experience%2C+technical+debt+remains+one+of+our+most+challenging+points+of+contention.+Whether+engaged+in+fully+outsourced+work%2C+or+more+flexible+resource+or+co-source+engagements%2C+technical+debt+is+unavoidable.%26rdquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technical+debt+can+be+quite+simply+described+as+having+two+primary+causes%3A+poor+code+quality+resulting+in+the+systemic+decay+of+the+software%26rsquo%3Bs+ability+to+perform+as+required+or+functional+and+system+requirements+flexing+and+shifting+too+far+away+from+the+original+goals+of+the+software%26rsquo%3Bs+architecture%2C+and+again+hampering+its+ability+to+support+the+new+requirements+adequately.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+that+in+cases+where+both+have+happened%2C+the+symptoms+can+be+quite+dire.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BWe+assist+our+clients+with+how+to+process+this+debt%3B+which+involves+describing+what+it+is+and+why+it+is+there+in+the+first+place.+Justifying+the+additional+expense+required+to+do+any+kind+of+work+again+is+especially+challenging+in+the+South+African+context+as+budgets+are+often+tight.+In+most+cases%2C+business+may+not+understand+the+impact+or+risk+of+the+debt+and+are+often+comfortable+carrying+it.+Internally%2C+with+outsourced+projects%2C+the+same+exists%2C+with+the+only+difference+being+that+we+can+more+easily+measure+and+manage+it%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technical+debt+is+very+often+seen+to+only+affect+legacy+systems%2C+or+software+that+may+need+to+integrate+with+them.+This+is+a+common+misconception+and+it+is+important+to+recognise+that+technical+debt+is+definitely+not+limited+to+these+legacy+systems.+%26ldquo%3BIt+not+only+affects+newer+and+more+modern+systems+but+applies+to+systems+still+in+development%2C+and+extends+to+our+philosophy+that+every+line+of+code+written+is+a+liability+as+soon+as+it+is+compiled.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+scary+thought%2C+incurring+technical+debt+on+such+a+micro+level%2C+but+not+as+bad+as+it+sounds+when+you+have+the+tools+to+understand+and+mitigate+against+it%2C%26rdquo%3B+adds+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+a+number+of+solutions+and+methods+for+addressing+technical+debt.+Firstly%2C+along+with+the+trend+of+awareness+surrounding+technical+debt%2C+the+focus+on+tools+to+detect+it+and+the+improvement+of+the+development+environment+has+emerged+as+a+principle+area+of+focus.+There+are+a+number+of+tools+that+assist+with+static+code+analysis+and+package+management+which+make+life+substantially+easier.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Secondly%2C+process+is+key+%26ndash%3B+especially+development+process.+%26ldquo%3BA+considered+approach+to+development%2C+with+either+a+fully+agile+methodology%2C+or+at+least+an+appreciation+for+incremental+and+iterative+delivery%2C+is+in+our+experience%2C+by+far+the+most+effective.+By+taking+your+time+to+evaluate+the+situation%2C+business+rule+conflicts+are+detected+earlier+and+less+pressure+means+code+quality+stabilises+at+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+true+capability.+The+central+point+here+is+that+once+the+problem+is+well+understood%2C+the+build+itself+is+easy.+With+problems+solved%2C+emphasis+can+be+put+on+future-proofing%2C+and+code+quality+as+required%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+effective+option+is+to+enable+the+business+stakeholders+to+identify+technical+debt+themselves.+Awareness+and+understanding+at+that+level+goes+a+long+way+in+reducing+friction+between+business+and+IT%2C+and+makes+for+open+communication+and+planning+as+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BTesting+is+also+a+much+advertised+answer+to+this.+Testing+at+all+levels+makes+measurement+of+technical+debt+easier+and+provides+a+clear+point-in-time+picture+of+the+health+of+the+system.+However%2C+it+only+goes+so+far%2C+and+in+our+experience%2C+technical+debt+is+a+hazard+that+is+only+visible+with+some+amount+of+retrospect.+In+other+words%2C+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+measure+the+debt+before+it+is+incurred%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BThe+last+effective+mitigation+involves+standards.+Having+a+set+of+technical%2C+process%2C+tooling+and+technology+standards+is+an+important+part+of+a+healthy+development+team+and+also+contributes+positively+to+reducing+technical+debt.+With+the+team+being+able+to+refer+to+both+examples+and+standards%2C+code+quality+improves+and+time+is+less+impacted%2C+which+can+then+be+spent+on+code-+or+architecture-reviews+and+more+valuable+feedback%2C%26rdquo%3B+concludes+Butler.
%3Cstrong%3EMatthew+Butler+%28GM%3A+Projects%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+The+recent+Deloitte+Tech+Trends+2014+report+highlighted+one+of+the+key+trends+for+2014+as+%E2%80%98Technical+Debt+Reversal%E2%80%99.

   Matthew.jpg    
The+%27in-memory%27+future Lately%2C+it+is+hard+to+read+an+IT+business+magazine+without+encountering+an+article+on+how+%26lsquo%3Bin-memory%26rsquo%3B+is+going+to+change+everything.+While+the+recent+developments+around+in-memory+analytics+and+processing+are+indeed+very+promising%2C+it+is+worth+having+a+look+at+the+underlying+technologies%2C+before+jumping+on+the+bandwagon.+The+discussions+on+in-memory+often+include+one+or+more+of+the+following%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Big+data%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Flash+memory%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+analytics%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+transactional+processing.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBig+data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BBig+data%26rsquo%3B+is+itself+a+buzzword.+5GB+of+relational+banking+transactional+data+a+week+is+not+big+data+but+on+the+other+hand%2C+CERN%26rsquo%3Bs+Large+Hadron+Collider%26rsquo%3Bs+experimental+results%2C+at+6GB%2Fsecond%2C+are+much+more+in+the+big+data+category.+At+its+core%2C+big+data+refers+to+data+that+is+too+large%2C+too+fast+and%2For+too+varied+to+be+processed+with+traditional+data-processing+methods.+It+is+not+just+about+size%2C+big+data+implies+that+there+is+a+lot+of+data%2C+that+it+is+accumulating+quickly+and+that+it+is+unstructured.+While+big+data+may+be+processed+using+in-memory+techniques%2C+as+a+result+of+the+size+of+the+data+involved%2C+it+is+not+likely+to+be+stored+in+memory.+Aggregations+may+be+stored+in+memory%2C+temporarily+or+permanently%2C+but+not+the+data+itself.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EFlash+memory%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+talking+about+in-memory%2C+it+is+important+to+distinguish+what+kind+of+memory+is+being+spoken+of.+Flash+memory+is+a+high-speed%2C+non-volatile+storage+technology.+It+is+what+is+used+in+Solid+State+Hard+Drives+%28SSDs%29.+While+significantly+faster+than+traditional+magnetic+media%2C+flash+memory+is+still+a+storage+technology.+However%2C+it+can+be+used+to+extend+a+server%26rsquo%3Bs+main+memory+as+in+the+case+of+SQL+Server+2014%26rsquo%3Bs+Buffer+Pool+Extensions.+Generally%2C+flash+memory+is+used+to+reduce+or+remove+the+IO+latency+from+applications+that+store+and+retrieve+large+amounts+of+data%2C+like+relational+database+engines.+Since+flash+storage+in+the+form+of+SSDs+appear+as+regular+drives%2C+the+applications+using+them+need+no+special+code+or+changes+to+handle+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIn-memory+analytics+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+analytics+allows+for+very+fast+querying+and+analysis+of+data.+It+encompasses+applications+such+as+Tableau+and+the+PowerPivot+plugin+for+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Excel.+In-memory+analytics+will+often+store+data+in+columnar+format%2C+as+opposed+to+the+traditional+row-based+storage+seen+in+relational+databases.+Columnar+storage+enables+a+very+high+compression+rate%2C+allowing+for+high+speed+analytics.+The+high+compression+means+that+large+data+sets+can+be+worked+on+in-memory.+Typically%2C+the+data+is+stored+on+durable+storage+and+processed+in-memory.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIn-memory+transactional+processing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+in-memory+OLTP+engines%2C+the+data+is+stored+in+volatile+memory+and+persisted+at+intervals+to+durable+storage+%28flash+memory+or+traditional+magnetic+drives%29.+In-memory+OLTP+allows+for+extremely+fast+transactional+processing%2C+making+it+suitable+for+applications+that+need+very+high+insert+rates+and+to+execute+huge+numbers+of+small+transactions.+Examples+of+this+are+stock+market+trading%2C+telephone+exchanges+and+on-line+stores.+Solutions+in+this+area+include+the+Hekaton+feature+in+Microsoft+SQL+Server+2014+%28renamed+as+In-memory+OLTP%29+and+Oracle%26rsquo%3Bs+TimesTen+In-Memory+Database+engine.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ERight+solution+in+the+right+place+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whichever+form+of+in-memory+solution+is+being+considered%2C+it+is+critically+important+that+it+not+be+implemented+as+a+%26lsquo%3Bsolution+looking+for+a+problem%26rsquo%3B.+The+problems+the+various+in-memory+solutions+solve+are+very+different+from+one+another.+There+is+no+gain+from+deploying+in-memory+solutions+for+the+sake+of+doing+so.+Any+solution+must+be+carefully+considered+in+the+light+of+what+problem+it+is+expected+to+solve+and+what+gains+it+is+expected+to+give.+Like+with+most+areas+of+technology%2C+there+is+unfortunately+no+magic+solution+for+all+problems+to+be+found+here.
%3Cstrong%3EGail+Shaw+%28Entelect+Technical+Lead%3A+SQL+Server%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Recent+developments+around+in-memory+analytics+and+processing+are+very+promising+but+the+underlying+technologies+need+to+be+understood.+These+include+big+data%2C+flash+memory%2C+in-memory+analytics+and+in-memory+transactional+processing.
    
["Software best practices"]
   Gail.jpg    
How+to+effectively+engage+with+a+software-services+provider Failed+engagements+can+be+costly+in+terms+of+effort%2C+time+and%2C+of+course%2C+money.+Meaningful+relationships%2C+on+the+other+hand%2C+can+save+you+all+three+of+these+but+they+require+commitment+from+both+sides.+Following+these+steps+will+ensure+that+you+start+these+engagements+on+the+right+foot.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+Find+the+right+partner+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identifying+the+right+partner+is+an+exercise+that+can+cause+an+organisation+to+reflect+on+its+own+culture+and+objectives.+Identifying+a+partner+whose+values+align+with+your+own+company%26rsquo%3Bs+is+important+because+the+individuals+who+embrace+those+values%2C+will+be+an+integral+part+of+your+project+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+determine+which+service+provider+is+best+suited+to+your+company%26rsquo%3Bs+goals%2C+there+are+a+few+questions+you+need+to+ask+to+determine+how+serious+the+provider+is+about+its+staff+and+approach%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EHow+strong+is+the+company+culture+and+identity%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+performance-manage+its+staff+in+a+structured+and+meaningful+way%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EHow+does+the+supplier+drive+positive+behaviour+in+its+organisation%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EWhat+kind+of+continuous-improvement+and+career-development+processes+does+the+provider+have+in+place+for+its+staff%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+have+technical+expertise+on+your+technology+platform+and+implementing+the+type+of+solution+that+you+are+expected+to+deliver%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+have+a+strong+track+record+of+delivery+with+companies+similar+to+yours%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EWhat+other+services+and+value-adds+does+the+company+provide%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+answers+to+these+questions+should+inform+your+decision+on+partnerships.+Without+well-thought-out+programmes+covering+these+areas%2C+your+provider+could+end+up+being+nothing+more+than+a+labour+broker.+Companies+whose+core+function+it+is+to+connect+talent+with+end-users+are+more+likely+to+let+borderline+candidates+slip+through+the+process+in+order+to+meet+your+demand.+More+importantly%2C+they+may+not+be+able+to+effectively+solve+software-development+environment+challenges.+There+is+generally+a+very+weak+retention+rate+at+these+companies+and+a+poor%2C+or+even+absent%2C+sense+of+employee+engagement.+This+means+that+their+HR+challenges+become+your+HR+challenges+and+their+churn+becomes+your+churn.+With+large-scale+offshore+companies%2C+this+problem+is+further+exacerbated+by+visa+and+immigration+issues%2C+sometimes+poor+technical+quality+as+well+as+communication+and+cultural+barriers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+some+software-development+companies+that+have+a+well-defined+company+culture+and+a+comprehensive+collection+of+experience+that+comes+from+managing+large-scale+software+projects+across+multiple+industries.+Forging+a+strong+partnership+with+an+experienced+software+company+will+allow+you+to+leverage+a+deep+technical+skill+set+as+well+as+a+dynamic+collection+of+experience%2C+distilled+from+years+of+working+with+peers+and+competitors.+Whether+it+is+effective+knowledge-sharing+through+collaborative+techniques%2C+formal+training+programmes+or+implementing+DevOps%2C+these+suppliers+can+guide+you+through+the+process+and+will+be+incentivised+to+do+so+if+the+relationship+is+meaningful+to+both+parties.+At+Entelect%2C+we+often+find+that+clients+who+recognise+the+value+of+our+relationship+and+leverage+our+experience+often+gain+the+benefits+of+a+more+flexible+model%2C+optimised+rates+and+an+implicit+advisory+relationship.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+size+of+the+company+can+play+an+important+role%2C+too.+Larger+service+providers+have+a+focus+on+scale+and+aggressive+growth.+The+upside+of+such+providers+is+that+they+can+offer+scale+where+smaller+companies+cannot.+This+can%2C+at+some+levels%2C+lead+to+an+%26lsquo%3Banyone-goes%26rsquo%3B+approach+because+the+scramble+to+assemble+teams+at+scale+can+pose+a+challenge.+However%2C+the+strategy+is+usually+to+compensate+for+the+weaker+individuals+on+the+team+by+placing+strong%2C+experienced+team+leaders+and+development+managers+to+pick+up+the+slack+and+act+as+quality+gatekeepers+on+the+project.+Smaller+companies+usually+place+a+greater+emphasis+on+growing+cautiously+with+the+right+fit+of+individual+and+technical+skill+set+because+their+ability+to+take+on+risk+is+limited.+These+companies+will+also+have+different+priorities.+As+a+growing%2C+young+company%2C+the+focus+will+be+on+maturing+internal+processes%2C+building+a+company+brand+and+identity+and+delivering+on+a+smaller+number+of+key+accounts.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+Begin+with+the+intention+of+partnering%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+thing+is+certain%3A+you+will+be+competing+for+priority+regardless+of+the+service+provider+you+choose.+It+is+always+a+good+idea+start+your+discussions+by+making+it+clear+that+you+are+interested+in+forging+a+partnership+that+will+be+mutually+beneficial+to+both+companies.+If+the+provider+is+not+the+right+partner%2C+this+will+become+clear+with+time.+It+is+perfectly+acceptable+to+start+with+a+thin+initial+commitment+as+long+as+there+is+an+understanding+that+there+is+a+partnership+on+the+line+at+the+end+of+that+contract.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+software+development+companies+have+the+challenge+of+demand+outstripping+supply+and+they+have+to+prioritise+their+resources+across+multiple+clients+while+balancing+their+commitments+to+their+clients+and+to+their+business.+This+means+that+they+need+to+be+sure+that+they+are+making+the+best+decision+for+sustainable+business+in+terms+of+where+to+invest+their+efforts+and+resources.+When+clients+are+looking+for+short-term%2C+quick-win+relationships%2C+they+are+more+unlikely+to+prioritise+the+requirement.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BA+successful+partnership+requires+transparency+on+both+sides%2C+and+your+partner+should+be+held+accountable+for+its+performance.+Things+do+not+always+go+to+plan+in+these+partnerships+and+providers+do+not+always+get+it+right+%26ndash%3B+having+a+partner+who+is+willing+to+recognise+failure+and+take+meaningful+remediation+steps+quickly+will+be+a+great+asset+to+you.+Whether+it+is+having+a+dedicated+account+manager+who+is+always+available+to+take+your+call%2C+or+a+direct+line+to+a+senior+manager%2C+having+access+to+swift+and+flexible+remediation+options+will+help+you+to+deal+effectively+with+turbulence+and+to+hold+your+partners+accountable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B3.+Deploy+careful+negotiation+tactics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Negotiating+engagement+terms+and+rates+is+healthy+and+a+great+way+to+manage+the+performance+of+your+partnership.+However%2C+it+is+something+that+should+be+done+carefully%2C+and+in+such+a+way+that+takes+into+account+the+scale%2C+potential+and+value+of+your+current+relationship.+If+priority+and+quality+are+your+concern%2C+you+may+want+to+hold+off+on+aggressive+negotiation+tactics+until+your+partnership+has+matured+because+this+could+have+a+very+real+and+direct+impact+on+prioritisation+and+the+level+of+service+that+you+receive.+On+the+other+hand%2C+if+you+are+not+happy+with+your+service+provider%2C+you+can+use+aggressive+negotiation+tactics+to+motivate+the+provider+to+a+better+place+of+service.+As+a+client+procuring+services%2C+you+have+the+unique+ability+to+motivate+and+manage+the+performance+of+your+provider+through+opportunity+and+negotiation.+Using+metrics+such+as+market-related+rates%2C+opportunities%2C+performance+of+individuals+and+service+levels+are+all+great+inputs+to+the+negotiation+process.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Provide+a+fast+track+through+the+red+tape%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+corporate+IT+divisions+have+internal+screening+processes+that+include+a+combination+of+online+automated+tests%2C+assignments+and+interviews.+The+process+can+be+complicated+and+protracted%2C+and+is+a+main+reason+why+candidates+take+up+offers+at+competitors+or+service+providers.+This+can+also+be+a+turn-off+for+software+development+companies+as+it+means+spending+more+billable+time+pushing+through+red+tape.+More+importantly%2C+your+screening+process+might+focus+on+different+strengths+from+your+providers%2C+which+means+that+you+may+screen+out+potentially+great+candidates+whom+your+provider+highly+recommends.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BIf+you+are+comfortable+with+the+level+of+service+from+your+providers%2C+it+can+be+hugely+beneficial+to+use+a+fast+track+through+the+red+tape.+Of+course%2C+your+provider+must+first+earn+this+privilege+by+proving+a+strong+track+record+of+providing+high-calibre+resources+and+services+to+you.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Attributes+such+as+strong+problem+solving%2C+a+solid+foundation+in+computer+science+and+object-oriented+programming+principles+are+important+for+software+companies+who+operate+across+multiple+technology+platforms+and+industries.+A+corporate+IT+division+that+utilises+specific+frameworks+may+look+for+individuals+with+specialised+experience+on+that+platform+or+framework%2C+and+potentially+screen+out+provider+resources+without+adequate+experience+on+that+platform.+There+may+be+a+differing+ideology+here+that+puts+you+and+your+provider+at+loggerheads+%26ndash%3B+specialist+versus+generalist.+Given+that+the+provider+has+your+interests+in+mind%2C+it+may+be+time+to+have+that+discussion+with+them+in+order+to+understand+why+they+believe+that+generalist+skills+will+work+in+your+environment+and+to+be+on+the+same+page+with+your+approach.+Being+open+to+stretching+your+technology+skills+requirements+might+play+to+your+advantage+and+allow+you+to+build+stronger+teams%2C+faster.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Resource+availability+can+last+anything+from+minutes+to+days+in+the+software+engineering+world%2C+but+seldom+weeks+or+months.+A+company%26rsquo%3Bs+priority+is+to+make+firm+commitments+on+its+resources+as+quickly+as+possible+and+to+minimise+bench-time.+This+can+often+lead+to+a+first-come+first-served+scenario.+If+you+have+been+sent+a+proposal+for+a+team+of+developers%2C+try+to+turn+it+around+as+quickly+as+possible+to+secure+the+resources.+If+your+provider+is+being+slow+and+non-committal%2C+do+not+hesitate+to+hold+the+company+accountable+for+your+deliveries+%26ndash%3B+the+provider+has+an+obligation+to+enable+your+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+Own+the+relationship%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+HR+departments+are+great+at+facilitating+the+recruitment+process+for+staff+but+they+tend+to+be+disruptive+when+dealing+with+specialist+resource+providers%2C+such+as+software+companies.+In+some+cases%2C+this+comes+down+to+a+combination+of+poor+relationship+management+%28remember%2C+they+are+dealing+with+a+high+volume+of+recruiters%2C+candidates%2C+clients+and+providers%29%2C+lack+of+prioritisation+%28in+certain+circumstances+they+are+providing+HR+and+recruitment+services+for+many+business+units%29+and+a+conflict+of+interest.+The+relationship+with+your+provider+needs+to+be+managed+carefully+in+order+to+maintain+value+and+priority+and+to+deal+with+issues+or+concerns+effectively.+If+you+are+in+a+position+to+transform+the+way+the+HR+works+with+strategic+service+providers%2C+you+will+benefit+by+training+them+on+the+challenges+you%2C+as+an+IT+department%2C+face+and+the+value+of+certain+provider+relationships.+In+this+case%2C+involving+HR+in+the+process+and+%26lsquo%3Bcoaching%26rsquo%3B+them+to+facilitate+the+relationship+may+introduce+a+cultural+change+that+could+result+in+better+provider+management+within+your+company.+If+you+do+not+have+a+say+in+how+services+are+procured+or+managed%2C+a+better+approach+is+to+maintain+a+direct+channel+with+your+service+provider+and+be+a+buffer+between+the+provider+and+HR.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E6.+Integrate+contractors+into+your+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+the+team+is+on+the+ground+and+it+is+a+co-sourced+mix+%28both+permanent+staff+and+contractors%29%2C+your+next+challenge+is+to+ensure+that+everyone+operates+as+a+single+team%2C+unified+under+the+same+vision+and+goal.+Unfortunately%2C+some+leaders+openly+voice+their+objections+regarding+contract+staff+and+this+can+be+extremely+damaging+to+your+provider+relationships%2C+team+dynamics+and+the+contractors+themselves.+Understanding+why+contractors+are+a+necessary+asset+to+your+company+will+help+to+maintain+an+integrated+culture.+Conversely%2C+and+equally+important%2C+is+that+your+provider+has+a+responsibility+to+ensure+that+its+resources+are+technically+capable+and+a+good+cultural+fit+for+your+organisation.+This+combined+message+and+understanding+will+ensure+that+all+parties+involved+are+invested+in+your+company%26rsquo%3Bs+overall+success.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+a+market+where+talented+software+engineers+are+progressively+scarce+to+come+by+and+even+harder+to+retain%2C+software+engineering+partners+can+be+an+incredibly+valuable+asset+to+a+corporate+IT+division.+Recognising+the+importance+of+the+elastic+workforce%2C+industry+and+technology+agnostic+expertise%2C+and+leveraging+this+through+a+mutually+beneficial+relationship+can+help+give+a+new+slick+of+paint+to+your+IT+culture%2C+vision+and+ability+to+deliver+on+that+mountain+of+project+work+in+the+pipeline.+Investing+some+time+in+the+relationships+with+your+providers+may+be+the+most+important+thing+you+do+in+2015.
