Taking+cybercrime+seriously This+figure+is+sure+continue+to+rise+in+parallel+to+the+continued+rapid+expansion+of+the+Internet+%26ndash%3B+the+technological+phenomenon+which%2C+although+becoming+available+for+commercial+use+just+two+decades+ago%2C+now+plays+an+integral+part+in+both+our+personal+and+professional+lives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+South+African+government%26rsquo%3Bs+State+Security+Agency+%28SSA%29+has+expressed+growing+concerns+around+Internet+usage+and+the+extent+to+which+both+private+individuals+and+businesses+have+begun+to+rely+on+it.+%26lsquo%3BWith+Wi-Fi+being+implemented+almost+anywhere%2C+being+online+is+as+important+as+running+water+and+electricity+nowadays%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+General+Manager+of+Business+Development%2C+Mark+Beets%2C+%26lsquo%3BMore+and+more+businesses+have+become+fundamentally+reliant+on+the+Internet+and+connectivity+in+order+to+operate.+The+importance+of+maintaining+the+integrity+of+these+systems%2C+not+only+for+their+customers+but+alo+for+business+continuity%2C+has+become+one+of+the+biggest+challenges.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+increasing+mobility+is+celebrated+for+rapidly+enhancing+our+daily+lives+and+business+processes%2C+it+is+also+creating+more+complex+security+threats.+%26lsquo%3BWhile+many+cybercriminals+still+practise+the+more+%26ldquo%3Bsmall-time%26rdquo%3B+crime+of+hacking+individual+computers+or+devices%2C+the+masses+of+information+now+stored+and+run+through+cloud-based+and+connected+servers+have+also+seen+a+marked+increase+in+cybercriminals+attacking+organisation+infrastructure+through+online+touch-points%2C%26rsquo%3B+Beets+explains.+%26lsquo%3BThis+poses+a+substantial+threat+to+any+individual+with+personal+or+sensitive+information+stored+digitally%2C+across+any+number+of+devices%2C+as+well+as+to+large+businesses+that+have+based+their+systems+on+digital+platforms+and+infrastructure.%26rsquo%3B+The+primary+goals+of+cybercrime+include+theft%2C+extortion+and+fraud%2C+which+all+have+potentially+devastating+consequences+for+victims.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Further+increasing+the+risk+to+personal+information+is+the+continued+growth+of+the+Internet+of+things+%28IoT%29.+%26lsquo%3BWith+information+constantly+being+sent+and+received+by+a+massive+number+of+sources%2C+ranging+from+your+office+equipment+and+personal+devices+to+your+refrigerator+at+home+and+even+your+clothes%2C+means+that+the+amount+of+data+being+stored+in+the+cloud+by+any+individual+is+increasing+exponentially.+As+a+result%2C+the+risk+of+data+breaches+is+increasing+in+parallel%2C%26rsquo%3B+explains+Beets.+%26lsquo%3BSoon+the+use+of+Internet+will+be+extremely+difficult+to+avoid+because+the+IoT+is+becoming+the+modus+operandi+of+many+companies+and+individuals+for+their+day+to+day+processes%2C+and+as+such%2C+education+on+data+security+is+becoming+more+and+more+crucial.%26rsquo%3B+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.timeslive.co.za%2Fthetimes%2F2015%2F05%2F27%2FA-hacker-is-on-the-line%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EVodacom%26rsquo%3Bs+Chief+Technology+Security+Officer%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+Vernon+Fryer%2C+has+been+quoted+as+saying+that+South+Africa+is+the+fourteenth+most+popular+target+for+cybercriminals%2C+with+South+Africans+underestimating+how+at+risk+they+are+when+sharing+information+and+using+the+Internet.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Among+a+variety+of+troublesome+trends%2C+which+were+flagged+in+the+CISCO+2014+Annual+Security+Report%2C+Android+mobile+devices+bore+the+brunt+of+99+per+cent+of+all+mobile+malware+%28malicious+software%29.+Furthermore%2C+the+report+indicated+a+shortage+of+more+than+one+million+security+professionals+across+the+globe+in+2014.+%26lsquo%3BMost+organisations+at+the+moment+do+not+have+the+required+systems+or+skills+to+be+able+to+monitor+networks+and+detect+infiltrations%2C+and+then+apply+protections+in+a+timely+and+effective+manner%2C%26rsquo%3B+Beets+continues.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+According+to+Beets%2C+software+organisations+can+play+an+important+role+because+they+have+the+ability+to+empower+their+clients+and+educate+them+regarding+the+potential+risks+to+their+businesses.+%26lsquo%3BA+proper+understanding+creates+the+opportunity+to+proactively+take+the+necessary+precautions+to+protect+themselves+from+cybercrime%2C+which+is+vital+to+the+survival+of+most+modern+businesses+and+the+protection+of+their+sensitive+or+personal+information.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Based+on+the+most+notorious+cybercrimes%2C+Beets+offers+the+following+advice+to+companies+and+individuals%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBeware+of+unrecognisable+links%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+do+not+click+on+these+links+when+they+are+sent+to+you.+This+is+a+tactic+used+by+hackers+called+phishing.+Phishing+is+the+fraudulent+practice+of+sending+emails+purporting+to+be+from+reputable+companies+in+order+to+get+individuals+to+reveal+personal+information+online.+These+emails+could+be+spam+and+expose+you+to+fraudulent+activity.+Your+systems+can+also+be+infiltrated+by+hackers+when+you+download+content+from+unknown+sites%2C+which+can+be+triggered+automatically+by+clicking+on+these+suspicious+links.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUpdate+your+passwords+regularly%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+up+to+three+times+per+month.+This+is+crucial+to+ensure+your+online+information+is+secured+at+all+times.+Do+not+use+birth+dates%2C+graduation+years%2C+or+your+mother%26rsquo%3Bs+maiden+name+as+security+answers+to+access+your+online+accounts+%26ndash%3B+this+makes+a+hacker%26rsquo%3Bs+job+even+easier.+By+generating+strong+passwords+you+can+make+it+much+harder+for+hackers+to+break+into+your+computer+via+the+back-end+code+of+the+system.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUnderstand+that+identity+theft+is+real%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+identity+theft+has+become+increasingly+common+and+is+something+everyone+needs+to+worry+about.+Identity+theft+is+when+a+criminal+accesses+data+about+a+person%26rsquo%3Bs+bank+accounts+and+bank+cards%2C+social+security+and+other+sensitive+information%2C+to+siphon+money%2C+engage+in+contracts+or+to+make+purchases+in+the+victim%26rsquo%3Bs+name.+Always+logout+of+your+accounts+properly+%26ndash%3B+this+is+a+good+policy+to+protect+yourself+against+identity+theft+and+cyberfraud%2C+which+is+the+distribution+of+rogue+security+software+to+conduct+fraudulent+transactions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EProtect+against+malware%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+malware+is+Internet-based+software+or+programs+that+are+used+to+disrupt+a+network+and+steal+sensitive+data%2C+often+causing+damage+to+software+present+in+the+system.+Malware+can+be+installed+in+a+variety+of+forms%2C+from+Trojan+horses+and+spyware+to+viruses+and+worms.+Investing+in+reputable+security%2C+firewall+and+anti-virus+systems+is+crucial%2C+and+even+with+these+in+place%2C+it+is+advised+that+you+make+use+of+public+wireless+internet+providers+sparingly.+These+Wi-Fi+networks+that+are+available+in+airports%2C+coffee+shops+and+hotels+often+do+not+require+encryption+of+data+traveling+between+laptops+and+the+Internet.+This+means+that+all+your+information+is+unsecured+to+hackers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAvoid+sharing+devices+with+others%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+if+you+must+and+want+your+personal+information+to+be+undetectable+by+the+person+with+whom+you+are+sharing%2C+you+can+browse+incognito+through+the+use+of+Google+Chrome.+By+using+Chrome%2C+your+browsing+history+and+cookies+will+not+show+up+in+the+history+stored+on+device+programmes.+However%2C+incognito+mode+does+not+hide+your+IP+address%2C+which+means+that+your+location%2C+browser%2C+operating+system%2C+as+well+as+your+own+address%2C+are+not+hidden+by+using+this+mode.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EScramble+your+information%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+one+way+to+do+this+is+to+make+use+of+a+Virtual+Private+Network+%28VPN%29.+VPNs+allow+users+to+make+sure+that+all+information+that+passes+between+your+device+and+the+network+is+subjected+to+extreme+encryption%2C+making+data+safer.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BWhile+we+are+aware+of+a+certain+number+of+cybercrimes%2C+hackers+develop+new+techniques+constantly+to+trick+you+into+unwittingly+sharing+your+personal+information%2C%26rsquo%3B+warns+Beets%2C+%26lsquo%3BKnowing+how+to+protect+yourself+can+significantly+add+value+and+safety+to+your+life+online.+Be+cautious%21%26rsquo%3B+he+concludes.
%3Ch3%3E+Mark+Beets+%28Entelect+General+Manager+of+Business+Development%29%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E+According+to+a+cybercrime+report+compiled+by+global+internet+security+firm%2C+Norton%2C+South+Africa+lost+R3.7+billion+in+2012+as+a+result+of+cybercrime.
    
["Software best practices"]
   Mark.jpg    
Building+projects+and+products+%E2%80%93+is+there+a+difference%3F At+Entelect+it+is+apparent+that+awareness+of+the+differences+between+these+two+concepts+needs+to+be+promoted%2C+mainly+because+the+mind-set+and+approach+required+for+each+are+different%2C+and+using+the+wrong+combination+means+guaranteed+friction+and%2For+an+engagement+failure+that+could+have+been+avoided.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+very+important+to+note+that+software+solutions+do+not+need+to+be+polarised+into+either+the+project+or+product+category.+Each+solution+or+engagement+falls+into+the+spectrum+somewhere+between+the+%26lsquo%3Bquick+and+dirty%26rsquo%3B+project+and+the+full-blown+product.+With+this+in+mind%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+first+look+at+some+of+generally+understood+differences%2C+which+most+project+managers+or+product+owners+will+already+know%3A+%3Col+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EAudience%3A+Projects+will+generally+have+a+more+specific%2C+internal+functionality+set%2C+tailored+to+a+certain+audience%2C+such+as+one+department+or+one+customer.+It+is+not+a+stretch+to+stereotype+projects+as+customer-specific+software.+Products+need+to+leverage+broader+functionality+for+often+a+larger+and%2For+external+audience.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDelivery%3A+A+project+typically+needs+to+provide+only+a+specific+set+of+deliverables.+Examples+could+include+a+workflow+system+customised+to+a+business+process%2C+or+a+new+online+capture+form+for+customer+feedback.+A+product+must+provide+a+viable+solution+for+ongoing+business%2C+which+is+likely+to+include+preparation+and+planning+for+the+product+life+cycle%3A+growth%2C+adaptation%2C+enhancement+and+decline+from+the+software+development+perspective.+Good+examples+of+this+include+Salesforce.com+and+the+Uber+mobile+apps.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETime%3A+Projects+should+be+time-limited+while+products+generally+have+a+roadmap%2C+but+only+loosely+defined+timelines+up+front.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EReturn%3A+Projects+will+often+have+an+indirect+return+on+investment+through+efficiencies+gained%2C+load+reduction+on+teams%2C+reduced+operational+or+staff+requirements+and+so+forth.+Products+typically+need+to+have+a+direct+return+on+investment+in+such+a+way+that%2C+over+a+period+of+time%2C+the+product+generates+direct+revenue+to+pay+for+its+own+development+and+enhancement.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelopment%3A+Projects+are+often+outsourced+as+contained+pieces+of+work.+Products+are+not+usually+outsourced%2C+especially+not+for+core+business+IP+or+competency.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+Added+to+this+list%2C+there+are+other+important+differences+that+are+not+as+well+understood+and+can+at+times+be+overlooked%3A+%3Col+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EUsers%3A+Projects+regularly+have+a+focused+feature+set+and+a+controlled+set+of+users.+Control+in+this+case+means+you+know+specifically+who+the+users+are+%28often+they+might+have+no+choice+but+to+use+the+software+as+part+of+their+work%29.+At+the+very+least%2C+you+can+chat+to+them+and+get+direct+feedback.+Software+products+often+need+a+large+user+base+to+be+successful+and+this+can+impact+many+other+decisions+during+the+development+process+%26ndash%3B+we+will+see+this+influence+coming+through+in+the+points+below.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EQuality%3A+As+a+consequence+of+a+larger%2C+and+less-controlled+user+base%2C+products+need+to+prioritise+quality.+For+any+product%2C+things+such+as+first+impressions%2C+performance+and+user+experience+are+critical+for+adoption+and+brand+value.+Another+aspect+is+longevity.+Code+quality+is+crucial+for+products+because+should+the+product+be+successful+in+the+marketplace%2C+existing+source+code+will+need+to+be+worked+on+for+the+foreseeable+future.+However%2C+this+is+not+to+say+that+quality+does+not+matter+in+a+project%2C+but+it+is+less+important.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETechnology%3A+When+developing+a+software+project+for+a+specific+customer%2C+generally+technology+choices+are+constrained+to+what+tools+and+platforms+are+already+in+place.+With+product+development%2C+often+the+best+and+latest+tools+and+technologies+are+needed+to+give+the+product+the+best+chance+it+has+in+the+marketplace.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EArchitecture%3A+There+is+an+industry-wide+buzz+around+building+%26lsquo%3Bsoftware+as+a+service%26rsquo%3B+%28SaaS%29+systems.+Although+the+topic+is+beyond+the+scope+of+this+article%2C+the+point+is+that+architecture+must+suit+the+intended+usage+of+the+solution.+Large+products+will+require+broad%2C+and+sometimes+complex%2C+infrastructure+to+allow+for+things+such+as+multi-tenants%2C+data+partitioning%2C+high+availability%2C+elastic+resources+and+shared+caching.+Projects+tend+to+be+more+predictable.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAdaptability%3A+Software+products+%28think+Microsoft+Office+or+Eclipse+IDE%29+have+demands+from+multiple+customers%2C+so+they+need+to+adapt+to+varying+customer+requirements+both+now+and+in+the+future.+This+requirement+is+far+more+muted+for+projects.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETesting%3A+With+a+project%2C+%26lsquo%3Bjust+good+enough%26rsquo%3B+will+more+often+than+not+suffice+for+the+intended+purpose.+However%2C+as+a+consequence+of+the+user+base%2C+products+require+the+accommodation+of+more+hardware+and+software+configurations.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EInvestment%3A+It+is+probably+clear+now+from+the+differences+tabled+so+far+that+building+custom+software+products+is+expensive.+More+time+is+required+for+planning+and+executing+a+good+software+product+solution+that+caters+for+the+variability%2C+quality%2C+testing%2C+user+breadth%2C+and+the+other+product+features+mentioned%2C+and+time+is+the+key+cost+factor+for+software+development.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+At+Entelect%2C+we+like+to+use+a+set+of+questions+to+help+stimulate+the+thought+process+to+guide+the+project%2Fproduct+owner+to+an+understanding+of+where+on+the+spectrum+their+solution+lies%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+it+for+your+company+%28internal+system%29%2C+or+is+it+for+users+whom+you+would+consider+customers%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDo+you+want+to+make+a+direct+income+from+the+solution%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAt+the+moment%2C+are+there+any+users+of+the+system+that+you+do+not+yet+know+of%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+there+a+market+demand+for+your+system+%26ndash%3B%26nbsp%3Bwould+anybody+else+want+to+use+it%3F+If+so%2C+would+you+expect+them+to+use+it+as-is+or+would+you+need+to+tailor+it%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+solution+represent+a+%26lsquo%3Bcore+competency%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+would+this+software+solution+be+the+key+revenue+driver+for+the+business%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+system+need+to+be+highly+adaptable%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+If+you+are+answering+%26lsquo%3Byes%26rsquo%3B+to+these+questions%2C+it+means+the+solution+leans+more+to+the+product+side+and+answering+%26lsquo%3Bno%26rsquo%3B+pushes+it+more+to+the+project+side.+This+really+is+a+key+point+to+establish+as+early+as+possible+in+process.+With+this+positioning+known%2C+the+next+steps+will+feel+more+natural+for+the+topics+above.+You+can+proceed+with+more+confidence+with+your+technology+roadmaps%2C+scoping%2C+test+planning%2C+competitor+analysis%2C+project+vision%2C+architecting+and+budgeting.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Successful+projects+and+products+start+with+positioning+the+solution+or+idea+on+the+project-product+spectrum+and+then+tackling+all+of+the+topics+raised+%28particularly+approach%2C+budget+and+timelines%29+in+a+way+that+is+tailored+to+that+position.+Ultimately%2C+when+building+software%2C+and+especially+when+looking+to+outsource%2C+knowing+whether+you+are+building+a+project+or+a+product+is+a+great+head+start+for+setting+expectations%2C+vision+and+driving+decisions.
%3Ch3%3E+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+Software+General+Manager%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+When+building+software+solutions%2C+whether+internally+or+outsourced%2C+much+of+the+focus+is+often+on+enforcing+budget+and+deadlines%2C+or+on+risks%2C+such+as+choosing+and+implementing+the+right+methodologies%2C+technologies+and+platforms.+Included+in+this+list+of+pitfalls+is+a+topic+that+does+not+get+as+much+airtime+as+it+deserves%3A+understanding+the+differences+between+developing+a+software+project+and+developing+a+software+product.

Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+one %3Cp%3EThe+presentation+addressed+the+main+issues+in+the+shift+from+data+as+an+IT+asset%2C+to+data+as+a+main+asset+for+decision+making.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+took+a+look+at+traditional+business+intelligence+ecosystems+and+how+we+all+thought+it+was+going+to+be+done%3A+the+perfect+situation+of+taking+data+from+source+systems%2C+creating+a+unified+data+model+and+data+store+and+thereafter%2C+having+a+set+of+business+users+accessing+only+that+data+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+reality+is+that+business+has+never+really+been+happy+with+this+approach.+This+approach+can+cause+a+lot+of+red+tape%2C+and+rightfully+so.+Incorporating+a+new+source+system+into+a+data+warehouse%2C+requires+a+lot+of+planning%2C+data+analysis%2C+identifying+business+rules%2C+cleaning+data+and+ultimately%2C+making+it+available+to+business.+The+red+tape+almost+makes+me+happy+%26ndash%3B+it+means+that+data+warehouses+or+business+intelligence+environments+are+mission-critical+systems%2C+changing+them+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+an+easy+process+and+they+should+be+treated+as+core+business+systems.+The+by-product+of+the+red+tape+however%2C+is+that+now%2C+organisations+typically+have+several+rogue+MIS+systems+that+IT+departments+often+have+no+knowledge+about.+Sometimes%2C+these+systems+are+running+on+local+machines+and+have+no+backup+or+business+continuity+strategies.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+a+bad+thing+by+any+means+and+if+anything%2C+it+shows+that+people+are+willing+to+break+the+rules+to+ensure+they+can+make+data-driven+decisions.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+what+are+the+steps+to+creating+a+data+driven+culture%3F+Eric+Schmidt+of+Google+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BWe+run+the+company+by+questions+and+not+answers%2C%26rdquo%3B+and+this+speaks+to+the+first+step+in+the+process%2C+which+is+to+to+define+the+question.%26nbsp%3BWe+then+need+to+choose+the+right+data+to+get+what+we+are+looking+for.+Big+Data+is+about+finding+an+answer+to+a+question+that+we+never+knew+we+had+%26ndash%3B+pick+the+right+subset+of+data+and+use+just+that.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+bloat+your+initiatives+with+too+much+data+from+too+many+data+sources.+For+example%2C+if+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+users%26rsquo%3B+tweets+to+get+to+the+answer+you+are+looking+for%2C+then+don%26rsquo%3Bt+include+them+in+the+data+set+you+are+analysing.+The+last+three+steps+in+the+process+are+self-explanatory+and+are+repeated.+We+need+to+analyse+the+data%2C+present+it+through+an+intuitive+interface+and+make+the+decision.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+second+part+of+my+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53113%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Epresentation%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+I+looked+at+different+ways+in+which+organisations+can+develop+analytical+talent+as+well+as+how+to+transform+culture%2C+capabilities+and+technology.%3C%2Fp%3E
Ryan+Naud%C3%A9+%28Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%2C+Entelect+Software%29%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+I+recently+spoke+at+the+TCI+Banking%3A+Big+Data+and+Analytics+Conference+and+my+presentation+covered+shifting+to+a+data-driven+culture%3B+developing+analytics+talent+within+your+organisation%3B+transforming+your+organisation+from+a+culture%2C+capabilities+and+technology+point+of+view%3B+and+developing+a+company-wide+analytics+strategy.+With+its+varied+demographic+of+attendees+and+presenters%2C+the+conference+was+an+ideal+setting+for+such+a+talk.

The+latest+on+cybercrime+and+cybersecurity+in+South+Africa %3Cdiv%3ECybersecurity+remains+a+huge+issue+throughout+the+world+and+South+Africa+is+no+exception.+Currently%2C+the+South+African+government+in+the+process+of+passing+new+legislation+%26ndash%3B+the+Cybercrimes+and+Cybersecurity+Bill.+The+new+bill+will+allow+it+to+define+the+offences+for+such+attacks%2C+with+the+list+of+offences+being+drastically+expanded%2C+and+the+fines+for+existing+infringements+being+increased.+This+goes+hand+in+hand+with+ensuring+that+electronic+service+providers+carry+out+certain+obligations+relating+to+and+impacting+cybersecurity.+In+addition+to+this%2C+the+president+is+adding+legislation+that+will+allow+him+to+collaborate+with+foreign+states+in+order+to+combat+cybercrime+in+an+official+capacity.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFor+a+long+time%2C+the+United+Kingdom+has+striven+to+be+one+of+the+safest+destinations+to+do+online+business.+The+country%26rsquo%3Bs+vision+for+2015+was+to+tackle+cybercrime+head-on%2C+be+more+impervious+to+cyber+attacks+and+to+create+an+open%2C+unwavering+and+pulsating+cyberspace+that+the+public+could+use+without+fear%2C+a+cyberspace+that+supports+open+societies.+To+this+end%2C+the+United+Kingdom+had+to+have+the+know-how+in+terms+of+the+latest+skills%2C+knowledge+and+capabilities+in+order+to+meet+its+cybersecurity+objectives.+It+also+meant%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+public+has+had+to+know+how+to+protect+itself+online%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EBusinesses+in+the+United+Kingdom+have+had+to+be+up+to+date+on+how+to+fight+cybercrime+and+have+done+this+by+working+with+their+government+and+using+its+strengths+to+do+this.+This+has+encouraged+businesses+to+operate+securely+in+cyberspace%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+United+Kingdom%26rsquo%3Bs+government+has+had+to+improve+its+law+enforcement+response+to+cybercrime%2C+its+defences+and+infrastructure+to+detect+and+combat+cybercrime%2C+as+well+as+education+and+skills%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+United+Kingdom%26rsquo%3Bs+government+has+had+to+help+its+country+to+take+opportunities+to+provide+the+cybersecurity+services+that+is+needed+across+the+world.+These+have+allowed+the+country+to+build+relationships+with+other+countries%2C+organisations+and+business+around+the+globe+in+order+to+create+an+open+and+bustling+cyberspace.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EIn+response+to+this+new+draft+bill%2C+South+Africa+has+already+started+collaborating+with+United+Kingdom+and+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime+to+achieve+the+following%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EA+Computer+Emergency+Response+Team+%28CERT%29+in+case+of+a+terrorist+attack+on+critical+governmental+information+infrastructures+%26ndash%3B+the+United+Kingdom+has+the+experience+and+has+made+it+its+mission+to+assist+other+countries+with+all+issues+relating+to+cybersecurity%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EA+Standard+Operating+Procedure+%28SOP%29+is+being+written+for+the+cybercrime+labs+in+cooperation+with+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThus%2C+based+on+this+collaboration+in+cybersecurity+and+governance%2C+best+practices+and+policy+goals+with+the+United+Kingdom+and+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime%2C+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+new+Cybercrimes+and+Cybersecurity+Bill+was+drafted.+In+response+to+this%2C+the+National+Prosecuting+Authority+%28NPA%29+is+also+gearing+itself+towards+this+bill+by+sending+its+state+attorneys+and+advocates+on+NQF6+and+NQF8+Cybercrime+courses.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EAs+it+stands%2C+many+security+experts+have+cautiously+welcomed+the+new+bill%2C+stating+concerns+that+privacy+and+constitutional+rights+may+be+infringed+upon.+Leading+cybercrime+expert%2C+Professor+Basie+von+Solms%2C+states+it+is+still+%26ldquo%3Ba+step+in+the+right+direction%2C%26rdquo%3B+even+though+%26ldquo%3Bthere+were+issues+that+had+to+be+addressed.%26rdquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+has+become+increasingly+clear+that+in+order+to+fight+cybercrime+and+stay+current+in+all+matters+relating+to+cybersecurity%2C+South+Africa+will+have+to+partner+with+other+countries%2C+businesses%2C+organisations+and+most+important+of+all%2C+local+ICT+companies.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EAs+software+engineers%2C+we+must+work+with+government+in+order+to+guide+it+on+all+the+technical+aspects+of+cybercrime+and+cybersecurity+in+order+to+help+them+to+understand+and+implement+the+correct+legislation+by+considering+the+moral%2C+ethical+and+legal+aspects+relating+to+IT.+It+is+the+duty+and+responsibility+of+the+private+sector+to+comment+on+laws+that+apply+directly+to+it.+After+all%2C+what+is+the+point+of+the+new+legislation+if+there+is+no+one+to+enforce+it%2C+and+no+one+from+the+IT+sector+to+assist+government+in+implementing+it%3F%3C%2Fdiv%3E
Christoff+Smith+%28Senior+Software+Engineer%3A+Entelect+Software%29%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+In+today%E2%80%99s+fast-moving+world%2C+technological+advances+happen+faster+than+legislation+can+keep+up%2C+and+will+continue+to+do+so+for+many+years+to+come.+As+software+engineers%2C+the+onus+lies+on+us%2C+not+only+to+apply+ethical+behaviour+to+the+implementation+of+these+new+technologies+but+also+to+enforce+cybersecurity.+This+can+be+accomplished+only+if+software+companies+liaise+with+governments+to+enforce+new+legislation+that+protects+a+country%E2%80%99s+citizens+from+falling+victim+to+cybercrimes+relating+to+new+technologies.

Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+two %3Cp%3EThere+are+two+aspects+to+analytics%3A+technical+and+capabilities.+Firstly%2C+you+need+to+be+able+to+get+the+data+and+visualise+it+%26ndash%3B+this+is+the+technical+side+of+analytics.+You+then+need+to+know+what+to+look+for+%26ndash%3B+this+is+the+capabilities+aspect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBefore+we+can+understand+the+capabilities+side+of+analytics%2C+we+need+to+grasp+the+technical+aspect.+Today%2C+there+is+a+whole+host+of+Massively+Open+Online+Courses+%28MOOCs%29+available+to+the+general+public%2C+including+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EEDX%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ECorsera%3C%2Fa%3E+and+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fbigdatauniversity.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EBigDataUniversity%3C%2Fa%3E.+These+MOOCs+provide+a+wide+variety+of+free+and+paid-for+courses+that+can+assist+people+in+developing+their+talent+and+enabling+them+to+reach+their+analytics+capability.+Another+option+is+to+pick+up+some+technologies+and+give+them+a+try.+Most+new+technologies+for+data+analytics+are+very+intuitive+and+do+not+require+a+massive+amount+of+technical+ability+to+get+out+a+proof+of+concept.+For+example%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fnodexl.codeplex.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ENodeXL%3C%2Fa%3E+is+a+great+Excel+plugin+that+you+can+use+to+quickly+get+out+social+media+statistics%2C+while+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tableau.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ETableau%3C%2Fa%3E+and+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.qlik.com%2F404%3Fitem%3D%252fexplore%252fproducts%252fsense%26amp%3Buser%3Dextranet%255cAnonymous%26amp%3Bsite%3DQlik%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EQliksense%3C%2Fa%3E+both+provide+a+useful+desktop+platform+to+connect+to+data+sources+and+quickly+create+a+data+discovery+dashboard.+IBM%26rsquo%3Bs+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ibm.com%2Fsmarterplanet%2Fus%2Fen%2Fibmwatson%2Fwhat-is-watson.html%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EWatson%3C%2Fa%3E+is+also+an+option.+If+you+want+a+lightweight+cloud+version+that+you+can+throw+some+data+at+and+get+some+great+insights%2C+it+is+quite+affordable.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3BSo+who+do+we+hire+in+the+new+world+of+analytics%3F+The+technologies+we+are+using+are+far+too+young+for+someone+to+be+an+expert+in+them.+When+I%26rsquo%3Bm+hiring+people+for+a+relatively+new+technology+stack%2C+I+like+to+look+at+the+person%26rsquo%3Bs+online+profile%3A+does+he+or+she+have+a+blog+that+is+respected+within+the+community%3B+has+he+or+she+published+articles%3B+what+is+his+or+her+status+on+forums%3F+In+the+interview%2C+I+try+to+gauge+the+applicant%26rsquo%3Bs+passion+for+data+and+analytics.+Because+the+technologies+are+so+young%2C+I+look+for+a+pseudo+track+record+that+will+provide+confidence+in+abilities+and+not+necessarily+a+commercial+track+record.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+you+are+looking+to+outsource+certain+components+of+your+analytics+strategy%2C+use+the+same+methodology+for+the+service+provider%26rsquo%3Bs+staff.+Public+profile%2C+transparent+training+programmes+and+track+records+are+key+when+it+comes+to+bleeding-edge+technologies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+terms+of+developing+people+in+the+realm+of+analytics%2C+not+the+technical+side%2C+there+is+no+hard-and-+fast+method+for+this.+My+best+advice+is+to+read+as+many+industry+case+studies+as+possible%2C+keep+up+to+date+with+global+trends+within+your+sector%2C+and+try+to+use+some+of+this+learning+to+apply+internally.+Many+people+outside+of+your+organisation+are+investing+a+lot+of+money+into+these+case+studies+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+an+easy+win.+I+also+try+to+read+relevant+research+papers+from+Masters+and+PhD+students+from+around+the+world.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+one+point+I+must+stress+is+that+locally+relevant+domain+knowledge+is+crucial.+Understanding+the+industry+and+business+is+a+critical+component+to+achieving+analytics+success.+I+have+mentioned+this+before+but+I+always+look+for+the+%26lsquo%3BMiss+Congenialities%26rsquo%3B+of+organisations.+These+people+have+been+at+the+company+for+many+years%2C+worked+in+several+departments+and+are+likely+to+have+more+domain+knowledge+than+most.+Always+try+to+leverage+these+people+when+going+down+your+analytics+journey.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+capabilities+point+of+view%2C+there+are+two+additional+key+points+organisations+need+to+take+into+account.+Firstly%2C+the+relationships+with+external+parties%2C+which+include+vendors%2C+suppliers+and+universities.+These+people+are+paid+to+keep+up+to+date+with+industry+trends%2C+research+what+the+next+big+thing+is+and+are+more+than+willing+to+share+that+knowledge.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Universities+in+particular+are+great+channels+for+assisting+with+analytics+capabilities+because+their+research+departments+are+on+the+cutting+edge+of+what+is+coming+next.+They+are+also+in+need+of+corporate+sponsorship.+Many+graduates+are+doing+great+work+and+are+worth+talking+to+about+ideas+you+may+have+to+take+your+organisation+to+the+next+level.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+second+point+is+to+%26lsquo%3Binvest+time+in+wasting+time%26rsquo%3B.+This+is+one+of+the+most+important+things+you+can+do+to+keep+yourself+abreast+of+what+is+going+on+in+the+world+of+data+analytics.+Gather+a+team+and+sit+and+watch+YouTube+videos+for+an+hour+or+two+on+relevant+technologies%2Ftopics%2C+spend+time+reading+the+case+studies+and+just+talking+about+possibilities+and+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53151%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+third%3C%2Fa%3E+and+final+part+of+this+series%2C+I+will+look+at+the+best+case+structure+for+a+high+performing+analytics+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+three %3Cp%3EEach+company+has+its+own+unique+culture+and+this+drives+how+things+are+done+in+the+organisation.+To+transform+analytics%2C+make+sure+you+are+out+of+your+comfort+zone+%26ndash%3B+we+cannot+stick+to+the+same+way+of+doing+things+as+we+have+done+in+the+past.+Make+sure+innovation+is+encouraged+and+incentivised.+Support+from+an+executive+within+the+company+is+also+crucial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETransforming+technology+is+a+longer+process.+Companies+have+to+be+open+to+embracing+new+technologies+and+allowing+rogue+analytics+to+occur.+Forget+about+governance+%28to+a+certain+extent%2C+of+course%29+because+organisations+need+to+encourage+playing+around+with+new+technologies+and+they+should+not+wrap+up+the+process+in+red+tape.+Lastly%2C+and+good+news%2C+the+new+technologies+are+not+that+expensive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+capabilities+point+of+view%2C+embrace+the+online+courses+available+and+form+strategic+partners+with+vendors%2C+suppliers+and+universities+because+these+are+the+people+who+will+assist+you+in+getting+the+most+out+of+your+efforts.+Remember+to+invest+time+in+wasting+time+%26ndash%3B+watch+YouTube+videos%2C+read+case+studies+and+keep+up+to+date+with+industry+and+global+analytics+trends.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+believe+that+every+organisation+needs+an+analytics+steerco.+This+committee+should+be+made+up+of+people+who+are+both+internal+and+external+to+the+organisation.+There+should+be+an+internal+executive+who+chairs+the+meetings.+It+is+also+necessary+that+all+business+units+are+represented+in+this+steerco.+From+an+external+point+of+view%2C+technology+vendors%2C+outsourced+suppliers+as+well+as+students+from+local+universities+should+be+included.+With+a+team+of+the+above+individuals%2C+an+organisation+should+quickly+be+able+to+identify+a+strategy+of+analytics+that+will+target+small+pockets+of+work+that+can+prove+a+concept+and+show+a+value+add.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+the+steerco+is+set+up%2C+an+analytics+centre+of+excellence+is+needed.+This+should+comprise+of+people+who+are+passionate+about+technology+and+analytics.+These+people+will+be+responsible+for+executing+the+ideas+that+are+put+forward+by+the+analytics+steerco.+This+is+by+no+means+a+full+time+role%2C+once+the+analytics+strategy+is+solidified+it+will%2C+however%2C+warrant+the+dedicated+resources.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+summarise%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+take+a+look+at+the+process+for+an+analytics+Utopia+within+an+organisation.+Firstly%2C+there+needs+to+be+an+executive+heading+up+the+entire+process.+The+analytics+steerco+is+tasked+with+meeting+monthly+to+determine+what+questions+are+going+to+drive+the+strategy.+The+steerco+then+hands+the+ideas+to+the+analytics+centre+of+excellence%2C+which+executes+the+ideas+and+gives+feedback+to+the+steerco.+If+an+idea+is+deemed+to+be+valuable%2C+the+centre+of+excellence+hands+this+to+the+internal+BI%2FMIS+team%2C+which+then+formalises+the+new+analytics.+The+BI%2FMIS+team+implements+the+correct+data+governance%2C+adds+it+to+existing+structures+and+automates+the+processes+with+the+relevant+visualisations.+This+is+then+exposed+to+the+business+and+the+cycle+starts+again.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+of+these+steps+require+weekly+progress+updates%2C+monthly+meetings+as+well+as+a+huge+emphasis+on+change+management.+Business+users+need+to+understand+what+value+the+new+analytics+will+bring+to+the+table%2C+when+it+is+going+to+be+implemented+and+how+it+will+impact+the+day+to+day+running+of+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+in+all%2C+the+conference+was+successful+and+I%26rsquo%3Bm+sure+everyone+who+was+there%2C+took+away+something+from+the+conference+that+they+could+implement+within+their+organisations.+We+are+in+an+extremely+exciting+time%2C+with+everyone+racing+to+be+excellent+at+analytics+and+provide+a+better+experience+for+customers%2C+staff+and+ultimately%2C+their+organisations.%3C%2Fp%3E

Delivering+a+quality+service+%E2%80%93+getting+it+right %3Cp%3EThere+are+many+mechanisms+available+to+support+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+service-delivery+goals+and+effective+implementation+of+these+may+be+critical+in+achieving+those+goals.+They+include+technology+and+systems%2C+standard+operating+procedures%2C+industry+best+practices+and+standards+body+certifications.However%2C+many+companies+neglect+to+recognise+the+impact+of+the+softer+elements+of+service+delivery%3A+the+human+element.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterpersonal+relationships+can+take+a+mediocre+experience+and+turn+it+into+something+exceptional.+People+like+to+do+business+with+those+whom+they+trust+and+trust+is+an+emotional+response+to+a+positive+%28or+negative%29+experience+with+another+individual.+Having+all+the+checks+and+balances+in+place+cannot+guarantee+a+positive+outcome+if+interaction+at+a+personal+level+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+taken+care+of+effectively.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+obvious+answer+to+this+is+to+hire+the+right+people+but+this+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+really+tell+us+much.+If+competence+is+assured%2C+what+are+some+of+the+key+behavioural+characteristics+of+individuals+required+to+deliver+a+quality+service%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShow+a+sense+of+urgency%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EClients+want+to+know+that+you+are+taking+them+seriously.+This+can+best+be+done+by+showing+a+sense+of+urgency%2C+which+means+understanding+and+acknowledging+their+requests+or+concerns%2C+acting+immediately+and+providing+regular+feedback.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+reliable%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EReliability+is+a+requirement+for+trust.+Building+strong+relationships+requires+us+to+honour+our+commitments%2C+whether+made+in+passing+conversation+or+as+part+of+a+larger+project+plan.+Simple+things%2C+such+as+not+returning+a+phone+call+when+promised%2C+not+arriving+for+a+meeting+and+lack+of+attention+to+detail+resulting+in+a+rework%2C+can+erode+the+trust+in+relationship.+If+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+honour+a+commitment%2C+then+explain+the+circumstances%2C+provide+alternatives+and+present+a+revised+plan+of+action+that+is+agreeable+to+all+parties.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+objective%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmotional+biases+are+typically+triggered+by+our+past+experiences+or+when+challenged.+They+may+result+in+being+defensive%2C+sugar+coating+or+making+unreasonable+promises+that+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+kept.+Do+not+let+emotional+biases+get+in+the+way+of+presenting+information.+Always+present+the+facts+as+you+understand+them%2C+then%2C+and+only+if+asked+or+obliged%2C+provide+your+opinion+based+on+the+facts.+As+professionals%2C+we+owe+it+to+our+clients+to+first+present+factual+information%2C+irrespective+of+how+we+feel+about+a+particular+situation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECommunicate+frequently%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+it+comes+to+delivering+a+quality+service%2C+keep+all+those+involved+in+the+project+informed+with+regular+and+frequent+communication.+This+reiterates+a+%26lsquo%3Bsense+of+urgency%26rsquo%3B+and+shows+that+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+requirements+are+a+priority.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EValue+over+ego%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBe+humble+in+your+interactions+with+a+client+and+spend+more+time+listening+than+talking.+This+opens+the+door+for+a+better+understanding+of+their+needs+and+builds+a+stronger+interpersonal+relationship%2C+which%2C+in+turn%2C+builds+more+trust.+Going+into+a+discussion+hoping+to+learn+something+rather+than+teach+something%2C+ultimately+positions+you+to+provide+more+value+to+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+business+in+the+long-term.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+businesses+that+continue+to+prioritise+technology+and+processes+over+the+human+element+to+address+service+delivery+goals+will+always+fall+short+of+delivering+a+quality+service+to+their+clients.+Assuming+you+have+a+solid+product+and+the+ability+to+complete+the+job%2C+it+is+the+quality+of+the+interpersonal+experiences+that+leave+a+lasting+impression+and+build+a+better+relationship.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Delivering+a+quality+service+can+make+or+break+a+business%2C+especially+those+in+the+professional+services+space+where+the+product+is+the+service.+The+level+of+service+provided+to+clients+can+become+a+key+differentiator+and%2C+more+often+than+not%2C+determines+whether+a+client+will+partner+with+a+service+provider+for+the+long-term+or%2C+at+a+minimum%2C+refer+the+service+provider+to+other+potential+clients.
    
["Software best practices"]
   Doug.jpg    
Adaptation+in+software+development+processes%3A+Learn%2C+detach+and+transcend. %3Cp%3EIn+the+world+of+building+software%2C+best+practices+are+considered+a+field-proven+technique+for+solving+a+known+problem.+They+should+be+a+guide.+A+mechanism+that+sets+boundaries+and+establishes+clear+roles%2C+process+and+measurements.+As+software+professionals%2C+we+want+these+processes%2C+practices+and+methodologies+to+tell+us+how+to+get+big+teams+to+work+together+effectively%2C+how+to+measure+%28and+report%29+progress+and+how+to+collectively+deliver+great+quality+software.+This+sounds+right%2C+however%2C+best+practices+should+not+be+used+as+a+prescriptive%2C+singular+approach.+At+some+point%2C+every+problem+becomes+unique+and+common+sense+offers+additional+value.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EVoltaire+famously+said+in+1764+that+%26ldquo%3BCommon+sense+is+not+so+common%26rdquo%3B.+This+just+indicates+that+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+rely+on+common+sense+to+make+decisions+as+perspectives+are+not+always+shared.+Instead%2C+we+should+foster+a+shared+understanding%2C+a+consensus+on+a+position+and+perception+which+allows+groups+of+people+to+reach+the+same+conclusion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELooking+at+the+two+concepts%2C+there+is+a+clear+relationship.+It+seems+that+we+go+about+creating+and+documenting+practices+in+this+endless+desire+to+pen+down+common+sense%2C+to+articulate+things+that+we+often+feel+are+obvious+with+retrospect%2C+the+Agile+revolution+is+a+stand-out+example+of+this.+Perhaps+the+real+goal+is+to+know+how+to+sequence+and+blend+practices+to+service+a+specific+software+development+scenario+-+a+cocktail+of+experience%2C+maturity%2C+structure%2C+influence+and+intent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26rsquo%3Bm+regularly+confronted+by+frustrated+software+engineers+who+are+baffled+by+the+seeming+absence+of+common+sense+being+applied+in+their+development+environments.+The+frustration+of+engineers+and+development+managers+share+an+interesting+degree+of+overlap.+The+developer+is+confused+at+either+the+lack+or+excess+of+process%2C+and+the+development+manager+is+frustrated+at+the+lack+of+adoption+of+the+processes%2C+or+the+uncertainty+of+which+process+to+use.+Dealing+with+these+situations+takes+some+insight.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+like+to+think+of+best+practices%2C+or+strict+methodologies+as+a+set+of+rules+to+get+you+going.+First+we+need+to+learn+and+master+these+rules+and+their+application%2C+this+is+experience%2C+thereafter+we+can+experiment.+An+opinion+with+experience+carries+a+lot+more+weight.+People+aren%26%2339%3Bt+naturally+good+at+using+common+sense+in+complex+and+quickly+developing+areas%2C+so+it+feels+intuitive+to+start+with+a+documented+approach%2C+and+not+rely+on+our+own+individual+sense.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIntention+is+also+important.+Identify+the+actual+objective+of+the+practice.+For+example%2C+a+strict+process+that+govern+changes+to+a+software+product+could+feel+encumbered+and+unnecessary%2C+but+the+intention+is+to+protect+the+company+and+the+users%2C+which+makes+sense.+In+this+example+my+argument+would+be+to+first+master+the+process%2C+and+prove+beyond+a+doubt+that+you%26rsquo%3Bre+capable+of+adhering+to+it%2C+and+then+start+a+process+of+change+from+your+position+of+proven+knowledge.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+application+of+experience+and+mastery%2C+we+can+know+when+and+how+to+break%2C+or+evolve%2C+the+rules+to+better+suit+the+people%2C+the+product+or+the+objectives.+This+is+the+%26lsquo%3Bcommon+sense%26rsquo%3B+many+will+rush+to+claim+prematurely.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+this+understanding%2C+it+stands+to+reason+that+industries+current+set+of+best+practices+are+the+combination+of+experience+from+experts+who+have+come+before+us%2C+but+also+that+once+we+reach+a+level+of+experience+and+mastery%2C+our+own+common+sense+can+inspire+adaptation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+Japanese+martial+arts+concept+called+%26lsquo%3BShuhari%26rsquo%3B+which+roughly+translates+to+%26ldquo%3Bfirst+learn%2C+then+detach%2C+and+finally+transcend%26rdquo%3B+which+is+an+enlightening+approach+to+developing+best+practice+that+is+relevant+every+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect+we%26rsquo%3Bre+constantly+selecting%2C+applying+and+measuring+development+practices+to+find+what+works.+As+engineers%2C+processes+are+important+to+us+and+the+development+of+rules+helps+streamline+problem-solving+to+some+degree.+But+that+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+we+operate+SCRUM+by-the-book+on+every+project.+Every+problem+really+is+unique%2C+mostly+because+of+the+people%21+Part+of+successfully+applying+best+practice+requires+establishing+a+consensus+on+a+position+and+perception+between+development+managers+and+engineers.+At+which+point%2C+the+team+can+%26lsquo%3Blearn%2C+detach+and+transcend%26rsquo%3B+and+the+resulting+application+of+common+sense+can+add+real+value+to+best+practice+solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E
Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Managed+Services%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+As+software+professionals%2C+we+embrace+best+practices+and+processes+that+allow+us+to+do+our+jobs+more+effectively.+But+every+problem+is+unique.+The+ability+for+a+team+to+%27learn%2C+detach+and+transcend%27+can+add+immeasurable+value+to+the+software+solutions+it+delivers.

%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToday%2C+just+about+anything+can+be+learnt+via+the+internet%2C+enabling+people+all+over+the+world+the+chance+to+develop+skills+in+virtually+any+field.+Considering+the+fast+growth+of+the+technology+industry%2C+this+presents+exciting+opportunities%3B+placing+opportunity+in+the+hands+of+anyone+dedicated+to+learning+a+new+skill.+As+such%2C+the+rock+stars+of+today+are+no+longer+traditional+jocks%2C+they+are+geeks+with+laptops.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+shift+is+even+more+relevant+in+the+software+industry.+Anyone+technically+inclined+can+learn+how+to+write+software+if+they+spend+enough+time+on+Google.+And+with+a+keen+eye+for+innovation%2C+anyone+can+come+up+with+a+great+concept+that+has+the+potential+to+disrupt+life+the+way+Facebook+did.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENo+doubt%2C+there+have+been+some+truly+amazing+software+solutions+built+in+this+informal+fashion%2C+but+the+difference+between+a+great+concept+and+a+beautifully+built+piece+of+software+that+complies+with+best+practices+and+quality+standards%2C+is+a+lot+of+hard+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+media+and+Silicon+Valley+glamorize+stories+of+the+%26lsquo%3Blone+genius+coder%26rsquo%3B%2C+those+superstars+depicted+in+films+such+as+The+Social+Network+and+Mr.+Robot.+But+the+truth+is%2C+there+is+no+shortcut+to+building+great+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELike+any+industry%2C+there+are+isolated+geniuses+who+build+out+products+that+fundamentally+disrupt+our+lives.+But%2C+like+football+millionaires+and+music+artists%2C+these+stories+are+exceptional+and+are+only+a+fraction+of+the+people+who+contribute+to+their+industries.+Silicon+Valley+for+example%2C+employs+only+8%25+of+coders+in+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wired.com%2F2017%2F02%2Fprogramming-is-the-new-blue-collar-job%2F%22%3EUS%3C%2Fa%3E.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+does+the+bigger+picture+look+like%3F+For+starters%2C+while+many+coders+and+engineers+across+the+world+are+self-taught%2C+most+have+had+formalized+training+behind+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+most+software+engineers+in+the+industry+build+out+products+that+answer+a+business+need.+Many+work+for+businesses%2C+big+or+small%2C+or+consultancies+where+a+large+part+of+the+job+is+helping+to+identify+the+problem+and+best+fit+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDo+they+receive+the+same+glory+and+recognition+on+the+global+stage%3F+No.+But+often+the+solutions+that+engineers+develop+to+resolve+various+challenges+provide+a+greater+sense+of+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+traditional+industries+shift+towards+technology+solutions%2C+engineers+can+find+themselves+working+to+build+time-effective%2C+secure+banking+solutions+that+help+make+your+day-to-day+life+easier%3B+or+healthcare+solutions+that+help+people+identify+early+onset+of+diseases%2C+or+agriculture+solutions+that+help+farmers+monitor+the+health+of+their+crop+or+livestock.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften+these+are+small+shifts%2C+but+they+can+have+a+dramatic+impact+on+the+livelihoods+of+the+communities+around+us.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+within+these+environments+there+can+be+inconsistencies+between+the+capabilities+of+those+software+engineers+with+formalized+or+non-formalized+training.+Not+every+company+requires+a+graduate+degree+for+example.+Equally%2C+even+within+academia%2C+there+can+be+discrepancies+regarding+the+different+levels+of+practical+experience+obtained%2C+making+a+significant+difference+to+the+engineers%26rsquo%3B+ability+to+build+the+right+solution+for+the+problem+at+hand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+building+software%2C+engineers+need+to+consider+issues+such+as+maintainability%2C+quality%2C+stability%2C+performance%2C+consistent+standards%2C+security%2C+and+scalability.+To+build+a+perfect+solution+requires+the+engineer+to+do+all+these+things+in+parallel%2C+which+is+true+craftsmanship+and+takes+years+of+experience.%26nbsp%3B+It+requires+significant+thought+to+be+applied+to+the+architecture+and+design%2C+the+ability+to+apply+computer+science+principles+%28such+as+OO%29%2C+and+a+strong+problem+solving+ability.+As+such%2C+mastering+the+skills+required+to+deliver+great+software+is+a+highly+adapted+talent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+understands+the+complexities+of+todays%26rsquo%3B+business+challenges+in+software+engineering%2C+and+this+has+informed+our+hiring+strategy.+We+believe+that+a+degree+in+Information+Technology%2C+Engineering+or+Mathematics+equips+a+prospective+candidate+with+the+foundation+required+to+become+a+great+software+engineer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+our+graduates%2C+we+build+on+their+academic+learning+with+an+intensive+6+week+graduate+bootcamp+to+convert+the+academic+learning+into+practical+real-world+experience.+We+then+invest+heavily+in+continued+training+to+ensure+all+our+staff+are+constantly+at+the+forefront+of+software+engineering+trends+and+best+practices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+however%2C+in+South+Africa+the+software+engineering+field+is+predominately+unregulated.+Compared+to+traditional+engineering+disciplines+and+law%2C+there+are+a+lack+of+governing+bodies+and+professional+organisations.+This+makes+it+harder+for+potential+clients+or+employers+to+spot+the+average+coders+from+outstanding+talent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+this+is+improving+globally%2C+we+are+in+the+midst+of+a+societal+shift+towards+citizen-driven+access+to+knowledge+that+is+up-ending+our+traditional+regulatory+systems.+Legislation+needs+to+understand+how+to+work+with+these+shifts+and+apply+quality+controls+accordingly%2C+but+this+will+take+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThat+anyone+can+teach+themselves+to+code+via+google+is+fantastic.+It+gives+this+growing+industry+a+low+barrier+to+entry%2C+making+it+inclusive+and+meaning+that+anyone+can+discover+their+potential.+However%2C+transitioning+from+a+self-taught+coder+to+a+software+engineer+capable+of+true+craftsmanship+takes+years+of+experience+and+formalized+training.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+determined+to+become+a+superstar+coder%2C+then+you+should+commit+to+continued+learning+including+some+formalized+training+and+understand+that+there+are+no+short+cuts%2C+just+a+lot+of+hard+work+and+true+dedication+to+your+craft.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Building+a+high+impact+leadership+development+framework %3Cp%3EGlobally%2C+companies+spend+millions+on+formal+Leadership+Development+initiatives+to+try+and+fast+track+and+invest+in+their+leadership+pipeline.+A+typical+Harvard+Business+School+Executive+Leadership+Development+Program+can+easily+cost+in+excess+of+%2440%26nbsp%3B000%2C+with+local+programs+being+a+bit+more+affordable%2C+ranging+from+R60%26nbsp%3B000+for+short+courses+to+an+excess+of+R300%26nbsp%3B000+for+executive+focused+programmes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIrrespective+of+the+type+of+programme%2C+they+all+have+a+common+goal+in+mind%3A+to+develop+the+next+set+of+leaders+inside+our+organisations.+However%2C+we+sometimes+miss+the+mark+by+not+delivering+a+good+balance+between+targeted+outcomes+compared+to+the+amount+of+time%2C+effort+and+money+put+in.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+other+words+we+are+not+getting+the+needed+bang+for+our+buck.+But+there+are+some%26nbsp%3Bcommon+mistakes+we+make+when+starting+these+initiatives%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1%29+Failing+to+properly+define+expected+ROI+metrics+and+later+benchmarking+against+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2%29+Failing+to+select+the+correct+programme%2C+course+or+service+provider+that+fits+the+current+needs%2C+goals+and+culture+of+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3%29+Not+selecting+the+right+attendees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+we+all+know%2C+there+are+no+shortcuts+to+developing+our+staff%2C+be+it+technical+development+or+leadership+development.+What+we+need+is+a+well+thought+through+approach+that+will+help+us+navigate+the+dynamic+world+of+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETime%2C+effort%2C+commitment+and+follow+through%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EForm+a+managerial+level%2C+we+need+to+spend+time+and+effort+to+take+stock+of+what+our+organisational+needs+are.+For+example%2C+do+we+prioritise+technical+skills+over+leadership+skills%3F+Do+we+get+an+external+service+provider+to+present+new+content+or%2C+do+we+develop+our+own%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+need+to+commit+to+our+training+and+development+initiatives+as+part+of+a+continual+learning+process.+We+do+this+by+actively+managing+expectations+and+actual+outcomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+we+need+follow+through.+We+need+to+measure%2C+assess+and+be+able+to+illustrate+the+true+impact+the+program+has+had%2C+not+only+on+the+organisation+as+a+whole%2C+but+specifically+on+the+individual.+That+is+ultimately+our+goal%2C+improving+the+individual.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+framework%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+help+you+structure+your+skills%2C+and+leadership+development+programmes+it+is+worth+thinking+of+it+in+terms+of+a+hierarchy+of+needs.+Different+groups+of+employees+have+different+needs%2C+at+different+times+of+their+careers%2C+where+each+layer+supports+and+builds+up+to+the+next+layer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+typical+hierarchy+of+needs+triangle+can+illustrate+how+you+could+structure+some+of+your+initiatives+to+achieve+maximum+impact.+Each+level+targets+a+specific+need+or+group+in+the+business%2C+and+will+be+tailored+accordingly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Culture+and+Values%3A+As+a+starting+point+the+cultural+elements+as+well+as+the+core+values+of+the+organisation+needs+to+be+defined%2C+communicated+and+regularly+reinforced.+One+of+the+many+functions+of+this+layer+is+to+set+and+communicate+your+commitment+to+caring+for+and+growing+your+staff.+Initiatives+in+this+layer+can+be+broader+in+focus+and+can+be+targeted+to+larger+groups+within+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+Core+Technical+Competencies+layer+focusses+on+equipping+your+staff+with+the+needed+skills+and+knowledge+to+be+able+to+effectively+perform+their+duties.+In+other+words%2C+your+staff+needs+to+have+the+ability+to+perform+per+the+expected+standard+of+excellence.+Training+programs+that+fall+into+this+layer%2C+should+have+a+direct+impact+on+the+daily+operations+of+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.The+Technical+Specialities+layer+focusses+on+the+specialist+skillsets+that+will+help+drive+your+business+forward%2C+ensuring+that%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+remains+relevant+in+the+market+place+in+terms+of+technical+capability+%28such+as+technology+changes%2C+competition%2C+client+demands%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+can+take+on+new+opportunities+that+arise+over+time+as+result+of+a+changing+market+conditions+%28such+as+emerging+technologies%2C+new+markets%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+can+differentiate+itself+from+its+competitors+%28via+niche+or+specialist+skills%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+New+Leadership+Development+focusses+on+developing+new+leaders+and+helping+them+transition+from+technical+experts+into+leaders+in+your+organisation.+This+is+especially+difficult+to+achieve%2C+especially+in+strong+technical+environments+where+a+lot+of+value+and+status+is+assigned+to+your+technical+and+specialist+ability+as+an+individual.+What+is+important+to+note%2C+and+incorporate%2C%26nbsp%3B+into+initiatives+for+this+layer+is+the+differentiation+between+technical+ability+and+leadership+ability+as+distinct+disciplines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInitiatives+in+this+layer+are+less+broad%2C+and+some+specialisation+needs+to+be+done+by+identifying+sub+groups%2C+such+as+inexperienced+leaders+vs+experienced+leaders.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Targeted+Leadership+Development+needs+to+ensure+that+you+nurture+and+grow+your+key+leaders+in+the+organisation.+What+needs+to+be+recognised+is+that+just+as+you+would+mentor+your+staff+on+technical+competencies%2C+leaders+need+specific+leadership+focused+mentorship+in+order+to+develop+their+leadership+ability+further.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EResearch+has+shown+that+people+who+have+been+mentored+by+multiple+mentors%2C+have+shown+greater+levels+success+than+those+who+have+only+been+mentored+by+a+single+mentor.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInitiatives+in+this+layer+needs+to+be+focused+on+the+individual+and+tailored+to+their+specific+needs+and+situation.+If+they+are+group+based%2C+the+groups+must+be+smaller+and+individuals+needs+to+be+grouped+according+to+their+leadership+development+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+the+outcomes+and+impact+of+training+and+development+initiatives+needs+to+be+measurable+and+illustratable+to+be+able+to+assess+the+value+of+the+amount+of+time%2C+effort+and+money+put+in.+But+similarly%2C+the+appropriate+selection+and+%26lsquo%3Bfit%26rsquo%3B+of+employees+to+each+training+course+is+important.+You+need+to+ensure+that+the+initiative+will+cater+to+the+needs+of+the+specific+group+or+person%2C+and+that+the+expected+outcomes+will+match+your+goals+for+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+applying+our+minds+and+defining+a+structured+approach+to+how+we+implement+our+training+leadership+development+initiatives+we+can+start+the+journey+of+not+only+caring+for%2C+and+growing+our+staff+more+effectively%2C+but+also+delivering+true+value+to+the+organisation+without+blowing+the+budget.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

A+case+for+unpleasant+design+in+software+development %3Cp%3EIn+the+world+of+software+development%2C+user+experience+%28UX%29+design+is+a+hot+topic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EResearch+has+shown+that+UX+design+can+significantly+enhance+the+customer+experience%2C+by+focusing+design+efforts+on+improving+usability%2C+accessibility+and+the+user+journey.+In+the+age+of+mobile%2C+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+experience+can+have+a+huge+impact+on+whether+your+app+will+be+a+success+or+failure%3A+the+difference+between+millions+of+downloads+and+none.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+recently+listened+to+a+podcast+about+%26lsquo%3BHostile+Architecture%26rsquo%3B+and+started+thinking+about+how+we+can+employ+this+concept+in+shaping+users%26rsquo%3B+behaviour%3B+pushing+them+away+from+certain+behaviours+and+towards+others.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+have+a+look+at+what+is+meant+by+%26lsquo%3BHostile+Architecture%26rsquo%3B%2C+also+known+as+%26lsquo%3Bunpleasant+design%26rsquo%3B.+In+architecture%2C+unpleasant+design+has+manifested+itself+in+a+wide+variety+of+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+common+examples%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EUsing+metal+spikes+or+protrusions+to+prevent+people+from+sitting+or+sleeping+on+sidewalks+and+in+front+of+shop+windows%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDesigning+seats+in+a+way+that+prevents+people+from+sitting+comfortably+for+long+periods%2C+such+as+at+bus+and+train+stations%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAt+airports%2C+arm+rests+are+designed+in+a+way+that+prevents+people+from+lying+down%2C+forcing+them+to+sit%2C+straight+up%2C+knees+facing+forward+%26ndash%3B+not+the+most+comfortable+position+for+a+wary+traveller%21%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+use+of+pink+lighting+outside+shops+accentuates+skin+blemishes+and+therefore+discourages+teenagers+from+congregating+outside%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+use+of+ultraviolet+lighting+under+city+bridges+and+in+public+restrooms+makes+it+difficult+for+drug+users+to+locate+their+veins+to+inject+drugs%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+note+is+that%2C+in+all+these+examples%2C+the+core+problem+was+not+resolved%2C+but+rather+shifted.+It+forced+vagrants+to+find+other+places+to+sit+or+sleep%2C+teenagers+to+find+other+spots+to+congregate+at%2C+that+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+highlight+their%2C+well%2C+spots.+Drug+users+were+forced+to+find+other+places+to+get+high.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+point+is+that+unpleasant+design+is+meant+to+deter+or+frustrate+the+user+to+such+an+extent+that+the+undesirable+behaviour+is+either+ceased+or+displaced.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+how+do+we+apply+this+to+UX+design%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+if+you+wanted+to+change+your+users%26rsquo%3B+behaviours%2C+you+probably+wouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+opt+to+frustrate+them.+You+might+argue+that+you+would+rather+use+an+incentive+model+to+elicit+the+desired+behavioural+change.+However%2C+there+are+a+few+examples+where+unpleasant+design+might+come+in+handy%2C+such+as+in+fraud+prevention+and+monitoring.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+part+of+bigger+enterprise-level+systems%2C+some+activities+are+considered+higher+risk+than+others.+For+instance%2C+users+of+a+payments+administration+platform+might+be+able+to+update+or+change+a+creditor%26rsquo%3Bs+banking+details.+By+manipulating+these+details%2C+payments+could+potentially+be+funnelled+away+from+the+intended+recipient+into+a+fraudster%26rsquo%3Bs+account.+If+details+are+changed+back+after+a+payment+has+been+processed%2C+and+in+the+absence+of+proper+control+mechanisms%2C+the+fraud+could+go+undetected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+that+all+the+typical+control+mechanisms+and+processes+are+in+place+to+prevent+fraud+but+that+there+are+functions+on+the+system+that+are+vulnerable+to+abuse.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+do+we+design+a+system+that+highlights+and+actively+discourages+these+high-risk+actions%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+approach+could+be+to+apply+the+concept+of+unpleasant+design%2C+with+the+purpose+of+deterring+or+frustrating+the+user+to+avoid+certain+undesirable+or+high-risk+behaviours.+For+example%2C+the+high-risk+behaviour+on+the+system+is+highlighted+by+making+the+typical+audit+trail+data+visible+to+the+users.+By+doing+this%2C+the+user+is+made+acutely+aware+of+his+actions+and+behaviour+on+the+system%2C+as+well+as+the+fact+that+this+behaviour+is+being+tracked+and+monitored.+And+so%2C+you+rely+on+the+resulting+psychological+effect+as+the+deterrent%3A+the+fear+of+being+caught.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUnderstanding+your+client+and+their+business%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+need+to+constantly+look+for+ideas+and+find+inspiration+from+other+environments+and+industries+to+help+drive+innovation+and+rejuvenate+our+way+of+thinking+about+how+we+design+and+build+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E
Jaco+Grant+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+UX+design+can+significantly+enhance+customer+experience.+But+recently+a+slightly+unconventional+approach+known+as+%27hostile+architecture%E2%80%99+is+being+used+to+shape+consumer+behaviour.+So%2C+how+can+you+apply+this+to+UX+design+effectively%3F

Let%E2%80%99s+do+Agile+right %3Cp%3EAgile+is+an+approach+that+companies+must+be+prepared+to+live%2C+breathe+and+consistently+practise+to+realise+the+full+value+of+the+methodology.+This+means+full+buy-in+and+in+most+instances%2C+a+mind-shift+across+the+entire+organisation.+Add+the+rapid+pace+of+industry+caused+by+the+Digital+Age%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+see+why+every+organisation+needs+a+software+development+workforce+to+stay+up-to-date+and+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETraditional+product+development+lifecycles+just+don%26rsquo%3Bt+cut+it+anymore.+These+processes+can+delay+a+great+idea+by+12+months%2C+meaning+your+organisation+quickly+loses+its+position+against+it+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Agile+methodology+was+designed+to+help+organisations+respond+more+efficiently+in+a+dynamic+market+environment.+But+there+are+critical+success+factors+to+Agile.+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+adhere+to+these%2C+then+you%26rsquo%3Bre+probably+not+seeing+the+benefits+and+wondering+what+all+the+fuss+is+about.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+do+Agile+right%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+To+do+Agile+%26lsquo%3Bright%26rsquo%3B%2C+requires+the+organisation+to+foster+a+culture+of+innovation.+Agile+creates+a+%26lsquo%3Bstart-up%26rsquo%3B+vibe%2C+which+inspires+employees.+It+is+widely+understood+that+a+great+idea+can+come+from+any+facet+of+a+business%2C+and+most+certainly+from+any+employee.+Challenging+the+status+quo+is+a+characteristic+that+is+at+the+heart+of+Agile.+An+organisation+that+encourages+its+employees+to+constantly+challenge+the+status+quo+is+going+to+inspire+innovative+thinking+as+part+of+its+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+team+structure+is+critical.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+the+responsibility+of+the+product+owner+in+an+Agile+squad+to+ensure+that+the+right+people+are+in+the+right+seat.+A+squad+normally+comprises+of+the+following+roles%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Product+owner%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Scrum+master%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Technical+lead%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Squad+members+%28developers%2C+designers%2C+testers%2C+data+analysts+and+analysts%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+squad+should+then+be+supported+by+a+scrum+coach%2C+engineering+coach%2C+and+people+coach.+Coaches+may+seem+like+an+unnecessary+second+layer+but+the+coaches+are+essential.+They+are+there+to+support%2C+guide%2C+and+teach+the+tools+and+principles+for+successful+Agile+implementation.+Without+them%2C+your+squad+will+not+have+the+benefit+of+previous+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Provide+plenty+of+training.+The+dynamic+nature+of+Agile+means+that+teams+must+be+constantly+learning%2C+evolving+and+adapting.+Teams+need+a+vast+array+of+skills+and+experience+to+deliver+on+an+Agile+project.+It+is+important+to+equip+the+squad+with+the+necessary+skills+and+knowledge+to+make+the+correct+calls.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+Agile+goes+wrong%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+reasons+Agile+in+organisations+fails+before+it+gets+going.+Often+it+is+the+lack+of+simple+but+essential+team+features.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Autonomy.+The+product+owner+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+allow+or+encourage+autonomy+in+the+squad.+The+squad+must+be+encouraged+to+make+decisions+and+consequently+take+ownership.+Only+when+people+feel+a+sense+of+ownership+can+they+have+the+greatest+impact+on+a+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+scrum+master+must+sustain+performance.+When+scrum+masters+don%26rsquo%3Bt+drive+performance%2C+or+demonstrate+any+creativity+to+improve+team+dynamics%2C+communication+breaks+down+and+this+ultimately+breaks+the+quality+and+culture+in+the+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Compiling+a+team+with+the+wrong+skills.+In+a+bid+to+get+an+Agile+team+in+place%2C+corporates+often+compile+a+squad+without+the+right+complement+of+skills+and+expertise.+The+result+is+that+the+team+falls+back+into+its+old+habits.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+The+product+must+be+designed%2C+spec%26rsquo%3Bd+and+estimated+before+it+is+passed+to+the+Agile+squad+to+build.+Thereby+fitting+a+waterfall+project+into+an+Agile+development+drive+train%2C+but+not+allowing+Agile+methodology+to+build+the+product+as+you+go.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+start+Agile+in+a+corporate%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+top-down+approach+is+always+the+best+place+to+start.+No+doubt+that+buy-in+from+executives+and+senior+management+really+help+to+cement+a+new+approach.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHire+smart.+Ensure+you+have+the+correct+people+with+the+correct+skills+on+the+team.+Importantly%2C+make+sure+you+have+a+Scrum+master+who+can+keep+the+team+running+on+a+solid%2C+even%2C+and+efficient+pace.+This+person+must+be+the+heartbeat+of+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStart+with+a+fresh+project+with+minimal+dependencies.+This+will+allow+you+to+experience+the+strength+of+doing+Agile+%26lsquo%3Bright%26rsquo%3B%2C+and+doing+it+right+first+time+will+give+you+a+solid+base+for+your+next+Agile+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+forget+to+look+after+your+people.+The+environment%2C+having+the+right+tools+for+the+job+%26ndash%3B+and+plenty+of+coffee+-+all+play+a+big+part.+The+team+must+be+exceptionally+cohesive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+be+committed+to+the+process.+The+ship+turns+slowly+at+first%2C+but+keep+it+turning+and+your+business+will+find+a+pace+that+will+allow+it+to+be+more+dynamic+than+its+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E
Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Agile+was+designed+to+help+organisations+respond+more+efficiently+in+a+dynamic+marketplace.+But+to+do+Agile+right+requires+a+culture+that+encourages+innovation+and+continual+learning%2C+and+well+structured+teams.
    
["Software best practices"]

Developing+a+natural+interest+in+STEM+through+open+source+software %3Cp%3EDuring+another+power+cut+in+a+poor+area+of+Brazil%2C+a+mechanic+sat+in+the+dark+and+wondered+how+he+could+light+up+his+house+without+electricity.+He+came+up+with+the+idea+of+pouring+bleach+and+water+into+a+two-litre+plastic+bottle%2C+which+refracted+sunlight+through+a+hole+in+the+roof+and+lit+up+his+house+during+the+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlfredo+Moser%26rsquo%3Bs+invention+has+provided+a+simple+lighting+solution+to+millions+of+people+who+live+in+off-grid+areas+around+the+world.+Others+have+since+improved+on+his+design%2C+by+attaching+solar+panels+so+that+it+can+also+provide+light+at+night-time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+a+real-world+example+of+the+value+and+beauty+of+open+source+design%2C+more+commonly+spoken+about+in+the+context+of+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EGreater+good%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesigners%2C+inventors+and+engineers+put+their+ideas+out+into+the+world+in+the+hopes+that+they+will+inspire+others+to+improve+on+their+designs+and+create+something+that+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+live+without.+Open+source+collaboration+works+so+well+because+the+community+is+committed+to+making+every+iteration+better+and+more+secure+than+the+last.+They+take+pride+in+what+they+do+and+work+together+to+produce+high-quality+solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThey%26rsquo%3Bve+gotten+it+right+in+the+software+space%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+few+years+ago%2C+proprietary+business+and+creative+software+was+prohibitively+expensive+for+many+people.+But+the+unstoppable+rise+of+the+open+source+movement+has+democratised+software+and+information+to+the+point+where+%26ndash%3B+no+matter+what+type+of+software+you+need+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+likely+you%26rsquo%3Bll+find+a+free%2C+high+quality+and+substantially+cheaper+alternative+to+the+top-of-the-range%2C+paid-for+options.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+enterprises+are+increasingly+putting+their+trust+in+open+source+software%2C+like+Apache%2C+Linux+and+MySQL%2C+and+the+big+guys%2C+like+Microsoft%2C+are+releasing+a+lot+of+their+source+code+to+open+source+platforms.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+us+don%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+realise+how+much+open+source+software+we+use+every+day+%26ndash%3B+or+the+impact+these+solutions+have+had+on+our+lives.+If+you+watch+videos+through+VLC+Media+Player%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using+open+source+software.+If+you+use+Mozilla+as+an+email+or+web+browsing+client%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using+open+source+software.+If+you+use+GIMP+to+edit+images+or+Drupal+to+build+websites+%26ndash%3B+you+get+the+point.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow+imagine+the+impact+of+equally+high+quality+education+software+in+the+lives+of+children+in+rural+or+under-resourced+areas.+Imagine+the+difference+in+learning+outcomes+between+children+studying+out+of+outdated%2C+dog-eared+textbooks%2C+versus+engaging+with+world-class%2C+interactive+and+relevant+digital+content+that+immerses+learners+in+topics+that+excite+them%2C+rather+than+imposing+structured%2C+predetermined+and+%26ndash%3B+let%26rsquo%3Bs+face+it+%26ndash%3B+boring+curricula+on+them+just+because+that%26rsquo%3Bs+the+way+it%26rsquo%3Bs+always+been+done.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+new%2C+effective+approach+to+STEM%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+how+we%26rsquo%3Bll+get+children+interested+in+science%2C+technology%2C+engineering+and+mathematics+%28STEM%29+%26ndash%3B+effortlessly+and+effectively.+Not+by+lowering+pass+rates+or+making+these+subjects+optional+in+schools.+The+truth+is%2C+if+we+keep+teaching+STEM+subjects+the+way+we+always+have%2C+children+will+never+be+excited+about+them.+But+let+them+tinker+around+with+IoT+and+the+free+resources+on+sites+like+Wyliodrin+Studio%2C+or+encourage+them+to+contribute+to+the+open+source+projects+on+Village+Science%2C+and+watch+a+love+of+STEM+develop+naturally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+we+remove+the+barriers+to+e-learning%3B+when+we+let+children+do+what+they+love+to+do+%26ndash%3B+tinker+with+gadgets%2C+learn+through+games%2C+share+ideas+with+friends+%26ndash%3B+they%26rsquo%3Bll+become+interested+in+STEM+without+us+even+trying.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd+the+onus+is+no+longer+on+teachers+to+be+subject+matter+experts.+With+e-learning%2C+teachers+become+facilitators+of+the+learning+process%2C+helping+children+to+find+their+passions+and+encouraging+them+to+delve+deeper%2C+to+teach+themselves+a+new+skill%2C+to+learn+how+to+make+something+with+their+hands.+That%26rsquo%3Bs+probably+the+best+definition+of+teaching+there+is.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+this+context%2C+learning+becomes+addictive+because+there+are+no+boundaries%2C+no+mandated+content%3B+just+free+access+to+a+world+of+knowledge.+Imagine+the+impact+of+that.+Imagine+what+happens+when+we+give+children+the+opportunity+to+become+the+next+generation+of+open+source+coders%2C+tinkerers+and+collaborators+on+the+next+world-impacting+or+life-changing+invention.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EChallenges%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELow-cost+computing+solutions+like+the+Raspberry+Pi%2A+make+it+more+affordable+than+ever+to+set+up+computer+labs+in+schools.+By+simply+plugging+in+a+monitor+and+keyboard%2C+you+instantly+have+a+fully+working+computer+on+which+children+can+learn+programming+to+build+anything+they+want.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+debate+around+STEM+needs+to+change+from+how+to+get+children+interested+%28because+they+already+are%29+to+how+to+facilitate+the+deployment+of+these+software+and+hardware+solutions+in+schools.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConnectivity+is+still+the+biggest+stumbling+block.+While+e-learning+can+certainly+be+delivered+without+connectivity+%26ndash%3B+through+preloaded+content+%26ndash%3B+learning+truly+comes+alive+when+children+are+able+to+define+their+own+learning+journeys+and+access+the+tomes+of+free+content+that+will+help+them+to+shape+their+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConnectivity+is+maturing+in+the+country%2C+with+the+roll-out+of+fibre-to-the-home+and+the+government%26rsquo%3Bs+drive+to+bring+down+data+costs.+This+is+where+we+should+be+placing+our+attention+in+the+STEM+debate%3A+to+get+more+people+online+in+support+of+the+idea+that+connectivity+is+a+basic+human+right.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEverything+else+is+semantics%3A+software+is+free%2C+hardware+is+affordable%2C+the+interest+is+there.+Open+source+software+has+revolutionised+every+other+aspect+of+our+lives+and+businesses%2C+yet+it%26rsquo%3Bs+only+trickling+into+the+education+system%2C+where+it+arguably+should+be+implemented+with+the+most+fervour+because+our+children+will+be+the+next+innovators%2C+tinkerers+and+world-changers.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+our+responsibility+to+give+them+the+tools+and+information+that+will+open+their+minds+and+spark+their+creativity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Mark+Beets+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+The+rise+of+the+open+source+movement+has+democratised+software.+By+letting+children+tinker+around+with+IoT%2C+or+encouraging+them+to+contribute+to+open+source+projects%2C+we%27ll+be+able+to+stimulate+a+love+of+STEM.
    
["Software best practices"]
