Recovering+from+failure %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+say+that+between+45%25+to+55%25+of+IT+projects+fail.+Others+also+say+that+80%25+of+statistics+are+made+up+on+the+spot%2C+or+is+it+75%25%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIrrespective+of+how+many+projects+fail+the+important+thing+to+realize+is%2C+they+do+fail.+Failure+is+a+relative+term%2C+and+can+be+varied+in+scope%2C+intensity+and+consequence.+Some+projects+run+over+resource+or+time+constraints+with+marginal+consequence%2C+others+fail+miserably+with+disastrous+consequences.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+1999%2C+NASA+lost+one+of+its+%24129-Million+Mars+Orbiters+due+to+a+seemingly+obvious+problem+and+mistake.+The+problem+being+the+conversion+from+inches%2C+feet+and+pounds+to+millimeters%2C+meters+and+kilograms%2C+with+the+quite+disastrous+mistake+being+that+it+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+being+converted+at+all.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+it+turns+out+the+two+teams+working+on+the+project%2C+NASA%26rsquo%3Bs+JPL+%28Jet+Propulsion+Laboratory%29+and+Lockheed+Martin+were+using+the+different+measurement+systems+for+their+respective+calculations.+The+result+being+that+after+its+286-day+journey+to+Mars%2C+the+Orbiter+initiated+and+engine+burn+to+push+itself+into+its+final+orbit+around+Mars.+Due+to+the+unit+mismatch%2C+it+pushed+the+orbiter+25+km+closer+to+the+atmosphere+than+it+should+have.+Subsequently+things+got+worse%2C+the+engine+overheated%2C+turned+itself+off+and+ultimately+the+orbiter+shot+through+the+upper+Mars+atmosphere%2C+popping+out+the+other+side%2C+sending+it+outwards+into+space.+Presumably+to+%26lsquo%3Bwhere+no+man+has+gone+before%26rsquo%3B.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+us+in+the+enterprise+software+development+space%2C+the+consequence+of+failure+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+quite+as+extreme+as+was+the+case+for+the+Mars+orbiter%2C+but+stakes+are+still+pretty+high+in+terms+of+delivering+feature+rich%2C+high+quality+software+solutions+to+our+clients.+There+is+the+obvious+financial+impact+of+failed+projects%2C+but+most+importantly+there+is+a+huge+loss-of-opportunity+cost.+This+can+range+from+a+basic+loss+of+income+caused+by+not+being+able+to+capitalize+on+your+ideas+or+initiatives%2C+to+making+bad+business+decisions+by+not+having+sufficient+insight+into+your+own+business+data.+Bad+decisions+can+cost+you+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFailure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+when+things+do+go+wrong+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+work+out+as+expected%3B+what+then%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWell%2C+depending+of+the+severity+of+the+failure%2C+your+first+action+might+be+to+Google+The+Seven+Stages+of+Grief+%28Shock%2C+Denial%2C+Anger%2C+Bargaining%2C+Depression%2C+Testing%2C+Acceptance%29.+And+then+you+realize+that+ironically+a+lack+of+Testing+and+Acceptance+is+probably+what+got+you+into+this+mess+in+the+first+place%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+as+the+shock+fades+you+turn+your+attention+back+to+the+task+at+hand.+What+now%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+a+start%2C+it+is+to+be+expected+that+your+client+will+most+probably+be+very+angry+and+may+need+an+outlet+to+vent+their+frustration.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+see+this+as+a+negative+aspect+of+the+experience.+The+important+point+to+note+here+is+to+listen+and+show+the+client+that+you+care%2C+not+that+you+are+just+sympathetic%2C+but+that+you+are+deeply+empathetic+as+to+what+has+transpired.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOwn+your+mistakes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+building+meaningful+relationships+with+your+clients%2C+it+will+create+room+for+experimentation+and+ultimately+create+tolerance+for+mistakes.+It+is+important+to+own+your+mistakes+and+to+never+underestimate+the+value+of+saying+you+are+sorry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+all+the+information+at+hand+before+responding+to+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+view+point+and+frustrations.+It+is+important+to+take+stock+and+assess+what+when+wrong.+Most+of+the+time+it+is+not+a+single+factor%2C+but+a+series+of+factors+and+events+that+culminates+into+a+crisis.+It+is+important+the+translate+this+into+a+learning+experience+for+both+yourself%2C+your+team+and+even+your+client.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ENever+waste+a+good+crisis%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+will+naturally+lead+you+into+a+space+where+you+can+start+the+recovery+process%2C+for+both+yourself+and+your+client.+This+is+the+stage+where+you+start+fighting+your+way+back+and+winning+back+some+of+the+trust+that+may+have+been+lost.+You+need+to+research%2C+plan%2C+negotiate+and+work+your+way+back.+This+is+where+you+show+what+you+are+made+of%2C+you+need+to+commit+time%2C+resources+and+potentially+money+to+work+towards+your+planned+goals+of+recovery.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+challenges+along+the+way+will+include+winning+back+enough+trust+from+the+client+to+allow+you+room+to+execute+your+recovery+plan.+You+will+need+to+keep+your+team+motivated+throughout%2C+keeping+them+committed+to+the+end+goal.+This+is+where+you+will+learn+a+lot+about+the+people+you+are+working+with+and+you+will+come+to+see+the+qualities+that+are+needed+in+a+strong+team%3B+courage%2C+resolve+and+strength+of+character%2C+in+other+words%3A+Grit.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFailure+equals+opportunity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+conclusion%2C+failure+is+sometimes+inevitable%2C+but+over+the+span+of+your+career+you+will+become+more+skilled+at+managing+that+risk%2C+becoming+better+at+foreseeing+and+preempting+failures.+The+important+part+is+to+know+that+in+the+face+of+failure%2C+there+are+a+multitude+of+opportunities+to+seize%2C+you+just+need+the+courage+to+do+so.%3C%2Fp%3E

nt+with+ease.+It+sets+the+standard+for+working+in+an+Agile+manner.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+the+discovery+phase+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+the+full+squad%2C+we+made+sure+we+had+a+representative+from+each+of+the+core+skillsets+to+cover+all+possible+bases+from+the+get-go.%26nbsp%3B+These+included%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Business+%28the+Product+Owner%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Analysts+%28to+assist+with+the+design%2C+user+story+grooming%2C+client+interviews+and+environment+analysis%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+UX+Designer+%28to+analyze+the+customer+journey+and+experience%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Engineers+%28to+kick-off+with+the+technical+integrations%2C+setting+up+of+the+CI%2FCD+and+delivery+pipeline%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGetting+this+team+structure+right+upfront+was+vitally+important+to+the+developers+and+the+success+of+the+product.+You+can+even+throw+in+a+small+teambuilding+exercise+to+ensure+everyone+knows+each+other+and%2C+to+build+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+the+discovery+phase+was+complete%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bd+defined+the+MVP%2C+completed+the+User+Story+grooming%2C+and+laid+out+the+first+2+to+3+sprints%2C+we+were+ready+to+get+the+rest+of+the+team+to+join+in.+And+they+hit+the+ground+running.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdjusting%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+2nd%26nbsp%3Bsquad+kicked+off+after+the+first+16-week+phase.+We+used+the+learning+from+the+first+squad+to+kick-start+the+2nd%26nbsp%3Bteam+and+drive+the+delivery+from+the+start.+The+walls+broken+down+by+squad+1%2C+allowed+for+an+easier+kick-off+and+start+for+the+2nd+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+after+the+2nd+squad+had+kicked+off%2C+we+realized+the+biggest+challenge+would+be+to+get+the+client+business+to+adjust+to+an+Agile+methodology%3A+to+be+more+hands+on+and+thoroughly+invested+in+the+processes%2C+not+just+a+by-stander+overseeing+the+agile+transformation.+They+needed+to+join+the+transformation+and+live+and+breathe+agile+it+on+a+daily+basis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+help+client+adjust+would+mean+a+very+hands-on+approach+from+our+side.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+invited+the+client+to+spend+time+within+our+dev+squads%2C+understanding+why+Agile+was+so+important+for+building+services+and+products+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+market+place.+The+hierarchy+of+the+person+is+irrelevant.+The+important+thing+is+for+them+to+understand+why+it+worked.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+we+had+buy-in+and+understanding%2C+we+were+able+to+grow+to+six+squads+all+compiled+by+Agile+Coaches%2C+Product+Owners%2C+Tech+Leads%2C+Software+Engineers%2C+Analysts%2C+Data+Scientists%2C+UX+Designers%2C+UI+designers%2C+and+Testers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+stakes%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOf+course%2C+there+were+risks.+Any+integration+into+legacy+systems+or+existing+applications+that+still+run+in+waterfall+delivery+could+affect+the+efficiency+and+effectiveness+of+the+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+we+were+prepared+for+this.+So%2C+our+approach+was+to+tackle+these+dependencies+upfront.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+well+understood+that+the+first+squad+is+tough.+There+are+development+and+integration+challenges%2C+but+also+buy-in%2C+and+very+often+an+organizational+mind+shift+required+to+adopt+Agile+methodologies.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+solution+we+worked+with+was+to+have+one+or+two+software+engineers+from+other+integration+teams+join+the+squad.+This+helped+with+knowledge+sharing%2C+IP%2C+and+buy-in+where+integrations+and+changes+to+existing+services+are+needed.+It+also+removed+the+old+approach+of+%26lsquo%3Bthrowing+work+over+the+fence%26rsquo%3B+and+waiting+for+feedback%21+%26%2339%3BThrowing+work+over+the+fence%26rsquo%3B+should+be+long+gone%2C+and+banned+from+any+custom+development.+The+software+vendor+must+build+the+software+with+the+client%2C+getting+continuous+feedback%2C+and+living+the+journey+together.+%26nbsp%3BThat%26%2339%3Bs+why+Entelect+had+such+great+success%2C+because+we+formed+a+business+partnership+instead+of+the+client%2Fsupplier+relationship.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThings+worth+sharing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+people-focused%3B+setting+up+career+paths+and+performance+appraisals+that+allow+the+engineers+to+grow+and+have+short-+or+long-term+targets+for+themselves+is+beneficial+to+the+entire+squad.+Corporate+reviews+are+just+too+restrictive%2C+each+member+of+the+team+needs+their+own+defined+path+for+growth.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMonthly+check-ins+between+the+scrum+master+and+each+person+on+the+squad+creates+regular+health+checks+and+opportunities+for+mentoring.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+also+vital+for+squads+to+have+the+buy-in+from+an+Executive+or+Director+to+open+doors+and+remove+any+blockers+that+may+be+there.+Organizational+adjustment+to+Agile+is+a+big+deal+and+must+be+a+team+effort.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGive+the+squad+the+freedom+to+be+bold%2C+to+grow%2C+and+take+chances%2C+knowing+that+they+will+be+accountable+for+the+delivery+as+a+squad.+Make+sure+they+see+and+get+the+support+from+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+next+%26lsquo%3Bfirst+squad%26rsquo%3B%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bll+be+tough%2C+they+always+are.+But+we%26rsquo%3Bll+use+everything+we%26rsquo%3Bve+learnt+to+refine%2C+adapt%2C+and+take+our+client+into+an+exciting+new+space+for+Agile+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

The+importance+of+context+in+creating+a+good+IA %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Samantha+Winfield+%28Entelect%2C+UX%2FUI+Designer%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EContext+is+important+in+all+areas+of+design+and+can+be+a+make+or+break+factor.+This+is+especially+the+case+in+information+architecture.+There+are+many+techniques+and+methods+used+by+UX+designers+to+establish+the+information+architecture+for+a+product+but+overlooking+something+as+important+as+context+can+mean+the+difference+between+a+successful+product+and+a+failure.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+the+following+statement%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAshley+is+running+to+the+ball.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+was+the+first+idea+that+appeared+in+your+mind%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+if+I+were+to+tell+you+that+Ashley+was+wearing+a+ball+gown%3F+Does+that+change+your+initial+perception+of+the+statement%3F+What+if+I+said+Ashley+was+a+professional+rugby+player+or+that+she+was+a+5+year+old+playing+with+her+friends+in+the+street%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENotice+how+the+introduction+of+a+small+amount+of+extra+information+can+completely+change+the+meaning+of+the+statement%3F+Context+refers+to+the+who%2C+what%2C+where+and+when+of+a+situation+and+provides+us+with+important+insights+which+influence+our+perception+of+that+information.+Without+these+insights%2C+we+are+forced+to+make+assumptions+and+come+to+our+own+bias+conclusions+about+what+a+statement%2C+object%2C+or+situation+means.+By+setting+the+scene+and+providing+context%2C+we+remove+ambiguities%2C+reduce+the+chances+of+assumptions+and+can+therefore+start+relying+on+the+correct+interpretation+and+perception+of+information.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+UX+our+main+goal+is+to+interact+with+users+in+order+to+remove+biases+and+assumptions+and+create+a+product+that+our+target+market+can+use+and+interact+with+effectively.+In+this+space%2C+context+is+used+to+inform+the+user+as+to+what+something+means+and+what+to+do+next.+Similarly%2C+information+architecture+involves+arranging+the+parts+of+a+product+to+be+understandable.+Together%2C+context+and+information+architecture+aim+to+achieve+a+similar+goal%3A+to+guide+the+user+to+complete+the+necessary+tasks+effectively+and+efficiently.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBuilding+a+solid+foundation+is+critical+to+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+interaction+with+a+product%2C+therefore+the+information+architecture+should+be+carefully+considered.+UX+designers+typically+use+card+sorting+as+the+method+of+interacting+with+users+to+establish+the+information+architecture.+Card+sorting+involves+presenting+parts+of+the+content+for+your+product+to+the+user+as+separate+parts+and+asking+them+to+group+and+categorise+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+the+simple+example+below%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+710px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+given+to+a+user+in+a+card+sorting+exercise%2C+the+result+may+be+similar+to+the+example+below%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+712px%3B+height%3A+545px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+change+the+context+slightly%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting3.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+939px%3B+height%3A+474px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+user+may+group+this+collection+as+follows%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting4.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+939px%3B+height%3A+504px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+example+above+highlights+how+a+small+change+in+the+context+of+the+content+can+result+in+a+very+different+grouping+and+categorisation+of+the+information.+It+is+therefore+essential+that+the+content+presented+to+users+is+proportionate+to+the+content+you+need+to+present+in+your+product+and+is+representative+of+the+correct+context+for+that+product.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+always+a+good+idea+to+perform+a+tree+test+%28reverse+card+sort%29+with+users+after+the+initial+card+sorting+exercise+in+order+to+ensure+that+the+resultant+information+architecture+makes+sense%2C+is+usable+and+understandable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
By+Samantha+Winfield+%28Entelect%2C+UX%2FUI+Designer%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Why+context+can+be+a+make+or+break+factor+in+IA
    
["Software best practices"]

From+mobile+first%2C+to+customer+first+%E2%80%93+how+to+build+a+mobile+app+with+longevity+and+appeal %3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelect_1-3.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+650px%3B+height%3A+349px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBy+Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager+%3A+Service+Delivery%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMobile+adoption+is+changing+the+way+we+do+business+in+South+Africa.+%26nbsp%3BIn+2016%2C+almost+70%25+of+South+Africans+have+browsed+the+web+from+a+mobile+device.+%26nbsp%3BGoing+beyond+content%2C+mobile+apps+are+providing+an+invaluable+mechanism+for+companies+to+engage+with+customers+and+businesses+must+carefully+consider+mobile+in+their+digital+strategies.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3E%26nbsp%3BThe+global+average+for+app+user+retention+rate+is+only+3%25+after+a+month.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EGetting+customers+to+try+your+app+is+easy.+%26nbsp%3BKeeping+them+for+longer+than+a+week+is+a+different+story.+%26nbsp%3BAccording+to+Quettra%2C+drop+off+rates+for+daily+active+users+are+as+high+as+77%25+after+3+days%2C+and+80%25+of+apps+are+only+used+once+before+being+deleted.+%26nbsp%3BThe+global+average+for+app+user+retention+rate+is+only+3%25+after+a+month.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+practical+considerations+should+we+take+into+account+when+building+mobile+apps+and+how+do+we+keep+customers+engaged%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cstrong%3E+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EProvide+utility%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+app+offers+a+channel+to+an+underlying+product+-+a+means+to+an+end%2C+rather+than+the+end+itself.+%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fid1107656326%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EOrderIn%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bprovides+a+delivery+service.+The%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fza%2Fapp%2Ffnb-banking-app%2Fid450094779%3Fmt%3D8%2C%3F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EFNB+app%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bprovides+access+to+banking+services.%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Fuber%2Fid368677368%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EUber%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Boffers+ride+services.+Customers+rate+the+product%2C+not+the+app%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+the+underlying+product+that+drives+app+usage.+%26nbsp%3BWithout+a+well-crafted+value+offering%2C+the+app%26rsquo%3Bs+shelf-life+will+be+short.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+choice+of+whether+to+create+one+monolithic+app+that+serves+many+purposes%2C+or+to+unbundle+the+functionality+into+several+smaller+apps+can+have+pros+and+cons+on+both+sides.+%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fza%2Fapp%2Fdiscovery%2Fid458077762%3Fmt%3D8%26amp%3Bls%3D1%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EDiscovery%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+for+example%2C+includes+all+their+products+within+a+single+app+framework%2C+offering+a+central+point+for+the+customer+to+experience+the+brand.+For+Discovery%2C+this+probably+makes+sense+given+the+integrated+nature+of+their+products.+%26nbsp%3BUber%2C+on+the+other+hand%2C+provides+an+app+for+ride+sharing+and+a%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Fuber%2Fid1058959277%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Eseparate+app+for+food+delivery%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+requiring+the+user+to+download+both+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+wanting+to+order+food+whilst+riding+in+an+Uber+from+the+airport+to+the+hotel.+They+do+however+still+share+a+single+user+account.+Ultimately%2C+the+app+experience+should+deliver+value+to+the+customer+in+the+easiest+way+possible%2C+having+a+clear+purpose+that+addresses+an+immediate+need.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ECustomers+rate+the+product%2C+not+the+app%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+the+underlying+product+that+drives+app+usage.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelect_1-4.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+450px%3B+height%3A+424px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOffer+a+compelling+user+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aesthetics+are+important%2C+but+this+needs+to+extend+to+a+compelling+user+experience+to+truly+gain+acceptance.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+type%3D%22disc%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EOn-boarding%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+make+the+sign+up+process+as+frictionless+as+possible.+%26nbsp%3BBe+ruthless+when+cutting+the+cruft+and+be+creative+in+how+you+balance+the+need+for+gathering+data+versus+getting+your+user+productive.+%26nbsp%3BAdd+value+at+the+earliest+opportunity.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ENavigation%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+give+the+user+a+%26lsquo%3Bsense+of+knowing%26rsquo%3B+where+they+are+in+the+app+and+make+sure+the+core+functionality+is+front+and+centre.+%26nbsp%3BOptimise+the+flow+and+minimise+cognitive+load+required+to+achieve+a+task.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EPerformance%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E-+streamline+activities+on+the+critical+path+and+minimise+back-end+dependencies+that+clog+up+the+experience+with+twirly+animations.+%26nbsp%3BEven+better%2C+cache+everything+locally+and+sync+up+asynchronously+where+feasible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ELess+is+more%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+unsure+whether+a+feature+is+important%3F+%26nbsp%3BIf+you+already+have+your+core+functionality+sorted%2C+then+put+it+on+ice.+%26nbsp%3BGiving+users+less+choice+lets+them+navigate+more+quickly+through+the+important+features+without+thinking+too+much+about+how+to+get+there.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EAvoid+indirect+competitors%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+anything+that+distracts+your+users+whilst+using+the+app+is+considered+an+%26%2339%3Bindirect+competitor%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+can+be+detrimental+to+increasing+adoption.+%26nbsp%3BAsking+users+to+enter+a+confirmation+code+sent+to+their+email+app%2C+for+example%2C+detracts+from+the+overall+user+experience+and+introduces+an+indirect+competitor+into+the+mix.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ERespond+to+analytics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EQuantitative+data+is+key+to+gaining+usage+insights%2C+allowing+you+to+respond+quickly+whilst+extending+your+mobile+strategy+over+the+long+term.+The+right+data+is+important%3A+it+must+be%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fem%3Eactionable%3Cem%3E.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMeasure+user+engagement+through+in-app+analytics+and+other+channels+to+determine+usage+patterns+and+where+user+drop-off+may+be+limiting+stickiness+-+such+as+app+crashes%2C+poor+performance+or+a+UI+choice+that+may+not+gel+with+a+broader+audience.+%26nbsp%3BQuantitative+data+is+key+to+gaining+usage+insights%2C+allowing+you+to+respond+quickly+whilst+extending+your+mobile+strategy+over+the+long+term.+The+right+data+is+important%3A+it+must+be%26nbsp%3B%3Cem%3Eactionable%3C%2Fem%3E.+%26nbsp%3BMeasuring+number+of+downloads+is+meaningless+from+a+customer+experience+perspective+since+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+reflect+engagement+or+retention%2C+or+drop-off.+%26nbsp%3BMeasuring+number+of+crashes%2C+however%2C+is+useful+and+immediately+actionable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+start+our+day+with+an+app+and+we+end+our+day+with+an+app.+%26nbsp%3BCompeting+for+attention+in+a+crowded+space+means+going+above+and+beyond+the+norm%2C+giving+customers+a+compelling+reason+to+return+for+more+by+creating+something+useful%2C+good+to+look+at+and+easy+to+use.+%26nbsp%3BMobile+first+is+here+and+a+digital+strategy+without+mobile+is+missing+the+boat.+Providing+functionality+in+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+pocket+is+not+a+competitive+advantage%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+necessity+to+stay+relevant+and+businesses+should+be+working+non-stop+to+reach+and+retain+customers+on+their+mobile+devices.%3C%2Fp%3E
Mobile+adoption+is+changing+the+way+we+do+business+in+South+Africa.+In+2016%2C+almost+70%25+of+South+Africans+have+browsed+the+web+from+a+mobile+device.+Going+beyond+content%2C+mobile+apps+are+providing+an+invaluable+mechanism+for+companies+to+engage+with+customers+and+businesses+must+carefully+consider+mobile+in+their+digital+strategies.
    
["Software best practices"]
   Entelect_1-3.jpg    
Beware+of+bolt-on+digital+transformations+-+the+short-term+thinking+trap %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FArticle-02R.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBeware+of+bolt-on+digital+transformations+-+the+short-term+thinking+trap.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+%28DX%29+is+%3Cem%3Ethe%3C%2Fem%3E+initiative+every+corporate+talks+about+and+spends+vast+resources+on%2C+it+hardly+needs+to+be+mentioned+at+this+point.+With+this+level+of+investment%2C+all+these+organisations+should+be+well+down+the+path+of+becoming+digital+right%3F+A+2017+study+done+by+Forrester+Consulting+for+Microsoft+has+explored+this+topic+in+some+depth+and+highlights+that+only+the+minority+of+enterprises+have+actually+embraced+digital+transformation+as+it+is+envisioned%3B+effectively+stating+that+although+there+was+a+strategy+%28and+it+got+priority%29%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+made+little+to+no+difference.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+begin%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+attempt+to+define+what+digital+transformation+is.+The+fundamental+principle+behind+DX+is+the+integration+of+digital+technology+into+all+areas+of+a+business.+This+alone+is+incomplete+without+the+culture+shift+this+change+implies.+A+business+needs+to+be+agile+in+its+approach+to+evolving%2C+the+bloat+and+inflexibility+associated+with+corporates+are+widely+considered+one+of+the+primary+reasons+DX+is+not+implemented+correctly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Forrester+Consulting+coined+the+term+%26ldquo%3BBolt-On%26rdquo%3B+digital+transformation%2C+which+refers+to+enterprises+that+attempt+to+run+digital+initiatives+as+projects+without+actually+realising+the+need+to+change+the+core+organisational+culture+along+with+the+integration+of+digital+technology+right+across+their+businesses.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+South+Africa+there+is+no+difference%2C+this+is+an+unfortunate+reality+across+the+majority+of+large+organisations.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+uncommon+at+all+to+see+a+fully+thought+out+straight-through-process+beautifully+described%2C+only+to+find+an+extremely+labour+intensive+process+propping+the+automated+process+up+behind+the+scenes.+This+is+a+strong+indication+that+digital+initiatives+are+bolted-on+as+opposed+to+thinking+about+DX+more+strategically+and+looking+for+true+transformation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETwo+major+culprits+behind+these+bolt-on+%26ldquo%3Btransformation%26rdquo%3B+strategies+are+cost-saving+measures+and+an+analogue+culture.+Leadership+in+enterprises+is+well+aware+of+the+benefits+of+digital+transformation+but+have+often+proceeded+without+consideration+for+culture+and+the+drivers+mentioned.+This+results+in+them+consistently+battling+to+keep+up+with+the+smaller+companies+who+are+taking+their+market+share.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+the+focus+and+investment+in+digital+transformation+across+South+African+businesses%2C+one+can+be+optimistic+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+at+least+going+in+the+right+direction+as+a+collective%3B+we%26rsquo%3Bre+tending+towards+a+truly+transformed+industry.+Our+large+companies+are+inherently+slow+to+change+due+to+the+size%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+before+taking+compliance+into+account.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStill%2C+we+must+persevere+or+inevitably+fail.+So%2C+while+bolting-on+some+digital+services%2C+processes+or+products+could+offer+short-term+relief%2C+statistics+show+clearly+that+it+will+stunt+future+potential.+Instead%2C+take+the+hard+road+to+create+and+install+digital+culture+in+the+minds+and+hearts+right+across+the+business.+Create+a+supportive+environment+where+it+becomes+natural+to+think+this+way+repeatedly+and+continuously.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Digital+transformation+%28DX%29+is+the+initiative+every+corporate+talks+about+and+spends+vast+resources+on%2C+it+hardly+needs+to+be+mentioned+at+this+point.+With+this+level+of+investment%2C+all+these+organisations+should+be+well+down+the+path+of+becoming+digital+right%3F+A+2017+study+done+by+Forrester+Consulting+for+Microsoft+has+explored+this+topic+in+some+depth+and+highlights+that+only+the+minority+of+enterprises+have+actually+embraced+digital+transformation+as+it+is+envisioned%3B+effectively+stating+that+although+there+was+a+strategy+%28and+it+got+priority%29%2C+it%E2%80%99s+made+little+to+no+difference.
    
["Software best practices"]

The+true+value+of+having+a+code+review+culture %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FThetruevalueofhavingacodereviewculture-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECode+reviews+are+often+seen+as+a+waste+of+time.+This+is+due+to+the+perception+that+if+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+creating+code%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+being+productive.+Done+right%2C+a+code+review+promotes+greater+quality+software%2C+stronger+teamwork%2C+and+more+inspiration+for+creativity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+benefits+of+doing+code+reviews+reach+much+further+than+improved+code+quality.+For+a+well-functioning+team+of+software+engineers%2C+reviewing+the+work+of+peers+and+applying+constructive+criticism+is+the+most+focused+form+of+communication.+Understanding+why+a+code+review+process+is+necessary%2C+knowing+how+to+find+reviewers%2C+and+responding+to+reviews+correctly%2C+are+three+core+elements+of+an+effective+code+review+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUnderstanding+why+a+code+review+process+is+necessary%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3BCode+reviews+are+the+most+powerful+form+of+sharing+knowledge%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Sharing+knowledge+helps+development+teams+in+several+ways.+Reviewers+may+have+a+better+understanding+about+the+various+practices%2C+standards+and+techniques+in+the+code+base+that+can+help+improve+or+consolidate+changes.+Frequent+positive+interaction+presented+in+small+amounts+strengthens+social+bonds+and+builds+trust+between+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3ECode+is+produced+at+a+higher+standard%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+software+engineers+know+their+code+will+be+reviewed+by+their+peers%2C+they+are+naturally+motivated+to+clean+up+their+code+and+keep+consistency.+Sharing+work+and+inviting+critical+feedback+creates+a+culture+of+taking+healthy+pride+in+work+that+passes+the+test+first+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EThe+style+of+code+becomes+consistent%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+often+very+different+ways+to+write+code+and+different+solutions+to+the+same+problem.+Consistency+in+a+code+base+makes+code+easier+to+interpret%2C+helps+prevent+bugs%2C+and+facilitates+collaboration+between+software+engineers.+Most+importantly%2C+consistent+code+can+be+easily+maintained%2C+and+code+reviews+present+a+natural+and+easy-to-operate+safety+net+which+promotes+consistency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+helps+being+familiar+with+the+project+in+its+entirety%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+a+team+works+on+a+project%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+highly+unlikely+that+every+member+is+working+on+every+part+of+the+application.+Sometimes+one+software+engineer+will+work+exclusively+on+a+single+part+of+the+system%2C+while+another+is+working+on+something+else+entirely.+Code+reviews+help+software+engineers+familiarise+themselves+with+code+they+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+written%2C+but+might+be+asked+to+maintain+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCode+reviews+make+for+better+estimates%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+new+features+are+added+to+the+existing+code%2C+having+an+established+code+review+culture+in+place+increases+the+accuracy+of+estimations.+Having+multiple%2C+informed+inputs+with+context+from+different+areas+of+the+code+base%2C+ensures+estimates+are+more+reliable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFinding+reviewers%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+establishing+the+guidelines+for+%26ldquo%3Bwho+reviews+who%26rdquo%3B%2C+seniority+should+not+be+the+main+consideration.+Having+juniors+review+the+code+of+experienced+software+engineers+is+a+great+learning+experience+for+the+reviewer.+Not+only+does+it+give+a+great+reference+for+design%2C+coding+style+and+architectural+decisions%2C+but+it+also+shows+how+to+apply+these+in+the+actual+project+the+more+junior+reviewer+is+actively+working+on.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESenior+software+engineers+should+leverage+the+fact+that+new+team+members+lack+the+context+they+have+built+up+over+the+years.+This+can+help+push+senior+members+of+the+team+to+think+about+problems+differently.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+great+software+is+a+team+effort.+Whether+someone+is+a+junior+or+senior+software+engineer%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+make+everyone+aware+that+their+input+is+valued.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BResponding+to+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Having+an+established+code+review+culture+in+place+will+ensure+that+communication+lines+are+open+and+that+everyone+can+handle+criticism.+Even+so%2C+it+takes+practice+to+become+a+great+code+reviewer.+When+capturing+feedback+on+a+review+or+commenting+on+a+pull-request%2C+reviewers+should+be+focused+on+objectivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reviewer%26rsquo%3Bs+job+is+to+critically+evaluate+the+work+for+understandability%2C+suitability%2C+quality+and+consistency.+Where+feedback+is+offered%2C+it+should+explain+any+confusion%2C+ask+questions%2C+offer+recommendations+and+explore+ideas%2C+as+opposed+to+being+destructive+or+hostile.+Having+this+process+in+place+will+ensure+that+reviewees+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+offended+by+suggested+changes%2C+and+that+they+take+suggestions+seriously+even+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+agree.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+teams+skip+or+avoid+the+review+process%2C+they+are+missing+out+on+one+of+the+shortest+feedback+loops+in+software+development+and+an+excellent+growth+mechanism+for+all+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+a+code+review+culture+is+more+than+just+the+process+of+verifying+source+code.+Promoting+interaction+and+creating+an+atmosphere+that+encourages+knowledge+sharing+is+what+is+truly+valuable.+Code+reviews+with+clear+examples+and+objective+feedback%2C+within+an+atmosphere+of+trust%2C+is+a+proven+way+to+build+better+software%2C+better+teams+and+better+engineers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Code+reviews+are+often+seen+as+a+waste+of+time.+This+is+due+to+the+perception+that+if+you%E2%80%99re+not+creating+code%2C+you%E2%80%99re+not+being+productive.+Done+right%2C+a+code+review+promotes+greater+quality+software%2C+stronger+teamwork%2C+and+more+inspiration+for+creativity.
    
["Software best practices"]
  
The true value of having a code review culture - F...
    
Stop+sabotaging+your+technology+projects%3A+How+to+communicate+requirements+effectively %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FStopsabotagingyourtechnologyprojects-33.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+teams%2C+departments+and+industry+still+hold+a+reputation+for+failed+projects%2C+where+customers+and+product+owners+spend+too+much+for+too+little%2C+or+where+results+pale+in+comparison+to+expectations+held.+We+hear+about+these+unmet+expectations+all+the+time%2C+followed+by+budgets+blown+on+project+extensions+and+scope+changes.+We+also+hear+about+customers+who+%26ldquo%3Bdon%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+they+want%26rdquo%3B%2C+or+who+%26ldquo%3Bkeep+changing+their+minds%26rdquo%3B.+Sound+familiar%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+these+projects+are+unknowingly+sabotaged+before+they+start.+This+is+because+expectations+are+mismatched+out+the+starting+blocks%2C+and+there+is+little+chance+that+the+solution+could+ever+go+on+to+solve+the+meaningful+problems+faced+in+reality.+This+is+a+scary+situation+which+traps+all+parties+in+projects+which+are+destined+to+fail.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+spending+the+time+upfront+to+clarify+expectations+and+give+your+projects+the+best+possible+chance+of+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+four+important+concepts+to+help+you+avoid+self-sabotage+by+communicating+your+requirements+effectively%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDescribe+the+problem%2C+not+the+solution%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+know+your+business+best.+Instinctively%2C+you+would+want+to+explain+how+you+would+solve+the+problems+your+business+is+experiencing.+However%2C+this+often+causes+more+harm+than+good.+Describing+your+requirements+as+solutions+will+deprive+you+of+the+opportunity+to+explore+multiple+different+solutions+with+your+development+team+which+might+have+stemmed+from+a+clear+problem-statement.+We+need+to+recognise+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+usually+not+all+that+great+at+explaining+what+we+need+but+are+probably+quite+good+at+explaining+our+problems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFocus+on+the+problem+space+instead.+Spend+the+effort+clearly+describing+the+challenges+which+exist%2C+and+what+success+would+look+and+feel+like.+Let+the+experts+contribute+to+the+problem-solving+process+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+why+they%26rsquo%3Bre+there+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+what+they%26rsquo%3Bre+good+at.+When+combining+good+requirements+and+good+problem+solving%2C+you+allow+optimisation+for+time%2C+scope+and+quality+%28and+a+great+overall+solution%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F01.Requirements.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BTry+not+to+hide+complexity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+compiling+requirements%2C+it+is+important+not+to+mix+concepts+or+priorities+in+a+way+which+will+disorient+your+audience.+Priority+should+flow+from+top+to+bottom%2C+and+requirements+should+be+clustered+around+the+problems+they%26rsquo%3Bre+linked+to.+What+you+may+consider+to+be+a+very+complex+need+may+in+fact+be+a+simple+feature.+In+contrast%2C+one+innocuous+line+in+a+requirements+brief+could+ultimately+account+for+a+disproportionate+amount+of+the+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHidden+complexity+leads+to+time+bombs+ticking+away+in+your+backlog.+Requirements+should+be+logically+grouped%2C+and+clear+enough+for+your+audience+to+easily+spot+this+hidden+complexity+so+you+can+clarify+it+and+defuse+the+bomb+before+getting+started.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F02.Detail.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BManage+expectations%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Expectations+must+be+shared+and+discussed+early+and+often.+Seasoned+project+managers+and+experienced+software+engineers+know+that+expectation+management+is+an+important+part+of+any+successful+software+development+project.+There+needs+to+be+a+communication+culture+to+ensure+that+there+are+shared+perspectives+of+the+end+result.+The+tree+swing+analogy+depicts+how+different+parties+interpret+and+implement+requirements+during+the+development+process.+When+there+is+a+lack+of+shared+understanding+during+these+processes%2C+stakeholders+often+genuinely+think+they+are+interpreting+requirements+correctly%2C+but+disaster+ensues+once+results+are+visible+and+material.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F03.Expectations.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPrioritisation+is+key%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+there+is+a+clear+set+of+requirements%2C+it+is+important+to+rank+them.+Requirements+will+vary+wildly+in+complexity%2C+time+and+cost%2C+which+makes+a+shared+understanding+of+priority+fundamental+to+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrioritisation+should+weigh+up+what%26rsquo%3Bs+important+versus+what%26rsquo%3Bs+urgent%2C+consider+the+right+mix+of+functionality+and+differentiation%2C+and+take+value+versus+effort+into+account.+Techniques+like+the+MoSCoW+method+can+be+used+to+build+this+prioritisation+puzzle+to+create+a+solution+that+maximises+time%2C+cost%2C+customer+and+business+value%2C+and+operational+objectives.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMust+have%3A+Non-negotiable+product+needs+that+are+mandatory+to+complete+the+project%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BShould+have%3A+Important+features+that+aren%26%2339%3Bt+vital%2C+but+add+significant+value%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCould+have%3A+Nice-to-have+features+that+would+only+have+a+small+impact+if+left+out%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWon%26%2339%3Bt+have%3A+Features+that+aren%26%2339%3Bt+a+priority+for+the+current+scope%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+allows+the+development+team+to+arrange+the+project+into+phases%2C+plan+for+minimum+viable+product+%28MVP%29+releases+when+necessary+and+have+the+%26ldquo%3Bnice-to-have%26rdquo%3B+requirements+in+scope+for+future+phases.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F04.Moscow.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Requirements+are+often+the+primary+medium+of+communication+throughout+development.+Communicating+them+effectively+is+clearly+not+a+trivial+exercise.+Describing+needs+well+means+agreeing+on+expectations+between+parties+from+the+very+different+perspectives+held+by+technology%2C+business%2C+product+and+strategy.+It+also+means+that+dissonance+is+managed+and+dispelled+as+early+as+possible+in+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStop+sabotaging+your+projects.+Detail+your+challenges+more+so+than+your+preconceived+solutions%2C+try+not+to+hide+complexity%2C+work+to+establish+shared+expectations%2C+and+be+clear+about+what+is+important+versus+what+is+urgent.+Set+yourself+up+for+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Technology+teams%2C+departments+and+industry+still+hold+a+reputation+for+failed+projects%2C+where+customers+and+product+owners+spend+too+much+for+too+little%2C+or+where+results+pale+in+comparison+to+expectations+held.+We+hear+about+these+unmet+expectations+all+the+time%2C+followed+by+budgets+blown+on+project+extensions+and+scope+changes.+We+also+hear+about+customers+who+%E2%80%9Cdon%E2%80%99t+know+what+they+want%E2%80%9D%2C+or+who+%E2%80%9Ckeep+changing+their+minds%E2%80%9D.+Sound+familiar%3F
    
["Software best practices"]
  
Stop sabotaging your technology projects-33.png
    
Sizing+up+UX%3A+Motivating+for+UX+budget+and+scoping+design+time+effectively %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSizingUpUX-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3ESizing+for+user+experience+%28UX%29+is+a+complex+topic+and+poses+challenges+to+business+development+and+delivery+management+teams%2C+as+well+as+UX+engineers+%28UXEs%29+themselves.+We%26rsquo%3Bll+look+at+some+of+those+challenges%2C+as+well+as+methods+to+overcome+them+and+scope+projects+effectively.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EChallenge+01%3A+Organisational+UX+maturity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+the+challenges+UXEs+face+when+sizing+UX+tasks+relate+directly+back+to+the+UX+maturity+of+their+organisations.+UX+maturity+is+how+far+along+an+organisation+is+in+its+adoption+of+UX+as+a+fundamental+part+of+the+software+delivery+process.+While+good+UX+is+crucial+to+the+success+of+any+digital+product%2C+in+many+organisations+work+still+needs+to+be+done+to+fully+integrate+UX+into+the+software+development+lifecycle+%28SDLC%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F01.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+a+company+is+in+the+early+stages+of+UX+adoption%2C+simply+motivating+for+UX+research+and+design+to+be+part+of+a+project%26rsquo%3Bs+scope+is+a+challenge.+To+organisations+with+low+UX+maturity%2C+UX+may+seem+more+academic+than+practical+due+to+its+research-intensive+nature.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+the+value+of+user+research+and+user-centred+design+has+proved+itself+over+time+among+Fortune+500+companies%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+still+seen+as+redundant+by+many+stakeholders.+These+stakeholders+often+feel+they+know+their+users+better+than+their+users+know+themselves.+This+makes+actually+receiving+any+budget+to+consider+UX+more+of+a+challenge+than+scoping+accurately.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EChallenge+02%3A+Giving+definite+sizes+to+iterative+processes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+second+challenge+is+giving+finite+timelines+to+tasks+that+form+part+of+iterative+design+processes.+Iterative+design+uses+cyclical+processes+of+research%2C+prototyping+and+testing+to+optimise+and+refine+design+over+time.+Based+on+insights+gleaned+from+user+testing+results%2C+the+UXE+will+often+change+and+adapt+their+prototypes+to+either+validate+or+challenge+their+design+decisions.+A+prototype+might+go+through+three+or+four+iterations%2C+or+it+may+take+months+of+rework%2C+ideation+and+testing+to+truly+answer+a+user%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F02.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+solution%3A+Prove+the+value+of+UX+without+going+over+budget%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+challenges+will+always+present+themselves%2C+the+UXE+needs+to+be+strategic+in+their+selection+of+research+and+design+methods+to+optimise+delivery+and+stay+within+budget.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+tricky+balance+that+requires+negotiation%2C+paired+with+advocacy+and+education+around+UX+to+convince+resistant+stakeholders.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+power+of+open+dialogue%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+essential+to+engage+in+candid+discussions+prior+to+the+procurement+phase+and+well+before+project+kick-off.+One+way+to+do+this+is+to+include+product+owners+and+other+decision-makers+in+design+thinking+workshops.+These+workshops%2C+such+as+the+now+well-known+Design+Sprint%2C+should+be+conducted+prior+to+planning+and+budgeting.+This+is+where+design%2C+business+and+technology+representatives+will+work+together+to+map+out+the+business+landscape+and+define+mutual+goals+for+the+project%2C+ensuring+strategic+alignment+and+understanding.+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+engage+with+your+stakeholders%2C+crucial+research+or+testing+exercises+will+be+excluded+from+the+project+due+to+a+lack+of+understanding.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+successfully+advocated+for%2C+the+UXE+can+make+use+of+a+strategic+arsenal+of+research+and+design+methods+to+output+effective+software%2C+and+in+turn%2C+prove+the+value+of+UX.+This+exercise+may+need+to+happen+several+times+before+it+is+institutionalised%2C+but+once+an+organisation+sees+direct+business+value%2C+it+will+become+easier+to+negotiate+scope+on+future+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou%26rsquo%3Bve+got+the+buy+in%2C+now+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+to+size+your+UX+tasks%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+you%26rsquo%3Bve+successfully+advocated+for+UX%2C+motivated+for+budget+and+developed+a+solid+research+strategy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+now+time+to+size+the+various+UX+tasks+you+feel+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+complete+the+project+accurately.+The+importance+of+sticking+to+defined+timelines+is+crucial+to+engender+trust+with+your+stakeholders.+This+is+particularly+true+on+fixed-price+projects+where+there+is+little+room+for+error+and+so+you+need+to+estimate+with+a+high+degree+of+confidence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+can%26rsquo%3Bt+account+for+the+sizing+of+all+UX+tasks+in+a+single+article+as+that+would+require+a+book%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+of+content%2C+but+we+can+look+at+some+key+tasks+as+examples.+For+the+purposes+of+this+article%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bll+look+at+the+sizing+of+qualitative+and+quantitative+UX+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3E%3Cstrong%3EQualitative+research+scoping+example%3A+Contextual+inquiries%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26%2339%3Bll+start+with+a+well-established+qualitative+research+method%2C+the+contextual+inquiry.+This+is+because+it%26%2339%3Bs+a+semi-structured+interview+method%2C+making+it+difficult+to+estimate+for.+Contextual+inquiries+are+intentionally+less+structured%2C+as+it+allows+users+to+go+about+their+regular+activities+in+their+context+of+use.+The+UX+researcher+uses+observation%2C+as+well+as+periodic+and+pointed+questions+to+uncover+key+insights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+sizing+contextual+inquiries+or+other+forms+of+user+research%2C+there+are+two+approaches+you+can+use.+The+first+is+a+dedicated+time-box%2C+in+which+you+would+conduct+as+many+inquiries+as+you+can+within+a+given+timeframe.+The+second+is+to+decide+on+how+many+users+you+would+like+to+observe+and+then+pre-define+how+long+you+would+need+with+each.+Let%26%2339%3Bs+use+the+second+example%2C+as+it+is+a+bit+more+complex.+We%26rsquo%3Bll+work+with+a+single+user%2C+then+scale+it+to+form+part+of+a+full+study.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+time+you+require+to+observe+a+user+is+dependent+on+the+complexity+of%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+system+they+use%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+tasks+they+need+to+complete%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+access+to+users+themselves%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26%2339%3Bs+use+a+theoretical+example+of+a+task+that+takes+a+user+30+minutes+to+complete.+We%26%2339%3Bll+then+need+to+double+that+time%2C+to+account+for+introducing+yourself+and+the+work+you%26rsquo%3Bre+intending+to+do%2C+as+well+as+getting+consent+to+observe+the+user.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F03.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+now+need+to+repeat+this+exercise+with+at+least+5+participants+to+make+your+research+effective.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F04.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+added+complexity+of+travel+and+setup%2C+we+can+anticipate+this+task+will+take+a+full+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F05.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFurther+to+that+is+preparation+time%3A+Writing+up+consent+forms%2C+logistics+and+travel+arrangements%2C+as+well+as+any+background+research+that+might+be+required.+For+this+entire+preparatory+exercise%2C+one+might+want+to+bank+at+least+2+days.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFollowing+this+is+transcribing%2C+collating+and+analysing+the+data%2C+which+may+take+as+much+time+as+the+research+itself.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F06.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+can+now+see+that+qualitative+research+has+many+dynamics+that+affect+its+timing.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+much+different+from+investigative+journalism+or+in-store+consumer+research%2C+so+ensure+you%26%2339%3Bre+accounting+for+all+aspects+of+your+research+when+scoping.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EQuantitative+research+scoping%3A+User+surveys%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+now+look+at+a+passive+research+method%2C+the+user+survey.+Surveys+can+take+many+forms+and+can+use+both+qualitative+and+quantitative+methods+to+gain+results.+The+advantage+of+a+survey+is+the+same+as+its+disadvantage%2C+in+that+the+researcher+need+not+be+present.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+the+survey%2C+the+most+time+spent+is+on+setup+and+analysing+the+findings+afterwards%2C+but+the+actual+survey+is+relatively+quick.+If+done+through+an+online+form%2C+the+survey+can+be+conducted+without+the+involvement+of+the+UXE%2C+meaning+passive+data+collection.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F07.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+sizing+of+a+survey+is+dependent+on+the+number+of+questions+needed+to+account+for+the+relative+complexity+of+a+system+or+user.+If+a+user+or+the+system+they+use+is+particularly+nuanced%2C+one+might+need+to+develop+a+variety+of+questions+over+a+few+days.+The+following+explores+what+goes+into+creating+and+sizing+a+survey%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDefining+the+users+you+would+need+to+survey+to+achieve+your+research+aims%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMeet+with+your+product+owner+or+an+equivalent+subject+matter+expert+%28SME%29+to+determine+who+would+be+participating+in+the+survey+and+what+questions+you+will+need+answered.+You+will+need+to+define+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+there+a+single+user+group+or+many+distinct+groups+requiring+separate+surveys%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRun+a+research+gap+analysis%3A+What+don%26%2339%3Bt+you+know+about+your+users%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+complexity+of+the+system+you+are+designing+for%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+total+time+spent+on+your+survey+preparation+can+range+from+a+single+day+to+several+days.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+the+user+base+is+somewhat+homogenous+and+the+system+is+relatively+simple.+In+this+case%2C+you+will+only+need+a+day+or+two+of+preparation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWriting+your+survey+and+choosing+the+appropriate+technology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+now+have+the+necessary+background+information+and+stakeholder+alignment+on+your+research+aims+and+therefore+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+spend+more+than+a+day+writing+your+survey.+Use+online+survey+tools+such+as+Google+Forms%2C+which+offers+data+visualisation+and+CSV+exports+to+assist+in+your+analysis+%28it%26rsquo%3Bs+also+free%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDetermining+how+long+should+you+run+your+survey%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+sent+an+email+of+your+survey+out+to+your+chosen+participants%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+at+least+10%25+of+them+to+respond.+If+the+survey+is+internal%2C+you+can+aim+for+a+30+%26ndash%3B40%25+response+rate.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+hit+your+response+target%2C+you+can+use+the+law+of+diminishing+returns+to+decide+whether+to+continue+your+survey+or+begin+analysing+your+results.+If+sent+using+a+well-marketed+email%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+generally+have+a+large+uptake+in+the+beginning+of+your+survey.+After+a+few+weeks%2C+your+respondents+will+plateau+before+they+drop+off+entirely.+You%26rsquo%3Bll+want+to+close+your+survey+and+begin+analysing+your+results+before+the+responses+plateau.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F08.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAnalysing+your+survey+data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+gathered+all+your+data%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+spend+a+fair+bit+of+time+combing+through+results+and+trying+to+find+patterns.+The+time+spent+will+be+dependent+on+how+disparate+or+diverse+your+results+are.+If+the+survey+answers+are+one-sided%2C+then+you+won%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+spend+much+time+on+analysis.+Let%26%2339%3Bs+extend+our+example+of+a+relatively+homogenous+user+base+and+assume+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+created+a+simple+survey+made+up+of+10+multiple-choice+and+yes%2Fno+questions%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+included+2+or+3+qualitative+questions+that+will+need+to+be+read+and+interpreted%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+received+200+out+of+2000+responses+over+a+period+of+one+week%3Cbr+%2F%3E+d.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+found+most+answers+have+a+distinct+pattern+with+minor+disparities%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBased+on+the+example+above%2C+we+can+assume+our+analysis+and+reporting+won%26rsquo%3Bt+take+more+than+2+days.+The+total+active+time+spent+on+the+survey+would+therefore+be+around+4+days%2C+while+the+total+time+required+would+be+approximately+two+weeks.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EEstimating+design+time%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+research+is+complete%2C+you+will+need+to+apply+your+findings.+This+means+coming+up+with+prototypes+that+truly+represent+and+integrate+your+research.+The+scoping+of+prototyping+is+often+defined+by+the+research+outcomes+and+is+therefore+a+bit+tricky+on+fixed-price+projects.+You+often+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you%26rsquo%3Bll+be+designing+until+you+do+the+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+in+a+situation+where+you+need+to+define+the+scope+of+design+before+having+conducted+research%2C+you+will+need+to+analyse+work+you%26rsquo%3Bve+done+on+previous+projects.+For+example%2C+you+may+have+designed+a+similar+system+in+the+past+or+you+may+have+been+a+user+of+a+system+not+much+different+from+the+one+you%26rsquo%3Bre+required+to+design.+With+this+type+of+knowledge%2C+you+can+begin+to+estimate+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+number+of+screens+that+would+make+up+the+user-flow%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+relative+complexity+of+the+system%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+features+that+the+user+would+need+to+achieve+their+goals%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EImplementation+and+measuring+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+your+prototypes+have+been+designed%2C+tested+and+refined%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+to+hand+over+to+the+development+team+to+implement+the+design+vision.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+crucial+you+put+measurements+in+place+to+track+the+success+of+your+system%2C+as+this+will+be+fundamental+in+negotiating+scope+on+future+projects.+Success+metrics+will+also+assist+in+UX+adoption+more+broadly+at+your+organisation.+We+can+therefore+add+a+few+more+steps+to+our+iterative+design+thinking+model%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F09.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+325px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+certainly+a+complex+task+going+from+advocacy+for+UX%2C+to+the+negotiation+of+budgets+and+resources%2C+and+finally+executing+your+design+strategy.+Keep+the+following+in+mind+when+unpacking+this+process%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EAlign+all+stakeholders+from+the+start%2C+under+a+user-centred+goal%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEstimate+research+and+design+time+as+accurately+as+possible%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDefine+measurements+of+success+to+prove+value+of+over+time%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+the+end+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about+advocating+for+the+user%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESizing+for+UX+and+negotiating+budgets+all+relates+back+to+the+UXE%26rsquo%3Bs+central+purpose+of+user+advocacy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+the+UXE%26rsquo%3Bs+job+to+give+the+user+a+voice+and+bring+them+into+business+and+technology+discussions+when+planning+a+delivery+schedule.+This+means+that+the+UXE+needs+to+push+back+if+there+is+a+real+chance+of+under-delivery%2C+due+to+lack+of+user+research+and+testing.+If+you+fail+to+provide+a+good+user+experience%2C+the+cost+saved+on+research+methods+will+be+outweighed+by+lack+of+user+adoption+and+failed+user+experiences.+As+the+saying+goes%2C+%26lsquo%3Bthere+is+never+enough+time+to+do+it+right%2C+but+there+is+always+enough+time+to+do+it+over.%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Sizing+for+user+experience+%28UX%29+is+a+complex+topic+and+poses+challenges+to+business+development+and+delivery+management+teams%2C+as+well+as+UX+engineers+%28UXEs%29+themselves.+We%E2%80%99ll+look+at+some+of+those+challenges%2C+as+well+as+methods+to+overcome+them+and+scope+projects+effectively.
    
["Software best practices"]
  
Sizing Up UX-FINAL.png
    
Unlocking+agile%3A+The+power+of+cross-functional+teams %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUnlockingAgile.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26rsquo%3Bve+finally+reached+a+post-waterfall+world%2C+where+iterative+problem-solving+processes+have+all+but+eclipsed+traditional+models.+Almost+every+tech+business%2C+IT+department+and+start-up+will+tell+you+they+are+%26quot%3Bwall-to-wall%26quot%3B+agile%2C+and+have+embraced+Scrum%2C+Kanban+or+one+of+the+numerous+scaled+delivery+frameworks.+Even+so%2C+non-delivery+is+still+common+because+we%26%2339%3Bve+not+yet+learned+to+consistently+build+and+drive+cross-functional+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+cross-functional+%28or+multi-disciplinary%29+team+is+one+with+every+resource+they+need+directly+inside+the+team.+Every+person+shares+a+common+cause+and+legitimate+responsibility.+Operating+multidisciplinary+teams+is+the+next+step+forward+and+we+already+have+the+tools+in+place.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndustry+has+a+habit+of+falling+back+to+%26%2339%3Bsilos%26%2339%3B+as+an+operating+model%2C+which+is+often+a+lazy+accountability+tool.+Splitting+teams+by+skill+is+meant+to+aggressively+manage+capacity%2C+and+to+ensure+people+are+supervised+by+managers+who+understand+their+expertise.+It+makes+sense%2C+but+hasn%26%2339%3Bt+translated+well+into+our+modern%2C+and+competitive%2C+technology+economy.+In+cases+like+these%2C+each+team+may+be+agile+internally%2C+but+are+often+powerless+in+the+bigger+picture+%26ndash%3B+lost+in+a+sea+of+dependencies+on+other+teams%2C+skills+and+departments.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+today%26%2339%3Bs+world%2C+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+need+perfect+and+complete+requirements+before+design+starts%2C+and+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+need+perfected+design+before+development+starts.+Testing+can+in+fact+start+from+the+first+line+of+code%2C+and+deployments+can+happen+automatically+every+night.+Product+updates+are+days+apart%2C+distribution+costs+are+near+zero%2C+and+the+new+battlefronts+are+scale%2C+experience+and+value.+Marketing+won%26%2339%3Bt+save+a+bad+product%2C+so+the+tech+we+ship+to+customers+really+needs+to+stand+out.+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+becoming+obvious+that+the+teams+succeeding+in+this+arena+are+those+who+collectively+realise+the+benefits+of+an+unrestrained+cross-functional+team+culture.+A+culture+and+process+that+allow+skills+to+blend+and+overlap%2C+and+where+responsibility+is+both+fluid+and+shared.+There+are+no+walls+to+throw+work+over+to%2C+and+no+150-page+design+documents+to+create+a+paper+trail+of+safety+and+a+pointless+lattice+of+hard+deadlines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+cross-functional+team+means+the+product+owner+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+have+to+create+requirements+on+their+own.+The+QA%2C+developers%2C+data+team+and+UX+team+are+all+in+the+same+boat%2C+and+are+just+as+responsible+for+the+quality+of+requirements.+Every+person+in+the+team+functionally+applies+their+niche+skillset+in+the+creation+of+the+product%2C+but+intellectually+contributes+to+the+entire+process.+This+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+just+spread+accountability%2C+it+creates+buy-in%2C+a+shared+sense+of+purpose+which+is+an+unbeatable+force+for+quality+and+delivery.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCFTimage.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+445px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMixed+teams+like+this+also+solve+the+lazy+capacity+problem+overnight.+There+is+no+such+thing+as+a+design+team+with+no+work+because+everything+is+snagged+upstream%2C+or+a+QA+team+who+are+waiting+for+the+next+UAT+cycle.+All+of+these+roles+are+mixed+into+the+cross-functional+teams+where+they+carry+responsibilities+from+day+one+right+through+to+the+sunset+of+the+product.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+in+almost+every+other+field+work+together+against+a+common+goal.+In+football%2C+the+strikers+are+allowed+to+defend%2C+and+the+goalkeeper+can+score.+We+need+to+follow+this+same+approach+in+the+technology+world+because+it+works+the+same+way.+Pull+your+teams+together+for+a+given+product+and+give+them+a+single+problem+to+solve+as+a+unit.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJust+being+physically+seated+together+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+count+as+a+cross-functional+team.+To+get+this+right%2C+our+teams+need+to+have+mixed+expertise+with+everybody+pulling+in+the+same+direction%2C+at+the+same+time.+This+means+product+owners%2C+designers%2C+developers+and+testers+should+be+participating+in+the+same+brainstorming+sessions%2C+and+allocated+to+the+same+user+stories.+Everybody+should+contribute+their+own+specialised+talents+in+parallel%2C+while+feeling+that+their+expert+views+are+considered+equal+in+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+your+teams+are+feeding+work+to+each+other%2C+then+you%26%2339%3Bre+still+operating+with+one+foot+in+the+stage-gated+waterfall+world.+Cross-functional+teams+will+change+the+game+and+unlock+the+real+value+that+agile+can+offer+your+organisation.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
We%E2%80%99ve+finally+reached+a+post-waterfall+world%2C+where+iterative+problem-solving+processes+have+all+but+eclipsed+traditional+models.+Almost+every+tech+business%2C+IT+department+and+start-up+will+tell+you+they+are+%22wall-to-wall%22+agile%2C+and+have+embraced+Scrum%2C+Kanban+or+one+of+the+numerous+scaled+delivery+frameworks.+Even+so%2C+non-delivery+is+still+common+because+we%27ve+not+yet+learned+to+consistently+build+and+drive+cross-functional+teams.

Stop+disorienting+business+with+elaborate+processes %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessprocesses800.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+technology+specialists%2C+we+often+find+our+teams+focusing+on+processes+and+working+models.+These+processes+are+the+basis+of+how+we+solve+problems+and+we+often+like+to+share+%28in+detail%29+how+we+work.+However%2C+even+though+these+elaborate+processes+are+important+to+achieve+the+end+goal%2C+our+stakeholders+often+have+no+interest+in+these+models+they+do+not+understand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+does+not+mean+that+your+process+or+recipe+for+success+is+not+important.+In+fact%2C+the+right+process+can+make+or+break+a+project.+The+lesson+here+is+to+avoid+focusing+on+granular+processes+and+rather+focus+on+the+outcomes+instead+when+dealing+with+customers%2C+or%26nbsp%3B+stakeholders+from+business+or+product+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou+need+to+adapt+to+their+language+%26ndash%3B+not+the+other+way+around.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Your+method+of+working+is+important+to+you+and+your+team%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+more+important+to+have+conversations+with+your+stakeholders+in+their+language.+This+is+especially+meaningful+at+the+start+of+a+project.+Rather+than+trying+to+sell+a+detailed+process+of+how+your+team+is+going+about+solving+each+problem%2C+gain+their+trust+by+showing+that+you+understand+their+business+and+objectives+instead.+Reciprocating+an+understanding+of+context%2C+circumstances+and+business+objectives+is+a+real+confidence+builder.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+easier+to+communicate+with+business+when+there+is+a+shared+frame+of+reference+in+place.+This+way%2C+clear+expectations+are+created.+The+below+table+has+some+examples+on+how+to+translate+your+method+into+a+valuable+message+that+your+stakeholders+will+understand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FResultsGRAPH800.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EYour+process+is+generic.+Rather+acknowledge+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+specific+problem.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+consider+a+method+such+as+design+thinking%2C+it+can+solve+practically+any+problem+when+applied+correctly.+Your+stakeholders+don%26rsquo%3Bt+want+to+know+about+a+process+you%26rsquo%3Bve+used+multiple+times+before%2C+because+it+comes+across+as+a+generic+solution+and+not+something+tailored+to+their+unique+problem.+Focusing+on+the+process+rather+than+the+result+is+usually+a+sign+of+not+knowing+the+client+or+problem+well+enough.+Your+customer+knows+that+it%26rsquo%3Bs+much+easier+to+talk+about+a+process+that+you+are+familiar+and+comfortable+with.+If+you+have+spent+enough+time+and+energy+to+do+targeted+research+and+ask+questions+about+the+business+context+and+objectives%2C+it+becomes+easier+to+focus+on+the+outcome.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+sell+your+process+%26ndash%3B+let+them+experience+it.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately+if+you+succeed%2C+customers+and+stakeholders+will+naturally+enquire+about+the+processes+you+followed+to+achieve+it.+Once+they+start+enquiring+about+it%2C+they+will+start+advocating+for+it+themselves+and+do+the+selling+on+your+behalf.+Telling+your+customer+how+great+your+process+is%2C+is+one+thing%2C+but+having+them+telling+others+about+your+methods+is+substantially+more+valuable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmphasising+the+value+in+your+process+is+not+always+useful%2C+describing+business+outcomes+is.+Technology+teams+should+make+the+effort+to+adapt+to+business+and+gain+their+confidence+by+showing+interest+in+results%2C+rather+than+trying+to+make+a+sale+in+a+language+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+understand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
As+technology+specialists%2C+we+often+find+our+teams+focusing+on+processes+and+working+models.+These+processes+are+the+basis+of+how+we+solve+problems+and+we+often+like+to+share+%28in+detail%29+how+we+work.+However%2C+even+though+these+elaborate+processes+are+important+to+achieve+the+end+goal%2C+our+stakeholders+often+have+no+interest+in+these+models+they+do+not+understand.

The+priority+gap%3A+Why+engineering+teams+have+to+stop+delivering+to+themselves+in+early+project+milestones %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FThePriorityGap.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+majority+of+modern+technology+teams+following+a+Lean-Agile+path+are+familiar+with+the+%26ldquo%3Bdeliver+early+and+often%26rdquo%3B+approach.+Even+though+continuous+milestone+delivery+is+a+common+focus%2C+directing+efforts+to+put+something+in+the+client%26rsquo%3Bs+hands+as+early+as+possible+to+build+trust%2C+is+not.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToo+often+development+teams+get+stuck+in+delivering+to+%26ldquo%3Bthemselves%26rdquo%3B+and+prioritising+technology.+This+alienates+the+product+owner%2C+analysts%2C+sponsor+and+any+non-developers+who+really+need+to+see+progress+and+problems+being+solved+in+a+way+they+can+understand+%26ndash%3B+especially+in+the+beginning+of+the+project.+Odds+are%2C+the+business+spent+months%2C+if+not+years%2C+trying+to+sell+the+project+internally+before+being+able+to+bring+on+a+development+team.+When+the+project+finally+kicks+off%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+only+natural+that+the+business+feels+some+excitement+and+nervousness.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+normally+goes+wrong%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Development+teams+are+technically-inclined%2C+so+they+will+naturally+focus+on+the+foundational+technology+in+the+beginning.+This+is+important%2C+but+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+intrinsic+business+value.+The+time+spent+on+algorithms+and+the+back-end+is+difficult+to+showcase+to+non-technical+stakeholders%2C+and+will+often+be+seen+as+invisible+work.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBusiness+loses+interest+if+there+is+too+much+focus+on+engineering+preferences+in+early+milestones.+This+will+cause+stakeholders+to+feel+overwhelmed+and+isolated+from+the+project.+At+the+other+end%2C+if+an+effort+is+made+to+include+the+business+at+the+start+of+the+project+and+the+focus+is+on+business+priorities%2C+stakeholders%26rsquo%3B+sentiments+will+increase+and+trust+will+grow.+The+difference+between+these+two+scenarios+create+a+priority+gap+between+business+and+the+development+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPGGraph.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDelivering+something+that+keeps+stakeholders+engaged%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+gain+the+business%26rsquo%3B+trust+while+relationships+are+still+new+by+involving+everybody+in+initial+phases+instead+of+diving+into+deep+tech+work.+Technology+teams+should+show+that+they+are+keeping+the+stakeholders%26rsquo%3B+priorities+and+concerns+top+of+mind+%26ndash%3B+even+if+the+technologists+don%26rsquo%3Bt+share+those+particular+concerns.+The+priority+gap+causes+the+business+to+feel+disillusioned+and+no+longer+in+control+of+their+project%2C+which+leads+to+mistrust+early+on+in+the+project%2C+before+the+relationships+are+there+to+lean+on.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEngineering+teams+need+to+be+empathetic+and+reciprocate+their+concerns+of+what+the+business+feels+the+key+risks+are+in+the+project.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+demonstrate+these+concerns+early+on+in+the+project+and+in+a+%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D65511%22%3Elanguage+that+the+business+and+stakeholders+will+understand%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+can+often+be+done+with+visual+outputs%2C+or+workshops%2C+findings+and+models+which+speak+directly+to+those+top+priorities%2C+instead+of+new+ones+which+the+business+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+understand+or+worry+about.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+third+principle+from+the+Agile+manifesto+tells+us+to+deliver+early+and+often.+However%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+clear+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3Ewhat+%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3Eneeds+to+be+delivered+early+and+often+during+the+early+phases+of+a+project%3A+business+value.+Business+value+is+often+just+about+reciprocating+priorities+and+sharing+empathy+with+stakeholders.+When+development+teams+prove+that+they%26rsquo%3Bre+focused+on+providing+business+value%2C+the+priority+gap+closes.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
