Deconstructing+requirements%3A+Why+you+need+to+spend+more+time+in+the+problem+space %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDeconstructingrequirements.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+development%2C+we+often+forget+how+important+it+is+to+spend+enough+time+exploring+and+understanding+the+full+context+of+a+problem+before+charging+ahead+with+new+ideas%2C+%26ldquo%3Bgame+changers%26rdquo%3B+and+designs.+Time+and+budgets+are+frequently+wasted+on+building+%28and+even+perfecting%29+minimum+viable+products+%28MVPs%29+and+tech+demos%2C+before+the+actual+problem+has+been+adequately+explored+and+understood.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+central+issue+that+the+meaning+of+the+word+%26ldquo%3Brequirements%26rdquo%3B+is+twofold%2C+and+is+usually+understood+as+both+the+customer+needs+and+product+requirements.+They+are+written+interchangeably+without+clarifying+which+one+is+being+addressed+or+what+exactly+the+differences+are.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+suggestion+here%2C+is+that+technology+teams+must+diligently+unpack+the+constraints+and+customer+needs+before+focusing+on+the+solution.+Here+are+4+reasons+to+take+this+seriously.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDIAGRAM-deconstructingrequirements.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ECreate+an+even+granularity+of+concerns+to+address%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Breaking+the+overall+vision%2C+history+and+strategy+into+smaller%2C+digestible+requirements%2C+shapes+a+solvable+puzzle+that+has+less+contingencies.+Deconstruct+the+subproblems+within+the+requirements+to+create+a+functional+map+to+start+from.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+also+important+to+remember+that+the+point+is+not+to+solve+the+requirements+exhaustively.+Explore+the+problem+space+fully%2C+but+the+solution+space+should+have+just+enough+coverage+to+kick+off.+The+solution+will+change+and+evolve+as+you+go%2C+but+the+problems+will+mostly+stay+the+same.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+less+contingencies+you+have%2C+the+easier+it+is+to+create+accurate+estimates%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Less+contingencies+means+more+accurate+time+and+resource+estimates.+If+you+spend+enough+time+listening+to+what+the+business+needs%2C+you+sometimes+realise+that+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+even+need+a+solution+or+that+the+results+you+need+are+completely+different+to+what+you%26rsquo%3Bd+expect.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESpending+time+and+exploring+business+context%2C+history%2C+competitors+and+strategy+takes+patience+and+rigor.+Working+on+the+solution+is+more+appealing+because+it%26rsquo%3Bs+new+and+unchartered.+But+when+too+much+focus+is+placed+on+demos%2C+planning+new+workflows+and+designing+MVPs%3B+time+and+budget+end+up+wasted+on+redundant+features.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETechnology+teams+have+the+ability+to+detect+more+complex+problems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Your+engineering+teams+are+experts+in+their+field%2C+and+have+the+ability+to+help+you+find+and+unpack+hindrances+that+the+business+might+not+be+aware+of.+The+business+team+and+tech+team+need+to+spend+time+together+in+this+space+to+discover+these+complexities+early+on+in+the+project+roadmap.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUse+this+time+to+collectively+map+out+the+business+context%2C+vision+and+landscape+in+detail+so+that+both+teams+are+able+to+answer+questions+in+future%2C+and+can+become+self-sufficient.+If+everyone+fundamentally+understands+what+the+business+requirements+are%2C+they+can+short-circuit+themselves+by+having+the+information+at+hand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShowing+empathy+will+create+customer+buy-in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Spending+more+time+truly+understanding+the+business+context+and+constraints+of+the+environment+demonstrates+empathy.+Engineering+teams+need+to+show+the+customer+that+they+care+about+their+vision+and+objectives%2C+and+that+they%26rsquo%3Bre+putting+themselves+into+the+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+frame+of+reference.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+relationship-building+exercise+that+gives+the+customer+confidence+in+their+abilities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+an+analogy%2C+consider+visits+to+the+doctor.+The+doctor+ideally+takes+an+interest+in+examining+your+worries+and+exploring+the+causes+with+you.+The+added+time+and+patience+the+doctor+takes+to+listen+to+your+concerns%2C+understand+your+background%2C+and+interpret+how+you+feel%2C+is+what+instils+confidence.+When+you+feel+listened+to+and+know+that+the+doctor+has+all+the+information+needed%2C+you+are+more+inclined+to+trust+the+diagnosis.+The+same+is+applicable+in+any+complex+problem-solving+relationship.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+engineering+teams%2C+we+are+naturally+more+drawn+to+the+interesting+and+magnetic+work+in+the+solution+space%2C+and+sometimes+skip+over+the+problem+space+without+even+realising.+However%2C+putting+extra+effort+into+exploring+the+business+model+and+success+criteria+to+detect+hidden+complexities%2C+unpack+granular+subproblems%2C+create+better+estimates+and+show+empathy+will+result+in+a+solution+that+solves+actual+problems+when+it+is+ready.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

What+are+we+testing%3A+Chasing+metrics+versus+actual+software+quality %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhatarewetesting-Banner.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+engineering+teams+are+focused+on+redundant+input+metrics+as+an+indication+of+the+success+of+%26ldquo%3Bquality+assurance%26rdquo%3B+on+their+technology+implementation+projects.+Are+we+so+busy+measuring+the+number+of+test+cases%2C+pass+rates%2C+code+coverage+and+bugs+discovered+that+we+have+forgotten+what+real+quality+means+in+the+eyes+of+our+users%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAre+we+blinded+by+automation%2C+following+widely+advertised+and+theoretical+best-practices+in+the+pursuit+of+quality%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+should+actually+be+working+backwards+from+the+outcome+we+want%2C+and+applying+tools+best+fit+to+measure+only+those+outcomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPullquote1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+broader+sense%2C+quality+means+that+a+solution+meets+the+following+requirements%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+system+is+robust+and+reliable%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+does+what+it+says+on+the+box%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+does+not+frustrate+its+users%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESeems+obvious%2C+right%3F+But+do+our+measurements+actually+speak+to+these+requirements+or+are+we+simply+ticking+predefined+boxes%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+surge+of+DevOps+has+allowed+us+to+streamline+and+automate+the+entire+software+development+lifecycle.+DevOps+assumes+that+just+about+everything%2C+and+certainly+testing%2C+can+be+completely+automated.+Automation+has+made+processes+easier+to+implement+and+standardise%2C+but+standardisation+blinds+us+from+the+real+objectives.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+where+the+danger+lies.+We+are+forgetting+to+work+backwards+from+results%2C+and+to+think+critically+about+the+quality+we%26rsquo%3Bre+putting+forward.+Instead%2C+we+are+at+risk+of+using+analysis+tools+and+automation+as+a+crutch.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESimilarly%2C+code+coverage+has+also+been+idolised+as+a+way+to+ensure+that+all+code+is+functional+end-to-end.+Looking+back+at+how+we+defined+quality+above%2C+it+is+clear+that+while+this+gives+the+development+team+confidence%2C+it+does+little+for+the+users.+The+truth+is%2C+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+need+100%25+code+coverage.+Code+coverage+might+be+proportional+to+quality%2C+but+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+guarantee+quality.+If+our+code+coverage+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+speak+to+the+end+goal%2C+we+may+cover+all+our+code+and+have+a+perfect+system+that+won%26rsquo%3Bt+break%2C+but+can+still+have+a+system+that+frustrates+our+users+and+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+do+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+intended+to.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPullquote2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhy+are+we+not+specifically+determining+what+software+quality+actually+means+for+each+unique+system%2C+and+testing+for+that%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+the+right+things%2C+while+balancing+time%2C+money+and+value+is+what+matters.+We+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+spend+time+testing+boilerplate+code+or+unit+testing+other+frameworks.+There+is+a+degree+of+assumption+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+allowed+to+make+and+not+all+failures+are+equal.+Testing+high-risk+functionalities+such+as+price+calculations+for+insurance+premiums+is+crucial%2C+because+the+damage+it%26rsquo%3Bll+cause+to+both+the+system+and+the+business+when+it+breaks+is+immeasurable.+In+2016%2C+a+system+error+from+the+NHS+caused+300+000+heart+patients+to+receive+the+wrong+medication+%26ndash%3B+something+that+could+have+been+prevented+by+thorough+testing.+However%2C+investing+time+testing+low-impact+and+cosmetic+%26lsquo%3Bfeatures%26rsquo%3B+can+just+be+wasteful.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+in+an+empathetic+frame+of+mind+will+allow+us+to+deliver+to+the+users+instead+of+ourselves.+The+%26lsquo%3Bassurance%26rsquo%3B+component+of+QA+is+not+intended+for+the+engineering+team%2C+because+quality+is+not+for+our+own+sake%2C+but+for+the+success+of+the+product+and+happiness+of+our+users.+Many+of+these+metrics+do+instil+confidence+which+does+carry+some+value%2C+but+actual+quality+should+be+measured+from+our+users%26rsquo%3B+experiences+with+our+systems.+Sometimes+it%26rsquo%3Bs+acceptable+to+have+a+nervous+engineering+team+and+a+satisfied+user+base.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+should+aspire+to+confidence+for+both%2C+an+achievable+goal+if+we+start+with+a+clear+outcomes-defined+basis+for+quality%2C+and+structured+in+a+way+which+can+be+measured+from+both+perspectives.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Many+engineering+teams+are+focused+on+redundant+input+metrics+as+an+indication+of+the+success+of+%E2%80%9Cquality+assurance%E2%80%9D+on+their+technology+implementation+projects.+Are+we+so+busy+measuring+the+number+of+test+cases%2C+pass+rates%2C+code+coverage+and+bugs+discovered+that+we+have+forgotten+what+real+quality+means+in+the+eyes+of+our+users%3F
    
["Software best practices"]

Unpacking+hypothesis-driven+development %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUnpackinghypothesis-drivendevelopment-Banner%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+ever+had+to+take+science+classes+in+university+or+high+school%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bd+be+familiar+with+the+concept+of+educated+guesses.+Before+an+experiment%2C+you+were+likely+asked+to+come+up+with+an+assumption+that+could+be+tested+%26ndash%3B+a+scientific+hypothesis.+The+basic+idea+of+a+hypothesis+is+that+there+is+no+pre-determined+outcome+%26ndash%3B+and+is+usually+shrouded+in+uncertainty.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+we+see+building+technology+solutions+as+experiments+to+learn+what+customers+want+and+what+is+good+for+a+business%2C+we+can+similarly+treat+any+of+these+programmes+as+a+series+of+experiments.+A+sequence+of+hypotheses%2C+working+towards+a+sequence+of+goals.+The+hypothesis+is+the+building+block+in+the+scientific+method%2C+and+should+be+in+agile+development+too.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+modern+agile-inspired+approaches%2C+teams+need+to+deliver+newer%2C+better%2C+and+more+robust+features+to+customers+in+increasingly+shorter+timeframes.+The+work+being+carried+out+is+usually+determined+by+a+product+owner+and+often+assumed+as+%26ldquo%3Bproven%26rdquo%3B+before+testing+it+with+real+users.+These+features+frequently+accumulate+into+mammoth+applications+where+the+full+breadth+of+functionality+is+not+utilised%2C+or+the+application+is+not+user+friendly+%26ndash%3B+or+more+severely+%26ndash%3B+the+solution+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+truly+solve+problems+for+customers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FHypothesis%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+facilitate+learning+what+actually+solves+problems%2C+hypotheses+should+be+considered+and+documented+for+every+feature+being+built+to+create+clarity+in+purpose.+Engineering+teams+should+experiment+early+and+often%2C+receive+feedback+from+customers%2C+and+make+data-driven+decisions+based+on+the+findings+from+every+experiment.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEstablish+hypotheses+that+can+teach+you+things%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Clear+and+predetermined+requirements%26nbsp%3B+are+only+valuable+when+several+possible+solutions+have+already+been+tested+and+validated.+However%2C+when+you+are+exploring+an+initiative+with+a+high-level+of+uncertainty+%28which+most+digital+projects+are%29%2C+using+atomic+hypotheses+to+guide+what+features+development+teams+build+will+ultimately+result+in+building+the+right+thing+as+you+continually+adapt+away+from+failed+experiments+and+towards+the+successful+ones.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+form+a+useful+hypothesis%2C+focus+on+pieces+of+functionality+from+a+user%26rsquo%3Bs+perspective.+How+will+they+interact+with+the+solution%2C+and+what+fundamental+problem+is+it+solving+for+the+user%3F+Ensure+that+these+pieces+of+the+solution+are+small+enough+to+develop+within+a+sprint%2C+and+be+tested+with+real-world+users+directly+after+that+sprint.+This+will+allow+you+to+focus+on+what+works%2C+and+parking+or+discarding+the+rest.+Keep+in+mind+that+the+larger+the+feature%2C+the+more+effort+and+cost+is+involved+in+maintaining%2C+testing%2C+and+working+around+the+feature.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUse+technology+to+validate+%28or+invalidate%29+your+hypothesis%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+you+have+an+agreed-upon+hypothesis+in+place%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+iteratively+prove+or+disprove+it+throughout+the+development+phases+using+the+tools+at+your+disposal.+These+validations+can+be+as+simple+as+workshops+or+focus+groups%2C+or+may+take+a+little+more+user+research+against+prototypes+to+find+a+conclusive+result.+In+some+instances%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+building+a+proof+of+concept+to+pilot+in+the+market+%28or+pilot+as+a+feature+within+a+larger+system%29.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+effective+step+towards+validation+is+having+smaller%2C+cross-functional+teams+that+are+able+to+complete+the+full+cycle+themselves%2C+internally.+Any+requirement+to+%26lsquo%3Bhand+off%26rsquo%3B+work+into+other+teams+for+research+and+feedback+will+put+the+brakes+on+the+experiment+as+context+is+lost+and+priorities+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+shared.+Cross-functional+teams+include+engineers%2C+designers%2C+and+analysts+%26ndash%3B+a+multi-skilled+team+allows+searching+for%2C+manifesting+and+learning+viable+ideas+quickly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdapt+your+solution+via+a+series+of+experiments%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+consider+an+example+where+a+business%26rsquo%3B+sign-up+rate+for+their+eCommerce+platform+is+surprisingly+low+given+the+large+volume+of+visitors+they+receive.+To+understand+the+product+take-up+problem+given+that+marketing+seems+to+be+working%2C+they%26rsquo%3Bd+need+to+lay+down+several+hypotheses+which+can+be+tested.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+1%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Users+are+getting+fatigued+by+sign-up+form+capture+taking+too+long+and+losing+interest.+Experiment%3A+Cut+sign-up+requirements+to+the+bare+minimum+needed+to+transact%2C+and+allowing+users+to+finish+their+profile+at+a+later+stage.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+2%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+product+is+too+expensive%2C+so+although+there+is+huge+interest+in+it%2C+a+low+percentage+of+consumers+are+willing+to+spend+the+money.+Experiment%3A+Offer+a+slightly+cheaper+version+of+the+product%2C+with+several+cut-back+features%2C+and+measure+take-up.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+3%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+There+is+a+lack+of+trust+in+the+product%2C+and+visitors+are+unwilling+to+sign+up+%28or+provide+personal+details%29+until+they+have+experienced+it.+Experiment%3A+Dramatically+lower+the+barrier+to+entry+by+allowing+guest-transacting+and+only+requiring+users+to+register+once+they%26rsquo%3Bve+completely+taken+up+the+product.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+these+experiments+in+play+%28albeit+pilot+versions%2C+with+potentially+a+small+customer+base%29+the+business+can+go+revisit+each+hypothesis+to+establish+whether+any+or+all+of+them+were+true+or+false%2C+and+then+further+invest+in+the+solutions+which+have+proven+demonstrably+more+effective+at+driving+product+uptake.%26nbsp%3B+This+process+can+repeat+as+the+product+evolves.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+atomic+ideas+quickly+is+advantageous+in+finding+better+solutions+for+businesses+%2C+and+should+be+utilised+as+often+as+possible.+This+approach+works+well+with+agile-based+development+due+to+the+short+release+cycles+and+ability+to+adapt+quickly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+hypothesis-driven+development%2C+every+major+feature+is+an+experiment%2C+and+every+experiment+must+start+with+an+educated+guess.+Your+goal+should+be+to+establish+a+clear+hypothesis+for+each+initiative%2C+and+then+focus+engineering+efforts+to+prove+or+disprove+it.+This+way%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+build+products+that+ultimately+succeed+in+delivering+against+a+clear+and+measurable+user+or+business+goal.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
If+you+ever+had+to+take+science+classes+in+university+or+high+school%2C+you%E2%80%99d+be+familiar+with+the+concept+of+educated+guesses.+Before+an+experiment%2C+you+were+likely+asked+to+come+up+with+an+assumption+that+could+be+tested+%E2%80%93+a+scientific+hypothesis.+The+basic+idea+of+a+hypothesis+is+that+there+is+no+pre-determined+outcome+%E2%80%93+and+is+usually+shrouded+in+uncertainty.

Is+industry+becoming+irrelevant+to+digital+success%3F %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIsindustrybecomingirrelevant_Bannercopy4-102.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThe+majority+of+present-day+digital+and+innovation+projects+typically+involve+digitising+products+and+services+to+combine+or+reach+across+traditional+sectors.+Enterprises+are+changing+%28shortening%29+traditional+customer+journeys+or+creating+new+digital-only+products+which+have+no+obvious+spot+on+the+value+chain.+There+is+a+theme+here%3A+industry+irrelevance.+The+lines+are+increasingly+blurred%2C+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+seeing+industries+learning+from+each+other%2C+as+technology+components+mature+and+techniques+are+normalised+in+a+way+that+can+be+applied+the+same+way+to+banking%2C+agriculture%2C+retail+and+media.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EConsider+industry-leading+technology+companies+that+have+pushed+the+boundaries+on+innovation+over+the+last+decade.+The+likes+of+Uber%2C+Airbnb%2C+Netflix%2C+Amazon+%28and+locally%2C+Takealot%29+are+prominent+not+because+they+knew+their+sectors+better+than+their+competitors%2C+but+rather+because+their+execution+of+technology+and+digital+customer+experience+was+beyond+what+was+on+the+market.+These+platforms+are+fast%2C+intuitive%2C+easy-to-use+and+responsive%2C+so+they+go+viral.+These+are+the+traits+we+want+in+our+solutions%2C+and+they+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+come+from+some+hidden+industry+experience%2C+but+rather+a+marriage+of+solving+real+problems+and+excellence+in+technology+execution.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIndustry-PULLQUOTE-19-19.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EExecution+is+more+important+than+industry+knowledge%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Broad+expertise+in+technology+execution+is+the+difference+between+good+and+great.+Teams+need+to+have+diversity+in+experience+across+varied+sectors%2C+and+thus+the+knowledge+to+tailor+problem-solving+towards+different+scenarios.+There+is+more+to+be+gained+from+lessons+in+building+similar+systems+in+multiple+sectors%2C+than+by+knowing+one+inside+out.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIf+you+want+to+be+competitive%2C+you+have+to+be+the+best.+This+means+that+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+solely+rely+on+industry+standards+and+norms.+You+have+to+learn+from+and+build+upon+what+the+market+is+doing+in+all+sectors%2C+all+the+time.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+an+insurer+creating+a+self-service+digital+product+for+customers%2C+you+should+have+an+engineering+team+who+is+an+expert+in+self-service+digital+products+%26ndash%3B+not+a+team+who+is+an+expert+in+insurance.+You+are+the+insurance+expert+that+will+be+guiding+the+team+in+industry+practices%2C+and+business+operating+context.+You+want+a+team+that+has+seen+it+all%2C+and+offer+ideas+that+challenge+the+industry+norms.+Not+just+because+it+will+result+in+delivery%2C+but+because+it+creates+the+opportunity+for+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMissing+industry+knowledge+is+not+why+tech+projects+fail%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Tech+projects+rarely+fail+due+to+missing+industry+knowledge+or+experience%2C+but+rather+due+to+missing+technology+experience%2C+awareness%2C+practices+and+pragmatism+in+execution.+These+are+things+which+are+universal+to+projects+in+any+industry.+Having+a+technology+team+with+some+experience+in+the+industry+will+certainly+help+%26ndash%3B+but+it+won%26%2339%3Bt+make+or+break+project.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+that+most+failures+are+borne+from+issues+in+delivery+that+have+little+to+do+with+industry+expertise.+Weak+or+non-existent+technical+leadership%2C+planning%2C+fundamental+skills%2C+tools%2C+practices+are+the+culprits+here.+A+veteran+team+with+lessons+in+delivery+of+complex+solutions+in+multiple+scenarios+can+navigate+any+project.+They+can+learn+each+context+rapidly%2C+and+surmount+the+real+killers+of+delivery%3A+expectation+management%2C+collaboration%2C+productivity+and+technical+know-how.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+narrow+expertise+bias%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Teams+who+have+been+deeply+embedded+in+a+single+industry+often+develop+%26ldquo%3Bblinkers%26rdquo%3B%2C+hiding+possible+solutions+which+are+obscured+by+repetitive+industry+system+norms.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOur+brains+are+naturally+wired+to+find+patterns+in+seas+of+information.+When+engineering+teams+are+biased+because+of+their+narrow+experience+within+a+single+business+or+industry%2C+they+risk+boxing+themselves+in%2C+hiding+alternative+ideas+for+how+problems+can+be+solved+with+technology.+With+diversified+experience%2C+teams+can+challenge+your+thinking+and+bring+new%2C+innovative+ideas+from+different+industries%2C+teams+and+platforms.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3ETeams+with+a+broader+view+of+technology%2C+domain%2C+and+business+processes+have+a+hunger+to+learn+and+to+solve+problems.+Broad+technology+practice+trumps+narrow+industry+expertise%2C+clinging+to+industry+standards+will+prevent+you+from+differentiating+your+business%2C+and+remaining+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Platform-oriented+IT+is+universal %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPlatformstrategy_Bannercopy4-106.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EAs+options+for+creating+and+building+digital+platforms+are+expanding+and+becoming+more+complex%2C+most+enterprises+seemingly+want+to+either+build+or+become+one.+A+%3Cem%3Ebusiness+platform+strategy+%3C%2Fem%3Eis+an+approach+to+entering+a+market%2C+offering+products+and+services+to+it+and+at+the+same+time+offering+that+channel+to+competitors+looking+to+reach+the+same+market.+This+method+allows+you+to+practically+own+the+customer%2C+and+when+done+right+forces+other+participants+to+sell+through+you+to+reach+customers.+This+enables+you+to+become+the+mall%2C+not+the+tenant+%26ndash%3B+or+both.+Think+Uber%2C+Airbnb+and+Amazon.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BBecoming+the+platform%26rdquo%3B+is+an+ambition+for+many+businesses%2C+but+even+if+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+or+won%26rsquo%3Bt+become+one+of+these+industry-owning+platforms+as+an+enterprise%2C+you+still+need+to+start+planning+and+implementing+an+%3Cem%3Einternal+technology+platform%3C%2Fem%3E+strategy.+Platform-oriented+IT+is+universal%2C+and+leading+technology+enterprises+are+leaning+on+this+approach+to+grow+or+transform+into+technology-enabled+and+technology+centric+businesses.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3ETech+giants+logically+group+their+IT+efforts+into+platforms%2C+with+each+platform+catering+for+a+specific+product%2C+service+or+channel+towards+users.+These+platforms+are+managed+independently+and+create+a+framework+for+re-use+that+accelerates+product+development+and+results+in+more+coherent+channels.+If+your+data%2C+systems+and+processes+are+organised+this+way%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+launch+products+faster%2C+offer+a+more+consistent+customer+experience+across+every+channel%2C+and+can+harness+economies+of+scale+in+non-functional+areas+like+security+and+performance.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOrganisations+of+practically+any+size+will+benefit+from+a+strategy+like+this%2C+which+is+why+it+is+becoming+so+popular%3A%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Be+faster+to+market%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Platform-oriented+IT+allows+business+units+to+focus+on+what+they+are+good+at.+It+seems+like+an+obvious+approach+to+reuse+the+tools+that+are+already+available%2C+but+the+truth+is%2C+most+business+units+in+the+enterprise+are+still+treated+as+silos+to+avoid+dependencies+and+politics.+They+just+build+what+they+need+from+scratch%2C+top+to+bottom.+Creating+new+IT+foundations+for+every+initiative+might+be+liberating%2C+but+it+is+also+wasteful+and+slow.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThere+are+some+among+us+who+have+learned+how+to+pick+the+granularity+that+makes+sense+and+offer+minimal+friction+in+a+dependency+tree.+The+idea+so+to+create+and+offer+shared+data%2C+services%2C+DevOps+and+infrastructure+that+the+teams+actually+want+to+use+and+are+readily+available.+This+saves+development+time%2C+releasing+it+for+valuable+product+validation%2C+testing+and+iteration+time+on+core+features.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Offer+a+more+consistent+customer+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Customers+expect+the+same+treatment+when+dealing+with+different+offerings+under+your+brand.+They+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+interested+in+the+fact+that+different+services+have+different+processes%2C+and+generally+expect+a+level+of+consistency+when+interacting+with+multiple+departments.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThis+is+a+question+of+execution+in+digital+customer+experience.+It+is+hard+enough+to+create+beautiful%2C+intuitive+and+memorable+user+journeys+once%2C+why+exaggerate+that+problem+by+forcing+every+new+team+and+project+to+do+it+alone%2C+and+again%3F+Re-using+channels+which+are+designed+to+accommodate+a+variety+of+%26lsquo%3Btenants%26rsquo%3B+does+require+more+planning%2C+and+technical+skill+upfront%2C+but+is+clearly+a+better+long-term+approach+to+consistency+for+your+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Make+non-functionals+a+shared+investment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_While+it+is+very+difficult+to+justify+costly+security%2C+performance%2C+or+infrastructure+upgrades+for+a+single+product%2C+pooling+these+investments+make+enormous+financial+sense.+In+a+platform-oriented+IT+structure%2C+each+business+unit+receives+the+benefit+of+communal+investments+into+non-functional+characterises+of+their+shared+platform.+All+for+a+small+premium+required+to+support+the+shared+team%2C+tooling+and+technology+required.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWhen+platforms+are+segmented+correctly%2C+privacy%2C+security+and+scalability+changes+can+be+implemented+across+all+departments+that+need+to+use+it+%26ndash%3B+without+the+concern+that+a+certain+unit+does+not+have+current+capacity+to+do+them.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FInternalplatform-23.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EInternal+platforms+are+the+secret+weapon+behind+rapidly+growing+tech+companies%2C+and+also+one+of+the+keys+to+leverage+limited+technology+talent+in+an+enterprise.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+no-brainer+to+share+core+IT%2C+API+and+customer+journey+capabilities+across+the+organisation.+For+the+computer+scientists%2C+platform-orientation+for+businesses+is+like+object+orientation+for+software+architectures.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWe+need+to+take+the+%3Cem%3Ebad+flexibility%3C%2Fem%3E+away+%28total+control+top+to+bottom%29+in+order+to+promote+the+good+kind%3A+customer-centricity%2C+shared+services+faster+time+to+market.+Start+moving+towards+platform-oriented+IT%2C+centralising+your+internal+IT+thinking%2C+and+easily+drive+compliance+and+security+consistency.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
As+options+for+creating+and+building+digital+platforms+are+expanding+and+becoming+more+complex%2C+most+enterprises+seemingly+want+to+either+build+or+become+one.+A+business+platform+strategy+is+an+approach+to+entering+a+market%2C+offering+products+and+services+to+it+and+at+the+same+time+offering+that+channel+to+competitors+looking+to+reach+the+same+market.

Proudly+South+African%3F+Not+technically%E2%80%A6 However%2C+many+seemingly+%26lsquo%3Bproudly+South+African%26rsquo%3B+businesses+are+choosing+to+outsource+their+technology+and+software+solution+requirements+to+countries+such+as+India%2C+China+and+the+United+States%2C+directly+damaging+the+local+industry.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BInvestment+in+local+skills+and+technology+is+crucial%2C+and+much+of+our+country%26rsquo%3Bs+future+growth+is+expected+to+stem+from+these+fields%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Shashi+Hansjee%2C+CEO+of+Entelect%2C+one+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+most+successful+software+solutions+companies%2C+%26lsquo%3BIn+that+case%2C+it+is+important+to+explore+the+reasons+why+businesses+are+not+advancing+their+resources+to+our+own+local+workforce.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+According+to+Hansjee%2C+South+Africa+boasts+some+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+most+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D45183%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ecutting-edge%2C+impressive+and+broadly+experienced+information+and+communication+technology+%28ICT%29+professionals%3C%2Fa%3E.+Hansjee+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BCities+such+as+Cape+Town+and+Johannesburg%2C+where+many+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+most+prominent+businesses+are+based%2C+have+already+proven+to+be+hubs+for+technological+innovation%2C+yet+businesses+are+still+sending+their+opportunities+outside+of+our+borders.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+key+differentiators+that+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+ICT+skills+base+offers+in+comparison+with+service+providers+abroad%2C+include+the+fact+that+using+local+talent+naturally+facilitates+stronger+communication+between+project+stakeholders.+%26lsquo%3BThis+ultimately+increases+the+overall+success+rate+and+shortens+the+delivery+timeframes%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Hansjee%2C+%26lsquo%3BWe+have+also+seen+a+number+of+case+studies+that+showcase+how+South+African+ICT+providers%26rsquo%3B+strong+communication+principles+and+agile+methodologies+positively+differentiate+us+from+overseas+competitors.+In+fact%2C+many+South+African+developed+software+projects+have+translated+into+successful+and+viable+products+and+businesses.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hansjee+suggests+that+in+the+past%2C+companies+seeking+ICT+services+elsewhere+may+have+been+put+off+by+problems+such+as+trying+to+locate+and+train+local+talent+to+the+point+where+they+are+able+to+become+part+of+a+mobilised+workforce%2C+and+so+the+seemingly+safer+and+more+familiar+option+of+outsourcing+took+preference.+%26lsquo%3BMany+feel+that+education+standards+may+not+be+up+to+international+standards%2C+particularly+as+a+result+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+low+global+rankings+in+the+maths+and+science+fields%2C%26rsquo%3B+he+explains%2C+%26lsquo%3BHowever%2C+remarkable+improvements+and+developments+have+taken+place+around+access+to+ICT+education+in+recent+years%2C+and+we+do+not+believe+that+is+the+case+today.+We+are+privileged+at+Entelect+to+be+exposed+to+some+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+finest+tech+experts+on+a+daily+basis.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hansjee+does%2C+however%2C+concede+that+some+disparities+do+occur+in+our+local+education%2C+but+rather+than+take+their+business+elsewhere%2C+South+African+organisations+should+see+this+as+an+opportunity+to+invest+in+and+improve+on+our+educational+systems.+%26lsquo%3BIt+is+crucial+that+businesses+recognise+how+vastly+different+and+exponentially+improved+today%26rsquo%3Bs+local+technology+expertise+is%2C+compared+with+just+a+few+years+ago%2C+and+see+the+potential+that+lies+within+our+own+population%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Hansjee%2C+%26lsquo%3BIf+big+corporates+and+organisations+take+the+pioneering+steps+of+showing+confidence+in+our+local+talents%2C+their+example+will+open+up+a+veritable+floodgate+of+opportunity+and+growth%2C+attracting+more+local+%26ndash%3B+and+even+international+%26ndash%3B+business+opportunities.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+CEO+concludes%2C+%26lsquo%3BWith+thousands+of+jobs+expecting+to+be+opening+up+in+the+ICT+sectors+for+South+African+businesses%2C+a+key+goal+for+the+country+as+a+whole+should+be+to+foster+a+culture+of+addressing+local+business+needs+using+local+expertise.%26rsquo%3B
South+Africa+has+been+making+waves+in+the+technology+innovation+world+and+the+country%E2%80%99s+wealth+of+young+talent+in+the+technology+and+software+space+creates+the+ideal+skills+pool+for+local+businesses+to+tap+into.

Growing+pains+of+an+ICT+company These+two+challenges+are+coupled+with+the+fact+that+companies+are+rapidly+exploding+from+10+employees+to+more+than+200+%26nbsp%3Bin+relatively+short+timeframes.+With+all+this+in+mind%2C+the+human+capital+of+a+company+is+its+most+vital+component+and+it+determines+overall+business+success+or+failure.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Career+development+and+performance+management+in+a+small+company+is+easy%2C+often+senior+management+is+operationally+involved+and+the+roles+and+responsibilities+are+generally+unstructured+or+loose.+Most+people+in+early+startups+accept+that+they+do+whatever+needs+to+be+done+on+the+path+to+success%2C+even+if+that+means+fixing+the+printer+when+they+are+developers+by+trade%21%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+the+company+grows%2C+senior+management+starts+becoming+less+and+less+operationally+involved+%26ndash%3B+and+this+is+when+things+start+becoming+tricky.+It+is+at+this+point+that+processes+and+policies+need+to+be+created.+These+are+both+critical+to+the+overall+growth+of+the+company.+At+Entelect%2C+our+core+value+has+always+been+focussed+around+our+employees+and+we+have+made+numerous+efforts+to+ensure+we+succeed+in+managing+their+performance+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+that+our+employees+are+continuously+growing.+As+with+any+process%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+about+learning+and+these+are+just+some+of+the+lessons+that+we%26rsquo%3Bve+learnt+along+the+way%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EEnsure+that+key+performance+indicators+and+career+paths+are+well+defined%2C+easily+accessible+and+part+of+the+company+culture.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETake+the+time+to+continually+evolve+your+performance+appraisal+process.+We+have+done+this+numerous+times+over+the+last+ten+years+and+it+has+made+a+massive+positive+impact%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDo+not+rely+solely+on+the+feedback+captured+during+the+performance+appraisal+process+but+rather+over+time%2C+document+and+consolidate+as+much+information+around+an+employee%2C+including+the+number+of+hours+worked%2C+client+commendations+received+and+training+attended.+All+of+this+information+will+give+you+a+more+accurate+reflection+of+the+employee%26rsquo%3Bs+performance+when+required%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAs+senior+management%2C+you+should+not+be+afraid+to+let+go+of+the+performance+appraisal+function%2C+especially+if+you+get+to+the+point+where+you+cannot+give+each+employee+the+adequate+amount+of+attention+he+or+she+deserves.+Make+sure+the+person+who+has+this+responsibility+is+armed+with+the+necessary+tools+and+information%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EGrow+a+strong+base+of+staff+leadership+that+have+capacity+to+give+each+employee+the+time+he+or+she+deserves%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+your+company+grows%2C+you+will+continue+to+face+many+challenges%3A+embrace+them%2C+continue+to+adapt+and+remain+relevant+to+your+staff%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.
Yatish+Parshotam+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Communications%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Software+development+companies+across+South+Africa+are+faced+with+many+ongoing+challenges+but+the+two+that+are+of+utmost+importance%2C+are+people+focused%3A+recruiting+and+maintaining+a+strong+pool+of+developers+to+help+fuel+the+high+demand+for+work+in+the+industry.
    
["Teams and culture"]
   Yatish.jpg    
High+Performance+Teams The+coders+worked+in+teams+of+six+to+ten+people+and+looking+at+the+success+of+the+end+products%2C+the+competition+raised+the+question%3A+What+constitutes+a+%26lsquo%3Bhigh+performance+software+development+team%26rsquo%3B%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.+The+right+individuals%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+level+of+ability+%28or+potential+ability%29+and+experience+of+members+is+crucial%2C+and+an+individual%26rsquo%3Bs+selection+will+depend+on+the+nature+of+the+project.+Attitude%2C+however%2C+trumps+ability+every+time.+In+coding%2C+there+are+two+types+of+individual%3A+those+who+find+problems+and+those+who+find+solutions.+Choose+members+who+have+a+bias+for+finding+solutions+%26ndash%3B+they+will+bring+energy+to+a+team+that+is+normally+drained+by+problem+finders.+A+positive+mindset+and+can-do+attitude+go+a+long+way.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+team+leader+will+emerge+naturally%2C+especially+where+there+are+varying+degrees+of+experience+in+the+team.+Whether+explicitly+identifying+an+individual+as+team+lead+or+letting+natural+selection+play+its+course%2C+leaders+who+display+the+characteristics+of+servant-leaders+%28those+who+look+to+enable+the+full+potential+of+those+in+their+team%2C+rather+than+taking+an+autocratic%2C+command-and-control+style%29+are+better+suited+to+leading+high-performance+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+The+right+combination%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Collaboration+is+king+in+high-performance+teams+but+finding+the+right+combination+of+individuals+is+significantly+more+challenging.+Team+dynamics+come+into+play+and+the+myriad+of+behavioural+habits+and+thinking+preferences%2C+and+combination+thereof%2C+can+be+difficult+to+assess+up+front.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identify+the+combination+of+individuals+that+will+communicate+effectively.+Assemble+a+cross-functional+team+that+has+all+the+skills+necessary+to+get+the+job+done%2C+eliminating+external+dependencies+wherever+possible.+Once+collaboration+and+skill+sets+are+addressed%2C+shift+the+focus+to+providing+the+right+environment+%28location%2C+tooling+and+so+on%29+and+trust+the+team+to+do+the+job.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.+Setting+the+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Having+a+well-defined+purpose+is+a+strong+motivator.+Individuals+who+understand+the+big+picture+and+who+buy+into+the+objectives+of+what+the+project+is+trying+to+achieve%2C+will+naturally+aim+to+maximise+the+value+of+their+contribution.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Success+often+comes+only+after+a+number+of+failures.+If+you+are+looking+for+innovation+from+your+team%2C+tolerate+failure.+Create+a+%26lsquo%3Bsafe%26rsquo%3B+environment+in+which+the+team+can+experiment+with+ideas%2C+new+technologies+and+approaches.+Encourage+the+team+to+explore+uncharted+territory+and+stretch+the+boundaries+of+what+is+possible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Involvement+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+the+project+sponsor%2C+product+owner+or+any+other+direct+stakeholder+having+a+vested+interest+in+the+success+of+the+project%2C+become+involved.+Show+an+interest+in+the+successes+and+failures+of+the+team+and+be+a+champion+for+the+project+and+team+across+other+business+units.+High-performance+teams+are+proud+of+their+work+and+recognition+for+their+efforts+will+directly+impact+their+level+of+motivation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+high-performance+team+is+a+crucial+element+in+delivering+a+successful+product+and+once+you+know+what+constitutes+a+winning+team%2C+it+could+be+the+start+of+something+game-changing.
Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Earlier+this+year%2C+Entelect+was+invited+to+FNB%E2%80%99s+inaugural+%23CodeFest.+The+event+sees+coders+prototyping+innovative+ideas+and+it+culminates+in+a+24-hour+coding+marathon%2C+turning+those+ideas+into+something+tangible.
    
["Teams and culture"]
   Doug.jpg    
What+makes+a+great+software+engineer%3F %3Cp%3EThe+following+observations+and+institutional+learnings+are+based+on+years+of+working+in+and+with+software+teams+of+different+sizes%2C+across+a+number+of+industries%2C+technologies+and+architectural+complexities.+They+are+in+no+particular+order+because+in+reality%2C+priorities+for+each+of+these+will+shift+based+on+context.+What+is+important+though%2C+is+that+these+are+all+positive+traits%2C+and+engineers+who+display+these%2C+would+almost+certainly+be+productive+and+most+likely+to+accelerate+through+their+career.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAttitude+over+aptitude%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+great+attitude+can+take+decades+of+personal+development+but+becoming+technically+competent+takes+a+fraction+of+that+time.+A+competent+team+will+have+the+resources+to+rapidly+teach%2C+mentor+and+develop+a+junior+engineer+who+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+start+out+with+the+sharpest+technical+skills.+A+negative+attitude+will+invariably+prevent+or+hinder+learning.+Building+competencies+for+people+with+tertiary-level+education+is+usually+far+less+onerous+than+changing+their+attitude.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+ability+to+relate+on+a+personal+level+to+colleagues+and+clients+is+crucial%2C+so+to+be+a+great+engineer%2C+you+need+to+be+the+engineer+whom+everyone+wants+to+work+with.+Being+a+technical+guru+is+insufficient+if+nobody+wants+to+work+with+you.+Great+software+engineers+avoid+condescension%2C+narcissism+and+an+inflated+ego.+In+communications%2C+this+means+they+are+able+to+listen+attentively%2C+be+assertive+and+concise.+Great+engineers+also+able+to+present+themselves+without+aggression.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAwareness+and+analytical+nature%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESome+engineers+struggle+with+%26lsquo%3Btunnel+vision%26rsquo%3B+into+the+solution+space%2C+where+they+focus+too+much+on+the+solution+without+properly+evaluating+the+problem.+Great+software+engineers+are+astute%2C+able+to+place+requirements+in+context+and+maintain+awareness+of+the+problem-space+while+working+through+the+solution.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+awareness+should+pervade+all+aspects+of+their+work%2C+especially+the+ability+to+be+aware+of+what+already+exists+in+a+given+solution%2C+and+how+it+can+be+reused+to+solve+requirements+more+efficiently+or+in+ways+that+weren%26rsquo%3Bt+directly+suggested.+One+of+the+hallmarks+of+great+software+engineers+is+a+shrewd+talent+for+solving+problems+on+their+feet+in+meetings%2C+workshops+and+pair-programming+scenarios.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaturity+in+approach%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Great+software+engineers+apply+their+mind+to+all+aspects+of+the+engineering+process+in+a+considered+and+non-selfish+way.+Here+are+a+few+examples+of+what+this+means+in+practice%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ESeeking+constructive+criticism+%26ndash%3B+great+engineers+ask+what+they+could+be+missing+in+a+design%2C+how+would+it+not+work+and+whether+it+is+understandable+to+the+users+and+the+rest+of+the+team%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAsking+for+the+background+of+a+requirement+to+see+how+it+fits+into+things+and+seeing+the+%26lsquo%3Bbig+picture%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+great+engineers+look+to+stabilise+requirements+before+rushing+ahead+with+development.+For+example%2C+similar+work+items+should+be+checked+to+see+if+there+is+an+overlap%2C+offering+an+opportunity+to+combine+or+reuse%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETaking+initiative+%26ndash%3B+when+working+on+a+specific+requirement%2C+great+engineers+will+explore+ways+to+improve+the+solution+beyond+the+exact+provided+requirement%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ECommunicating+regularly+%26ndash%3B+status+reports%2C+stand-up+meetings+and+involvement+in+the+broader+software+and+client+context+are+all+easy+ways+to+be+noticed+though+excellent+service.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECareer-path+intuition%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+career+in+software+engineering+is+vibrant+and+varied+so+it+is+difficult+to+have+a+template+for+growth+that+can+be+applied+to+junior+engineers+in+a+blanket+fashion.+Being+senior+is+less+about+how+many+years+you+have+worked+and+more+about+your+maturity%2C+competence+and+value+you+can+provide+to+a+team.+The+best+software+engineers+see+this+for+what+it+is+%26ndash%3B+an+opportunity.+Furthering+a+career+in+the+field+is+about+understanding+the+context+and+demonstrating+an+insight+into+what+makes+a+software+engineer+a+%26lsquo%3Bsenior%26rsquo%3B+or+a+%26lsquo%3Blead%26rsquo%3B+within+that+organisation.+Armed+with+that+knowledge%2C+great+software+engineers+can+tailor+their+skills+and+initiative+to+push+themselves+further.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+what+separates+great+engineers+from+good+engineers+is+a+natural+maturity+in+approach%2C+personality+and+attitude+that+goes+beyond+the+expected+competence+in+the+technical+aspects+of+the+software+craft.+This+might+seem+counterintuitive+given+the+implied+technical+depth+in+the+job+and+to+be+fair%2C+in+many+positions%2C+an+expert+level+technical+competency+is+an+absolute+minimum.+However%2C+the+point+is+that+often%2C+technical+strength+will+only+get+you+through+the+door%2C+where+these+%26lsquo%3Bsofter%26rsquo%3B+aspects+then+take+over.%3C%2Fp%3E
Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%3A+Managed+Solutions%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+When+compared+to+disciplines+such+as+mechanical%2C+civil+and+industrial+engineering%2C+software+engineering+as+a+craft+is+still+young%2C+despite+its+rapid+growth+over+the+last+two+decades.+Much+of+this+growth+has+been+driven+by+Twitter%2C+Facebook%2C+Google+and+Microsoft%2C+all+of+which+have+generated+substantial+interest+in+the+field.+As+a+result+of+this+surge+in+interest%2C+software+engineering+has+become+an+attractive+career+option+and+it+draws+in+people+with+a+wide+variety+of+talent%2C+personality%2C+knowledge+and+attitude.+Given+these+variations%2C+it+is+worthwhile+looking+at+the+traits+that+make+a+great+software+engineer.

Employee+loyalty+programmes%3A+a+Band-Aid%C2%AE+for+a+gaping+wound %3Cp%3ESouth+African+companies+are+not+only+competing+within+a+national+context+for+top-tier+software+talent+but+they+are+also+up+against+international+organisations+on+their+own+soil.+These+organisations+have+cut+their+teeth+in+far+more+competitive+markets+and+have+decades+of+experience+in+managing+software+environments+on+the+South+African+companies.+It+is+not+breaking+news+either+that+there+is+a+very+limited+pool+of+skills+to+draw+on%2C+and+to+top+it+off%2C+in+South+Africa%2C+there+is+a+through-the-roof+demand+on+enterprise+developers+in+all+sectors.+This+dangerous+combination+and+a+heavily+imbalanced+supply-and-demand+picture+has+forced+software-service+companies+and+corporates+to+take+a+closer+look+at+their+retention+rates+and+invest+in+programmes+designed+to+improve+these+figures%2C+or+suffer+churn+as+the+talent+is+pulled+towards+the+highest+bidder.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+problem+with+this+approach+is+that+companies+are+designing+loyalty+programmes+to+mitigate+that+fact+and+as+a+result%2C+they+avoid+the+tough+questions+that+examine+the+organisational+causes+of+staff+churn.+When+used+in+this+way%2C+loyalty+programmes+are+the+equivalent+of+sweeping+the+problem+under+the+carpet.+They+cannot+solve+fundamental%2C+underlying+issues+that+require+investment+and+political+will+to+transform%2C+much+in+the+same+way+that+a+Band-Aid+cannot+stop+arterial+bleeding.+Giving+employees+a+free+smoothie+is+not+going+to+keep+them+working+for+you%2C+let+alone+engaged+with+their+work+if+they+have+a+poor+relationship+with+their+team%2C+have+very+little+input%2C+control+or+ownership+of+their+work%2C+or+work+in+the+basement+of+a+dilapidated+building+with+poor+ventilation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+power+of+a+loyalty+programme+lies+in+its+ability+to+enhance+what+is+already+a+working+organisational+culture%2C+and+to+incentivise+positive+behaviour.+Loyalty+programmes+are+incredibly+useful+tools+for+this+purpose+and+the+benefits+of+this+approach+have+been+well+studied+and+documented%2C+some+of+which+you+can+read+about+on+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.encentivize.co.za.%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EEncentivize%3C%2Fa%3E+website.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+how+then+do+we%2C+as+the+businesses+who+depend+on+these+individuals%2C+move+ourselves+into+the+future+with+a+predictable+strategy+for+retaining+and+attracting+top+software+talent%3F+The+answer+is+not+easy%2C+nor+is+it+the+same+for+everyone+in+the+game.+However%2C+at+Entelect%2C+we+know+that+it+begins+with+self-reflection.+For+a+retention+programme+to+be+effective%2C+it+cannot+simply+be+a+rewards+system.+At+worst%2C+it+needs+to+be+a+comprehensive+overhaul+of+the+organisational+culture%2C+processes+and+management+practices+of+a+company.+We+have+identified+some+common+success+factors+within+teams+that+have+high+retention+rates+and+although+not+universal%2C+there+is+generally+a+shift+towards+empowerment%2C+autonomy%2C+transparency+and+inclusivity+in+all+the+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EKnowing+where+to+start+can+be+tricky.+In+our+business+of+software+services%2C+customers+and+staff+are+two+sides+of+the+same+equation+and+success+is+an+exercise+in+identifying+our+value+proposition+for+our+staff%2C+and+working+just+as+hard+to+balance+that+equation+as+we+do+for+our+customers.+Embarking+on+this+journey+has+taught+us+that+retention+in+the+world+of+software+development+means+taking+a+long+hard+look+in+the+mirror+at+who+you+are+as+a+company+and+committing+to+improving+yourself%2C+for+your+staff.%3C%2Fp%3E
Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%3A+Professional+Services%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+In+2014%2C+Entelect+Software+won+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+To+Work+For+award+and+this+year%2C+the+company+was+was+awarded+with+a+Gold+Achiever+Award+in+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+to+Work+For+survey.+Of+course%2C+the+company+celebrated+these+accolades+but+they+also+gave+them+an+oppotunity+to+pause+and+reflect+on+the+reasons+why+Entelect+has+seen+a+suprisingly+low+staff+churn+and+high+satisfaction+rating+over+the+past+few+years.

Why+candidate+liability+clauses+are+bad+for+business %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+time+of+year+is+critical+for+recruitment.+Many+companies+are+actively+searching+universities+all+over+the+country+to+secure+the+best+candidates+to+join+their+graduate+programmes.+Similarly%2C+many+graduates+are+entering+the+job+market+for+the+first+time+and+are+navigating+their+way+around+the+recruitment+space%2C+looking+for+the+right+recruitment+agent+to+help+them+identify+the+best+career+opportunity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+in+recent+years+there+has+been+an+increasing+trend+by+recruiters+to+ask+candidates+to+sign+what+has+been+called+a+Candidate+Liability+Clause.+Given+that+a+large+number+of+graduate+candidates+are+new+to+the+recruitment+industry%2C+many+assume+that+all+components+of+these+agreements+are+standard+practice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+contentious+component+of+these+agreements+is+that+if+a+candidate+reneges+on+an+offer+after+written+acceptance%2C+the+recruitment+agency+claims+damages+against+the+candidate.+Usually%2C+the+agency+demands+from+the+candidate+an+amount+equal+to+the+commission+or+fee+they+would+have+earned+upon+successful+placement.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+this+practice+is+not+common%2C+it+has+been+in+existence+for+some+years.+In+2012%2C+the+Federation+of+African+Professional+Staffing+Organisations+%28APSO%29+amended+its+Code+of+Ethical+and+Professional+Practice%2C+banning+the+use+of+the+Candidate+Liability+Clause.+As+such%2C+it+required+all+members+of+APSO+to+adhere+to+this+ban+and+provided+a+candidate+notification+that+informed+candidates+that+an+agency%26rsquo%3Bs+only+right+would+be+to+seek+damages+in+line+with+their+legal+rights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+the+frequency+of+this+Candidate+Liability+Clause+practice+suggests+that+there+is+still+a+lack+of+clarity+around+this+issue+and+what+is+permitted.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECarmen+Williams%2C+General+Manager%3A+Talent+Acquisition+at+Entelect%2C+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BAt+this+time+of+year%2C+graduates+are+planning+for+their+first+job.+Many+of+them+will+be+stepping+into+the+recruitment+space+for+the+first+time.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EShe+believes+it+is+critical+that+candidates+understand+how+the+recruitment+industry+works+so+that+they+are+not+misled+by+unethical+practices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BSuccessful+placements+can+only+exist+when+a+candidate+wants+to+join+a+company%2C+not+because+the+candidate+feels+intimidated+into+joining+by+the+prospect+of+incurring+damages+fees+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAPSO+has+also+joined+the+discussion+in+an+attempt+to+provide+clarity+on+the+issue.+While+APSO+recognises+that+some+members+may+wish+to+seek+damages+in+certain+instances%2C+it+expressly+prohibits+recruitment+agencies+using+a+Candidate+Liability+Clause+as+a+means+of+recovering+these+damages.+Part+of+the+problem%2C+explains+Roly+Boardman%2C+chairman+of+the+APSO+Ethics+Committee%2C+is+that+there+is+currently+no+requirement+for+recruitment+agencies+to+be+members+of+an+industry+body+such+as+APSO.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BMembership+of+APSO+would+serve+to+monitor+unethical+practices+and+give+candidates+recourse+when+a+dispute+occurs%2C%26rdquo%3B+he+says.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+why+is+this+practice+bad+for+business%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+contracting+a+candidate+to+cover+damages+should+they+decide+to+change+their+mind+on+an+offer+is+not+conducive+to+a+successful+placement.+A+candidate+who+feels+bound+to+a+job+offer+through+fear+of+incurring+damages+fees+is+likely+to+enter+that+position+in+a+negative+state+of+mind+and+feel+cheated+out+of+their+preferred+choice.+Jobs+that+start+like+this+do+not+last+and+replacing+these+employees+incurs+more+expense+in+the+longer+term.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+a+large+number+of+companies+are+not+aware+that+potential+candidates+are+asked+to+sign+this+document.+Consequently%2C+it+can+be+a+poor+reflection+on+the+companies+these+agencies+represent%2C+not+to+mention+that+this+practice+may+be+in+stark+contrast+with+the+values+of+the+organisations+they+serve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThirdly%2C+this+practice+can+result+in+a+poorly+matched+placement.+On+the+one+hand%2C+a+company+may+lose+out+on+an+excellent+candidate+because+he+or+she+is+unable+to+change+their+mind.+On+the+other%2C+a+company+may+take+on+an+employee+who+would+have+preferred+to+join+another+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWilliams+has+a+good+view+of+both+sides+of+the+industry+and+believes+that+this+issue+points+to+the+role+of+the+recruiter.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+role+of+the+recruitment+agent+is+to+help+both+the+candidate+and+the+company+make+the+best+decision%2C%26rdquo%3B+she+explains.+%26ldquo%3BIf+the+recruiter+is+prepared+to+nurture+this+part+of+the+process%2C+damages+fees+should+not+be+an+issue.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+should+company%26rsquo%3Bs+and+candidates+look+for%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+When+it+comes+to+identifying+the+right+candidate+for+the+right+role%2C+the+onus+is+on+the+recruiter+to+perform+greater+due+diligence+throughout+the+recruitment+process.+Boardman+supports+this+view+by+asking+the+question%2C+%26ldquo%3BSurely+we+cannot+employ+people+without+personal+interaction%3F%26rdquo%3B+He+firmly+believes+that+we+need+to+bring+personality+back+into+the+recruitment+process%2C+saying%2C+%26ldquo%3BWe+simply+cannot+afford+to+miss+out+on+good+candidates+because+the+right+information+was+not+discovered.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Part+of+a+recruiter%26rsquo%3Bs+process+is+to+counsel+candidates+on+what+to+do+in+case+of+a+counter+offer%2C+helping+them+understand+the+pros+and+cons+of+accepting+a+counter+offer.+It+is+in+the+interest+of+all+parties+involved+that+the+candidate+takes+the+best+career+opportunity+available+to+realise+a+successful+recruitment+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Candidates+and+companies+should+ask+a+potential+recruitment+agent+whether+they+are+a+member+of+APSO.+This+way+they+know+a+code+of+ethics+is+being+followed%2C+and+should+there+be+any+cause+for+recourse+or+dispute%2C+all+parties+involved+have+the+support+of+an+independent+party.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+engaging+a+recruitment+agency%26rsquo%3Bs+service%2C+companies+and+candidates+should+find+out+what+the+terms+of+engagement+are.+If+an+agency+does+indeed+apply+a+damages+fee%2C+then+companies+need+to+consider+how+this+may+affect+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BA+candidate+must+be+free+of+coercion+of+any+sort+to+make+the+right+decision+for+them%2C%26rdquo%3B+concludes+Williams.+%26ldquo%3BIt+is+important+that+companies+start+to+determine+the+kind+of+practices+they+want+from+the+recruitment+industry%2C+and+start+demanding+it%2C+or+only+work+with+those+recruiters+who+share+your+organisation%26%2339%3Bs+values.%26quot%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Carmen+Williams+%28Entelect%C2%A0General+Manager%3A+Talent+Acquisition%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+This+time+of+year%2C+graduate+recruitment+searches+start+to+heat+up%2C+and+with+this+comes+a+number+of+graduates+looking+for+their+first+job+but+unfamiliar+with+the+recruitment+process.+Candidate+Liability+Clauses+have+become+a+hot+topic+again+recently%2C+partly+because+they+can+also+be+bad+for+business.

Using+the+power+of+communities+to+stay+relevant %3Cp%3EAs+software+engineers%2C+we+need+to+stay+on+top+of+a+continuously+evolving+industry+-+the+stronger+and+more+diverse+our+community+network+of+engineers+and+developers%2C+the+greater+chance+we+have+to+remain+relevant.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunities+are+popping+up+in+all+areas+of+our+lives+because+people+no+longer+just+do+one+job+or+hobby%2C+they+have+a+number+of+passion+projects+and+interests.+Increased+connectivity+and+social+media+have+enabled+this.+Finding+a+good+community+is+like+finding+your+perfect+match%3B+when+it%26%2339%3Bs+good%2C+the+most+amazing+innovations+can+emerge+from+your+collaborations+with+like-minded+people.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+often+think+of+communities+as+formally+established+groups+but+communities+can+also+be+much+smaller+groups+of+people+that+share+similar+ideologies.%26nbsp%3B+Often+these+people+choose+to+define+their+connection+in+a+way+that+reflects+their+social+identity+and+practice.+The+most+rewarding+thing+about+communities+can+be+the+knowledge+sharing+and+the+personal+networks+that+develop+from+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+first%2C+it+may+seem+obvious+as+to+why+it+can+be+valuable+to+interact+with+the+larger+development+community%3B+to+share+knowledge.+But%2C+there+are+other+advantages+that+are+not+always+obvious+until+you+are+part+of+a+development+community.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Sharing+passions%2C+ideas%2C+and+goals%2C+can+accelerate+your+personal+growth+exponentially.+But+the+first%2C+most+important%2C+trick+to+getting+the+most+out+of+a+community+is+not+to+look+at+it+for+what+you+can+get+out+of+it%2C+but+rather+look+at+what+you+can+offer.+Networking+is+a+two-way+street+and+the+second+you+can+show+yourself+to+be+someone+who+is+always+willing+to+help+and+share+knowledge%2C+the+quicker+you+will+be+able+to+build+your+network.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+The+software+industry+moves+at+an+incredible+pace.+While+developers+may+be+exposed+to+many+of+these+trends+in+their+day+jobs%2C+there+is+always+more+to+learn.+For+instance%2C+have+you+considered+ember.js+as+a+tool+when+you+hit+the+limits+of+your+current+Single+Page+Application+framework+and+do+you+know+what+pitfalls+to+look+out+for%3F+Or%2C+do+you+know+what+options+exist+for+bringing+your+next+application+into+the+augmented+reality+or+virtual+reality+world+of+the+future%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+In+the+same+vein%2C+because+of+the+continuous+evolution+of+the+industry%2C+troubleshooting+is+as+much+a+learning+curve+as+learning+new+languages+and+technologies.+Communities+provide+software+engineers+with+an+experimental+space+to+learn+and+also+troubleshoot+with+like-minded+people.%26nbsp%3BThe+advantages+of+having+a+space+to+troubleshoot+don%26%2339%3Bt+just+apply+to+work+in+community+forums%2C+but+also+problems+you+may+come+up+against+in+your+day-to-day+working+environments.%26nbsp%3B+You%26rsquo%3Bll+find+you+are+able+to+work+through+problems+more+quickly%2C+which+will+ultimately+add+value+to+both+your+career+and+the+projects+that+your+employer+is+undertaking.+Not+to+mention+the+insights+you+will+bring+to+your+community+will+increase+exponentially.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+One+of+the+less+obvious+but+most+compelling+advantages+of+being+part+of+a+community+is+that+it+can+give+guidance+to+your+career.+Being+in+touch+with+the+latest+changes+in+the+industry+will+help+you+to+make+strategic+decisions+about+your+future+career%3B+where+you+want+to+be+three+years+from+now%2C+what+skills+you+need+to+get+there%2C+and+most+importantly%2C+how+to+stay+relevant.+Fostering+relationships+in+a+community+will+have+a+positive+effect+on+your+career%3B+who+knows+who+you+may+meet%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26rsquo%3Bre+lucky+in+South+Africa%3B+we+have+access+to+a+number+of+international+communities+such+as+GitHub+and+stackoverflow%2C+but+also+some+locally+emerging+communities+such+as+source.technology.+But+the+User+Groups+are+possibly+the+most+active.+Groups+including+DevUG%2C+Jozi-JUG%2C+and+Android+UG+are+all+very+active+and+have+a+high+number+of+developers+who+attend+events.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+also+a+number+of+conferences+in+South+Africa+which+are+being+created+by+the+community+such+as+DevConf+and+JSinSA.+Attendance+at+these+kind+of+events+is%26nbsp%3Bsky-rocketing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithin+companies%2C+Slack+is+also+becoming+hugely+popular%2C+and+channels+such+as+such+as+ZA+Developers+and+ZA+Tech+enable+smaller+communities+to+emerge+and+interact+all+the+time.+After+all%2C+a+community+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+an+official+group+with+a+name%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+collection+of+like-minded+people%2C+so+sub-communities+can+exist+anywhere.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%2C+as+developers+and+leaders+in+the+industry%2C+need+to+take+ownership+to+drive+these+initiatives+and+lead+by+example.+We+have+so+much+knowledge+to+share+and+so+many+upcoming+developers+who+are+hungry+to+share+in+our+knowledge.+There+is+a+shortfall+in+good+developers+in+South+Africa+but+no+shortage+of+jobs+for+great+developers.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+build+and+participate+in+communities+to+help+bridge+this+gap+and+grow+to+our+full+potential+%26ndash%3B+as+individuals%2C+and+as+an+industry.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

BI+developers+should+be+treated+like+gold %3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3EHave+you+considered+who+has+the+most+insight+into+your+business%3F+The+CEO%2C+CIO%2C+or+perhaps+the+CFO%3F+After+all%2C+these+are+the+people+making+the+biggest+decisions+about+the+business.+They+are+presented+with+all+the+necessary+information+to+make+strategic+business+decisions.+Right%3F+Not+necessarily.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EActually%2C+the+people+with+the+greatest+insight+are+a+little+bit+lower+down+the+food+chain.+They+are+the+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29+developer.+The+reality+is+that+we+may+not+have+considered+the+BI+developer+because+for+many+years%2C+these+people+have+been+left+in+situations+where+they+are+always+playing+catch+up+with+organisational+changes.+It+was+almost+a+reverse-fit%3B+the+organisation+uses+existing+data+insights+to+make+a+financial+decision+on+how+to+improve+efficiencies%2C+then+the+BI+developer+goes+in+to+engineer+the+support+system+around+that.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+been+an+interesting+journey+for+BI+developers.+When+SQL+was+launched+in+2005%2C+the+only+conceivable+approach%2C+given+the+richness+of+each+the+feature+tools+in+the+BI+stack%2C+was+a+collection+of+specialists.+Then+came+the+next+generation+of+BI+developers%3B+the+generalists.+Those+guys+who+knew+enough+to+be+able+to+support%2C+maintain%2C+and+occasionally%2C+enhance+the+solution+implemented+by+the+specialists.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EBut+things+have+changed%2C+significantly.+BI+developers+%28previously+the+%26lsquo%3Bgeneralists%26rsquo%3B%29%2C+have+now+acquired+something+that+no+one+else+in+the+business+has%3B+a+unique+and+holistic+view+of+the+business+systems+and+the+business+processes.+In+fact%2C+at+a+mid-+management+level+%28and+because+of+the+nature+of+their+role%29%2C+these+developers+have+a+unique+perspective+and+access+to+data+at+virtually+all+levels+of+the+organisation+and+across+all+functional+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EI+often+refer+to+them+as+the+%26%2339%3BMiss+congeniality%26%2339%3B%26nbsp%3Bof+organisations.+They+have+typically+been+in+the+organisation+for+a+long+time%2C+had+contact+with+almost+all+departments+and+are+well+liked+by+everyone.+The+result+is+that+as+a+BI+Developer%2C+they+have+the+capacity+to+inform+and+influence+strategic+business+decisions.%26nbsp%3B+They+are+becoming+the+%26lsquo%3BIntelligence+Engineers%26rsquo%3B+of+organisations.+Spending+less+time+on+technical+work+and+far+more+on+data+discovery%2C+predicting+trends%2C+understanding+influencers+and+advising+businesses+on+solutions+to+problems+they+never+knew+they+had.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EBI+developers+should+be+treated+like+gold+and+nurtured.+They+have+so+much+intelligence+at+their+fingertips.+Losing+this+when+a+BI+developer+looks+for+greener+pastures%2C+or+more+challenging+opportunities%2C+could+significantly+damage+your+market+position.+Maybe+not+next+month%2C+but+certainly+before+the+next+BI+developer+has+got+his+or+her+feet+under+the+table.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EConsider+retention+strategies%2C+make+sure+they+are+specific+to+the+resource+needs+and+growth+opportunities.+BI+developers+should+have+business+critical+skills%2C+domain+knowledge+across+industries+and+business+silos.+Even+ownership+in+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThe+reality+is+that+if+these+guys+leave%2C+they+leave+with+an+exceptional+amount+of+knowledge+about+your+business.+So+don%26rsquo%3Bt+let+them+become+the+Intelligence+Engineer+of+another+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E

The+company+breakaway+%E2%80%93+old-fashioned+relic+or+indispensable+business+tool%3F %3Cp%3EThe+company+breakaway+is+often+dismissed+as+a+day+or+two+out+of+the+office+for+a+bit+of+fun+and+a+few+hours+of+discussion+about+the+business.+More+often+than+not%2C+the+phenomenal+ideas+that+seemed+so+innovative+around+the+table+never+materialise.+Lessons+learnt+are+quickly+forgotten+and+the+passionate+commitment+to+%26ldquo%3Bdoing+things+differently%26rdquo%3B+and+%26ldquo%3Bgoing+the+extra+mile%26rdquo%3B+soon+gets+swallowed+up+in+the+daily+grind.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+according+to+Doug+Crawford%2C+manager%3A+service+delivery+at+Entelect%2C+the+breakaway+is+still+highly+relevant+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+business+environment.+In+fact%2C+he+believes+it%26rsquo%3Bs+more+relevant+than+ever.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+is+a+software+development+company+that+runs+teams+of+on-site+developers+across+a+range+of+clients+and+projects+throughout+South+Africa.+Each+project+is+operationally+independent%2C+which+means+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+need+for+the+project+teams+to+interact+or+engage+with+each+other.+However%2C+from+a+strategic+and+developmental+perspective%2C+there+is+a+lot+they+can+learn+from+each+other.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BEach+year+we+take+a+day+out+of+the+office+to+bring+together+our+project+team+leaders+from+across+the+country+%26ndash%3B+we+call+them+%26lsquo%3Bteam+leads%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+to+share+experiences+and+discuss+creative+and+innovative+ways+to+address+common+challenges+in+the+business%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BMore+importantly%2C+the+sessions+give+team+leads+and+management+the+opportunity+to+interact+in+a+dedicated+and+focused+setting+that+allows+for+a+healthy+two-way+communication+that+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+easily+achieved+by+other+means.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESounds+like+any+other+breakaway%2C+right%3F+But+Crawford+says+these+interventions+have+yielded+several+success+stories+over+the+years.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+breakaways+are+heavily+solutions-focused%2C%26rdquo%3B+he+explains.+%26ldquo%3BBefore+the+event+we+circulate+a+list+of+topics+or+tasks+that+will+be+unpacked+during+the+course+of+the+day.+Team+leads+are+required+to+make+notes+for+discussion+on+each+of+the+scenarios.+On+the+day+itself+we+divide+the+group+into+teams.+Each+team+is+allocated+one+of+the+topics+to+unpack+and+debate+in+the+morning+session.+Teams+then+present+their+solutions+to+the+group+in+the+afternoon.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+challenges+from+the+last+Entelect+breakaway+were%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Create+a+toolbox+to+help+our+new+or+young+team+leads+run+effective+career%2C+growth+and+performance+discussions+with+their+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Create+an+on-boarding+pack+that+can+be+used+by+team+leads+and+other+team+members+to+ensure+new+members+joining+a+team+have+the+best+possible+experience+and+are+able+to+deliver+value+to+the+client+and+team+at+the+earliest+opportunity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+do+we+maximise+visibility+across+the+company+of+the+technical+achievements+and+innovations+being+delivered+by+our+teams%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+can+I+inspire+a+sense+of+purpose+in+my+team+that+creates+a+common-ground+for+our+client%2C+staff+and+company+interests%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+do+we+ensure+teams+and+clients+are+aware+of+and+making+use+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+value-adding+services%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+depth+of+discussion+was+impressive%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BAs+a+management+team+we+are+already+working+on+operationalising+a+number+of+the+ideas+that+came+out+of+the+most+recent+session.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+these+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+on-boarding+toolbox+to+ensure+a+comprehensive+and+consistent+on-boarding+experience+for+new+team+members%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+discretionary+%26ldquo%3Bhappiness%26rdquo%3B+budget+for+each+team+to+spend+on+anything+that+will+make+them+happy%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeam+CVs+that+list+capabilities+and+achievements+at+team+level+leading+to+awareness+and+boosting+profile+within+the+company%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGenerating+thinking+around+value-add+activities%2C+e.g.+knowledge+sharing%2C+training%2C+events+and+workshops%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+sessions+also+play+a+very+important+role+when+it+comes+to+internal+mentorship.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BWe+currently+have+44+team+leads+in+the+business%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BBreakaways+provide+the+ideal+forum+for+the+whole+team+to+network+and+form+relationships.+Some+people+in+the+team+are+very+experienced%2C+while+others+are+new+to+the+role+or+to+the+business.+During+the+breakaways+we+actively+encourage+connections+between+newer+and+more+experienced+team+members%2C+which+serve+as+informal+mentorship-type+relationships.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+not+only+management+that+sees+value+in+these+sessions.+Team+leads+themselves+gave+some+really+positive+feedback+after+the+most+recent+breakaway.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+really+enjoyed+the+day+as+a+whole%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Jonathan+Counihan%2C+who+works+on+one+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+teams+based+at+Sage.+%26ldquo%3BI+like+the+fact+that+our+input+is+valued+and+some+actionable+items+come+out+of+it.+I+think+the+networking+aspect+is+also+very+good%2C+as+it+gives+the+leads+a+chance+to+touch+base+and+build+support+structures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+really+feel+part+of+the+team+the+way+the+Entelect+management+keeps+us+in+the+loop+about+the+company+strategy+and+vision.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESchalk+Wolhuter%2C+who+leads+the+Entelect+team+at+Discovery+Vitality+RSA%2C+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BPut+a+group+of+highly+motivated+and+bright+individuals+in+a+room%2C+shake+them+a+bit+and+out+comes+ideas+and+solutions.+This+is+what+happens+at+an+Entelect+Team+Lead+breakaway.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BA+properly+thought-out+scenario+list%2C+a+room+full+of+team+leads%2C+a+great+venue%26hellip%3B+and+the+only+thing+that+can+happen+is+that+problems+will+be+solved.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Company+breakaways+are+often+dismissed+as+a+few+days+out+of+the+office%2C+but+according+to+Doug+Crawford%2C+the+company+breakaway+is+more+important+than+ever.
