Why+we+fail+to+find+the+right+job %3Cp%3EAccording+to+a+2013+Gallup+study%2C+70%25+of+the+American+workforce+are+not+engaged+at+work.+Around+the+world%2C+across+142+countries%2C+the+proportion+of+employees+who+feel+engaged+at+work+is+just+13+percent.+LinkedIn+estimates+that+66%25+of+its+350+million+users+are+actively+or+passively+seeking+a+job.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+why+is+it+that+so+many+people+are+unhappy+in+their+jobs%3F+For+me+the+answer+is+simple-+people+make+career+decisions+based+on+the+wrong+reasons.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+my+past+8+years+in+recruitment+I+have+interviewed+hundreds+of+people%2C+most+of+which+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+tell+me+why+they+were+really+looking+for+a+new+job%2C+what+they+were+looking+for+in+their+next+job+or%2C+what+type+of+culture+or+environment+would+best+suit+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPeople+should+be+asking+why+do+they+want+to+leave.+In+data+analytics+a+%26lsquo%3Bwhy%26rsquo%3B+analysis+goes+a+long+way.+The+process+is+to+keep+asking+%26lsquo%3Bwhy%26rsquo%3B+until+you+get+to+the+very+core+of+why+you+want+to+leave+so+that+you+can+understand+what+will+make+you+feel+fulfilled.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften+we+take+the+first+offer%2C+or+move+just+for+more+money.+In+fact+money+is+far+too+often+associated+with+success+%26ndash%3B+we+think+if+we%26rsquo%3Bre+earning+more+money+then+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+measure+of+how+successful+we+are.+But+a+salary+is+not+going+to+determine+how+much+you+will+be+challenged+in+your+job+or+whether+you+will+feel+fulfilled+by+the+day-to-day+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+book+%26ldquo%3BIn+Drive%3A+The+Surprising+Truth+About+What+Motivates+Us%2C%26rdquo%3B+Daniel+Pink%2C+says+that+knowledge+workers+are+motivated+by+three+things%3A+autonomy%2C+mastery+and+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAutonomy%3A+when+we+are+in+control+of+what+we+do%2C+how+we+do+it%2C+and+when+we+do+it.+That+should+always+be+the+case+in+a+true+Agile+working+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMastery%3A+when+we+are+constantly+learning+and+evolving%2C+becoming+better+professionals+and+better+human+beings.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPurpose%3A+when+we+feel+that+our+job+is+important+and+we+are+contributing+to+make+things+better%2C+instead+of+just+doing+what+we+are+told+without+understanding+why.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETherefore%2C+we+see+that+people+work+for+recognition%2C+not+money.+Understandably%2C+money+does+feature+in+the+decision+making+process.+However%2C+we+need+to+be+more+strategic+about+our+choice+and+view+money+as+one+element+rather+than+the+most+important+element.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+my+experience%2C+people+never+leave+a+job+because+they+dislike+their+salary%2C+they+become+unhappy+because+they+are+not+feeling+fulfilled+in+other+areas+of+their+role+and+then+the+salary+compounds+the+issue.+Growth+%28mastery%29%2C+a+sense+of+independence+%28autonomy%29+and+fulfilment+that+your+job+makes+a+significant+impact+on+the+lives+of+others+somehow+%28purpose%29+are+the+defining+factors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+technology+industry%2C+these+issues+are+compounded+by+the+fact+that+the+industry+is+fast-paced+and+growing+exponentially.+There+are+many+new+jobs+emerging+all+the+time%2C+so+this+can+make+it+harder+to+make+your+decision.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+next+time+you+go+for+an+interview%2C+why+not+change+the+questions+you+prepare+for+the+interviewer+to+be+focused+on+autonomy%2C+mastery+and+purpose+and+appreciate+the+interesting+conversation+that+unfolds.+The+money+will+follow.%3C%2Fp%3E
Carmen+Williams+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Talent+Acquisition%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+The+technology+industry+is+fast-paced+and+growing+exponentially.+With+so+many+new+jobs+emerging+all+the+time%2C+how+can+you+be+sure+you+make+a+career+decision+based+on+the+right+reasons%3F

Performance+appraisals%3A+Helping+you+reach+your+full+potential %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPerformance+appraisals+have+a+bad+rap.+They+are+the+meetings+that+many+of+us+dread.+But%2C+the+truth+is%2C+performance+reviews+present+some+great+opportunities+if+you+know+how+to+get+the+most+out+of+them.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAppraisals+are+there+to+identify+your+potential+and+help+you+realise+your+goals.+Entelect+want+to+give+our+staff+both+the+challenges+and+tools+you+need+to+be+successful.+Appraisals+are+simply+a+great+platform+to+discuss+this+so+that+you+can+become+the+best+at+what+you+do.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+first+thing+to+remember+is+that+there+are+three+main+purposes+of+appraisals+which+are+always+constructive%3A+Alignment%2C+growth%2C+and+the+opportunity+to+have+crucial+conversations.+The+reality+is+that+everyone+comes+from+different+career+backgrounds+with+different+experiences.+While+we+all+join+a+company+with+great+capabilities%2C+our+experiences+are+different%2C+and+so+aligning+ourselves+to+the+company+and+teams+as+well+as+ensuring+we%26rsquo%3Bre+continuously+growing+is+critical.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+order+to+get+the+most+out+of+your+appraisal%2C+it+is+important+to+understand+the+expectations+of+the+session.+We+often+approach+performance+reviews+as+something+that+happens+to+us.+But+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+two-way+street+and+our+role+in+the+appraisal+discussion+is+crucial+to+shaping+it+fully.+Specifically%2C+this+is+your+opportunity+to+let+your+manager+or+team+lead+know+what+your+goals+and+aspirations+are.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+take+the+time+to+prepare+carefully.+If+you+review+yourself+critically%2C+consider+the+values+or+principles+that+are+important+to+you%2C+and+if+you+can+articulate+this+clearly%2C+you+will+find+the+session+far+more+constructive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+structure+of+reviews+at+Entelect+mean+they+are+quarterly.+There+are+two+%26lsquo%3Bmajor%26rsquo%3B+sessions%3B+in+May+and+November%2C+and+then+two+%26lsquo%3Bminor%26rsquo%3B+sessions+in+March+and+August.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+%26lsquo%3Bmajor%26rsquo%3B+reviews+are+structured+to+be+%26lsquo%3B360%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+means+they+survey+your+colleagues+and+clients+throughout+your+day-to-day+role+in+order+to+obtain+a+full+view+of+your+professional+development.+This+is+done+via+an+online+tool+and+then+discussed+in+person+with+your+Account+Manager+or+Team+Lead.+Listening+is+crucial+in+this+session%2C+as+your+team+lead+will+have+taken+the+time+to+synthesise+your+%26lsquo%3B360%26rsquo%3B+feedback+and+draw+themes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlways+remember+that+when+someone+offers+you+feedback+%26ndash%3B+positive+or+negative+-+it+demonstrates+an+interest+and+investment+in+your+growth.+Whether+your+feedback+is+positive+or+negative%2C+learn+to+respect+all+feedback+and+understand+it+as+someone+showing+an+interest+in+your+growth+and+you+will+start+getting+more+out+of+the+sessions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+person%26rsquo%3Bs+objective+is+to+help+you+progress+and+meet+your+full+potential.+We+all+have+blind+spots%3A+areas+of+development+that+hadn%26rsquo%3Bt+occurred+to+us.+If+these+arise+then+listening+closely+is+extremely+valuable+and+will+help+us+to+work+out+ways+to+apply+the+learnings+and+development+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOf+equal+importance+is+for+the+reviewee+to+share+his+or+her+personal+experiences.+Our+personal+interpretations+of+our+workplace+are+shaped+by+our+own+experiences.+It+is+essential+that+we+are+open+and+honest+about+these+too%2C+to+help+inform+how+life+at+Entelect+looks+from+the+perspective+of+every+employee.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndeed%2C+some+of+the+best+performance+advice+we+can+receive+is+from+our+peers.+They+work+with+us+every+day%3B+see+our+strengths+and+weaknesses%2C+wins+and+frustrations.+Therefore%2C+it+is+important+to+dedicate+enough+time+to+reviewing+your+peers+and+providing+them+with+the+kind+of+constructive+feedback+you+would+want+to+receive.+Raising+issues+is+not+something+to+shy+away+from%2C+as+long+as+they+are+substantiated+and+show+opportunity+for+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelectuals+strive+to+be+challenged%2C+receive+recognition+for+work+well+done%2C+and+aspire+to+the+best+they+can+be.+Appraisals+will+help+you+reach+your+full+potential.+So%2C+don%26rsquo%3Bt+dread+reviews.+Be+prepared%2C+take+control+of+the+session%2C+and+apply+the+learnings+to+help+accelerate+your+career+and+be+the+best+you+can+be.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETips+on+ways+you+can+prepare+for+your+review%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Set+aside+at+least+an+hour+to+complete+your+online+form.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+rush+it.+Find+a+quiet+place+where+you+can+think+clearly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Be+honest%2C+open+and+thorough.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Remember+that+ratings+mean+nothing+without+comments.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Take+the+time+to+read+your+team+members+feedback%2C+and+identify+the+points+that+stick+out.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Prepare+a+set+of+notes+for+your+discussion+to+ensure+you+cover+everything+that+is+important+to+you+and+to+help+guide+the+conversation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

How+software+engineering+candidates+can+create+an+impact+in+a+highly+competitive+market %3Cp%3EDemand+for+software+engineering+skills+continues+to+rise.+According+to+a+report+issued+by+The+Joburg+Centre+for+Software+Engineering+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wits.ac.za%2Fmedia%2Fwits-university%2Fnews-and-events%2Fimages%2Fdocuments%2FJCSE%2520Skills%2520Survey.pdf%22%3EJCSE+Skills+Survey%3C%2Fa%3E%29%2C+a+University+of+Witwatersrand+partnership+with+government+and+industry%2C+there+is+%26lsquo%3Ban+immediate+unsatisfied+need+for+skills+in+the+ICT+sector%26hellip%3B%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+end+of+2015%2C+a+paper+from+Empirica+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.empirica.com%2Fhome.html%22%3Eempirica%3C%2Fa%3E%29+indicated+that%2C+%26lsquo%3Bthe+European+market+could+absorb+756+000+ICT+practitioners+by+2020+if+sufficient+supply+was+available%26rsquo%3B.+And+in+June+2016%2C+Cisco+announced+that+it+will+invest+%2410+million+over+two+years+in+a+scholarship+programme+to+increase+the+pool+of+talent+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Finvestor.cisco.com%2Finvestor-relations%2Fnews-and-events%2Fnews%2Fnews-details%2F2016%2FCisco-Launches-10-Million-Global-Cybersecurity-Scholarship-to-Increase-Talent-Pool-Introduces-New-and-Updated-Certifications%2Fdefault.aspx%22%3Einvestor.cisco%3C%2Fa%3E%29.+Locally%2C+the+May+2016+edition+of+the+Career+Junction+Index+showed+that+Software+Development+remained+the+most+sought-after+skillset+on+the+Career+Junction+website+and+just+25%25+of+those+jobs+available+in+December+2016+were+filled+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Finvestor.cisco.com%2Finvestor-relations%2Fnews-and-events%2Fnews%2Fnews-details%2F2016%2FCisco-Launches-10-Million-Global-Cybersecurity-Scholarship-to-Increase-Talent-Pool-Introduces-New-and-Updated-Certifications%2Fdefault.aspx%22%3ECJI+Executive+Summary%3C%2Fa%3E%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+that%2C+large+software+engineering+companies+are+competing+for+skills+and+resources+to+deliver+against+the+business+opportunities%2C+which+are+being+driven+by+traditional+industries+such+as+financial+services%2C+insurance+and+healthcare+sectors.+But+the+competition+is+tough.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+competing+in+the+IT+space+are+continuously+looking+for+ways+to+set+themselves+apart+from+their+competitors%2C+which+is+resulting+in+increased+demand+for+high-quality+software+engineering+candidates.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year%2C+Entelect+took+on+40+of+the+top+Computer+Science+and+Engineering+candidates+in+the+country%2C+up+from+30+in+2016.+On+an+average+month%2C+Entelect+employ+anywhere+between+5-10+full-time+employees%2C+which+is+testament+to+the+number+of+opportunities+out+there+at+the+moment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+unlike+many+other+industries%2C+the+South+African+Software+industry+should+be+considered+as+having+a+supply+issue%2C+rather+than+a+demand+issue.+That+means+the+industry+simply+cannot+fill+the+jobs+available+with+the+necessary+skills.+Computer+Science+and+Engineering+is+still+listed+by+the+Department+of+Higher+Education+and+training+as+a+scarce+skill+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dhet.gov.za%2FGazette%2FGovernment%2520Gazette%2520No%252039604%2C%252019%2520January%25202016.%2520List%2520of%2520Occupations%2520in%2520High%2520Demand%25202015.pdf%22%3EDHET+scarce+skills%3C%2Fa%3E%29+and+although+graduates+are+increasing%2C+it+is+not+at+the+pace+the+industry+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+our+view%2C+the+most+sought-after+skills+in+the+industry+at+the+moment+include+Java%2C+C%23+and+Angular%2C+and+typically%2C+candidates+with+these+skills+are+in+high-demand.+However%2C+it+would+be+wrong+to+assume+that+because+there+is+a+supply+challenge%2C+this+means+it+is+easy+to+get+a+job+in+software+engineering.+The+reality+is+that+continuous+increases+in+security%2C+big+data+and+consumer+lifestyles+makes+this+industry+the+backbone+of+many+other%2C+more+established+industries.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHence%2C+this+supply+issue+places+a+challenge+on+the+companies+because+service+standards+must+remain+high.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+need+to+demonstrate+technical+accuracy+and+extremely+high+levels+of+craftsmanship+in+every+aspect+of+their+job.+The+industry+moves+too+quickly+to+absorb+mistakes+and+technical+errors+so+candidates+must+demonstrate+exceptional+skills.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+technical+accuracy+alone+is+not+enough.+Candidates+are+also+required+to+demonstrate+other%2C+softer+skills%2C+which+will+positively+impact+their+ability+to+deliver+effective+solutions+in+teams%2C+but+these+are+often+overlooked+by+candidates+when+selling+themselves+in+an+interview.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECraftsmanship%3A+The+drive+to+transform+what+is+currently+a+skill+into+an+art+of+exceptional+ability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEQ%3A+Self-awareness+and+having+a+deep+understanding+of+oneself+is+an+important+skill+when+managing+teams+and+clients+effectively.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArticulate%3A+The+ability+to+express+ideas+clearly+and+with+a+high-energy+drive+efficiencies+and+productivity+in+the+workplace%2C+especially+when+working+on+tough+projects+with+tight+deadlines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeam+spirit%3A+People+who+have+a+strong+team+spirit+tend+to+be+collaborative%2C+which+is+critical+for+identifying+the+best+solution+for+the+project+or+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConfidence+and+passion%3A+These+traits+drive+behaviours+such+as+the+desire+to+learn+new+skills%2C+techniques+or+technologies+quickly%2C+to+go+above+and+beyond+your+daily+tasks+and+to+bring+creative+flair+to+their+role.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+a+candidate+can+demonstrate+that+they+have+the+exceptional+skills+to+create+an+impact%2C+the+opportunities+available+as+an+employee+in+this+industry+are+extensive.+Apart+from+exposure+to+cutting-edge+innovation%2C+there+are+many+other+less+obvious+benefits+that+candidates+will+be+exposed+to+which+are%2C+arguably%2C+unique+to+this+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+in+a+new+industry+there+are+many+opportunities+to+create+new+solutions+and+address+new+problems.+This+means+that+the+occasion+to+practice+autonomy+is+far+greater+than+in+well-established+industries+where+there+are+pre-defined+best+practices+and+rules+of+engagement.+Autonomy+is+a+significant+growth+accelerator.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+there+is+the+opportunity+to+become+a+master+in+your+field.+The+competitive+nature+of+the+software+industry+means+that+companies+are+looking+for+true+crafts+men+and+women.+Being+exceptional+is+the+flavour+of+the+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThirdly%2C+purpose.+Employees+today+are+looking+for+purpose+in+their+jobs.+Software+engineering+is+often+considered+the+backbone+of+many+industries+and+as+such%2C+every+problem+software+engineering+solves+will+ultimately+better+or+improve+the+lives+of+others+somehow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+this%2C+when+recruiters+talk+about+%26lsquo%3Bopportunities%26rsquo%3B+in+software+engineering%2C+they+are+not+just+talking+about+the+number+of+jobs+available+in+the+market%2C+although+this+is+very+true.+They+are+talking+about+the+opportunities+for+growth%2C+personal+development+and+purpose+which+are+presented+by+a+relatively+new+industry+that+is+at+the+forefront+of+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUndoubtedly%2C+the+future+of+the+software+industry+is+on+an+exciting+trajectory.+The+pace+of+innovation+means+that+competition+will+remain+extremely+high.+Candidates+that+can+reap+the+rewards+of+this+industry+are+those+who+can+offer+exceptional+craftsmanship+and+understand+the+value+of+the+softer+skills+in+the+delivery+of+the+most+agile+and+effective+services+and+solutions+a+client+can+employ.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+important+to+consider+what+additional+skills+you+can+offer+a+software+company+that+will+help+set+them+apart+from+their+competitors.+Understand+the+marketplace%2C+and+your+position+in+it.+There+are+many+good+software+developers%2C+but+exceptional+ones+are+far+fewer+between.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Carmen+Williams+%28Entelect+General+Manager%2C+Talent+Acquisition%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+The+IT+industry+continues+to+grow+and+with+it%2C+the+demand+for+software+engineering+skills.+But+how+can+software+engineering+candidates+create+in+an+impact+in+a+highly+competitive+market.

The+journey+to+becoming+a+Data+Scientist. %3Cp%3EThe+role+of+the+data+scientist+is+one+of+the+broadest+roles+in+the+software+engineering+field+at+the+moment+with+the+expectations+on+these+individuals+being+extremely+high.+However%2C+there+is+growing+controversy+around+the+roles+and+responsibilities+of+a+Data+Scientist+and+at+what+point+can+you+fairly+call+yourself+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+begin%2C+we+need+to+be+cognisant+that+the+industry+itself%2C+especially+in+South+Africa%2C+is+in+its+infancy.+So+industry+standards+which+outline+the+breadth+of+knowledge+required+on+Big+Data+and+Analytics+technologies+have+yet+to+be+defined.+Although%2C+fundamentally%2C+the+role+of+the+Data+Scientist+is+closely+linked+to+being+Big+Data+developers+and+implementers+of+solutions+that+encompass+large+amounts+of+structured+and+unstructured+data.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+when+hiring+Data+Scientists%2C+we+need+to+understand+that+there+are+only+a+handful+of+people+with+experience+across+the+board.+Organisations+are+mostly+hiring+people+with+pockets+of+knowledge+or%2C+graduates+or+juniors+with+the+right+passion.+In+reality%2C+Data+Scientists+have+many+years+of+experience+and+a+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge+that+is+relatively+unique.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+believe+the+journey+to+Data+Scientist+begins+as+either+a+Big+Data+Engineer+or+a+Big+Data+Analyst%2C+and+there+is+an+important+distinction+between+the+two+roles.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Engineers+are+traditionally+from+a+Software+Engineering+background.+They+have+spent+some+time+in+the+trenches+learning+Linux%2C+networking+and+the+Hadoop+ecosystem.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+limiting+the+Engineer+role+to+the+Apache+technologies%2C+most+vendors+are+releasing+amazing+solutions+that+would+classify+them+into+the+Big+Data+field%3B+however%2C+they+are+leveraging+the+initial+architecture+and+concepts+of+Hadoop.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Analysts+typically+come+from+a+Maths+and+Statistics+background.+They+have+been+tinkering+with+databases%2C+ETL%26rsquo%3Bs+and+ELT%26rsquo%3Bs+as+well+as+basic+data+mining+models.+These+guys+understand+the+difference+between+supervised+and+unsupervised+learning%2C+what+a+random+forest+is%2C+and+a+vast+array+of+other+analytics+techniques.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBoth+these+roles+set+extremely+strong+foundations+on+the+path+to+becoming+a+Data+Scientist+thanks+to+their+problem-solving+skills%2C+both+technical+and+logical.%26nbsp%3B+At+this+point%2C+these+individuals+are+now+set+to+start+moving+up+the+ranks+in+terms+of+Data+Science.+However%2C+there+are+still+a+number+of+learning+imperatives+required+before+becoming+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+have+established+a+training+path+to+take+these+individuals+towards+the+end+goal+of+being+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMoving+to+junior+or+intermediate+level%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+decisions+the+engineers+and+analysts+need+to+make.+Initially%2C+a+lot+of+them+are+related+to+breadth+versus+depth+of+knowledge.+I+have+always+believed+you+should+develop+a+vast+breadth+of+knowledge+across+all+relevant+technology+stacks+and+then+focus+on+achieving+depth+of+knowledge+in+relevant+areas+over+time.+If+you+are+really+committed%2C+this+means+you+end+up+with+both+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+tackle+this%2C+the+data+solutions+side+of+Entelect+created+a+roadmap+designed+to+take+a+Big+Data+Engineer+or+Analyst+through+a+structured+programme+to+provide+the+breadth+across+the+engineer+and+analyst+role.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+similar+to+the+Entelect+Graduate+Bootcamp+%28https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DsFNj6fzOIAc%29%2C+where+graduates+or+juniors+are+provided+with+an+overview+of+the+main+stream+technologies%2C+which+helps+them+develop+a+breadth+of+skill+and+from+there%2C+the+Graduates+can+move+into+specific+areas+of+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+data+solutions+training+programme%2C+we+leverage+a+few+of+the+MOOC%26rsquo%3Bs%2C+a+host+of+our+internal+training+material+but+most+importantly+we+use+something+known+as+a+Structured+Incubators+approach.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Structured+Incubators+provide+real-world+scenarios+filled+with+mini+challenges+designed+to+expose+everyone+to+all+aspects+of+the+Big+Data+environment.+It+covers+everything+from+installing+and+configuring+Linux+clusters%2C+all+the+way+through+to+running+their+first+data+mining+model.+Several+technologies+are+used%2C+however+the+concepts+learnt+during+these+incubators+are+the+key+to+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+important+key+to+a+successful+incubator+is+constant+mentoring.+At+Entelect+we+have+attracted+several+Big+Data+Engineers+and+Analysts+and+provide+constant+support+to+aspiring+Data+Scientists.+Constant+feedback+loops+are+given+to+the+participants+though+various+mediums%2C+frequent+show+and+tell+sessions+are+conducted%2C+and+several+ad+hoc+challenges+are+given+to+the+participants%2C+ranging+from+taking+2+days+out+to+enter+a+Kaggle+competition+all+the+way+through+to+producing+some+real-world+analytics+on+relevant+subjects+%28http%3A%2F%2Fsource.technology%2Fpolitical-party-analysis%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERegardless+of+experience+in+the+field%2C+the+initial+training+programme+must+be+followed+by+all+our+engineers.+If+a+person+has+experience+in+setting+up+clusters+they+are+still+required+to+complete+the+entire+incubation+period+to+ensure+that+everyone+is+on+the+same+minimum+level.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+seen+great+success+with+this%2C+constantly+pushing+the+guys+out+of+their+comfort+zone%2C+throwing+them+in+the+deep+end+and+making+sure+we+provide+the+support+for+them+to+float.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+initial+period+takes+roughly+10+weeks+to+achieve+a+broad+overview.+At+this+stage+the+individual+is+still+operating+at+a+Big+Data+engineer+or+analyst+level.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMoving+to+intermediate+level%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+field+changes+far+too+quickly+for+anyone+to+stand+still+and+rest+on+their+laurels+for+6+months+so+growth+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+optional.+We+strive+to+help+our+engineers+and+analysts+experience+a+variety+of+industry+verticals+and+technologies+to+support+their+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+this+point%2C+data+engineers+and+analysts+start+finding+their+passion+and+gaining+a+depth+of+knowledge+in+a+certain+area.+This+is+not+a+career+direction%2C+but+more+a+career+enhancement.+The+learning+paths+change+slightly+and+more+focus+is+given+to+the+relevant+area+of+interest.+However%2C+growth+in+the+other+areas+never+stop.+If+someone+enjoy+doing+the+data+analysis+we+would+focus+the+training+roadmap+more+on+R%2FMachine+Learning%2FPython+aspects.+However%2C+there+will+still+be+investment+in+furthering+the+knowledge+on+the+engineering+side+and+vice+versa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+roadmap+for+career+growth+is+a+long+one.+We+estimate+roughly+two+years+of+part-time+focus+to+achieve+solid%2C+well-rounded+knowledge+to+become+a+Junior+Data+Scientist.+This+would+encompass+understanding+SQL%2C+NoSQL+HQL%2C+Linux%2C+Windows%2C+Spark+and+another+90+technologies+relevant+to+data+science.+All+of+this+needs+to+be+coupled+with+real+world+experience+across+various+industry+domains+to+develop+the+entire+picture+of+implementations%2C+use+cases+and+critical+success+factors+of+big+data+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+now+you+are+a+junior+data+scientist%2C+what%26rsquo%3Bs+next%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+this+point+you+should+be+able+to+take+a+blank+slate%2C+setup+a+big+data+environment%2C+ingest+data%2C+execute+useful+analytics+and+provide+a+presentation+layer+to+any+organisation+you+are+at.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+next+step+is+to+continue+deepening+your+knowledge%2C+the+focus+is+then+put+on+advanced+statistics%2C+graph+theory%2C+advanced+data+structures%2C+streaming+analytics+and+finally+we+move+into+the+Probabilistic+Modelling+and+Deep+Learning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you+have+proven+competency%2C+a+solid+track+record+and+a+vast+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge%2C+at+this+point+you+are+considered+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+industry+becomes+more+established%2C+we+expect+to+see+this+path+to+Data+Scientist+becoming+more+commonplace.+At+Entelect%2C+we+use+the+roadmap+to+ensure+our+Data+Scientists+are+true+craftsmen+in+their+field+and+can+consistently+provide+the+highest+quality+service+and+solutions+to+their+clients+at+all+times.%3C%2Fp%3E

Loyalty%3A+A+morphing+concept+in+the+age+of+a+fluid+workforce %3Cp%3EFor+many+years%2C+loyalty+in+the+business+environment+was+measured+by+tenure+or+resignations.+However%2C+this+is+the+age+of+the+fluid+workforce.+That+which+motivates+Millennials+to+stay+or+leave+a+company+is+driven+by+many+things%2C+several+which+are+largely+out+of+the+hands+of+HR+managers.+Unless+they+reframe+their+understanding+of+loyalty.%26nbsp%3B+Says+Yatish+Parshotam%2C+Chief+People+Officer%2C+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+baby+boomer+generation+tended+to+stay+in+one+job+for+their+entire+working+career.+My+dad+is+a+great+example+of+this+having+been+a+shipping+manager+for+a+company+for+25+years.+His+previous+job+was+for+15+years.+In+neither+job%2C+did+he+receive+fancy+perks+or+bonuses%2C+there+were+no+%26lsquo%3Bpause%26rsquo%3B+areas+or+coffee+machines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+fast+forward+to+the+Millennials+workforce+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+seeing+a+dramatic+shift+in+the+mind-sets+of+our+employees.+The+pace+of+employee+needs+and+demands+in+the+workplace+has+changed.+Along+with+their+expectations+of+management.+For+some+while%2C+the+phrase+%26lsquo%3Bpeople+leave+their+managers+not+the+company%26rsquo%3B+may+have+been+true%2C+but+it+does+not+sufficiently+address+the+reason+for+leaving.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+a+recent+industry+surveys%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+29%25+of+millennials+are+engaged+at+work%2C+16%25+are+actively+disengaged%2C+55%25+are+not+engaged+%28gallup%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+21%25+of+millennials+say+they%26%2339%3Bve+changed+jobs+within+the+past+year%2C+more+than+3x%26nbsp%3Bthe+number+of+non-millennials+%28gallup%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+44%25%26nbsp%3Bof+Millennials+say%2C+if+given+the+choice%2C+they+expect+to+leave+their+current+employers+in+the+next+two+years+%28deloitte%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+companies+today+have+adopted+new+policies+and+practices+to+provide+an+environment+that+supports+and+encourages+Millennials.+There+are+great+work+opportunities%2C+succession+planning%2C+well-defined+growth+paths%2C+autonomy%2C+health+programmes%2C+training+and+mentorship.+But+employees+still+leave.+Why%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDoes+this+mean+that+employees+today+are+not+loyal+or%2C+should+we+be+redefining+our+definition+of+loyalty%3F+Our+reality+is+that+we+live+in+an+age+of+a+Fluid+workforce+so+can+loyalty+still+exist+and+if+so%2C+what+drives+loyalty+in+this+environment%3F+In+my+opinion%2C+employee+engagement+is+one+of+the+key+factors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+people+leave+because+there+is+a+deeper+cultural+misalignment+with+the+company.+Companies+need+to+recognize+that+loyalty+is+a+two-way+street.+That+means+not+only+providing+employees+with+growth+and+development+opportunities+but+also+taking+the+time+to+engage+with+them+personally+and+understand+their+aspirations.+This+is+most+authentic+when+the+support+offered+is+entirely+selfless.+Sometimes%2C+that+means+encouraging+people+to+follow+their+passions+even+if+that+means+they+move+out+of+your+organization.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+people+will+leave.+That+is+the+nature+of+today%26rsquo%3Bs+fluid+workforce.+However%2C+loyalty+is+something+that+begins+within+the+organisation%2C+but+it+could+reach+far+beyond+the+four+walls+of+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+people+leave+our+company%2C+they+do+so+for+many+reasons%2C+some+of+which+are+personal+and%2C+which+no+counter-offer+can+address.+But+if+that+person+knew+there+was+an+authentic%2C+selfless+interest+in+their+personal+development+and+growth%2C+then+they+will+remain+loyal+to+your+company+beyond+their+duration+with+you.+Because+employees+who+move+on%2C+do+so+with+the+value+you%26rsquo%3Bve+contributed+to+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+past+three+years%2C+Entelect+have+participated+in+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey.+This+past+year%2C+our+results+reflected+some+of+this+thinking%2C+specifically+around+building+loyalty+with+employees+in+a+way+that+reaches+beyond+the+four+walls+of+this+business%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+93%25+of+respondents+felt+that+in+the+last+year+they%26rsquo%3Bd+had+the+opportunity+to+grow+and+learn%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+of+employees+believed+that+this+company+cares+about+developing+people+for+long-term+careers%2C+not+just+the+current+job%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+95%25+said+they+could+identify+with+the+values+of+the+organization%2C+and%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+said+there+is+a+feeling+of+trust+throughout+the+organisation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+real+terms%2C+practices+that+achieve+results+like+these+means+your+employees+will+likely+continue+to+be+your+brand+ambassador+beyond+their+time+with+you.+And+that+they+will+do+so+out+of+a+genuine+appreciation+for+the+value+you+have+contributed+to+their+growth.+They+may+wish+to+return+to+your+company%2C+provide+high+quality+referrals+or%2C+you+may+find+that+strategic+business+partnerships+emerge+that+could+have+far+reaching+benefits+for+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+my+role%2C+working+for+a+software+engineering+company%2C+my+greatest+excitement+comes+from+not+only+helping+people+grow+in+their+roles+but+as+people+in+their+personal+lives+as+well.+When+they+move+on%2C+their+relationship+with+our+organization+remains+strong+because+of+the+value+we+have+contributed+to+them+professionally%2C+and+personally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+must+demonstrate+loyalty+to+their+employees+by+treating+and+investing+in+them+as+though+they+will+be+with+you+forever.+You+will+never+be+able+to+control+the+market%3B+competitor+hiring+strategies%2C+economic+downturns%2C+or+consumer+trends.+But+if+you+focus+on+the+individuals%2C+your+company+will+be+far+stronger.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEngage+with+your+employees+on+a+personal+level+and+selflessly+put+their+growth+first.+This+is+where+loyalty+starts.+But+there+is+no+reason+loyalty+should+end+here.+Employees+valued+in+this+way+will+remain+loyal+to+your+organization+for+a+very+long+time+and+the+relationship+could+grow+into+something+more+than+either+of+you+expected.%3C%2Fp%3E
Yatish+Parshotam+%28Entelect%2C+Chief+People+Officer%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+In+today%27s+work+environment%2C+the+concept+of+loyalty+is+changing.+So+how+should+we+redefine+our+concept+of+loyalty+and+what+are+the+benefits+of+this+thinking%3F

The+importance+of+socialization+at+work %3Cp%3EWhat+is+the+purpose+of+socialization%3F+For+many+years%2C+socialization+in+the+workplace+was+a+way+to+help+employees+%26lsquo%3Blet+their+hair+down%26rsquo%3B+after+a+long+week.+Friday+night+bar+or+braai+was+a+way+to+give+back+to+employees.+But+company+culture+is+going+through+a+transition.+Employees+now+expect+more+connectedness+with+their+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+Professor+Matthew+Lieberman%2C+human+interaction+is+a+basic+human+need%2C+which+he+equates+to+our+need+for+food+and+shelter.+%26ldquo%3BBeing+socially+connected+is+our+brains+lifelong+passion%26rdquo%3B+says+Prof+Lieberman.+As+such%2C+socialization+has+several+purposes+and+outcomes+which+should+not+be+dismissed+when+we+shift+into+a+business+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+simple+truth+is+that+fostering+friendships+at+work+helps+employee+engagement.+It+creates+a+positive+environment+where+employees+feel+connected+and+can+develop+a+sense+of+purpose+with+their+peers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+socialization+takes+place+within+obvious+groups+such+as+project+teams.+But+it+should+also+be+encouraged+across+traditional+business+boundaries+to+help+stimulate+a+sense+of+connectedness+with+the+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBoundaries+can+be+created+around+teams%2C+hierarchical+groups%2C+personal+interest+groups+or+career+goals.+Sometimes+they+are+obvious%2C+sometimes+far+less+apparent.+But+socialization+is+something+that+can+traverse+any+boundary%3B+a+junior+to+a+senior+on+another+team%2C+two+people+striving+for+promotions+in+different+sectors%2C+or+weekend+interests.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+developing+communities+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+easy.+It+requires+a+company+to+provide+platforms+and+environments+that+support+and+promote+relationship+building.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+Friday+night+bar%2C+although+those+kind+of+events+does+serve+a+purpose.+The+initiatives+must+be+part+of+a+bigger+strategic%2C+thought-through%2C+program+to+promote+relationship+building+across+various+%26lsquo%3Bboundaries%26rsquo%3B.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+should+be+the+true+intent+of+Socialization%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+true+intent+of+socialization+is+two-fold%3B+to+create+camaraderie+which+serves+to+drive+accountability+and+delivery+in+the+work+place%2C+but+also+employee+engagement+which+leads+to+job+satisfaction+and+a+sense+of+personal+fulfillment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+these+goals+can+fall+apart+if+the+company+in+question+does+not+appreciate+that+relationships+are+not+merely+a+means+to+an+end%2C+but+an+end+in+itself%3B+one+that+must+be+authentic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECamaraderie+is+a+key+feature+of+a+successful+team+because+it+creates+a+sense+of+mutual+accountability+and+responsibility.+Employees+who+have+a+sense+of+accountability%2C+responsibility%2C+and+self-fulfillment+are+more+likely+to+stay+engaged+in+the+workplace.+Hence+it+can+logically+be+considered+to+have+a+positive+effect+on+retention%2C+as+these+features+relate+to+personal+development.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+should+your+company+do+to+promote+community+and+socialization%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+knowing+it%2C+socialization+starts+on+your+first+day%3B+introductions%2C+onboarding.+Already+there+is+a+connection+made+in+those+first+few+hours+and+days+as+people+get+to+know+each+other.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+there+are+the+connections+made+as+people+join+project+teams+and+begin+to+integrate+themselves+into+roles+and+take+on+responsibilities.+However%2C+very+often%2C+this+is+where+socialization+begins+to+fade.+The+pressures+of+the+project+deadlines+mean+that+work+becomes+the+focus+and+socialization+quickly+moves+to+second+place.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+should+realize+that+socialization+is+an+ongoing+practice+that+never+ends.+Once+you%26rsquo%3Bve+settled+into+your+team%2C+there+are+opportunities+to+socialize+with+new+employees%2C+or+form+a+relationship+with+your+client%2C+which+leads+to+more+opportunities+to+socialize+and+engage+with+clients+from+different+departments.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+after+work+drinks+can+be+a+great+social+tool+in+its+simplest+form%2C+relationship+building+at+work+serves+the+greater+purpose+of+providing+personal+and+professional+support.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+must+spend+considerable+thinking+time+dedicated+to+establishing+various+and+multiple+social+opportunities.+In+some+instances%2C+this+may+feature+as+part+of+an+appraisal+or+a+less+formal+growth+objective%2C+where+the+employee+makes+a+considerable+effort+to+attend+the+social+activities+or+even+manage+arrange+the+social+activities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENon-traditional+examples+of+socialization+initiatives+include+community+events+such+as+User+Groups+and+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+DevDay.+Social+investment+initiatives%2C+such+as+the+Entelect+Foundation%2C+or+sports+events+are+more+typical+activities+that+companies+such+as+Entelect+use+to+help+break+down+traditional+boundaries+in+the+work+place+and+encourage+their+staff+to+create+relationships+across+teams%2C+projects+or+hierarchies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect+the+Social+Clubs+are+run+by+employees%2C+where+they+have+full+ownership+and+autonomy+of+their+clubs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETake+the+mountain+climbing+club+for+example.+They+meet+once+a+month+whereby+the+venue+will+either+be+indoor+or+outdoor+and+the+tools+required+for+climbing+are+sponsored+by+Entelect.+A+typical+day+would+include+10-20+people+including+the+spouse+or+plus+1.+Then+you+have+a+good+3-4+hours+of+community+building%2C+cross-team+teamwork+and+support+for+their+fellow+climbers.+The+day+after+the+event%2C+pictures+are+shared+on+the+internal+social+platform+and+plenty+of+jokes+and+chatter+around+the+day+and+events+as+they+transpired.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESocialization+however%2C+is+also+very+personal.+Some+people+prefer+to+socialize+in+large+groups+where+there+is+lots+of+energy+such+as+the+climbing+club.+Whereas+other+people+prefer+to+socialize+in+small+groups+or+one-on-one.+Companies+need+to+find+ways+to+support+and+facilitate+these+different+connecting+styles%2C+otherwise+company+culture+will+become+exclusive+rather+than+inclusive%2C+which+is+ultimately+the+goal.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+good+example+of+a+way+to+engage+with+people+who+prefer+smaller+groups+is+to+invite+a+fellow+employee+from+a+different+team+on+a+coffee+run.+Or+to+join+the+Chess+Club+at+Entelect%2C+where+they+meet+bi-monthly.+These+interactions+present+less+social+pressure+and+can+often+result+in+making+a+stronger+connection+as+it%26rsquo%3Bs+one-on-one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+the+importance+of+socialization%2C+many+companies+should+make+sure+that+it+is+a+key+part+of+their+culture.+Whenever+someone+asks+me%2C+why+do+I+drive+the+social+culture+in+a+company+as+much+as+much+as+I+do%2C+my+response+always+comes+down+to+the+following%3B+One-third+or+more+of+your+day+are+spent+at+the+office.+You+can+just+as+well+build+relationships+and+community%2C+as+it+is+so+much+more+fulfilling+in+your+working+environment+when+you+collaborate+and+feel+that+you+belong.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmployees+expectation+of+companies+is+most+certainly+shifting%2C+and+companies+need+to+view+an+employees+desire+to+belong+as+positive.+While+this+places+a+few+extra+demands+on+a+company+to+ensure+they+are+providing+relationship+development+opportunities+for+every+type+of+personality%2C+they+must+remember+that+creating+camaraderie+in+the+workplace+and+improving+employee+engagement+will+lead+to+job+satisfaction+and+a+sense+of+personal+fulfillment+for+everyone+in+the+workplace.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Team+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Socialization+in+the+workplace+can+help+to+create+camaraderie%2C+break+down+hierarchical+boundaries+and+foster+friendships+that+help+drive+employee+engagement.+How+should+companies+help+promote+socialization+in+the+workplace%2C+and+where+should+it+begin+and+end%3F
    
["Teams and culture"]

Why+you+should+be+uncomfortable+as+a+manager %3Cp%3EI+built+an+oscilloscope+the+other+day.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+sure+what+I%26rsquo%3Bm+going+to+do+with+it+but+the+point+is+that+I+built+it+and%2C+in+doing+so%2C+I+learnt+a+few+things%2C+including+how+to+present+information+meaningfully+on+a+small+device%2C+which+is+becoming+more+relevant+in+the+field+of+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+a+few+hours%2C+I+was+out+of+my+comfort+zone+but+I+was+learning%2C+researching+and+understanding+new+concepts.+The+fact+that+I+had+an+oscilloscope+to+show+for+it+was+a+bonus+but+what+really+mattered+was+the+journey+of+creating+something%2C+of+problem-solving%2C+and+that+incomparable+sense+of+achievement+when+it+was+finally+finished.+Even+if+it+was+3am+and+I+knew+the+kids+would+be+looking+for+breakfast+in+a+few+hours.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+process+of+learning+and+creating+got+me+thinking+about+leadership+in+the+fast-moving+technology+space.+In+the+new+age%2C+our+comfort+zone+is+the+danger+zone%2C+and+if+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+occasionally+step+out+of+the+boundaries+of+what+we+know%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+impossible+to+stay+relevant+and+to+keep+our+finger+on+the+pulse+of+this+dynamic+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGet+comfortable+with+being+uncomfortable%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToo+often%2C+managers+get+bogged+down+by+administrative+tasks%2C+performance+reviews+and+growing+the+business.+While+this+is+important+because+it+keeps+our+heads+above+the+trees%2C+we+also+risk+losing+touch+with+the+industry+because+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+see+the+wood+for+those+trees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELearning+is+one+of+the+driving+cultural+principles+at+Entelect.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+increase+our+value+to+our+peers%2C+colleagues+and+clients.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+find+new+and+novel+approaches+to+problems+and+services.+But+most+importantly%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+stay+relevant+in+our+field.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELearning+forces+you+to+think+outside+of+the+boundaries+of+what+you+deal+with+on+a+daily+basis%2C+exposing+you+to+new+technologies+and+industries%2C+and+giving+you+an+opportunity+to+apply+your+knowledge+and+systems+to+other+problems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EColour+outside+the+lines%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EManagers+often+reach+a+level+where+engagement+with+junior+staff%2C+potential+and+existing+clients%2C+and+the+industry+as+a+whole+is+not+possible+because+their+focus+is+on+business+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+what+if+I+told+you+that+the+business+development+we+strive+for+is+just+on+the+outside+of+our+comfort+zone%3F+It%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+ground%2C+among+the+coders+who+are+deploying+systems+and+meeting+deadlines%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+on+social+media%2C+connecting+with+people+who+share+your+passion+for+home+automation+and+can+help+you+figure+out+why+your+swimming+pool+light+won%26rsquo%3Bt+turn+off+automatically.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+in+the+audience+at+a+Bitcoin+conference%2C+even+though+you+work+for+an+environmental+NGO.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+spending+time+on+site%2C+managers+not+only+get+a+chance+to+see+what+coders+are+working+on+and+to+get+a+better+appreciation+of+the+challenges+they+face%2C+but+they+also+have+an+opportunity+to+connect%2C+to+share+ideas+and+knowledge%2C+and+to+identify+opportunities+to+do+things+differently+or+to+elevate+a+task+to+become+a+standard.+By+pulling+ideas+from+the+learner%2C+the+hobbyist+and+the+person+in+the+delivery+stream%2C+managers+will+instinctively+know+how+and+where+to+grow+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+new+comfort+zone+for+managers+is+not+behind+a+desk%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+ground%2C+fetching+coffee+and+pizza+while+the+team+works+towards+deadlines.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+among+the+coders+and+tinkerers+at+user+groups+and+dev+days.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+attending+industry+conferences+on+topics+we+know+little+about.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+engaging+on+social+media%2C+forming+relationships+with+like-minded+people+and+building+trust.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+changes+rapidly.+Getting+comfortable+with+the+way+things+are+and+by+only+operating+within+the+boundaries+of+our+business+is+dangerous+territory+and+puts+us+on+a+fast-track+to+irrelevancy.+But+by+engaging%2C+learning%2C+sharing%2C+having+an+opinion+and+finding+a+creative+outlet%2C+we+earn+the+trust+and+respect+of+our+colleagues+and+clients%2C+and+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+substitute+for+that+in+the+professional+services+industry.+You+might+end+up+with+a+pile+of+useless+oscilloscopes%2C+but+I+promise+the+journey+of+getting+there+will+be+worth+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow%2C+excuse+me+while+I+figure+out+how+to+automate+my+swimming+pool+light+before+the+kids+wake+up+for+breakfast.%3C%2Fp%3E
Mark+Beets+%28Entelect+General+Manager%2C+Business+Development%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Leadership+in+this+fast-moving+technology+space+requires+us+to+occasionally+step+out+of+our+comfort+zone+to+stay+relevant+and+keep+our+finger+on+the+pulse+of+this+dynamic+industry.

How+software+communities+can+create+jobs+and+stimulate+the+economy %3Cp%3EThe+South+African+economy+is+at+a+tipping+point.+Slow+economic+growth+and+the+recent+downgrading+of+the+sovereign+rating+has+dire+consequences+for+job+creation+and+business+growth.+In+times+like+these%2C+businesses+start+looking+at+where+they+can+cut+costs+and+jobs+are+usually+the+first+on+the+chopping+block.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+the+software+industry+is+well-positioned+to+buck+this+trend%2C+to+create+jobs+through+learning+opportunities+and+to+spearhead+innovation+that+can+help+businesses+cut+costs+and+improve+efficiencies+in+other+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+has+become+a+massive+focus+in+recent+years.+Spend+in+the+e-business+sector+continues+to+rise%2C+with+BMI+TechKnowledge+putting+spend+on+IT+services+at+R63+billion+in+2016%2C+up+from+R56.9+billion+in+2015.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EReasons+for+this+shift+include+increased+access+to+the+internet%3B+the+Internet+of+Things+changing+how+people+are+interacting+with+business%3B+access+to+data%3B+and+the+ability+to+analyse+and+respond+to+data+intelligence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+WEF%2C+South+Africa+is+classified+as+an+efficiency+economy%3B+however%2C+the+growth+of+industries+in+the+knowledge+economy+keeps+South+Africa+competing+with+top-performing+international+markets+such+as+Australia%2C+Europe+and+the+US.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDemand+vs+supply%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+unemployment+in+South+Africa+is+at+one+of+the+worst+levels+ever+recorded.+Youth+unemployment+is+particularly+drastic+and+worsening.+According+to+Stats+SA%2C+30.1%25+of+youth+aged+15+to+24+are+not+in+employment%2C+education+or+training%2C+which+is+a+percentage+point+increase+on+the+previous+year.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+desperately+needs+job+opportunities+for+young+and+recently+matriculated+students+so+that+they+can+enter+the+job+market+and+stimulate+our+economy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+job+creation+requires+two+things.+Firstly%2C+jobs%2C+but+secondly%2C+the+technical+skills+to+meet+functional+job+requirements.+Without+both%2C+job+creation+remains+a+theoretical+discussion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+software+industry+to+be+properly+supported%2C+we+need+the+required+skills+in+the+market.+The+South+African+economy+will+benefit+the+most+if+the+required+work+is+completed+locally+without+the+need+to+outsource+these+skills+from+international+markets.+Ideally%2C+the+resulting+skills+should+come+from+a+well-balanced+diversification+that+is+representative+of+our+country%26rsquo%3Bs+demographics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+just+not+there+yet.+According+to+a+recent+Career+Junction+report%2C+demand+does+not+meet+supply.+That+is+to+say%2C+more+than+30%25+of+jobs+in+demand+come+from+the+IT+sector+but+less+than+7%25+of+job+placements+have+fed+the+IT+sector%2C+indicating+that+job+growth+in+the+tech+sector+is+misaligned+to+the+skills+and+talent+coming+through+the+education+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+there+are+some+excellent+graduates+coming+through+the+South+African+varsity+system%2C+there+is+a+vast+amount+of+untapped+talent+that+does+not+reside+in+the+formal+education+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+on+the+periphery+of+the+software+talent+pool+may+be+there+for+several+reasons%3A+their+parents+do+not+understand+the+industry+well+enough+to+be+able+to+recommend+it+as+a+career+choice+for+their+children%3B+disadvantaged+youths+may+not+have+access+to+computers+to+kindle+that+desire%3B+or+it+may+also+be+that+girls+are+simply+not+encouraged+to+enter+a+male-dominated+field.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+power+of+communities%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInformal+knowledge+environments+such+as+tech+and+software+communities+can+help+bridge+this+gap.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunities+serve+a+multitude+of+purposes%3A+they+provide+events+where+like-minded+people+can+come+together+and+mentor+one+another%3B+they+provide+a+platform+to+explore+new+ideas+and+troubleshoot+problems%2C+thereby+increasing+learning+experiences+and+knowledge+bases.+But+further+to+this%2C+they+serve+as+a+forum+for+thought-leadership+that+can+help+improve+the+technology+capabilities+and+development+of+cutting-edge+solutions%2C+thus+keeping+the+South+African+software+industry+on+par+with+its+international+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+software+development+industry+is+continuously+breaking+down+boundaries+and+paving+the+way+in+innovation.+Entrepreneurs+and+innovators+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+wait+for+government+policy%3B+individuals+can+push+ahead+and+define+their+own+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+within+the+context+of+large+corporates%2C+students+with+degrees+in+applied+maths+no+longer+go+straight+into+a+modelling+role.+They+can+consider+statistical+market+analysis%2C+data+analysis+and+data+science%2C+to+name+a+few.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+we+consider+this+in+the+African+context%2C+there+are+countless+opportunities%2C+given+that+the+continent+is+so+diverse+and+that+there+are+endless+opportunities+in+social+entrepreneurship%2C+medical+healthcare%2C+logistics%2C+retail+and+banking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERegardless+of+your+formal+training+or+your+working+environment%2C+as+a+developer%2C+one+thing+remains+true%3A+the+software+engineering+industry+is+evolving+at+a+pace+not+seen+in+many+other+industries.+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+greatest+challenge+will+be+to+meet+those+opportunities+with+the+skills+and+talent+necessary+to+deliver+on+those+jobs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+this+pace+of+innovation+to+be+sustained%2C+industry+thought+leaders+and+influencers+need+to+help+guide+young%2C+talented+individuals+via+mentorship+and+learning+opportunities+to+help+them+compete+effectively+in+the+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+putting+more+emphasis+and+support+behind+communities%2C+we+can+not+only+bring+these+mentors+and+mentees+together%2C+but+help+inform+parents+about+software+engineering+as+a+career+prospect%2C+give+girls+the+confidence+they+need%2C+and+provide+a+forum+where+eager+youngsters+can+access+devices+to+start+developing+and+feel+pride+at+what+they+have+created.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+makes+good+business+sense+to+leverage+the+power+of+communities+to+help+bridge+the+gap+in+formal+training+and+get+youngsters+into+jobs+to+stimulate+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+economy.%3C%2Fp%3E

Transitioning+from+a+technical+to+a+management+role %3Cp%3EFor+many+software+engineers%2C+there+comes+a+time+when+they+must+decide+whether+to+remain+technical+or+pursue+a+role+that+primarily+requires+managing+others.+%26nbsp%3BThey+are+no+longer+solely+responsible+for+their+own+contributions%2C+but+also+that+of+others+and+the+team+as+a+whole.%26nbsp%3B+The+transition+to+%26%2339%3Bmanager+of+others%26%2339%3B+must+certainly+be+one+of+the+more+stressful+milestones+in+one%26rsquo%3Bs+career+-+a%26nbsp%3Bhypothesis+partly+supported+by+the+numerous+articles+online+on+this+topic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+very+little+is+said+from+the+perspective+of+those+responsible+for+promoting+an+individual+into+a+leadership+role.%26nbsp%3B+What+are+some+of+the+common+challenges+and+fears+facing+new+managers%2C+and+what+can+leaders+of+leaders+do+to+support+them+during+the+transition%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAreas+of+discomfort+for+new+managers%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+%26mdash%3B+especially+the+high+achievers%2C+those+most+likely+to+be+promoted+into+a+leadership+role+%26mdash%3B+are+natural+%26lsquo%3Byes%26rsquo%3B+people%2C+willing+to+take+on+a+new+challenge+without+always+knowing+what%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+other+side+of+the+door.%26nbsp%3B+There+is+plenty+to+debate+about+whether+moving+into+a+management+position+is+indeed+a+step-up+on+the+career+ladder%2C+but+let%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+it%26rsquo%3Bs+happening%2C+and+for+the+right+reasons.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EInfluence+over+control%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+notable+adjustment+is+shifting+from+a+position+of+control+to+a+position+of+influence.%26nbsp%3B+As+a+%26lsquo%3Bdoer%26rsquo%3B+of+the+work%2C+you+are+in+direct+control+of+what+you%26rsquo%3Bre+building.%26nbsp%3B+Your+responsibilities+are+task+oriented%2C+hands-on%2C+and+your+actions+have+an+immediate+and+tangible+effect+on+your+output.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+a+manager+of+others%2C+your+job+is+to+influence.%26nbsp%3B+Leadership+style+plays+a+large+part+in+your+effectiveness+as+a+manager%2C+and+often+requires+the+new+manager+to+cede+a+significant+level+of+control+of+how+the+job+gets+done.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELosing+technical+skills%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESpending+more+time+managing+delivery+and+team+members+naturally+takes+away+time+from+being+able+to+practice+the+technical+skills+that+have+been+part+of+your+technical+career+until+now.%26nbsp%3B+This+is+a+real+fear+many+new+managers+face+%26mdash%3B+their+livelihood+has+been+anchored+on+these+technical+skills+for+most%2C+if+not+all%2C+of+their+career+up+until+this+point.+Addressing+this+fear+is+important+to+avoid+regret+later+down+the+line.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHolding+others+to+account%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiving+constructive+feedback+to+others%2C+both+positive+and+negative%2C+is+something+that+many+new+managers+can+find+extremely+uncomfortable.+It+takes+part+skill+and+part+courage+and+includes+holding+others+to+account+for+not+meeting+expectations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPriorities%2C+time+management+and+context+switching%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnical+individuals+will+naturally+gravitate+towards+technical+tasks+since+this+is+where+they+feel+most+comfortable.+They+have+a+high+level+of+confidence+that+they+will+succeed%2C+and+believe+that+technical+tasks+is+where+their+time+is+best+spent.+Plus%2C+there+is+a+common+misconception+that+time+not+spent+designing+a+solution+or+writing+code+is+time+wasted.+However%2C+this+also+happens+to+require+larger+chunks+of+focus+time%2C+which+is+a+luxury+that+managers+don%26rsquo%3Bt+always+have.+So%2C+the+ability+to+prioritize+what%26rsquo%3Bs+important+and+context+switch+appropriately+in+the+new+role+is+a+common+challenge+faced+by+most+new+managers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDealing+with+imprecise+elements%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+are+used+to+binary+outcomes%3A+it+either+works+or+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+and+the+timeframes+for+feedback+on+these+outcomes+in+the+software+world+are+fairly+instant.%26nbsp%3B+As+a+manager%2C+the+focus+shifts+from+binary+outcomes+to+one+of+motivating+others%2C+building+relationships%2C+making+decisions+with+limited+information+and+planning+more+than+one+or+two+sprints+ahead.+%26nbsp%3BNew+managers+from+a+technical+background+often+struggle+to+adjust+to+making+long-view+decisions%2C+especially+with+imperfect+information.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESupporting+the+transition+to+management%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+assume+an+individual+who+excelled+in+a+technical+role+will+naturally+perform+at+a+similar+level+in+a+leadership+role%2C+especially+if+they+are+career+driven%2C+enthusiastic%2C+and+eager+to+take+on+new+challenges.%26nbsp%3B+Ideally+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been+operating+with+some+or+all+of+these+responsibilities+before+taking+full+accountability%2C+but+this+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+practical+given+the+current+demand+for+both+technical+and+leadership+skills+in+the+software+development+world.%26nbsp%3B+What+can+we+do+as+leaders+of+leaders+to+better+support+them+in+their+new+role%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFirst+be+a+mentor%2C+then+a+boss%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+come+from+a+learning+process+of+reading+books%2C+doing+online+courses%2C+experimenting+with+code+and+tools+and+on+the+job+experiences.%26nbsp%3B+A+large+part+of+their+growth+comes+from+interacting+with+other+team+members+discussing+technical+designs+and+the+merits+of+one+approach+over+another.%26nbsp%3B+The+soft+skills+required+for+a+leadership+role+cannot+easily+be+digested+through+the+same+learning+approach.%26nbsp%3B+Providing+a+hands-on%2C+mentorship+role+during+the+early+stages+can+help+guide+in+ways+that+cannot+be+found+in+a+text+book%2C+or+through+formal+job+descriptions+and+performance+appraisals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESet+proper+boundaries%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENew+managers+often+struggle+with+knowing+what+decisions+they+can+and+cannot+make.%26nbsp%3B+Make+the+boundaries+of+the+role+explicit+and+give+permission+to+make+mistakes.+%26nbsp%3BEncourage+them+to+continue+developing+their+technical+skills+through+various+means%2C+but+be+clear+that+a+key+focus+of+the+role+is+growing+and+developing+others.%26nbsp%3B+Talk+through+the+challenges+of+time+management+and+get+them+to+commit+an+appropriate+amount+of+time+in+the+right+areas%2C+especially+those+outside+their+comfort+zone.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETeach+them+how+to+give+effective+feedback%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJust+as+you+expect+a+new+manager+to+hold+others+to+account%2C+do+the+same+for+them+%26mdash%3B+lead+by+example+and+show+first-hand+how+to+give+effective+feedback+to+team+members.%26nbsp%3B+Spend+time+in+feedback+sessions%2C+preparing+discussion+points+and+suitable+techniques+for+dealing+with+potentially+difficult+discussions%2C+and+doing+retrospectives+on+how+various+scenarios+could+have+been+tackled+differently.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELet+go%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+promoting+someone+in+an+area+you%26rsquo%3Bve+directly+been+responsible+for+in+the+past%2C+give+them+the+space+to+find+their+own+leadership+style.%26nbsp%3B+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+micro-manage.%26nbsp%3B+In+the+same+way+you%26rsquo%3Bre+guiding+them+to+trust+their+team%2C+trust+the+new+manager+to+decide+how+to+achieve+his+or+her+own+objectives.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDevelop+management+skills%2C+emphasize+leadership%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+a+broad+range+of+skills+to+master+to+become+an+effective+manager.%26nbsp%3B+The+one+area+of+development+that+will+benefit+the+new+manager+the+most+is+leadership.+%26nbsp%3BTeaching+them+how+to+influence+and+develop+others+in+a+manner+that+builds+trust+and+strong+relationships+will+go+further+than+any+other+skill.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENew+managers+can+experience+a+significant+amount+of+discomfort+and+stress+when+moving+from+a+technical+to+a+management+role%2C+which+may+not+manifest+immediately.%26nbsp%3B+If+they%26rsquo%3Bre+taking+on+this+new+role+and+staying+with+their+current+team+and+environment%2C+be+sure+to+explain+their+new+responsibilities+to+both+team+and+client.%26nbsp%3B+Having+a+suitable+strategy+in+place+to+support+an+individual+during+this+transition+can+go+a+long+way+in+helping+them+be+the+best+leader+they+can+be.%3C%2Fp%3E
Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%2C+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Moving+from+a+technical+to+a+management+role+requires+new+managers+to+step+outside+of+their+comfort+zone.+What+are+some+of+the+common+challenges+and+fears+facing+new+managers%2C+and+what+can+leaders+of+leaders+do+to+support+them+during+the+transition%3F
    
["Teams and culture"]
   Doug.jpg    
Six+leadership+activities+to+sustain+high-performance+software+teams %3Cp%3EHigh+Performing+Teams+%28HPTs%29+are+the+pinnacle+of+many+businesses+today.+This+is+especially+true+in+the+software+space%2C+where+competition+for+talent+and+skills+is+prominent.+HPTs+are+those+that+take+on+a+life+of+their+own+and+are+largely+self-sustaining+%2810+Leadership+Techniques%29.+However%2C+this+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+happen+by+accident.+Teams+can+only+be+self-sustaining+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+operating+in+an+environment+that+fosters+certain+leadership+features.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESuccessful+leaders+build+their+teams+around+one+simple+goal%3A+to+create+a+space+where+people+are+charged+with+energy%2C+can+thrive%2C+have+a+sense+of+belonging%2C+and+love+to+work+as+a+team+%28Forbes%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+software+industry%2C+the+pressure+to+deliver+flawless+software+craftsmanship+is+intense.+As+such%2C+building+HPTs+is+essential%2C+but+sustaining+those+teams+and+ensuring+job+satisfaction+and+the+promise+of+meaningful+work+is+what+can+keep+a+solid+team+together+and+delivering+consistently.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+six+activities+leaders+can+perform+to+create+these+spaces+to+help+sustain+their+HPTs%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Set+goals+for+individuals+and+the+team+as+a+whole%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+built+an+HPT%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+important+to+understand+that%2C+in+order+for+the+team+to+remain+so%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+best+to+adopt+iterative+processes+%26ndash%3B+with+each+new+project%2C+deadline+or+team+member.+Using+team+goal+frameworks+can+help+you+identify+areas+for+improvement+and%2C+ultimately%2C+lead+to+growth+and+increased+job+satisfaction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOur+team+has+had+great+success+using+good+ol%26rsquo%3B+SWOT+%28strengths%2C+weaknesses%2C+opportunities%2C+threats%29+analysis.+Conducting+individual+SWOT+analyses+and+discussing+each+team+member%26rsquo%3Bs+personal+analysis+provides+a+better+idea+of+perceptions+in+the+team+and+where+energy+should+be+focused%3A+It+can+be+informative+to+see+how+people+interpret+their+own+situations.+Using+this+in+my+own+team+has+helped+me+identify+areas+to+improve+team+dynamics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+well-known+framework+is+SMART+%28specific%2C+measurable%2C+achievable%2C+relevant%2C+timely%29+goals.+Develop+SMART+goals+collaboratively+with+your+team+to+build+inclusive+objectives.+Your+team%26%2339%3Bs+goals+need+to+be+in+the+back+of+everyone%26%2339%3Bs+mind%2C+whether+you+reiterate+your+goals+in+stand-ups%2C+display+progress+on+a+dashboard+or+communicate+them+regularly.+Keep+track+of+people%26%2339%3Bs+goals+and+SWOT+analyses+as+this+will+form+the+backbone+for+planning+their+personal+development+and+guide+performance+conversations.+At+Entelect%2C+we+have+an+internal+platform+I+use+for+capturing+conversations+like+this%2C+but+Google+Docs+or+Evernote+also+work+well.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Articulate+and+share+your+strategy%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EShare+your+strategy+with+the+team.+This+is+often+overlooked+in+favour+of+goals%2C+but+goals+are+not+strategies.+Goals+define+the+destination%3B+strategies+define+the+path+taken%2C+trade-offs+and+unique+activities+involved+in+executing+a+plan+to+reach+your+goals.+Sharing+strategy+includes+the+team+in+a+joint+vision+to+strive+towards+and+may+help+in+increasing+motivation+and+accountability+to+achieve+a+higher+goal.+Understanding+the+twists+and+turns+involved+in+following+a+strategy+also+provides+team+members+with+added+meaning+in+their+work%2C+which+in+turn+stimulates+job+satisfaction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+technical+teams+are+the+last+ones+to+hear+about+new+innovations%2C+products+or+integrations+in+their+pipeline.+If+you+want+the+choir+to+sing+on+pitch%2C+get+everyone%26%2339%3Bs+buy-in+and+follow+a+unified+strategy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+no+secret+that+leaders+can+grow+and+retain+great+people+by+helping+them+have+their+say+about+the+company+or+product%26rsquo%3Bs+long-term+vision.+Sometimes%2C+the+most+unexpected+people+have+the+most+awe-inspiring+input+to+give.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Optimise+operational+efficiency%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOperational+efficiency+is+key+to+executing+your+strategy.+But+operational+efficiencies+are+not+static+processes.+They+too+are+iterative+and+require+constant+review+and+diagnosis.+There+are+a+few+areas+where+you+can+help+to+optimise+general+operations.+Positive+changes+to+these+areas+will+help+create+a+space+where+people+can+focus+on+their+strengths+and+grow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn-boarding%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn-boarding+can+be+one+of+the+best+ways+to+create+a+good+first+impression+in+any+team+environment.+In+an+HPT%2C+the+on-boarding+process+must+convert+new+team+members+into+fully+functioning+team+members+as+quickly+as+possible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+essential+activities+for+new+members+of+High+Performing+Teams+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Becoming+comfortable+working+together+and+accomplishing+tasks+with+minimal+hand-holding.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Communicating+well+in+the+team+and+utilising+their+tools+and+practices.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Picking+up+the+business+domain+relatively+quickly+and+interacting+with+key+stakeholders+with+confidence.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+using+tools+to+help+your+new+teammate+progress+through+their+on-boarding%2C+such+as+a+Trello+board+%28here%29.+My+team+and+I+introduced+an+on-boarding+process+using+Trello+at+one+of+our+big+corporate+clients+where+we+on-board+30-plus+people+throughout+the+year.+It+helped+us+keep+track+of+where+our+team+members+are+at+and+quickly+see+if+someone+needs+help.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EKnowledge+sharing%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECentralised+and+structured+knowledge+sharing+greatly+improves+productivity+and+efficiency.+In+larger+companies+and+teams%2C+you+often+find+a+lot+of+duplicated+efforts+because+of+weak+or+non-existent+knowledge-sharing+facilities+or+practices.+Be+sure+to+share+standards+and+tools+used+across+the+company+and+team+to+reduce+rework+and+build+on+solid+foundations+contributed+by+others.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+used+wikis+to+great+success+to+create+ad+hoc+specification%2C+document+startup+guides+for+developers+and+business+analysts%2C+share+nifty+SQL+scripts%2C+document+go-to+guys+and+business+owners+in+our+teams+and+partners+-+pretty+much+anything+that+would+be+of+value+for+someone+else%2C+we+try+and+offload+here.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInstill+the+values+in+your+team+to+look+after+their+collective+knowledge+and+you%26rsquo%3Bll+add+to+their+sense+of+job+satisfaction+and+help+sustain+the+level+of+quality+delivery+and+pace+that+an+HPT+is+renowned+for.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunication%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProvide+high-bandwidth%2C+low-latency+communication+tools.+High-bandwidth+communication+channels+allow+a+great+amount+of+information+to+be+transferred+between+parties+but+often+have+long+delays+associated+with+it.+Email+is+a+prime+example+of+this.+Low-latency+communication+channels+allow+for+quick+turnaround+times.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHelp+your+team+to+find+a+balance+and+the+tools+to+improve+the+quality+of+communication.+Recently%2C+our+team+had+the+opportunity+to+work+closely+with+teams+on+different+continents+and+in+different+timezones.+With+this+new+challenge%2C+we+had+to+re-evaluate+our+communication+tools+to+promote+shorter+feedback+loops+and+provide+an+adequate+level+of+detail.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProcess+and+red+tape%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERigid+and+formal+rules+can+kill+a+team%26rsquo%3Bs+productivity.+Eliminate+processes+that+diminish+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+autonomy+and+authority.+This+definitely+speaks+to+the+agilist+in+that+you+need+to+value+people+over+process.+Put+principles+in+place+that+allow+people+to+adapt+quickly+and+deliver+quality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Empower+people+to+make+decisions%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+business+leaders+overestimate+their+abilities+to+build+teams+and+make+decisions+for+them.+If+you+fail+to+realise+that+you+should+not+be+the+centre+of+all+decision+making%2C+you+will+never+be+able+to+retain+HPTs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreate+an+environment+for+growth+and+empowerment.+Empowerment+means+giving+people+the+means+and+mandate+to+make+more+decisions+that+influence+their+work+on+a+daily+basis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELeaders+often+mistake+their+roles+as+being+the+ones+who+direct+the+daily+operations+and+tasks+that+get+dished+out+to+team+members.+But+true+leaders+create+an+environment+where+other+forms+of+leadership+can+emerge+organically+and+flourish.+Nurture+and+encourage+leadership+of+all+kinds.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+basic+rules+for+empowering+your+team+members%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+It+should+always+be+incremental+-+Don%26%2339%3Bt+dump+someone+in+a+situation+that+could+be+overwhelming.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+There+should+be+appropriate+control+in+place+-+Facilitate+and+moderate+appropriately.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Replace+control+with+accountability+-+as+ability+increases%2C+loosen+your+control+and+hand+over+responsibility+AND+accountability.+There+is+no+responsibility+without+accountability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Apply+situational+leadership+techniques%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+wide+range+of+leadership+styles+and+almost+everyone+possesses+leadership+qualities+that+can+be+tapped+into.+One+way+to+look+at+these+leadership+styles+is+to+classify+them+according+to+their+strengths+in+the+three+components+outlined+by+Gerald+M.+Weinberg+in+%26ldquo%3BBecoming+a+technical+leader%26rdquo%3B%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMotivational+leadership+-+a+leader+who+can+motivate+a+team+due+to+his+or+her+technical+ability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisational+leadership+-+a+leader+who+can+help+create+an+environment+for+the+team+to+perform+at+a+high+level+%28think+tools%2C+processes%2C+mentorship+and+culture%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+leadership+-+a+leader+who+controls+the+flow+of+new+ideas+and+encourages+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJuggling+these+styles%2C+given+the+situation+and+individuals+at+hand%2C+can+give+your+team+the+edge+it+needs+to+outperform.+We+have+a+handful+of+extremely+talented+and+technical-minded+developers+in+our+team.+Giving+them+the+opportunity+to+lead+our+initiatives+on+a+technical+front+has+enabled+us+to+adopt+new+technologies+quickly%2C+with+the+confidence+that+our+top+guys+and+girls+have+approved+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+move.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E6.+Promote+constant+learning+and+improvement%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndividual+and+team+development+plans+can+help+you+carve+out+a+path+for+growing+your+team.+Do+you+invest+time%2C+money+and+energy+into+your+own+people%3F+Do+you+give+them+the+same+focus+and+attention+you+want+them+to+provide+your+company%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+important+thing+a+leader+can+do+for+their+team+members+is+to+facilitate+continuous+feedback.+Promoting+constant+learning+and+improvement+makes+people+more+likely+to+stay+on+board+and+engaged%3B+remaining+loyal+and+helping+your+company+on+its+journey.+The+threat+of+people+leaving+your+organisation+will+always+be+there.+However%2C+the+key+is+to+make+a+concerted+effort+to+invest+in+each+employee+and+make+them+feel+like+a+valuable%2C+indispensable+asset+%28while+they%26rsquo%3Bre+there%29.+Spend+time+with+them%2C+nurture+them%2C+and+watch+as+the+magic+happens.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+six+leadership+activities+all+include+constant+review+and+diagnosis.+Nothing+can+be+static.+An+HPT+can+only+be+sustained+if+it+is+constantly+evolving.+Fostering+the+values+outlined+here+will+not+only+build+High+Performance+Teams+but+also+increase+retention.+These+practices+may+seem+daunting+to+implement%2C+but+start+to+incorporate+them%2C+one-by-one%2C+in+your+team.+Remember%2C+small+steps+add+up+to+big+improvements+over+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPerhaps+ask+yourself%2C+what+vital+principles%2C+practices+or+values+have+your+teams+benefitted+from+most%3F%3C%2Fp%3E
