Differentiate+your+company+with+a+candidate-centric+approach+to+interviews %3Cp%3EIn+a+market+suffering+from+a+skills+shortage%2C+companies+competing+for+software+skills+need+to+think+about+how+to+separate+themselves+among+potential+candidates.+To+differentiate+your+company+amidst+a+skills+shortage%2C+start+to+treat+the+interview+as+an+opportunity+to+let+potential+candidates+experience+your+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+way+to+do+this+is+by+positioning+your+company+as+an+employer+of+choice.+Often%2C+the+difference+between+a+successful+business+and+a+very+successful+business+is+the+vision+to+treat+its+candidates+the+way+it+treats+its+employees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFeeding+frenzy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDue+to+stiff+market+competition%2C+employers+are+interviewing+at+an+incredible+rate%2C+meaning+the+company+encounters+potential+candidates+daily.+But%2C+because+the+race+is+on+to+find+the+best+skills+and+eliminate+unsuccessful+candidates%2C+companies+take+a+pragmatic+approach+to+interviews+and+fail+to+recognise+the+brand-building+opportunity+an+interview+can+provide.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+don%26rsquo%3Bt+often+think+about+an+interview+from+a+candidate%26rsquo%3Bs+perspective%3A+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+stressful+time.+Companies+usually+treat+the+interview+as+a+process.+But+despite+all+the+noise+and+rationale+around+customer-centricity%2C+few+companies+have+considered+building+an+interview+process+that+is+candidate-centric.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAfterall%2C+culture+is+not+defined+from+when+someone+joins+your+organisation%2C+but+from+when+they+first+interact+with+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+their+shoes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+candidate-centric+interview+would+mean+understanding+what+the+candidate+needs+from+the+potential+employer+to+make+them+feel+like+they+have+had+a+rounded+and+fulfilling+experience%2C+no+matter+what+the+outcome.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+while+there+are+some+basic+interview+faux+pas+that+no+one+should+rely+on%2C+such+as+smart+software+algorithms+to+narrow+down+the+top+candidates+or+the+CV+itself+%28you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+trying+to+hire+the+best+writers%29%2C+there+are+also+several+game-changers+that+could+separate+your+business+from+the+crowd%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+First+impressions+count%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+that+an+experience+of+your+culture+can+begin+at+your+office%26rsquo%3Bs+reception.+A+culture+is+not+a+list+of+values+that+hangs+on+the+wall%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+something+that+each+employee+lives+and+breathes.+Therefore%2C+the+first+interaction+a+candidate+has+with+brand+%26ndash%3B+that+is%2C+with+the+company+receptionist+%26ndash%3B+should+reflect+your+culture.+Was+she+friendly%3F+Did+she+make+the+candidate+feel+comfortable%3F+Was+she+expecting+the+candidate%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+small+engagements+can+give+an+immediate+impression+of+the+company+and+put+the+candidate+at+ease+during+what+is+often+a+nerve-wracking+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Break+with+interview+tradition%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFind+creative+ways+to+interview+people.+Often%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+only+in+relaxed+situations+that+you+can+pinpoint+a+person%26rsquo%3Bs+attitude%2C+ambitions+and+drive.+Consider+a+15-minute+Skype+conversation%2C+a+hackathon+or+a+speed-dating+session.+And+vary+the+opportunities+to+interact+with+people%3A+some+people+are+better+in+one-on-one+environments+but%2C+despite+their+quiet+dispositions%2C+can+be+little+packages+of+dynamite.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERemember+that+your+offer+might+not+be+the+only+one+a+candidate+gets.+The+interview+may+be+their+only+experience+of+your+company+and%2C+therefore%2C+could+seal+the+deal+when+they+are+considering+competing+offers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Courtesy+goes+a+long+way%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+interview+experience+should+not+be+drawn+out.+Make+decisions+quickly+but+be+considerate+and+respectful+of+your+candidate.+That+means+providing+direct%2C+constructive+and+personal+feedback.+Generic+template+rejections+are+impersonal+and+can+leave+the+candidate+feeling+anonymous+to+your+organisation%2C+even+though+they+may+have+put+their+best+foot+forward.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMapping+the+candidate+journey%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+can+companies+do+to+turn+an+interview+process+into+a+candidate-centric+brand+experience%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+tactic+that+companies+can+introduce+to+help+ensure+an+interview+experience+to+surpass+all+others%2C+is+by+outlining+a+candidate+journey+map.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+a+candidate+journey+map+considers+the+experience+of+the+interviewee+throughout+the+interview+process+and+aims+to+understand+their+feelings+at+each+stage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+includes%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+interactions+a+candidate+will+have%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+emotions+they+may+feel+during+these+phases%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+impressions+that+may+be+created%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnalysing+their+step-by-step+journey+more+closely+can+help+you+understand+the+candidate%26rsquo%3Bs+experience+of+your+company+and+culture.+After+all%2C+workplace+dynamics+are+shifting+and+culture+is+more+important+than+ever.+Great+offers+can+be+turned+down+by+great+candidates+if+their+experience+of+your+brand+is+poor.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+should+remember+that+each+interview+is+the+beginning+of+a+business+relationship.%26nbsp%3B+Even+if+the+candidate+is+unsuccessful+on+this+occasion%2C+he+or+she+might+be+a+potential+brand+ambassador.+The+future+network+advantages+can+be+extensive%2C+including+referrals+to+other+potential+candidates%2C+future+clients+or+strategic+business+introductions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+consider+the+last+candidate+who+walked+through+your+door.+Did+they+have+an+experience+that+they+will+want+to+share%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Gearing+up+for+Generation+Z %3Cp%3EIn+an+industry+where+teams+have+been+dominated+by+Millennials+for+several+years%2C+this+may+be+the+first+time+many+of+our+colleagues+have+to+deal+with+a+new+generation+in+the+workplace.+Proactive+companies+would+do+well+to+start+planning+ahead%3B+how+we+train+people%2C+grow+our+future+leaders+and+attract+and+retain+employees+will+be+shaped+by+the+demands+and+concerns+of+this+new+workforce.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPreparing+for+Generation+Z%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGen+Z+are+a+follow+on+from+Millennials+and%2C+as+such%2C+will+probably+be+similar+in+many+ways.+However%2C+Gen+Z+are+also+the+offspring+of+Gen+X%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+to+see+how+the+attitudes+of+the+parents+have+shaped+Gen+Z.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGen+Z+will+be+the+first+generation+to+never+have+known+a+world+without+smartphones+and+social+media.+Access+to+technology+will+be+taken+for+granted+by+many+people+in+this+age+group.+Platforms+such+as+Facebook+are+being+ditched+in+favour+of+Instagram+and+Snapchat+and+the+rise+of+%26ldquo%3Bfinsta%26rdquo%3B+%28fake+or+friends+only%29+and+%26ldquo%3Brinsta%26rdquo%3B+%28real%29+accounts+shows+that+users+understand+the+possible+long-term+ramifications+of+social+media.+Not+only+might+your+parents+find+out+what+you+have+been+doing+but%2C+in+years+to+come+you+might+miss+out+on+that+varsity+place+or+get+denied+your+chosen+job+based+on+posts+made+years+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+way+we+consume+information+continues+to+evolve+with+Gen+Z%3B+attention+spans+continue+to+diminish+it+seems%2C+so+information+delivery+and+interaction+with+systems+need+to+be+bite-sized%2C+quick+and+to+the+point.+Micro-apps%2C+which+offer+targeted+interaction+to+do+certain+tasks%2C+are+coming+to+the+fore+and+these+reinforce+the+bite-sized+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMoving+forwards%2C+employees+will+not+want+to+engage+with+large+enterprise+systems+through+one+app+interface+that+is+complex+to+learn.+Instead%2C+highly+focused+interaction+points+will+let+people+do+what+they+need+with+minimum+friction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEducation+and+culture+shift%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMy+opinion+is+that+this+approach+will+spill+over+into+education%2C+where+I+feel+the+value+of+traditional+three-+or+four-year+degrees+will+be+put+under+even+more+pressure+in+the+next+10+to+20+years.+In+IT+especially%2C+the+speed+of+change+means+that+developers+are+frequently+asked+to+cross-skill+into+new+areas.+Learning+is+becoming+a+career-long+reality+for+developers+and+is+something+employers+need+to+embrace+fully.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+Gen+X+parents%2C+who+have+engaged+with+their+children+in+a+mature+fashion%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bll+be+faced+with+new+colleagues+who+will+be+confident+and+independent.+Leadership+of+Gen+Z-ers+must+focus+on+collaboration+and+mutual+respect.+Hierarchy+does+not+work%3B+this+generation+firmly+believes+that+they+have+something+to+offer+and+that+even+people+with+more+experience+can+still+learn+from+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAttracting+born-frees%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGeneration+Z+accounts+for+nearly+a+third+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+population%2C+with+the+majority+of+them+living+in+underdeveloped+or+developing+countries.+From+a+South+African+perspective%2C+it+is+likely+that+our+workforce+will+ultimately+carry+a+greater+percentage+of+Gen+Z-ers+than+many+of+the+developed+Western+economies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+first+complete+generation+to+be+%26lsquo%3Bborn-free%26rsquo%3B%2C+Gen+Z+in+South+Africa+will+be+the+most+culturally+diverse+generation+we+have+seen.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+find+research+into+the+attitudes+of+black+Gen+Z+software+developers+in+South+Africa%3B+however%2C+my+feeling+is+that%2C+as+the+most+globally+connected+generation+yet+%26ndash%3B+and+with+IT+skills+in+short+supply+in+many+countries+across+the+globe+%26ndash%3B+the+possibility+is+that+the+current+%26lsquo%3Bbrain+drain%26rsquo%3B+of+software+developers+once+they+have+a+little+experience+is+likely+to+continue+into+the+next+generation+unless+things+change+radically+here+in+South+Africa.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26rsquo%3Bve+worked+for+Entelect+for+over+three+years+now+and%2C+being+at+the+top+end+of+the+age+profile%2C+I+can+see+how+Entelect+works+hard+to+support+social+initiatives%2C+provide+clear+career+paths%2C+incorporate+and+make+use+of+social+media+and+adopt+flexible+working+practices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+we+aim+to+cater+for+people+on+an+individual+basis+and+we+take+work-life+balance+very+seriously.+The+fact+that+these+efforts+are+all+squarely+aligned+with+stereotypical+Millennial+requirements+is+partly+due+to+who+we+want+to+attract+but+also+driven+by+who+we+already+are.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOur+current+approach+puts+us+in+a+good+position+to+attract+Generation+Z+workers+as+they%2C+too%2C+will+want+to+work+for+a+company+that+looks+past+simply+making+a+profit+to+working+somewhere+that+contributes+to+the+wider+society%2C+working+to+be+the+best+that+we+can+and+having+fun+while+we+do+it.%3C%2Fp%3E

Make+peer+review+a+cornerstone+of+your+SDLC %3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+well+accepted+these+days+that+the+peer+or+code+review+is+an+important+part+of+any+development+team%26rsquo%3Bs+Software+Development+Lifecycle+%28SDLC%29.+The+basic+premise+being+that+at+a+certain+stage+colleagues+in+the+team+look+over+and+review+code+being+written%2C+typically+before+it+is+released+into+a+more+formal+test+phase.+The+core+driver+behind+the+peer+review+is+the+early+detection+of+bugs%2C+with+the+theory+being+that+the+earlier+you+can+catch+an+issue%2C+the+cheaper+it+is+to+resolve+and+the+less+disruptive+it+is+to+the+timeous+delivery+of+the+feature+set.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDespite+such+a+compelling+argument+for+peer+reviews+it+is+my+experience+that+teams+still+struggle+to+implement+and+maintain+an+effective+review+process.+Reviews+are+often+deprioritised+or+rushed+when+there+is+pressure+to+deliver%2C+developers+form+review+cliques+to+review+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+code+and+reviewing+someone+else%26rsquo%3Bs+code+is+often+seen+as+not+as+important+as+delivering+your+own+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+wider+benefits+of+code+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+different+forms+that+the+review+process+can+take+and+choosing+the+correct+one+for+your+team+will+depend+on+lots+of+factors+including%3B+team+size%2C+type+of+software+being+built+and+development+methodology+being+followed.+Independent+of+the+exact+process+though+I+believe+there+are+wider+benefits%2C+not+always+acknowledged%2C+that+the+review+process+can+bring+to+a+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EEducation%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+A+peer+review+is+an+excellent+time+for+people+to+learn+from+each+other.+Seniors+in+the+team+can+use+the+forum+to+educate+colleagues+on+best+practices+and+patterns+they+would+like+to+see+adopted+and+a+peer+review+gives+juniors+a+stage+to+ask+questions%2C+learn+and+show+what+they+are+capable+of.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EImprove+team+communications%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+If+done+right+the+simple+act+of+getting+developers+together+to+discuss+the+code+they+are+writing+will+help+promote+an+environment+of+openness+and+collaboration+%26ndash%3B+key+elements+of+a+well-functioning+team.+Using+these+sessions+as+a+vehicle+for+celebrating+success+is+also+a+great+way+to+grow+a+stronger+team+dynamic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3ERaise+maturity+in+the+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+For+people+new+to+the+process+being+told+you+could%2Fshould+have+done+something+differently+is+not+easy+to+accept+at+first.+However%2C+with+some+coaching+to+highlight+the+benefits+most+people+quickly+come+onboard.+In+a+professional+environment+being+mature+enough+to+have+these+discussions+is+key.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EReduce+key+person+dependencies%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+Peer+reviews+are+a+way+of+lowering+the+key+person+dependency+on+the+code+being+written.+Spreading+the+knowledge+of+what+is+being+developed+in+the+wider+team+ensures+that+the+team+is+better+placed+to+deal+with+people+taking+unforeseen+leave.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EDrive+improvements%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+What+happens+in+the+reviews+should+feedback+into+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+push+for+continual+improvements.+Patterns+in+the+sorts+of+comments+being+made+can+drive+training+in+the+team+or+the+adoption+of+a+tool+to+run+static+code+analysis.+Looking+at+bugs+raised+later+in+the+development+lifecycle+can+also+be+used+to+update+the+review+process+to+look+out+for+certain+issues.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EPromote+team+ownership%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+Socialising+their+code+as+part+of+a+review+process+should+be+the+beginning+of+a+transition+from+code+being+solely+owned+by+the+author+to+a+point+where+the+team+feels+joint+ownership+for+that+code.+This+is+quite+subtle+and+not+something+that+is+always+discussed+in+teams+but+I+think+is+key.+The+review+should+not+be+about+poking+holes+in+another+person%26rsquo%3Bs+work%2C+rather+a+discussion+along+the+lines+of+%26ldquo%3BIs+the+team+willing+to+take+responsibility+for+this+new+code%3F%26rdquo%3B+After+all%2C+once+this+code+is+in+production+the+norm+tends+to+be+that+any+member+of+the+team+will+be+asked+to+support+it+in+future+weeks.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHealth+check+your+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+believe+there+are+warning+signs+that%2C+despite+being+a+mandatory+part+of+your+SDLC%2C+your+peer+review+process+might+not+be+adding+the+value+it+could.+Developer+apathy+towards+them+is+a+sure+sign+that+the+review+is+not+the+first-class+citizen+it+should+be.+Are+the+same+people+doing+the+reviews+all+the+time%3F+While+you+will+naturally+find+some+people+to+be+more+engaged+its+vital+that+reviews+are+done+by+everyone+in+the+team+so+you%26rsquo%3Bre+getting+the+best+possible+coverage+and+input+to+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHow+long+are+people+reviewing+for+and+how+big+are+the+commits%3F+Recently+a+colleague+of+mine+mentioned+flippantly+%26ldquo%3Bfor+a+single+line+change+you%26rsquo%3Bll+often+get+3+comments+and+then+0+comments+on+the+next+review+which+happens+to+be+2000+lines+long%26rdquo%3B.+Keeping+commit+sizes+down+is+vital.+Studies+have+shown+that+there+is+a+bell+curve+when+it+comes+to+%26lsquo%3Bvelocity+%28lines+of+code+per+hour%29+vs+time+spent%26rsquo%3B+with+reviews%5B1%5D.+If+your+colleagues+are+taking+longer+than+60+mins+for+a+review+you%26rsquo%3Bre+likely+getting+a+diminishing+return+on+that+investment.+Review+fatigue+is+a+real+thing%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWays+to+power+up+your+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAcknowledging+that+the+review+process+has+so+much+more+to+bring+to+your+team+than+simple+%26lsquo%3Bchecks+and+balances%26rsquo%3B+is+key.+Where+possible+reduce+friction+for+the+team+around+the+review+process%2C+invest+in+tooling+that+supports+reviews%2C+such+as+Atlassian%26rsquo%3Bs+BitBucket+and+consider+formalising+slots+in+people%26rsquo%3Bs+diaries+where+they+are+expected+to+be+reviewing+and+not+working+on+their+own+code.+Empower+senior+developers+in+the+team+to+leverage+reviews+as+a+way+of+educating+and+promoting+best+practice+and+ask+them+to+train+your+team+on+actually+how+to+review+effectively.+Consider+the+metrics+you+can+put+in+place+to+measure+the+effectiveness+of+the+review+process+and+share+that+information+across+the+team+so+the+process+can+evolve.+Perhaps+most+importantly+engage+in+dialog+with+your+team+to+make+sure+everyone+buys+into+and+contributes+to+the+reviews.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESources%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%5B1%5D+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Frhodecode.com%2Fblog%2F69%2Fcode-review-how-to-convince-a-skeptic%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Frhodecode.com%2Fblog%2F69%2Fcode-review-how-to-convince-a-skeptic%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E
Matthew+Longden+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Despite+the+well-known+benefits+of+peer+reviews%2C+teams+often+struggle+to+maintain+an+effective+review+process+when+under+pressure+to+deliver.+However%2C+there+are+a+number+of+wider+advantages+to+peer+reviews+that+make+them+an+essential+and+integral+part+of+your+team

Tech+entrepreneurship%3A+you+are+not+prepared %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+days%2C+new+mobile+app+ideas%2C+modern+social+tools%2C+automation%2C+digital+transformation+of+the+enterprise%2C+rapid+prototyping%2C+and+new+businesses+can+be+born+overnight+with+just+a+website.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+read+about+the+successful+ideas+all+the+time+in+the+news%2C+but+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+often+get+sight+of+the%26nbsp%3Bcomposition%26nbsp%3Bof+these+businesses.+What+below-the-surface+decision+making+went+down%3F+We+rarely+get+to+peer+behind+the+curtain+to+see+an+honest+record+of+their+journey.+From+dreaming+and+designing+to+budgeting%2C%26nbsp%3Bbuilding+and+shipping+and+the+complexities+monetising+their+technology.+Press-releases+show+the+highlights%2C+but+they+paper+over+the+cracks+and+often+obfuscate+the+real+story.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26%2339%3Bll+get+to+the+point.+Building+software-defined+technology+products+from+an+idea%2C+is+not+as+trivial+as+it+might+seem+from+the+outside.+With+adequate+planning%2C+awareness+and+caution%2C+almost+all+these+risks+can+be+mitigated+and+understood.+Without+them%2C+the+attraction+can+be+a+financially+%28and+reputationally%29+dangerous+trap.+New+technology+businesses+have+potential+for+terrifying+operational%2C+legal%2C+financial+and+skills-depth+behind+the+veil%2C+and+these+aren%26%2339%3Bt+the+kinds+of+things+you+want+to+be+learning+about+and+tackling+half-way+through+your+execution%2C+and+your+budget%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELet%26%2339%3Bs+look+at+a+widely+known+example%2C+Uber.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+groundbreaking+idea+which+is+simple+for+anybody+to+grasp.+The+premise+is+to+use+a+smartphone+application+to+call+a+taxi+to+your+location%2C+which+is+conveniently+available+from+the+on-device+GPS%2C+take+the+ride%2C+and+then+pay+electronically.+It+is+one+of+those+ideas+where+we+think+to+ourselves+%26quot%3Bwhy+hasn%26%2339%3Bt+it+been+done+before%26quot%3B.+This+is+where+it+starts.+When+something+sounds+too+good+to+be+true%2C+it+probably+is%21+Uber+lost+%241.46+billion+in+Q3+2017+alone%2C+I+wonder+how+many+know+that%3F+It%26%2339%3Bs+not+an+exception+either.+The+business+lost+more+than+a+billion+dollars+in+Q2%2C+and+%24708+million+in+the+first+quarter.+So+where+are+all+these+costs+coming+from+if+Uber+is+just+an+app%3F%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+misconception+for+some+of+the+less-technical+among+us+that+tech+products+are+a+scheme+where+the%26nbsp%3Bidea+comprises+everything.+That+the+first-to-market+wins+and+implementation+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+need+much+attention.+There+is+a+blind-spot+to+other+aspects+of+an+application%2C+website+or+technology+which%2C+while+usually+not+deliberately+ignored%2C+are+just+not+thought+of.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+reality%2C+there+is+hidden+complexity+in+building+a+product%2C+or+a+business%2C+out+of+software+beyond+both+the+idea+and+the+technical+implementation.+The+purpose+isto+share+and+explore+a+few+of+the+most+common+ones+to+invigorate+your+thought+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+complex+areas+to+tackle+when+starting+a+business.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECosts%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EThis+is+a+tricky+topic%2C+primarily+because+of+just+how+context-sensitive+%28and+ambition-sensitive%29+costs+can+be.+It+is+important+to+research+the+input%2C+time+and+technology+costs+which+might+be+applicable.+Seemingly+small+details+such+as+designs%2C+third+parties%2C+lead-times%2C+or+where+previously+unknown+components+of+a+project+%28e.g.+licensing%2C+specialised+tools+and+hosting%29+all+introduce+unplanned+capital+or+operational+budget+impact.+This+information+is+powerful+when+negotiating%2C+so+doing+the+research%2C+and+gathering+input+from+individuals+or+partners+with+experience+should+be+one+of+the+first+steps+taken.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESkills%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ETechnology+is+supple+and+subjective%2C+but+even+so%2C+not+all+implementation+teams+are+the+same.+Talented+engineers%2C+project+managers%2C+specialists+and+designers+are+very+hard+to+find%2C+this+is+evident+by+the+rampant+growth+in+demand+for+software+engineers+globally.+For+the+same+money+and+time%2C+different+teams+will+achieve%26nbsp%3Bvastly%26nbsp%3Bdifferent+results.+This+makes+it+important+to+research%2C+network+and+take+care+when+creating+your+own+internal+teams+or+outsourcing+development.+Technical+and+product+teams+need+to+be+aligned%2C+communicating+freely+with+no+loss+of+understanding%2C+and+share+a+common+sense+of+direction%2C+passion+and+urgency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOperations%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EOnce+your+app%2C+website+or+service+is+built+and+launched%2C+who+will+operate+it%3F+When+customers+have+questions%3A+who+do+they+talk+to%3F+How+do+they+contact+them%3F+How+will+you+manage+partners+and+third+parties+who+have+a+role+to+play%3F+Tech%26rsquo%3B+businesses+still+need+a+finance+team+and+operational+teams.+People+are+still+critical+in+the+healthy+functioning+of+any+technology.+Google+has+a+search+page+which+should+be+fully+automated+right%3F+Type+something+in+and+some+computers+do+the+work+and+send+back+results.+How+many+people+could+you+possibly+need%3F%26nbsp%3BGoogle+employed+more+than+70+000+staff+in+2017.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELegal+and+compliance%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ECompliance+is+messy%2C+and+made+worse+by+technologies+that+have+to+operate+across+borders+and+regulatory+or+legal+jurisdictions.+Around+the+world%2C+governments+have+different+laws+regulating+privacy%2C+security+and+data.+Seek+advice+here%2C+explore+previous+examples+and+learn+from+them.+This+one+is+often+left+until+last%2C+whether+out+of+priority+or+ignorance%2C+and+can+delay+a+launch%2C+cripple+an+idea+or+incur+costly+technology+changes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETime%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESome+things+just+take+the+fullness+of+time.+Ideas+need+to+settle%2C+systems+need+to+harden%2C+team%26%2339%3Bs+need+to+storm+and+form%2C+people+need+to+build+trust+and+feedback+follows+a+cycle.+Larger+teams+don%26%2339%3Bt+work+proportionally+faster+%28nine+women+cannot+deliver+a+baby+in+one+month%21%29.+Rushing+blinds+us%2C+and+can+cause+teams+to+make+compromises+they+didn%26%2339%3Bt+fully+understand.+By+no+means+is+%26%2339%3Blethargic%26%2339%3B+a+viable+business+strategy+but+sustainable+pacing+is.+Iterating+frequently+and+learning+from+failures+are+powerful+tools+in+a+product+development+arsenal.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPurity+of+vision%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESo+much+is+made+possible+in+a+technology-based+service+or+product%2C+because+it+is+malleable.+Product+owners+can+become+trapped+in+paralysis%2C+stuck+between+great+ideas.+Running+too+many+tasks+in+parallel+and+never+quite+reaching+a+point+of+commercial+or+practical+completion.+This+process+can+pull+projects+apart+when+even+meaningful+and+independently+brilliant+ideas+start+to+distract+attention+from+a+core+vision.+Something+Twitter+initially+managed+superbly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+are+the+real+threats%2C+but+there+are+more%3A+preparing+for+scale%2C+marketing%2C+user+experience%2C+hosting+and+infrastructure%2C+market+research%2C+technological+possibilities%2C+and+more.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterestingly%2C+and+perhaps+surprisingly%2C+managing+these+aspects+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+actually+need+to+cost+more.+So%26nbsp%3BLean+Startup%26nbsp%3Bfans+rejoice.+A+combination+of+foresight%2C+avoiding+certain+expensive+but+avoidable+emergencies%2C+and+methodical+work+typically+result+in+a+higher+quality+product.+This+means+that+in+the+end+its+not+at+all+about+making+a+larger+upfront+investment.+It+comes+down+to+moving+through+the+investment%2C+aligned+to+a+plan%2C+with+more+insight+and+confidence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+objective+here+is+not+to+scare+people+away.+Technology+is+a+magical+key+which+unlocks+ideas+and+businesses+in+remarkable+ways.+Instead%2C+the+ambition+is+to+encourage+new+product+owners%2C+entrepreneurs%2C+analysts+and+project+managers+to+go+into+these+projects+with+more+clarity%2C+a+bit+more+caution%2C+and+a+better+knowledge+of+the+journey.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+starting+a+journey+like+this+or+developing+an+idea+which+could+be+the+next+big+tech+story%2C+become+informed%2C+ask+these+questions+and+feel+confident+in+your+preparation+to+handle+operational+hurdles+and+legal+arguments.+Be+sure+you%26%2339%3Bve+got+the+right+team+and+protect+your+vision.+Explore+and+manage+your+own+expectations+for+the+journey.+Those+who+aspire+to+create+technology+products+will+be+well+served+by+mixing+this+kind+of+awareness+into+their+excitement+and+anticipation.%3C%2Fp%3E
By+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Our+lives+are+saturated+with+apps%2C+websites+and+digital+services.+With+so+much+consumer+focus+on+these+services%2C+much+of+the+entrepreneurship+focus+is+also+on+market+opportunities+created+through+technology.

%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect%2C+COO%29+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+be+upfront%2C+it+is+not+my+intention+to+bestow+sagely+wisdom+upon+aspiring+entrepreneurs+and+software+professionals%2C+rather+I+thought+this+would+be+a+fun+exploration+of+how+business-endeavors+in+the+realm+of+music+could+parallel+some+of+what+we+see+in+the+tech+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPresentation+of+credentials+forthcoming%3A%2C+in+a+former+life+I+fronted+a+rock-band+that+toured+South+Africa+for+many+years.+We+had+some+measure+of+success+with+local+fans+and+radio+but+I+can%26rsquo%3Bt+say+that+we+imprinted+ourselves+upon+the+zeitgeist.+We+put+out+a+couple+of+records%2C+worked+with+some+great+people+and+played+a+few+hundred+shows+around+the+country.+We+didn%26%2339%3Bt+have+a+tour-bus%2C+we+had+a+tour-bakkie.+But%2C+there+is+something+special+about+forming+a+band%2C+defining+a+mission+and+embarking+on+it+as+a+team+and+I+hope+you+find+some+of+these+insights+valuable+if+not+entertaining.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFundamentals+over+fashion%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGood+song+writing+is+something+that+although+on+the+surface+appears+to+have+changed+dramatically+over+the+decades%2C+when+you+listen+a+little+closer+it+is+very+much+the+same+from+the+Beatles+to+Taylor+Swift.+A+good+song+allows+you+to+ignore+all+its+imperfections+and+predictability+because+it+grabs+you+with%26nbsp%3Bresonance+-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3Ba+combination+of+three+characteristics%3A+honesty%2C+vulnerability+and+musicality.+One+of+the+reasons+that+U2+have+been+a+mainstay+for+over+40+years+is+because+of+their+commitment+to+this+principle%2C+they+still+bring+stadiums+of+people+to+tears+%28happy+tears+for+the+fans%2C+sad+tears+for+the+bono-haters%29+with+the+sounds+of+guitars%2C+drums+and+voice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+looking+for+advice+on+how+to+steer+our+products+or+businesses%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+most+certainly+be+met+with+pages+and+pages+of+neatly+bulleted+lists%2C+littered+with+tech+buzzwords+and+inspirational+tokens+like+reinvention%2C+disruption+and+innovation.+Now+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+a+bad+thing+to+say+about+innovation+in+the+tech+business%2C+however+I+do+question+why+it+is+always+so+high+on+our+priority+list+when+there+are+so+many+other+more+important+problems+we+face.+Some+things+that+just+as+important+as+innovation+are+the+fundamentals+of%26nbsp%3Bon-time%26nbsp%3Band%26nbsp%3Bquality+service+delivery%2C+practical%26nbsp%3Bproblem+solving%26nbsp%3Band+honest%2C+friendly%26nbsp%3Bcustomer+service.+My+take+on+this+one+is+become+great+at+your+core+business+before+you+try+and+change+it.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPerseverance+is+paramount%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+first+heard+Snow+Patrol%26rsquo%3Bs+%26ldquo%3BFinal+Straw%26rdquo%3B+in+my+dorm+room+in+2002%2C+and+it+was+around+2005+that+their+music+started+hitting+the+international+airwaves.+You%26rsquo%3Bll+be+surprised+to+hear+that+for+a+band+that+achieved+such+phenomenal+global+success+at+the+time%2C+they+had+been+recording+and+touring+for+12+years+already%2C+playing+mostly+in+pubs+and+university+campuses+to+a+handful+of+people.+Their+2005+release+%26ldquo%3BEyes+Open%26rdquo%3B+saw+their+situation+change+dramatically+with+support+from+a+%26lsquo%3BGrey%26rsquo%3Bs+Anatomy%26rsquo%3B+song+placement%2C+their+album+became+an+%26ldquo%3Bovernight+success%26rdquo%3B.+There+was+nothing+%26ldquo%3Bovernight%26rdquo%3B+about+their+success+though+and+their+story+is+not+unique%2C+it+is+shared+by+many+other+artists.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+heard+of+a+formula+that+makes+success+any+easier+to+achieve%2C+but+I%26nbsp%3Bdo+know+that+those+who+have+been+successful%2C+have+had+to+stick+it+out+for+a+while.+Sure%2C+there+are+elements+to+the+success+equation+that+are+not+entirely+in+our+control%2C+for+example+natural+ability+or+talent+is+more+a+product+of+nature+than+it+is+anything+else.+This+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+put+those+of+us+who+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+naturally+gifted+out+of+the+running+though%2C+it+just+means+that+we+may+have+to+work+a+little+harder+and+stay+a+little+longer+to+get+there.+True%2C+aspirational+success+is+a+rare+confluence+of+opportunity%2C+talent+and+circumstance.+The+longer+you%26rsquo%3Bre+in+the+game%2C+the+more+likely+you+are+to+experience+it.+I+see+this+with+the+exceptional+individuals+in+our+business+and+customers.+There+are+so+many+different+products%2C+companies+and+technologies+to+work+with+out+there+in+the+market+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+to+decide+which+horse+to+hitch+your+wagon+to.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+harder+to+know+when+to+leave+and+when+to+stay+with+your+company%2C+when+to+admit+failure+and+move+on+with+your+venture.+What+I+can+say+is+this%3A+make+sure+you%26rsquo%3Bre+where+you%26rsquo%3Bre+meant+to+be%2C+and+when+you+are%2C+put+your+faith+in+your+team%2C+company+or+colleagues+and+saddle+in+for+the+long+haul.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEgo+is+your+enemy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOut+of+check+egos+have+been+responsible+for+robbing+us+of+many+of+our+favourite+bands+over+the+years+%28Guns+%26lsquo%3Bn+Roses%2C+The+Police%2C+Oasis+to+name+only+a+few%29.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+understand+how+emotions+can+get+the+better+of+you+when+you%26rsquo%3Bre+being+worshiped+by+thousands+of+people+every+night%2C+and+they+all+want+a+piece+of+you.+I+remember+seeing+Oasis+live+in+2009+and+one+of+the+magnetic+aspects+of+their+performance+was+Liam%26rsquo%3Bs+obvious+disdain+for+the+audience.+He+was+the+true+embodiment+of+a+narcissistic+rock-star+and+it+was+almost+romantic.+We+wanted+that+from+him%2C+we+paid+for+it.+Liam%26rsquo%3Bs+narcissism+however+was+not+just+a+performance%2C+it+was+a+disease+which+ended+up+destroying+his+relationship+with+his+band+and+brother.+Although%2C+you+have+to+admit+that+he%26%2339%3Bs+got+a+sense+of+humour+about+it.+An+excerpt+from+the+book+of+Gallagher%3A+%26quot%3BI+suppose+I+do+get+sad%2C+but+not+for+too+long.+I+just+look+in+the+mirror+and+go%2C+%60What+a+%28expletive%29%26nbsp%3Bgood-looking%26nbsp%3B%28expletive%29%26nbsp%3Byou+are.%60+And+then+I+brighten+up.%26quot%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESelf-confidence+is+attractive%2C+and+it+builds+confidence+in+the+people+we+interact+with.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+also+healthy+for+us+to+respect+our+own+opinions+and+methods.+A+good+dose+of+it+is+absolutely+necessary+for+success+but+be+careful+not+to+drink+too+deeply.+Teams+that+exhibit+a+deeper+sense+of+respect+for+each-other%26rsquo%3Bs+contributions%2C+opinions+and+personalities+are+far+better+equipped+to+weather+the+storm+while+those+who+succumb+to+ego+and+delusion+will+dissolve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHave+fun%2C+be+interesting+and+break+some+stuff%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERock+bands+remind+us+that+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+question%2C+break+the+rules+and+let+loose+from+time+to+time.+Whether+it%26rsquo%3Bs+punk%2C+grunge%2C+metal+or+pop%2C+people+are+usually+drawn+to+it+for+similar+reasons.+We+want+to+know+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+like+on+the+other+side%2C+to+live+a+little+vicariously%2C+be+a+part+of+a+movement+and+maybe+even+be+reminded+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+in+control+of+our+own+lives.+And+the+industry+needs+examples+and+stories+of+risk-takers%2C+rule-breakers+and+mad-men+-+people+who+push+and+test+limits+to+show+us+what%26%2339%3Bs+possible.%26nbsp%3BLegends%2C+pariahs+and+martyrs+who+show+us+what+we+can%2C+can%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+should+and+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+do.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+advocating+bat-biting+%28Ozzy+Osbourne%29+or+throwing+grand+pianos+into+hotel+pools+%28Keith+Moon%29%2C+but+the+world+would+be+a+much+duller+place+without+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+close+with+a+quote+from+our+very+own+industry%2C+while+discussing+the+prospect+of+Bitcoin%26rsquo%3Bs+price+reaching+%24500%2C000+in+the+next+3+years+-+McAfee+%26amp%3B+Associates+founder+John+McAfee+said+%26quot%3BIf+not%2C+I+will+eat+my+own%26nbsp%3B%28insert+part+of+male+anatomy+here%29%26nbsp%3Bon+national+television%26quot%3B.+Now+there+is+someone+who+is+willing+to+put%26nbsp%3Bmore%26nbsp%3Bthan+their+money+where+their%26nbsp%3Bmouth%26nbsp%3Bis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
By+Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect%2C+COO%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Some+interesting+and+lesser+known+parallels+between+the+music+industry+and+the+tech+industry.

What+have+I+learned+about+running+remote+teams%3F %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMatthew+Longden+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+far+back+as+1964+Arthur+C+Clarke+predicted+the+digital+nomad+trend+was+coming+to+the+work+place.+%3Cem%3E%26ldquo%3BPerhaps+only+50+years+from+now+a+man+%5Bmay%5D+conduct+his+business+from+Tahiti+or+Bali+just+as+well+as+he+could+from+London%26rdquo%3B.+He+went+further%3A+%26ldquo%3BMen+will+no+longer+commute%3B+%3Cstrong%3Ethey+will+communicate%2C+%5B%26hellip%3B%5D+They+will+only+travel+for+pleasure.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26%2339%3Bs+just+over+50+years+later%2C+and+while+we%26rsquo%3Bre+perhaps+not+fully+nomadic+in+our+choice+of+where+to+work%2C+the+idea+of+remote+work+is+more+and+more+prevalent%2C+certainly+in+the+IT+sector.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+several+years%2C+Entelect+has+been+implementing+a+version+of+remote+work%2C+essentially+our+offsite+project+model+is+that.+We+gather+requirements+for+a+system+and+then+we+proceed+to+design+and+build+it+with+teams+based+at+our+offices+in+Melrose+Arch%2C+Centurion+and+Cape+Town.+As+we%26rsquo%3Bre+advocates+of+Agile+SDLCs+we+try+to+communicate+progress+frequently+and+prefer+a+high+level+of+interaction+with+product+owners+or+client+stakeholders+to+get+prompt+feedback+on+development.+We%26rsquo%3Bre+good+at+this+model+and+we%26rsquo%3Bve+provided+many+high-quality+systems+to+our+clients+in+this+way.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMore+recently+though+we%26rsquo%3Bve+been+engaging+with+clients+and+colleagues+in+different+ways.+For+instance%2C+when+a+colleague+decided+to+move+to+Eastern+Europe+last+year+he+continued+to+work+for+us%2C+producing+mobile+dev%2C+for+the+first+six+months+of+his+new+life+there.+We+now+have+several+engagements+where+we+have+expanded+our+onsite+team+augmentation+model+to+include+remote+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+this+remote+augmentation+model+that+I+am+particularly+interested+in.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirst%2C+let+me+paint+the+perfect+remote+augmentation+picture+from+my+point+of+view.+Teams+that+really+nail+this+will+be+able+to+onboard+and+work+with+colleagues+who+are+not+coming+into+the+same+office+as+them.+Being+able+to+learn+the+domain%2C+access+systems%26nbsp%3Band+communicate+with+the+wider+team%2C+will+not+be+impacted+by+lack+of+physical+presence.+Remote+members+of+a+team+will+contribute+and+be+valued+in+exactly+the+same+way+as+their+colleagues+and+they+will+undertake+all+the+same+tasks+as+the+core+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+idea+of+such+a+team+is+attractive+to+me+as+a+Delivery+Manager+because+it+opens+up+possibilities+to+support+our+clients+in+new+ways.+By+tapping+into+the+major+commercial+hubs+in+South+Africa+we+can+find+the+best+composition+of+skillsets+and+experience+to+help+them+achieve+their+development+aims.+No+doubt%2C+it+has+to+be+better+for+our+economy+and+the+growth+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+IT+industry+to+recruit+people+in+this+country+rather+than+looking+abroad%2C+and+as+the+IT+skills+pool+is+relatively+isolated+in+this+country+we+need+to+be+flexible+in+our+approaches+to+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+have+I+learned+so+far%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+assume+that+remote+augmentation+will+work+in+just+the+same+way+local+augmentation+does+%28we+all+just+use+jira+and+get+on+with+it%2C+right%3F%29+is+simplistic+in+the+extreme.+By+its+nature%2C+augmenting+into+a+team+typically+requires+much+closer+interaction%2C+both+in+terms+of+frequency+of+communication+and+in+the+nature+of+tasks+being+taken+on.+It+should+be+perfectly+normal+for+the+person+sitting+400km+away+to+develop+the+service+tier+which+the+front+end+developer%26nbsp%3Bsitting+locally+will+consume%2C+or+visa+versa.+However%2C+achieving+this+is+not+always+trivial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%28The+right%29+tech+can+help%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETech+has+been+the+enabler+of+people+working+remotely+so+its+unsurprising+that+it+sits+at+the+center+of+any+solution+to+remote+working.+Its+vital+to+have+the+correct+array+of+communication+mediums+available+and+that+the+team+members+are+able+to+use+them+appropriately.+The+humble+telephone+still+has+a+huge+part+to+play+but+provisioning+a+team+with+IM%2C+video+conferencing%2C+group+messaging+such+as+Slack%2C+as+well+as+the+now+common+tools+like+Jira+and+BitBucket+is+key+removing+the+inherent+friction+in+communicating+from+a+remote+location.+Products+such+as+Basecamp+are+also+available%2C+they+aim+to+provide+a+single+platform+off+which+you+can+run+a+distributed+team.+It+goes+without+saying+that+high+speed%2C+stable+network+access+for+the+remote+teams+is+a+%26lsquo%3Bmust%26rsquo%3B+as+well.+Security+policies%2C+especially+of+corporates%2C+need+to+align+to+allow+remote+workers+access+to+all+the+systems+they+need+to+do+their+job.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+remote+team+is+not+a+second+class+citizen%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+ideal+here+is+that+remote+colleagues+simply+pull+tasks+off+the+same+backlog+as+the+core+team.+I+have+seen+instances+though+where+the+core+team+allocate+simpler+tasks+to+the+remote+team+under+the+reasoning+that+they%26rsquo%3Bll+be+easier+to+do+in+isolation+%28this+is+also+a+common+model+when+dealing+with+high+capacity+offshore+teams+in+places+like+India+and+the+Philippines%29.+This+sets+a+tone+where+the+remote+guys+feel+like+they+are+never+given+access+to+the+more+complex%2C+interesting+work.+Over+time+this+will+lead+to+them+feeling+disengaged+and+is+likely+to+lead+to+frustrations+around+their+ability+to+contribute+to+the+development+effort.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaking+it+work+is+also+a+people+problem%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+find+the+really+insightful+part+of+Clarke%26rsquo%3Bs+1964+prediction+not+to+be+the+idea+of+remote+work+itself+but+that+of+people+needing+to+communicate.+Despite+the+fact+that+we+grow+up+with+so+many+ways+of+communicating+these+days+we+are+generally+still+very+bad+at+communicating+effectively%2C+especially+when+not+working+face-to-face.+This+is%2C+and+will+remain+for+some+time%2C+the+main+barrier+to+how+well+any+given+remote+team+will+work+in+my+opinion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+an+industry+not+known+for+high+EQ+levels+across+the+workforce%2C+it+is+especially+important+to+make+sure+there+are+nominated+people+in+both+the+local+and+remote+teams+that+will+help+facilitate+excellent+communications.+This+will+ensure+expectations+across+the+team+boundaries+are+managed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EManagement+support+and+buy+in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+encounter+managers+who+are+open+to+trying+a+remote+team+however+they+feel+there+is+no+extra+overhead+needed+to+make+the+engagement+a+success.+In+addition+to+the+above+points+around+tech%2C+equality+between+teams+and+great+communication+pathways%2C+it+is+important+that+the+management+team+themselves+are+clear+in+where+potential+issues+may+lie+and+are+proactive+in+dealing+with+them.+My+experience+of+remote+augmentation+is+that+when+things+do+start+to+go+wrong+you+really+need+strong+leadership+to+act+quickly+to+put+plans+in+place+to+address+the+issues+at+hand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+able+to+build+teams+that+can+operate+in+this+fashion+does+require+different+skills%2C+approaches+and+tech+than+simply+running+a+local+team.+If+you+manage+to+get+it+right+though+the+potential+to+unlock+talent+pools+in+other+South+African+cities%2C+and+ultimately+further+afield%2C+is+an+exciting+prospect+for+Development+Managers+struggling+to+find+the+skills+they+need+locally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Matthew+Longden+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Remote+teams+are+no+longer+a+future+idea.+But+making+sure+they+are+successful+requires+some+very+modern+approaches+to+team+dynamics
    
["Teams and culture"]

Nobody+Reads+Anymore+Right%3F %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Shashi+Hansjee+%28Entelect%2C+CEO%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+a+few+questions+that+we+ask+people+joining+our+company%2C+to+get+to+know+them+better.+One+of+which+is+their+favourite+book.+Granted%2C+we+are+a+technology+company+and+so+naturally+will+have+a+larger+than+average+number+of+readers%2C+but+pretty+much+every+person+speaks+passionately+about+one+or+two+particular+books+that+really+spoke+to+them.+Of+course%2C+most+of+these+are+fiction%2C+but+when+people+say+that+nobody+reads+anymore%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+true.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+of+my+favourite+quotes+is+from+Warren+Buffet.+When+asked+about+the+key+to+success%2C+he+said+%26ldquo%3BRead+500+pages+every+day.+That%26rsquo%3Bs+how+knowledge+works.+It+builds+up%2C+like+compound+interest.%26rdquo%3B+He+also+followed+up+that+statement+with+%26ldquo%3BAll+of+you+can+do+it%2C+but+I+guarantee+not+many+of+you+will+do+it.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+business+reading+perspective%2C+I+never+manage+to+get+through+as+many+books+as+I%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to%2C+but+I+do+manage+to+read+at+least+one+or+two+per+month.+I%26rsquo%3Bve+found+there+are+a+few+tricks+to+developing+a+concentrated+reading+list%2C+compared+to+the+four+or+five+per+month+many+other+thought-leading+executives+seem+get+through.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+experiment.+Amazon+have+an+enormous+range+of+books+and+their+recommendations+generally+work+well.+Reading+reviews%2C+checking+out+the+contents+and+reading+the+first+chapter+before+you+buy+will+help+you+identify+those+books+that+are+outside+the+obvious+bestsellers+and+can+offer+amazing+insights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+be+aware+and+be+%3Cem%3Ecreative%3C%2Fem%3E.+If+you+take+just+one+idea+from+a+book+and+apply+it+to+your+business%2C+then+the+time+spent+is+worth+it.+At+times%2C+it+might+not+be+obviously+applicable%2C+but+being+aware%2C+and+thinking+outside+the+box+when+reading%2C+has+led+to+some+of+the+most+successful+initiatives+in+our+business+today.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+variety+is+important.+Generally%2C+people+get+hung+up+on+reading+one+type+of+book+%26ndash%3B+either+strategy%2C+or+other+peoples%26rsquo%3B+success+stories%2C+or+topics+that+are+only+applicable+to+their+area+or+role.+Variety+is+key+to+expanding+the+mind+and+promoting+creativity.+Some+of+the+more+technical+or+specialised+subject+matter-focussed+books+are+a+heavier+read%2C+but+often+that+extra+detail+and+depth+can+yield+the+most+practical+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+invest+in+your+knowledge+by+reading+regularly.+Challenge+your+existing+knowledge+by+picking+up+books+that+sit+outside+of+your+comfort+zone+and+think+laterally+while+reading.+There+is+no+rule+as+to+where+a+creative+solution+to+a+business+problem+can+come+from.+What+is+certain%2C+is+that+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+be+at+executive+level+to+bring+a+great+idea+into+a+business+or+your+team+and+change+the+way+things+are+done+for+the+better.%3C%2Fp%3E

Don%E2%80%99t+be+a+commodity+in+your+career.+Stop+doing+and+start+growing. %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager+%3A+Managed+Solutions%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+could+coast+through+a+career+of+40+years%2C+or+become+formidable+in+5.+This+is+a+look+at+two+mechanisms+to+stay+on+the+accelerator%2C+grow+as+a+professional+and+make+an+impact+wherever+you+are.+These+mechanisms+are+your+attitude+towards+learning%2C+and+your+willingness+to+understand+context.+These+are+two+stand-out+concepts+I%26%2339%3Bve+learnt+and+observed+in+my+own+journey+from+junior+to+leadership.+It+is+scary+how+this+conventional+wisdom+is+lost+or+diluted+in+many+companies.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Essentially+these+do+boil+down+to+critical+thinking%2C+but+let%26rsquo%3Bs+take+a+moment+to+explore+learning+and+context+as+two+of+the+easier+ways+to+change+your+mindset+towards+your+work%2C+get+ahead+of+your+peers%2C+and+stand+out%21+We+individually+have+control+of+these+areas+of+our+professional+lives.+In+particular%2C+attitudes+or+mindsets+like+these+have+nothing+to+do+with+industry+knowledge%2C+experience+or+technical+skill.+Your+stance+is+your+key+to+a+massively+accelerated+career%2C+if+you+want+it.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+land+in+our+roles+full+of+uncertainty+but+ambitious+because+of+it.+We+are+motivated+to+learn+and+are+terrified+of+underperformance.+The+mystery+of+a+new+career+energises+us+greatly+through+new+purpose+and+problems.+We+must+justify+our+selection+to+join+a+team+and+hold+a+position.+Does+this+sound+familiar%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Sometime+into+your+role+you+learn+the+recipe.+You+solve+many+of+the+mysteries%2C+and+deeply+understand+how+a+team+or+organisation+operates.+Through+this+clarification+the+novelty+of+the+role+wears+off%2C+and+human+nature+dictates+that+we+start+to+lose+interest.+We+stop+pushing+ourselves+as+our+expectations+align+with+our+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+or+employer%26rsquo%3Bs+expectations.+We+stop+growing+and+start+doing.+As+these+external+factors+-+new+people%2C+new+expectations+and+environments+wear+off%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+for+internal+factors+to+kick+in..%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+here+they+are%2C+two+dynamos+which+you+can+apply+to+change+your+perspective%3B+to+stop+doing+and+start+growing%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOne%3A+learn+on+your+own+time.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+self-investment.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+not+waiting+for+your+employer+to+force+you+on+training+or+sponsor+you%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+it+on+your+own+time+and+your+own+dime.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+realising+that+you+are+the+captain+of+your+career+and+have+an+obligation+to+do+this+for+yourself.+It+also+accelerates+you+within+your+organisation+because+you+can+offer+more+%28incidentally+why+you+were+attractive+to+an+organisation+in+the+first+place%29.+If+you+are+clearly+investing+in+yourself+it+sends+a+critical+message+to+your+team+and+management+that+you+care+about+your+productivity+in+a+vacuum.+If+you+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+relying+on+your+employer+to+carry+you%2C+it+sets+a+very+different+balance+of+power.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+People+who+invest+in+themselves+regardless+of+circumstance%2C+employer+or+project+are+independent.+They%26rsquo%3Bre+keeping+themselves+ahead+of+the+curve%2C+which+is+a+hugely+magnetic+concept.+You+probably+want+to+work+with+other+people+like+this%2C+because+they+have+so+much+to+offer.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+just+wisdom+or+skill+either.+Independence+breeds+positivity+and+focus%2C+characteristics+which+help+projects+succeed+and+businesses+grow.+If+you+commit+openly+with+yourself%2C+your+team+and+your+company+to+spend+your+own+time+learning+and+developing+yourself%2C+you+become+a+giver+and+not+a+taker%2C+a+transformation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETwo%3A+obsess+over+context.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+one+is+a+little+more+complex+but+still+nothing+ground-breaking.+The+idea+here+is+to+always+remember+why+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+something.+Some+call+this+big+picture+thinking+but+I+believe+it+is+more+nuanced.+Context+is+about+self-awareness%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+about+business+sense%2C+selflessness+and+objective+thinking.+Introspect+for+a+second%2C+ask+yourself+if+everything+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+and+saying+right+now+within+your+current+project+is+in+the+best+interests+of+the+success+of+that+project%3F+Does+your+attitude+show+a+care+for%2C+and+understanding+of+circumstances%3F+Business+environment%2C+customers%2C+budget+demands%2C+time+pressures.+Does+your+team+and+leadership+absolutely+trust+you+to+think+for+yourself%3B+have+you+demonstrated+that+you+can%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+harder+to+balance+because+what+we+need+to+do+or+say+in+the+best+interests+of+the+project+may+not+align+so+perfectly+with+our+personal+measurement+of+things.+This+is+also+a+common+perspective+%28or+measurement%29+of+maturity+-+our+ability+to+put+personal+agenda+aside+in+these+circumstances+and+to+prioritise+the+team+or+business%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.+Once+context+is+mixed+into+the+picture%2C+motivation+will+come+more+naturally+as+we+demonstrate+a+balanced+intent+and+clarity+of+purpose.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+introspection+for+you+to+try%3A+when+the+dust+settles%2C+what+will+your+contribution+be%3F+Douglas+Kruger+talks+about+this+in+his+book+%26ldquo%3BOwn+your+Industry%26rdquo%3B+%28a+cool+read+by+the+way%29.+He+talks+about+speaking+the+language+of+results+when+we+are+trying+to+sell+something.+He+encourages+us+to+think+about+outcomes+as+what+people+and+businesses+are+attracted+to%2C+as+opposed+to+the+input%2C+features+or+tasks.+If+you+%26ldquo%3Bdo+a+thing%26rdquo%3B+you%26rsquo%3Bre+a+commodity%2C+if+you+%26ldquo%3Bget+a+result%26rdquo%3B+you%26rsquo%3Bre+a+in+a+position+of+power.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+These+two+mindsets+are+made+even+more+interesting+because+they+present+a+curious+balance+of+their+own.+Self-investment+can+be+considered+selfish+and+unrelated+to+your+role%2C+but+context+is+100%25+selfless+and+focused+on+the+narrow+agenda.+The+important+realisation+is+that+our+stance+when+it+comes+to+these+two+elements+of+ourselves+are+powerful+levers+to+pull.+They+influence+how+we+are+perceived+in+our+roles+and+should+be+understood+to+be+taken+advantage+of.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Coast+along+a+career+through+the+slow+march+of+time%2C+or+force+some+perspective.+Motivate+yourself+to+continuously+learn+for+your+own+sake%2C+and+remember+to+deliberately+empathise+with+business+objectives.+Make+a+bigger+impact%2C+get+noticed%2C+grow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

trong%3E3.+Building+capability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+especially+powerful+for+technical+teams.+By+sharing+a+new+process+or+solution+through+an+employee+story+%28sharing+key+actions%2C+lessons+learned+and+the+honest+frustrations+experienced+getting+to+the+end+point%29%2C+we+allow+other+employees+to+gain+knowledge+through+a+very+reliable+source.+This+generates+confidence+for+both+the+storyteller+and+those+who+can+learn+from+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Employee+engagement+and+connection%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+By+sharing+something+deeply+personal+or+a+story+that+stirs+emotions%2C+a+storyteller+can+build+connections+across+the+business+and+bring+everyone+together+through+shared+empathy.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+A+new+business+process%2Fprocedure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+communications+area+that+is+usually+delivered+in+a+dry+way+can+be+far+more+engaging+when+delivered+by+employees+who+can+authentically+share+the+benefits+they+have+gained+or+will+gain+from+the+new+process.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+various+ways+to+find+and+capture+these+stories%2C+although+maybe+surprisingly%2C+the+simplest+way+works+wonders.+Openly+asking+all+employees+to+contribute+can+be+powerful%2C+especially+if+it+is+to+highlight+the+great+work+of+others.+People+in+leadership+positions+can+also+highlight+top+performers+as+a+source+of+engaging+stories+to+share+across+the+business.+It+is+important+to+ensure+that+the+key+messages+are+shared+beforehand%2C+so+the+team+knows+what+to+look+out+for%2C+but+as+much+as+possible+let+employees+tell+the+story+in+their+own+words.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Guiding+the+narrators+to+tell+compelling+stories%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Not+everyone+is+a+natural+storyteller+in+written+or+spoken+form%2C+so+it+is+vitally+important+for+companies+to+give+the+right+support+and+guidance+to+empower+employees+to+deliver+their+best+stories+authentically.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Regardless+of+the+format%2C+there+are+a+few+critical+elements+that+will+help+frame+the+narrative.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWho+is+the+audience%3F+i.e.+their+team%2C+division%2C+or+the+entire+business%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+key+moral+of+the+story%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhy+will+the+audience+find+this+useful%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+did+I+achieve+the+success+I+am+going+to+share%3F+What+were+the+biggest+challenges+I+faced%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+would+I+find+most+interesting+about+my+story+that+I+think+others+might+find+engaging%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+last+point+is+quite+powerful+because+if+you+have+employees+aligned+to+the+same+objectives%2C+an+employee+will+know+what+others+will+find+empowering+and+inspirational.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+it+is+a+story+that+is+being+shared+by+a+live+presentation+or+video%2C+consider+offering+public+speaking+or+presentation+coaching+beforehand+to+build+confidence.+Also%2C+having+experienced+speakers+available+to+positively+share+feedback+during+practice+runs+will+allow+companies+to+develop+a+stable+of+great+storytellers+across+the+business+over+time.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Use+this+great+asset+within+your+business+%26ndash%3B+your+people%2C+empower+them+and+guide+them+towards+narrating+their+own+stories+of+learning%2C+achievement+and+success.+This+is+a+technique+organisations+can+use+to+create+and+share+much+more+engaging+and+memorable+messaging.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Let+your+people+tell+your+story+for+you.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
In+a+time+where+access+to+information%2C+and+the+noise+from+external+inputs+such+as+social+media+have+never+been+louder%2C+ensuring+your+messaging+gets+maximum+exposure%2C+can+be+challenging.Generally%2C+people+tend+to+trust+stories+told+to+them+by+people+that+they+spend+time+with+and+have+built+relationships+with

The+world+is+changing%2C+So+is+HR %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-537973-cmsimages%2FTheworldischangigsoisHR.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+recruiting+new+talent%2C+to+employee+engagement+and+retention%2C+through+to+performance+management+and+development%2C+HR+functions+have+never+had+more+tools+and+resources+to+support+their+businesses%26rsquo%3B+most+valuable+resources+%26ndash%3B+its+people.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+the+flip+side%2C+not+having+an+HR+function+and+associated+tools+and+processes+aligned%2C+can+put+your+business+at+a+competitive+disadvantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+explore+some+of+the+main+themes+of+a+digitally-led+HR+function+and+the+benefits%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAttracting+and+retaining+talent+in+a+digital+world%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThanks+to+the+new+digital+age%2C+job+seekers+and+talent+acquisition+specialists+have+access+to+countless+employment-oriented+services.+Members+can+search+for+specific+industries%2C+locations%2C+remuneration%2C+skills+and+experience%2C+using+portals+such+as+LinkedIn+which+currently+has+over+6.7+million+South+African+users+or+Careers24+with+over+1.4+million+unique+visitors+each+month.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+with+great+power+comes+great+responsibility.+This+fast-paced%2C+job-seeking+environment+also+presents+three+major+challenges%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Due+to+the+volume+of+applicants+to+many+open+roles%2C+processing+applications+accurately+and+timeously+to+ensure+a+high-quality+shortlist+has+become+a+more+pressurised+process%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Candidates+can+instantly+find+new+opportunities+in+an+ultra-competitive+job+market%2C+causing+many+disconnected+recruitment+processes+to+lose+prime+candidates%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Existing+employees+are+fully+aware+of+how+easily+their+next+opportunity+is+to+find%2C+so+retaining+staff+has+become+vitally+important%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+last+challenge+naturally+leads+to+the+discussion+around+employee+retention%2C+but+also+how+powerful+employee+advocacy+is+in+a+digital+world.+With+global+tech+companies+such+as+Apple%2C+Google+and+Facebook+leading+the+way+with+free+food+around+the+clock%2C+massage+therapists%2C+games+rooms+and+even+sleep+pods%2C+companies+small+and+large+are+by+necessity+looking+at+all+kinds+of+ways+to+make+the+employee+experience+as+enjoyable+as+it+can+be.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUser+experience+%3D+Employee+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+world+becomes+more+connected+than+ever%2C+sharing+experiences+with+others+can+have+immense+reach.+Leading+companies+such+as+Microsoft+are%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fblog.impraise.com%2F360-feedback%2Fmicrosoft-throws-stack-ranking-out-the-window%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+reimagining+the+way+performance+reviews+%3C%2Fa%3Eare+processed.+There+is+a+growing+movement+globally+to+phase+out+the+traditional+style+of+annual+performance+reviews+against+a+numerical+scale%2C+to+a+style+of+frequent%2C+informal+employee+feedback+during+regular+check-ins%2C+and+adjusting+how+merit-based+pay+increases+are+assessed.+This+allows+for+bugbears+to+be+regularly+ironed+out.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+countless+examples+of+negative+customer+service+going+viral+on+social+media.+Websites+such+as+Glassdoor+allow+employees+to+review+their+working+experiences+in+a+public+forum%2C+giving+insight+into+what+it+is+like+to+work+for+any+company.+Companies+have+no+influence+over+what+is+published+and+it+is+totally+anonymous.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+one+of+the+many+critical+reasons+why+HR+functions+should+embrace+and+empower+their+people+with+the+ability+to+give+feedback+on+issues+outside+of+the+traditional+review+processes%2C+and+addressing+those+concerns+through+continual+leadership+communications.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBeing+connected+through+digital%2C+starts+and+ends+with+engaged+people%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+custodians+of+the+most+important+but+arguably+the+most+complex+resource+within+a+business%2C+HR+functions+need+to+be+connected+throughout+a+business.+It+comes+with+its+fair+share+of+challenges%2C+but+these+can+be+overcome+if+HR+functions+focus+on+the+empowerment+of+people+through%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Aligning+all+individual+objectives+to+those+of+the+overall+business+and+ensuring+everyone+understands+their+contribution+to+achieving+these%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Fostering+a+culture+of+open+and+continuous+feedback+that+is+embraced+and+actioned+by+leaders+all+year+round%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Be+the+champions+of+change+to+processes%2C+to+free+up+resources+to+focus+on+things+that+drive+business+outcomes+and+for+leaders+to+support+their+people+in+their+growth%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Partner+with+IT+and+expert+agencies+to+evolve+legacy+systems+to+save+resources+and+digitise+the+employee+experience+end-to-end%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Embrace+digital+as+a+positive+catalyst+for+connecting+all+functions+of+the+business+to+a+common+goal+%26ndash%3B+with+HR+taking+a+central+role+in+that+connection%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+pride+ourselves+in+being+aligned+with+the+global+trend+of+identifying+ways+to+deliver+a+connected%2C+digital+employee+experience+through+our+empowered+HR+function.+But+we+take+it+one+step+further.+We+ensure+that+our+performance+reviews+are+designed+to+cultivate+talent+and+not+merely+provide+a+review.+We+don%26%2339%3Bt+see+the+traditional+HR+function+as+the+rest+of+the+world+sees+it%2C+but+rather+as+a+people+function.+We+see+our+valued+people+as+individuals+who+we+look+to+constantly+grow%2C+and+this+is+what+sets+us+apart.%3C%2Fp%3E
From+recruiting+new+talent%2C+to+employee+engagement+and+retention%2C+through+to+performance+management+and+development%2C+HR+functions+have+never+had+more+tools+and+resources+to+support+their+businesses%E2%80%99+most+valuable+resources+%E2%80%93+its+people
    
["Teams and culture"]
  
The world is changig so is HR.png
    
Performance+reviews+which+make+a+real+difference g+with+commendations.+Joshua+has+had+an+even+better+review+period%2C+but+what+motivates+him+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+success+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+mastery+and+the+depth+of+the+technical+challenges+he+has+faced+and+come+out+on+top+of.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+these+scenarios%2C+both+Daniel+and+Joshua+have+done+amazing+work.+If+we+as+managers+just+highlight+the+achievements+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+offer+a+way+forward+or+don%26rsquo%3Bt+understand+their+motivators%2Fcareer+aspirations%2C+we+are+doing+a+disservice+to+the+excellent+individual+that+stands+before+us.+For+someone+that+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+had+a+good+review+period%2C+if+we+focus+only+on+the+faults+without+explaining+the+implications+and+providing+actionable+feedback%2C+guidance+or+opportunities%2C+we+are+not+doing+our+jobs+of+cultivating+talent.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+focus+on+the+positives+and+the+negatives%2C+regardless+of+the+performance+of+the+individual.+That+is+how+you+guide+people+to+grow.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBefore+we+can+discuss+how+to+prepare+for+a+review%2C+we+need+to+understand+what+the+outcomes+of+a+review+should+be%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPart+of+our+responsibility+as+managers+is+to+cultivate+talent%2C+grow+the+people+we+work+with+and+provide+a+clear%2C+actionable+path+for+people+to+go+down+on+in+their+careers.+We%26rsquo%3Bre+focused+on+the+perspective+of+the+reviewer+and+not+the+reviewee+in+this+article%2C+but+it+is+important+to+note+that+it+is+the+responsibility+of+both+the+reviewer+and+the+reviewee+to+make+sure+that+a+review+is+beneficial.+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+following+list+of+outcomes+should+be+a+focus+of+any+performance+review%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGet+a+sense+of+individual+achievements%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+People+want+to+be+recognised+for+the+great+work+they+do.+Give+them+the+recognition+they+deserve.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EUnderstand+the+challenges+the+person+may+have+or+has+overcome.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+If+someone+is+still+experiencing+the+challenges%2C+identifying+what+they+are+is+a+great+way+to+become+an+enabler+for%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+them.+Knowing+the+challenges+they+have+overcome+helps+to+remind+them+of+the+growth+they+experienced+over+the+review+period.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EIdentify+the+strong+skills+the+individual+has+and+help+to+leverage+those.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+By+highlighting+the+strengths+people+have+and+explaining+how+important+those+are+in+one%26rsquo%3Bs+career%2C+reinforces+great+behaviour+and+shows+an+understanding+of+what+the+individual+has+to+offer.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EIdentify+the+skills+that+need+refinement.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Nobody+is+great+at+everything%2C+so+there+will+always+be+skills+that+need+refinement+or+growth+as+one+moves+down+their+career+path.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3ESetting+and+tracking+goals+set+out+by+the+person%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+Setting+goals+is+multifaceted.+You+could+use+a+goal+as+an+opportunity+to+grow+a+skill+identified+earlier%2C+or+help+the+individual+do+something+that+they+are+passionate+about+that+is+outside+of+their+work.+Goal+setting+helps+put+together+something+actionable+to+achieve+but+helps+for+accountability+too.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGauge+sentiment.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+This+one+is+simple%2C+find+out+if+the+person+is+happy+in+the+role+they+are+in%2C+the+work+they+are+doing+or+the+interactions+they+have+with+their+team.+Action+something+if+the+person+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+happy.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EDeepen+a+relationship+with+the+individual%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+going+without+saying%2C+building+strong+relationships+with+your+team+is+a+must.+It+helps+to+be+honest%2C+to+understand+the+people+on+the+team%2C+what+inspires+them%2C+how+to+communicate+with+them%2C+where+they+come+from%2C+and+what+is+important+to+them.+It+shows+that+you+care.+It+also+improves+your+credibility+as+a+manager.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+deliver+the+feedback%2C+career+guidance+and+support+in+the+review%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+one+leaves+a+review%2C+they+should+feel+as+though+they+have+been+able+to+speak+their+mind%2C+talk+about+what+is+important+to+them%2C+have+a+clear+understanding+of+the+next+steps+and+feel+excited+about+the+challenges+ahead.+Effective+performance+feedback+looks+both+backward+and+forward%2C+speaks+to+behaviours+and+skills+as+attributes%2C+not+the+person%2C+and+explains+the+impact+and+consequences+of+those+attributes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+following+guidelines+should+be+exercised+when+providing+feedback%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EListen+first+and+ask+questions+to+clarify+understanding.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Most+people+crave+the+opportunity+to+talk+and+share+their+views%3B+to+feel+as+though+they+are+listened+to.+It+is+a+discussion%2C+not+a+lecture.+Be+clear+in+your+understanding+of+what+the+reviewee+is+saying+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+make+assumptions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+constructive+by+reviewing+a+skill+and+not+the+person.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EFeedback+should+be+seen+as+an+opportunity+to+learn+more+about+yourself+professionally%2C+not+be+personal.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGive+specific+and+concrete+examples+where+performance+was+good+or+poor.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Saying+things+like+%26ldquo%3Byou+are+a+very+good+communicator%26rdquo%3B+vs+%26ldquo%3Byou+are+great+at+explaining+very+technical+terms+to+non-technical+people+and+ensuring+that+everyone+in+the+room+understands+the+way+forward+while+making+people+feel+part+of+the+team%26rdquo%3B+is+very+different.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExplain+the+impact+of+good+and+poor+behaviour.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+You+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know.+Talk+about+the+reasons+why+something+impacts+the+team+or+the+project+so+that+the+reviewee+gains+experience+and+develops+insight.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProvide+opportunities+or+ways+to+stretch+and+improve+skills.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+give+an+opportunity+or+a+clear+way+to+achieve+a+goal%2C+most+people+get+stuck+and+say+that+the+opportunities+don%26rsquo%3Bt+exist+in+the+current+work+environment.+There+is+always+an+opportunity%2C+one+simply+needs+to+explain+what+it+is+and+the+measurables+from+it.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProvide+the+appropriate+support.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Support+comes+in+many+formats.+Providing+training%2C+having+face+time+to+soundboard+ideas%2C+removing+blockers+or+introducing+the+right+people+at+the+right+time.+Be+available+and+offer+support+to+achieve+goals.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExercise+EQ.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+This+one+is+tricky%2C+but+the+gist+of+it+is+that+in+a+review%2C+your+feedback+and+tone+need+to+be+adjusted+to+each+person+you+are+reviewing.+Feedback+often+comes+with+emotions%2C+but+when+the+intent+is+to+be+constructive%2C+honest+and+to+grow+the+person%2C+delivery+of+the+feedback+becomes+much+easier.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExercise+accountability.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EOften+review+feedback+requires+tough+conversations.+Accountability+is+only+effectively+achieved+when+there+is+an+agreement+in+place%2C+a+clear+understanding+of+the+boundaries+and+knowing+how+to+measure+success.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+be+afraid+to+hold+people+accountable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+explore+how+this+strategy+played+out+with+Daniel+and+Joshua.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDaniel+is+a+rock+star+engineer%2C+and+a+natural+leader+in+the+team%2C+even+though+he+is+relatively+early+in+his+career.+His+review+started+out+as+a+highlights+reel+where+we+discussed+all+his+achievements+and+the+impact+that+he+has+made+to+the+project+and+client+%3Cstrong%3E%28listen+first%2C+recognise+achievements%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+spoke+about+his+strong+technical+skills%2C+such+as+estimations+in+his+own+work+and+his+ability+to+problem-solve+%3Cstrong%3E%28identify+strong+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%2C+but+also+identified+that+he+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+know+how+to+estimate+other+people%26rsquo%3Bs+throughput+%3Cstrong%3E%28identify+skills+to+refine%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+resulted+in+him+setting+deadlines+he+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+meet+and+then+pouring+his+heart+and+soul+into+the+project+to+make+sure+it+got+delivered+on+time+%3Cstrong%3E%28explain+the+impact%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+admirable+in+his+desire+to+get+things+done+and+see+things+through%2C+it+meant+that+Daniel+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+dedicating+time+to+his+other+passion%2C+rock+climbing%2C+and+he+would+ultimately+suffer+burnout+%3Cstrong%3E%28understanding+his+challenges%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+put+together+a+dedicated+meeting+slot+to+review+every+estimation+made+on+his+own+work+and+that+of+the+others+on+the+team+to+see+how+he+would+improve+over+time+and+adjust+accordingly+%3Cstrong%3E%28provide+the+appropriate+support%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+also+agreed+that+he+should+do+the+things+he+is+passionate+about+and+that+I+would+call+him+out+if+he+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+do+at+least+one+trip+to+the+nearest+indoor+rock+climbing+gym+once+a+month+%3Cstrong%3E%28agreeing+to+a+goal+and+shared+accountability%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJoshua%2C+our+technically-minded+defender+of+quality+and+champion+of+best+practices+entered+the+room+and+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+say+much.+Highlighting+all+the+achievements+and+technical+brilliance+he+brought+to+the+team+from+my+point+of+view+is+how+the+review+started+%3Cstrong%3E%28recognise+achievements%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+proceeded+to+talk+about+the+solutions+he+was+delivering+on+the+project+and+if+he+still+felt+as+though+the+work+was+challenging+%3Cstrong%3E%28gauging+sentiment%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+He+was+very+happy+and+felt+as+though+he+was+still+adding+huge+value.+The+next+thing+we+spoke+about+was+his+career+path.+He+wants+to+go+down+the+path+of+being+a+Solutions+Architect%3B+so+we+chatted+about+the+need+to+grow+the+skills+of+influencing+change+and+being+able+to+address+non-technical+people+%28identifying+skills+to+grow%29.+These+skills+would+be+grown+by+running+project+planning+workshops%2C+and+joining+the+analysis+meetings+with+the+business+analysts+%3Cstrong%3E%28provide+the+right+opportunities+to+improve+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+His+strengths+in+holding+people+accountable+would+provide+the+legitimacy+in+a+room+of+non-technical+people+as+being+the+trusted+advisor+on+the+team+%3Cstrong%3E%28leveraging+strong+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPreparation+and+clear+feedback+are+key.+Think+of+the+outcomes+you+want+to+achieve+from+a+performance+review+before+it+starts.+Providing+great+tactile+feedback+gives+clear+direction+and+makes+a+review+meaningful.+To+take+it+a+step+further%2C+share+your+intent%2C+and+get+the+reviewee+to+prepare+for+the+review+following+the+same+guidelines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+are+all+about+staying+true+to+our+core+values+through+our+performance+reviews.+Through+being+open+%26amp%3B+honest+and+building+meaningful+relationships+during+reviews+means+that+%3Cem%3Erelationships+set+us+apart%3C%2Fem%3E.+By+providing+clear+actionable+feedback%2C+we+ensure+that+for+those+within+our+organisation%2C+%3Cem%3Egrowth+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+optional%3C%2Fem%3E.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Daniel+walks+confidently+down+the+corridor+towards+the+meeting+room+booked+out+for+the+latest+round+of+bi-annual+performance+reviews.+He+is+dressed+for+success%2C+notes+in+hand+and+undoubtedly+prepared+to+showcase+his+achievements+over+the+last+six+months.+In+contrast%2C+Joshua+looks+uninterested%2C+unprepared+and+ready+to+leave+before+he+arrives.+In+both+these+vastly+different+review+scenarios%2C+there+is+a+lot+of+preparation+needed+by+a+manager+and+employee+in+order+to+get+the+most+out+of+performance+reviews.
