the+process+gauging+technical+feasibility%2C+timelines+and+capabilities%2C+allows+the+team+to+draw+on+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+strengths.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCreate+a+culture+of+open+communication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+UX+Engineers+and+Software+Engineers+often+see+things+very+differently+as+a+result+of+their+own+skills+and+strengths.+These+differing+viewpoints+can+be+leveraged+to+establish+an+open+communication+policy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+involving+Software+Engineers+in+design+reviews+and+workshops%2C+they+are+given+the+opportunity+to+provide+earlier+input.+By+urging+UX+Engineers+to+attend+sprint+planning%2C+they+will+have+a+more+holistic+understanding+of+the+project+to+keep+refining+their+designs+when+new+or+changing+requirements+emerge+throughout+the+development+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWork+towards+a+shared+understanding+of+goals%2C+and+establish+clear+and+frequent+updates.+Collaborative+design+and+development+need+constant+feedback+and+input+from+both+parties.+This+will+ensure+that+business%2C+design%2C+and+technology+perspectives+are+integrated+into+the+project+from+day+one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCompromise+when+needed%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Being+constantly+involved+in+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+processes+allows+for+a+better+understanding+of+requirements+and+constraints.+Ultimately%2C+there+will+always+be+compromises%2C+or+at+the+very+least%2C+adjustments+required+between+what+UX+Engineers+envision+and+Software+Engineers+implement.+Most+often%2C+these+are+compromises+to+meet+business+objectives%2C+while+still+meeting+user+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+project+roadblocks+do+happen%2C+take+the+time+to+understand+why+a+missing+feature+is+crucial+or+how+an+unnecessary+element+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+feasible+given+constraints+of+the+platform.+Understanding+the+reasoning+behind+the+roadblock+will+make+it+easier+to+compromise+and+collectively+come+up+with+a+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+proper+communication+and+leveraging+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+skillsets%2C+the+user+experience+provided+will+lack+efficiency%2C+engagement%2C+and+value.+Promoting+transparency+on+tasks+and+timelines%2C+and+nurturing+a+feedback+culture+within+the+team+as+a+whole%2C+is+critical+to+ensure+you%26rsquo%3Bre+creating+great+products+with+the+best+user+experience+possible%2C+without+compromising+on+robustness+and+maintainability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCodingCommunity-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPresident+Barack+Obama+asked+in+his+State+of+the+Union+address+that+%26ldquo%3Bwe+live+in+a+time+of+extraordinary+change%2C+change+that%26rsquo%3Bs+affecting+the+way+we+live+and+the+way+we+work.+New+technology+replaces+any+job+where+work+can+be+automated.%26nbsp%3B+Workers+need+more+skills+to+get+ahead.%26nbsp%3B+These+changes+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+new%2C+and+they%26rsquo%3Bre+only+going+to+accelerate.%26nbsp%3B+So%2C+the+question+we+have+to+ask+ourselves+is%2C+%26lsquo%3BHow+can+we+make+sure+everyone+has+a+fair+shot+at+success+in+this+new+economy%3F%26rsquo%3B%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BThe+answer+is+coding+and+computer+science+education.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+good+news+is+that+if+you+are+not+able+to+attend+courses+or+university+after+school%2C+or+if+you+are+in+a+different+role+and+want+to+upskill+in+software+development%2C+there+are+many+organisations+today+assisting+people+at+all+levels+to+get+involved+in+the+world+of+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+South+Africa+alone%2C+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+strong+IT+community+with+a+plethora+of+knowledge-sharing+events+to+attend%2C+if+you+know+about+them.+There+are+also+several+different+organisations+assisting+and+growing+individuals+in+this+space.+So%2C+who+exactly+are+they+and+how+can+you+get+involved%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EGirlCode%3C%2Fstrong%3E+is+a+social+enterprise+that+aims+to+empower+young+girls+and+women+through+technology.+Their+vision+is+to+impact+10-million+women+across+Africa+in+10+years%2C+starting+with+getting+young+girls+interested+in+STEM.+It+aims+to+do+this+through+strategic+partnerships+with+the+public+sector%3B+strengthening+collaboration+with+similar+organisations%3B+and+leveraging+corporate+assets+in+the+development+of+ICT+facilities%2C+infrastructure+and+networks+within+schools+in+disadvantaged+communities.+GirlCode+run+workshops+throughout+the+year%2C+which+are+aimed+at+the+community+and+are+positioned+to+accommodate+all+skill+levels+in+various+technologies%2C+such+as+HTML%2C+CSS%2C+JavaScript+and+more.+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EGeekulcha%3C%2Fstrong%3E+is+where+young%2C+skilled%2C+creative+and+ambitious+tech+minds+meet+to+connect+with+each+other%2C+share+knowledge%2C+collaborate+on+projects%2C+network+with+industry+leaders%2C+obtain+training+to+further+improve+and+enhance+their+skills+and+to+put+that+newly+acquired+skill+to+work.+The+platform+has+over+11+200+tech+enthusiasts+and+innovators+across+Africa.+Their+focus+is+on+empowering+young+geeks+through+ICT+skills+development+and+training+while+giving+them+a+taste+of+what+awaits+them+in+the+big+world+through+industry+exposure.+Their+ultimate+goal+is+to+help+the+young+innovators+with+skills+for+employment+and+innovation+development.+Geekulcha+provides+a+variety+of+platforms+and+events+for+growth+while+being+exposed+to+the+corporate+world.+All+Geekulcha+events+are+free.+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgeekulcha.com%2Fevents%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fgeekulcha.com%2Fevents%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EUser+Groups.+%3C%2Fstrong%3ELocal+and+international+organisations+have+also+realised+the+need+to+help+facilitate%2C+train+and+assist+in+the+education+and+upskilling+of+the+community%2C+especially+here+in+South+Africa+where+the+skills+shortage+is+prevalent.+We+value+building+relationships+and+the+community+around+us+and+believe+that+if+you+can+network+with+peers+in+the+industry%2C+you+can+learn+from+what+they+are+doing.+Participating+in+user+groups+is+a+great+way+to+improve+technical%2C+presentation+and+networking+skills.+They+are+free+to+attend+and+anyone+can+join+in.+Visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E+or+sign+up+on+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.meetup.com%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.meetup.com%3C%2Fa%3E+to+view+events.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EThe+Entelect+Foundation+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eis+an+initiative+designed+to+provide+support+to+the+underprivileged+in+the+community%3B+be+it+financial+aid%2C+schoolwork+or+counselling.+The+primary+focus+of+Foundation+is+on+educating+the+community+to+equip+them+with+skills+that+will+help+them+become+self-sufficient.+On+Saturday+mornings+Entelectuals+volunteer+to+help+tutor+the+learners+from+our+offices%2C+having+put+many+children+through+better+schools+with+better+results+in+the+past+year.+Through+the+Entelect+Foundation%2C+we+even+helped+one+learner+through+high+school+and+university%2C+who+then+finally+joined+Entelect+as+a+graduate+software+engineer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+more+information+or+to+get+involved%2C+visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.culture.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.culture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FNews.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+243px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

Forganization%2Four-insights%2Fis-there-a-payoff-from-top-team-diversity%22%3EMcKinsey+%26amp%3B+Company%3C%2Fa%3E+study+across+Germany%2C+France%2C+the+United+Kingdom+and+the+United+States+that+included+180+companies%2C+found+that+those+with+more+diverse+workforces+enjoyed+significantly+higher+earnings+and+returns+on+equity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+that+outperformed+were+able+to+make+the+right+decisions+faster+which+is+an+obvious+advantage+in+any+industry.+This+ultimately+led+to+higher+profits.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGreater+economic+and+employment+benefits+for+the+wider+market%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+European+Institute+for+Gender+Equality+%28EIGE%29+has%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feige.europa.eu%2Fgender-mainstreaming%2Fmethods-tools%2Fabout%22%3E+analysed+multiple+data+sources%3C%2Fa%3E+across+the+European+Union+and+its+member+states+to+extrapolate+two+key+positive+economic+outcomes+for+STEM+within+the+EU.+Although+the+European+Union+is+a+vastly+different+market+to+Africa%2C+we+believe+the+tangential+benefits+for+Africa+would+be+very+similar.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIncreasing+the+participation+of+women+in+STEM+subjects+will+have+a+strong+positive+GDP+impact+at+EU+level.+Closing+the+gender+gap+in+STEM+would+contribute+to+an+increase+in+EU+GDP+per+capita+by+2.2+to+3.0%25+in+2050.+In+monetary+terms%2C+closing+the+STEM+gap+leads+to+an+improvement+in+GDP+by+%26euro%3B610+-+%26euro%3B820+billion+in+2050.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3Eb.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BClosing+gender+gaps+in+STEM+education+would+have+a+positive+impact+on+employment.%26nbsp%3B+Total+EU+employment+would+rise+by+850+000+to+1+200+000+by+2050.+These+jobs+are+forecasted+mostly+in+the+long+term+as+employment+rates+will+rise+only+after+more+women+studying+STEM+finish+their+education.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+many+factors+impacting+education%2C+skills+and+career+development.+We+need+to+understand+these+factors+so+that+inclusivity+opportunities+can+be+addressed.+If+these+are+not+addressed%2C+it+will+drive+further+inequality+among+these+workforces.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+equal+workforce+in+STEM+is+vital+for+many+reasons%2C+however+it+is+not+a+simple+problem+to+solve.+If+we+are+committed+to+evolving+our+workforce+to+be+more+gender-equal%2C+and+ensure+diversity+of+thought%2C+we+need+to+take+the+correct+steps+towards+achieving+this.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Government%2C+business%2C+and+society+need+to+work+together+in+order+to+make+this+viable.+Starting+in+homes%2C+parents+will+need+to+understand+what+STEM+careers+are+available+to+their+children+and+encourage+them+to+get+into+these+fields+after+school.+Companies+need+to+get+more+involved+with+educating+the+community+by+reskilling+and+upskilling%2C+and+government+needs+to+speed+up+the+roll-out+of+STEM+%26ndash%3B+in+particular+technology+in+schools+throughout+South+Africa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+future+workforce+can+be+an+equal+one+but+the+work+must+start+now+to+drive+these+changes%2C+in+order+for+this+to+become+a+reality+sooner+rather+than+later.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E

5+lessons+in+continuity+for+distributed+technology+teams %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDistributedTeams.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFew+can+argue+that+2020+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+full+of+worldwide+rollercoasters+%26ndash%3B+the+biggest+being+the+global+COVID-19+pandemic.+Due+to+the+accelerated+spread+of+the+virus%2C+many+organisations+have+been+forced+to+adapt+to+a+remote+working+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+companies+have+been+working+with+distributed+teams+for+years.+For+most+organisations%2C+this+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+by+choice%2C+but+rather+due+to+the+shortage+of+skills+in+the+industry.+In+such+a+globalised+world%2C+building+the+right+technology+team+with+the+right+skills%2C+experience+and+chemistry+is+very+unlikely+to+happen+in+one+location.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+have+been+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D59112%22%3Erunning+distributed+and+remote+teams%3C%2Fa%3E+for+some+time+now%2C+and+so+are+fortunate+enough+to+not+be+too+disrupted+by+these+unforeseen+changes.+Below+are+5+lessons+we%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to+share+with+others+in+industry+who+are+perhaps+finding+themselves+in+unfamiliar+territory%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+1%3A+Your+technological+workforce+will+adapt+easily.+Be+sure+to+pay+attention+to+non-technical+team+members+who+might+need+support.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Developers%2C+technologists+and+tinkerers+are+usually+content+with+working+in+solitude.+They+are+used+to+installing+and+configuring+tools%2C+and+having+their+workload+managed+via+a+virtual+SCRUM+board+on+Jira+or+Azure+DevOps.+This+means+their+workflow+is+the+least+impacted+in+a+remote+delivery+environment.+On+the+other+hand%2C+analysts%2C+scrum+masters%2C+product+owners%2C+subject-matter+specialists+and+other+less+technical+roles+have+a+disproportionately+harder+challenge+being+as+effective+as+they+would+have+been+in+a+fully+co-located+working+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+disruptive+times+like+these%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+establish+what+degree+of+frequent+communication+is+required.+A+well-balanced+distributed+team+should+have+low-comms+roles+making+an+effort+to+support+the+high-comms+roles%2C+and+recognise+that+this+might+be+a+more+difficult+adjustment+for+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+2%3A+Ensure+there%26rsquo%3Bs+someone+to+bridge+the+gap.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+running+a+distributed+team%2C+there+is+often+a+gap+between+the+remote+team+and+the+on-site+business+team.+This+gap+can+cause+anything+from+delays+in+feedback+from+business+to+overall+patchy+communication+between+the+teams.+Having+somebody+%26ldquo%3Bon+the+inside%26rdquo%3B+is+critical+for+all+distributed+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+logistically+possible%2C+there+should+ideally+be+at+least+one+allocated+person+from+the+distributed+team+who+is+physically+based+at+the+business.+This+person+needs+to+be+specifically+tasked+with+helping+the+remote+team+by+working+closely+with+the+business%2C+and+acting+as+a+translator+and+clarification+layer+between+your+distributed+engineering+team+and+the+business.+When+urgent+feedback+is+required+or+if+there+are+blockers+preventing+progress+during+the+project%2C+having+an+ally+to+receive+mandates+or+requirements+is+immeasurably+valuable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+3%3A+Culture+is+critical.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+completely+new+to+running+a+remote+team%2C+focusing+on+culture+is+probably+more+important+now+than+ever.+Switching+to+distributed+model+is+not+an+easy+transition+%26ndash%3B+especially+if+it%26rsquo%3Bs+done+abruptly.+Digital+tools+will+go+a+long+way+during+these+transitions%2C+but+focusing+on+team+culture+will+take+it+a+lot+further.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+disregard+the+importance+of+how+people+interact+to+solve+problems%2C+socialise+and+support+each+other.+This+might+be+a+good+time+to+relook+at+your+team+charter+and+ensure+that+the+unique+attributes+that+kept+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+culture+alive+are+still+implemented%2C+even+when+working+remotely.+Over+time%2C+this+will+result+in+a+culture+of+delivery+regardless+of+which+working+model+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+4%3A+Collaboration+is+easy%2C+communication+is+hard.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Teams+often+have+a+big+push+towards+collaboration+when+working+remotely.+There+is+no+need+to+start+stressing+about+collaboration.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+only+as+difficult+as+it+always+was%2C+and+only+as+good+as+your+communication.+This+is+why+you+need+to+focus+on+communication+instead.+Communication+in+distributed+or+remote+teams+is+extremely+challenging%2C+and+therefore+collaboration+becomes+more+difficult.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGood+collaboration+flows+from+good+communication%2C+and+if+you+spend+time+and+effort+on+improving+comms+in+your+team%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+naturally+get+better+at+collaborating.+The+biggest+communication+challenges+in+running+distributed+teams+are+availability+and+responsiveness.+You+need+to+establish+when+each+team+member+is+available+during+the+day+and+agree+on+how+frequently+everyone+responds+to+requests+or+enquiries.+Lack+of+availability+and+responsiveness+in+teams+create+bottlenecks+that+will+delay+the+success+of+the+project.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+challenge+here+is+not+the+administrative+tasks+of+potentially+moving+your+project+backlog+to+a+virtual+application+or+using+digital+tools+to+collaborate.+It+is+rather+fostering+a+communication+environment+that+allows+for+availability+and+responsiveness+to+thrive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+5%3A+Mistakes+will+be+made.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Change+is+difficult+and+can+often+be+frustrating.+Very+rarely+will+teams+pick+up+a+new+working+model+without+some+hurdles+along+the+way+%26ndash%3B+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+okay.+Learning+to+use+new+communication+tools+and+facing+other+difficulties+like+portraying+tone+and+body+language+correctly+will+be+an+adaptation+for+any+team.+Have+patience+with+each+other+and+go+through+these+changes+as+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+many+organisations+who+are+currently+not+using+a+remote+working+model+by+choice+but+rather+due+to+circumstances%2C+this+is+the+ideal+opportunity+to+see+the+potential+this+model+has+to+offer.%26nbsp%3B+When+you%26rsquo%3Bre+capable+and+confident+in+how+you+operate+projects+with+a+distributed+workforce%2C+scaling+teams+becomes+substantially+easier+because+you+can+source+and+manage+them+anywhere.+There+is+also+value+in+running+the+right+distributed+team+versus+the+wrong+co-located+team.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+view+a+remote+working+model+as+a+present+complication%2C+but+rather+as+an+opportunity+to+prove+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+determination+when+faced+with+challenges%2C+and+prepare+your+business+for+new+ways+of+working.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Few+can+argue+that+2020+hasn%E2%80%99t+been+full+of+worldwide+rollercoasters+%E2%80%93+the+biggest+being+the+global+COVID-19+pandemic.+Due+to+the+accelerated+spread+of+the+virus%2C+many+organisations+have+been+forced+to+adapt+to+a+remote+working+model.
    
["Teams and culture"]

Innovation+thrives+in+a+culture+of+cultures %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FInnovationthrivesinacultureofcultures.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+as+a+business+concept+has+many+definitions.+At+its+core%2C+the+central+theme+of+innovation+is+the+successful+delivery+of+an+idea+that+brings+positive+value+to+a+company+and+its+customers.+However%2C+where+there+is+a+large+diversity+of+thought+when+it+comes+to+the+subject%2C+is+how+to+successfully+build+a+%26ldquo%3Bculture+of+innovation%26rdquo%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIs+it+implementing+new+processes%3F+Is+it+investing+in+collaboration+technologies+and+services%3F+Is+it+ensuring+employees+have+the+freedom+to+fail%3F+Is+it+setting+up+innovation+labs%3F+Or+is+it+the+CEO+purely+stating+the+company+will+now+%26ldquo%3Binnovate%26rdquo%3B%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+no+silver+bullet+and+most+of+the+above+can+be+parts+of+a+greater+strategy+to+foster+a+culture+of+innovation.+%28Side+note+%26ndash%3B+leadership+is+critical+but+it+is+an+ongoing+commitment%2C+not+a+singular+sermon+from+above.%29+But+like+so+many+things+in+business%2C+innovation+starts+with+the+makeup+of+the+people+within+a+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+starts+with+people+coming+up+with+great+ideas.+The+nature%2C+quality+and+quantity+of+these+ideas+can+be+impacted+by+multiple+factors+%26ndash%3B+the+underlying+company+culture%2C+access+to+technology+and+resources%2C+the+ever-important+factor+of+time+to+ideate+amongst+many+others+%26ndash%3B+but+always+comes+back+to+the+source%2C+which+is+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+starting+point+being+people%2C+what+is+the+best+strategy+of+ensuring+that+the+initial+idea+factory+of+business+is+in+the+best+position+to+drive+a+culture+and+output+of+innovation%3F+The+quantity+and+quality+of+ideas+are+most+positively+impacted+by+a+diversity+of+thought+and+this+is+achieved+through+the+diversity+of+your+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFocusing+on+evolving+the+diversity+of+the+people+within+your+business+across+all+the+usual+factors+of+demographics%2C+education+and+experience+will+organically+diversify+and+strengthen+the+ideation+process.+This+allows+your+people+to+bring+their+exposure+from+different+cultures+that+they+have+experienced+throughout+their+personal+and+professional+lives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+that+is+just+one+part+of+it.+It+is+arguably+even+more+important+to+ensure+within+any+ideation+process%2C+session+or+project+to+bring+in+people+from+multiple+disciplines+even+if+their+roles+and%2For+expertise+don%26rsquo%3Bt+naturally+fit.+A+technology-focused+ideation+project+for+an+app-based+development+team+may+not+seem+like+the+place+for+the+brand+marketing+intern+to+come+up+with+an+amazing+idea+or+feature.+Through+their+experience+as+a+frequent+app+user+who+spent+six+months+travelling+through+Europe+before+starting+their+role%2C+for+example%2C+will+give+them+a+far+different+perspective.+This+will+allow+them+to+provide+an+insight+that+a+room+of+app+developers+would+probably+never+come+up+with%2C+but+those+developers+than+then+use+their+expertise+to+take+the+idea+and+make+it+the+next+major+feature+release.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+can+interchange+%26ldquo%3Bbrand+marketing+intern%26rdquo%3B+with+anyone+within+a+business+as+ideas+don%26rsquo%3Bt+come+from+a+qualification+but+a+lifetime+of+experiences+unique+to+each+person.+The+more+diverse+those+experiences+and+exposure+to+varied+cultures+only+widens+the+scope+of+thinking+within+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+when+thinking+of+how+to+create+a+culture+of+innovation+that+thrives%2C+start+with+your+people%2C+create+an+environment+to+foster+thinking%2C+give+them+the+time+and+the+tools+to+create%2C+look+at+the+cultures+they+have+experienced+and+always+expand+the+diversity+of+these+cultures+to+foster+a+successful+one+unique+to+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
Innovation+as+a+business+concept+has+many+definitions.+At+its+core%2C+the+central+theme+of+innovation+is+the+successful+delivery+of+an+idea+that+brings+positive+value+to+a+company+and+its+customers.+However%2C+where+there+is+a+large+diversity+of+thought+when+it+comes+to+the+subject%2C+is+how+to+successfully+build+a+%E2%80%9Cculture+of+innovation%E2%80%9D.

gineering+to+the+processes+of+product+design+and+requirements+specification.+Technology+teams+need+to+be+able+to+make+informed+decisions+no+matter+the+situation+they+find+themselves+in.+They+are+closer+to+business+than+ever%2C+they+have+access+to+customers%2C+and+are+making+more+and+more+decisions+themselves+internally.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIndividuals+who+can+learn+faster+but+without+the+requisite+tech+experience+may+outperform+average+or+weak+team+members+with+perfect+tech+experience%2C+in+a+short+period+of+time.+We+need+to+consider+different+competencies+in+the+new+skills+profile+for+tech+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSkillsprofile-28.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWhen+recruiting%2C+organising+and+training+your+technology+teams%2C+there+needs+to+be+a+renewed+understanding+of+which+skills+really+are+critical%2C+and+which+would+be+a+perk.+The+new+face+of+technology+skills+prioritises+thinking%2C+engagement+and+problem+solving.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E1.+Individuals+need+to+have+the+ability+to+solve+problems+and+show+a+rational+thought+process.+This+is+determined+by+seeing+whether+they+can+articulate+decisions+made+on+their+current+or+previous+projects.+Presenting+ideas+and+communicating+a+vision+is+imperative%2C+as+is+listening+and+understanding+concepts+in+a+team.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E2.+A+well-rounded+team+member+needs+to+understand+the+fundamentals+of+their+craft+%28development%2C+analysis%2C+data%2C+UX+etc%29.+For+team+members+this+means+truly+understanding+core+process%2C+tools+and+pattern+from+their+own+perspective+%28not+the+textbook%29.+For+analysts%2C+this+could+be+requirements+elicitation%2C+communication+and+documentation%2C+and+for+software+engineers+it+could+be+languages%2C+data+structures+and+algorithms+or+design+patterns.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E3.+Culture-fit+is+important%2C+many+softer+skills+will+make+team+members+much+easier+to+work+with.+Coachability%2C+approachability+and+empathy+are+key+ones+here.+As+collaboration+extends+beyond+the+traditional+IT+borers+and+into+business%2C+product%2C+ops+and+even+outside+the+organisation%2C+these+people-oriented+skills+are+now+critical+to+engineering+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3ESmaller%2C+self-organising+teams+and+high+pace+delivery+models+are+becoming+the+norm+because+it+means+better+products+which+are+in+the+market+sooner.+The+type+of+skills+required+for+these+teams+is+dramatically+different+to+what+we+needed+just+5+years+ago.+We+need+to+deprioritise+focusing+solely+on+industry+experience+and+technical+expertise.+The+skills+profile+for+our+technology+delivery+teams+has+changed%2C+and+we+need+to+rethink+how+we+train%2C+recruit+and+orient+our+cultures+towards+these+new+skillsets.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
The+way+we+build+software+is+changing.+The+way+we+run+our+processes+is+changing.+The+reason+is+simple%3A+we+have+to+deliver+faster.+As+pressure+to+compete+for+customers+in+the+digital+world+continues+to+mount%2C+we+have+been+re-arranging+our+ways+of+work+to+embrace+the+chaos+in+modern+industry%2C+with+shortened+delivery+cycles.
    
["Teams and culture"]
  
Changing face of skills-LinkedIn, Twitter, Faceboo...
